1b1(1): sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las bzod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / bam po drug cu rtsa gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
1b2(1): dpa' sems kyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bgyis pa dang / grangs ma mchis pa'i grangs ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de/ bcom ldan
1b3(1): 'das ji ltar na grangs ma mchis pa bstan pa lags/ tshad ma mchis pa dang / mu ma mchis pa dang // kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / bgrang du ma rung ba dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / bsam
1b4(1): gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa'i yang brjod du ma mchis pa lags na ji ltar bstan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'
1b5(1): sems kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa de ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten thams cad grangs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis
1b6(1): mkhyen pa'i don 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu bar bsams pa legs so// de bas na skyes bu dam pa legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o// 
1b7(1): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o// zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das las phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa de la 'di skad ces
1b8(1): bya ste/ brgya stong phrag brgyan bye ba'o// bye ba bye ba na khod khod do// khong khong khong khong na thad dgu'o// thad dgu thang dgun khrig khrig go// khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so// thams thams thams thams na myang myid do// myang mying myad
1b9(1): mying na gang ya'o// gang ya gang yan pan bun no// phan bun pa na phun na phyar phyur ro// phyur phyur phyar phyur na lcag sdig go// lhag skyig lcag sdig na byang bying ngo // byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo// chem che mche ma chem na phyal byol lo// phyal phyol
1b10(1): phyal phyol na khyung khyud do// khyung khyung khyung khyud na zer zer ro// zar zer zar zor na khrib khrig// khrib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so// ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o// cho ma tshoman khram khrim mo// khram khrim khram khrim na nub po// na ba nub na ba nub na
2a1(1): @/ sang sang ngo // sang sang sang sang na brgyud yas so// brgyud yas brgyud yas na gtang yas so// gtad yas gtang yas na bkra yar ro// bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so// gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do// 
2a2(1): mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum mo// la ma lum lam lum na yal yol lo// yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo// khral khrul khrel khrul na thung thud do// thung thung thung thud nabs ma phyod do// bsam phyod pas ma pyod na brang breng ngo // brang bre brang breng
2a3(1): na 'grod yas so// 'grod yas 'grod yas na bsngo yas so// bsngo las bsngo yas na zad yag go// zad yag zad yag na 'phro bkye'o// 'phro ba kye 'phro bkye na rtse 'phyo'o// rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyon yod tan no// yod tan yod tan na drug g.yo so// brug g.yos brug
2a4(1): g.yos nasang yal lo// sang yal sang yal na thig yug go// thig yug thig yug na yi 'phyo'o// yid 'phyo yid 'phyon na pa na Ta neb bo// na ba na ban pa neb na khrig thams so// khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo// yal yal yal yal na bgrang yas so// 
2a5(1): bkrung las dgrang las nadrug pas lo// thug sa mjug sa la na shang shang ngo // lung shang shang shang na lag lag go// yag yags gsagan tham thim mo// nam thim tham ziman rlom bskum lo// rlos pasgras rlom skas na gzhal 'byos so// gnas
2a6(1): 'phyos gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo// gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med de// gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to// gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal brim mo// gzhal brim gzhal thim na gar gzha'o// gar gzhal gar gzhal
2a7(1): na gzhal sang so// gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhel thago// gzhal thag ga zhal na gzhal phul lo// gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal zhi'o// gzhal zhig zhal zhin 'phyo 'gyur ro// 'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro// nyar nye nyar nyer na
2a8(1): phyag phyig go// phyag phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo// zal zul zal zul nes las la lo// sa la sa la sa las lan g.yo ldeg go// g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no// phan phun phan phun na gnang ya'o// brnang yab rdang yan rem 'drol lo// rem 'drol
2a9(1): rim 'drol na rdzi ngang // rdzi ngang rdzi ngadan rdzi rdul lo// rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo// phun yos phun yol nang da ngang do// nga dang dang dung dran bgrang brtsi'o// bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsin zab bgrang ngo // zab bgrang zab bgrang na dag 'a rkyang ngo // dga' rkyang dga'
2a10(1): rgyang na gzhung 'dal to// gzhung 'dal gzhung 'das na khrug pyad do// khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'ol byed do// 'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so// gdab yas gdab yas na bcal yas so// gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yal lo// bgrang yal bgral na
2b1(1): khyim 'phye'o// byim 'phye byim 'phyon yam me mo// yam me yam men bskal yas so// bskal yas bskal yas na lnga pa ldeb bo// lngab ldepa ldipa lnga pa na 'phen chad do// 'phan chad 'phan chad na phang phung ngo // pang phung phang phung na khe'u'o// khe'u tsang khe'u tsang
2b2(1): na zhung zung ngo // zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo// mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rdul lo// mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so// yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lab po// bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo// lam lo ma lam lom na/ 
2b3(1): bsnyad yas so// bskad yas bskas yas na lang ling ngo // lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib bo// lnga ldi lngapa ljib na mi brtsal to// mi brtsal mi brtsal na 'bya mo yas so// 'byam yas 'byam yas nang 'grang ngo // nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos
2b4(1): yal lo// smos yal smos yal na bkra cal lo// bkra cal bkra N+Dal na lo rgyas so// lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo// 'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gam gum mo// gam gum gam gu ma na ya la lo'o// la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so// bgrang 'phyos
2b5(1): bgrang 'byos na bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o// bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa na dpag yas so// dpag yas dpag yas na dpag la bsgres pa'o// dpag yas la bsgres pa dpagayas la bsgres na yal phyong ngo // yal phyong
2b6(1): yal phyong na yal phyong la bsgres pa'o// yal phyong la bskus pa yal phyong la bsgres na mu yal to// mu yal mu yul na mu yal la bsgres pa'o// mu yil la bsgres pa mu yal la bsgres na bgrang yol lo// bgrang yol bgrang yol na bgrang yol/ byaM
2b7(1): la bsgres pa'o// bgrang yol la bsgres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na mi 'jal to// mi 'jal mi 'dral na mi 'jal la bsgres pa'o// mi 'jal la bsgres pa mi 'jal la bsgres na bos ma phyed do// bsam phyod bsam phyod na bsam phyod la bsgres pa'o// 
2b8(1): bsam pyod la bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres na mtha' 'byam mo// mtha' 'byam mtha' 'byam na dpag thag go// dpag thag pag thag na dpag zug la bsgres pa'o// dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na brjod du med pa'o// brjod
2b9(1): du med pa brjod du med pa na brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'o// brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du med pa la bsgres na// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b10(1): kyi rgyal po la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa ni// brjod du med pas thams cad 'tshang bar 'gyur// brjod du med pa bskal par brjod byas kyang // brjod du med la mthar thug gang yang med// brjod du med pa'i
3a1(1): sang sa rgyas zhing gernams// thams cadagacig ste rdus du gyu blags shing // gcig rje la'ang gcig po brjod med par // thams cad rjod du med par rab tu 'jugag/ zhing rnams brjod du med pa'i brjod
3a2(1): ga med pa// skad cig sems kyis kun kyang rab tu 'jig/ skad cig re re 'jig pa brjod du med// 'jig pas bskal pa mang po zad par byed// dbye ba'i bye breg dbye ba brjod du med// rdul la 'jug pa brjod du med pa ste// bgrang ba'i tshul gyis
3a3(1): brjod du med pa yis// bskal pa brjod du med pa zad par byed// rdul dang rdul la mtshan nyid brjod du med// brjod du med pa'i rdul rnams kun bzung ste// bskal par kun tu bzang po bstod byas kyang // kun tu bzang po de bsngags mthar
3a4(1): mi thug/ brjod du med pa'i kun tu bzang po rnams// skra rtse re re kun la yang dag 'jug/ skra rtse gcig bzhin yul rnams kun la ste// chos dbyings ma lus ji snyed de bzhin no// skra rtse re re zhing gi khams kyi rnams// brjod du med par yang
3a5(1): dag 'jug par byed// khams dbyings sgra'i rtse mos gzhal du rung // zhing rnams thams cad brjod du med pa'o// skra rtse de las sangs rgyas zhing gi rnams// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba mang // bskal pa mi mthun zhing rnams brjod du
3a6(1): med skal ba 'thun pa'i zhing yang brjod du med// skra rtse gcig po de la brjod med pa'i// zhing rnams dag pa brjod du med pa dang // sna tshogs rgyun rnams brjod du med pa 'ged// rnam pa du ma tha dad du med// ming gi tshogs kyang brjod du med
3a7(1): pa ste// sgra rtse gcig la thams cad rab tu gzhol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams re re ra yang // brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa yin// sangs rgyas ra rer brjod du med pa yi// spu rnams ba spu'i khung bur byin gyis rlob// spu gcig
3a8(1): nas kyang brjod du med pa'i// kha dog sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'gyur// spu gcig nas kyang brjod du med pa yi// 'od zer brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed// 'od zer re re las kyang brjod med pa'i// pad mo brjod du med pa mang po 'byung // pad mor de la yang
3a9(1): brjod med pa'i lam brjod du med pa mang po 'byung // brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa yi// lom la dog brjod du med pa ste// khadog ri de bzhin brjod du med// pad mo ri ri lom brjod du med// le ma re re'i 'od zer brjod du med/ kha dog thadad sa
3a10(1): pa brjod du med// kha dog ri brjod med de dag las// 'od zer mang po brjod du med pa 'byung // 'od zer kun la brjod med zla ba 'byung // zla ba las kyang zla ba brjod du med// zla ba re re las kyang brjod med pa'i// kha dog mtha' mas ldan pa'i 'od mang
3b1(1): 'byung rje kha dog re re las cung brjod med pa'i// nyi ma kun tu snang ba brjod du med// nyi ma re re las kyang brjod med pa'i// kha dog brjod du med pa sna tshogs 'byung // kha dog re las kyang brjod med pa'i// 'od zer brjed du med pa rab tu 'byung // 'od zer rere
3b2(1): la yang brjod med pa'i// seng ge'i khri mang brjod med sna tshogs gnas// seng+ge'i khri mang sna tshogs re re las// 'od gsal brjod du med pa'i brjod med 'byung // kha dog sna tshogs brjod du med pa dang // dag pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa 'byung // 'od
3b3(1): gsal re re las kyang brjod med pa'i// rnam par snang ba sna tshogs rab tu 'byung // rnam par snang sna tshogs re re las// brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa yi// brjod du med pa bsgres pa'i grangs snyed kyi// ri rab pad me'i mchog dang ldan pa 'byung // ri rab re'i
3b4(1): tshad kyang 'di rtsam ste// brjod du med pa brjod du med pa yi// zhing rnams brjod du med pa yod pa'i rnams// ri rab gcig gis yongs su rgyas pa ste// brjod du med pa brjod du med pa yi// ri rab lhag ma rnams kyang de tsam mo// de dag bshig ste rdul phran char
3b5(1): blags na// yon tan legs pa brjod med de snyed ldan// de bzhin bye brag khyad par gzung byas kyang // brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa ste// brjod du med la bsgres pa yongs bzung zhing // 'od zer brjod du med pa rab tu 'byung // tshigs bcad brjod du med pa
3b6(1): gsal ba'i rnams// rnam par dbye ba brjod du med pa 'byung // brjod med pa'i 'jig rten khams su rgyu// de bzhin sangs rgyas brjod du med pa 'byung // brjod du med pa brjod du med pa yi// skad cig re re bden pa brjod du med// phyi ma'i mtha'i mu mthar bstan
3b7(1): byas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mu med do// sangs rgyas re re zhing yang brjod med pa// brjod du med la bsgres pa gsal dag pa'i// dbyangs kyi yan lag brjod med gsal dag par// 'khor lo brjod du med pa rab tu bskor// 'khor lo ra
3b8(1): bskor bas brjod med pa'i// mdo sde brjod du med pa mang po 'byung // mdo sde brjod du med re re las// chos kyi rnam grangs brjod du med pa 'byung // chos rnams brjod du med pa re re las// shin tu bstan chos brjod du med pa 'byung // shin tu bstan pa/ 
3b9(1): brjod de du der yang // sems can brjod du med pa rnam par 'dul// de dag sgra rtswa gcig la 'jug pa ste// skra gcig ci bzhin ma lus kun// brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa ste// bskal pa brjod du med pazad par byed// chags med sems kyang
3b10(1): brjod du med pa ste// de dag sangs rgyas brjod du med sprul pa// sangs rgyas ri brjod du med pa las// bsgres pa'i tshul du sprus pa kun tu 'byung // phyogs rnams brjod du med pa kun tu 'dong // de dag sku yang brjod du med pa ste// rnam par bye sku de
4a1(1): / bzhin brjod du med// kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa grangs med do// / sangs rgyas zhing tshad brjod du med par yang / sems can brjod med rnam par ston par byed/ rnam par bstan pa de dag re re
4a2(1): go/ zhing rdo rnga sems can brjod du med pa yongs su spyod// de dag rgyan bzang rnam phye brjod du med// de dag rdzu 'phrul mang po'ang brjod du med// / rnam dag dbang yang brjod du med pa ste// cho 'phrul rnams kyang
4a3(1): brjod du med pa 'byung // rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa ste// spyod yul rnams kyang de bzhin brjod du med// de dag byin gyi rlabs kyang brjod med de/ 'jig rten brjod du med pa'i khams su 'byung / 
4a4(1): chos tshul rnam dag brjod du med pa ste/ tshul gyi mdo yang brjod du med pa 'byung // mdo sde re re las kyang brjod med pa'i// brjod du med chos yang dag rab tu 'byung // chos rnams re re las kyang brjod
4a5(1): med pa'i// shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pa 'byung // bstan pa re re zhing yang brjod du med pa'i// rtog par shes pa brjod du med pa 'byung // rtogs par shes pa re res brjod med pa'i/ 
4a6(1): sems can brjod du med pa rnam par 'dug / tshul 'thun chos kyang brjod du med pa s+ho// / tshul 'thun sems kyang brjod du med pa 'byung // mi mthun chos kyang brjod du med pa ste/ mi mthun sems kyang
4a7(1): bzhin brjod du med// dbang po mi mthun brjod du med pa ste/ tshig gi rnam pa mi mthun brjod du med// de dag brjod du med pa rnam par 'dul// skad cig re rer spyod yul gyur pa la// brjod du med
4a8(1): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ston// de bas de dag brjod du med pa yin/  ga/ de la dus kyang brjod du med pa ste/  / bskal pa tha dad brjod du med pa 'byung / bstan pa de dag brjod du med pa 'jug/ grangs kyi tshul
4a9(1): gyis de dge brjod du med/ sgra rtse gcig la brjod du med pa yi/ yangs dang dog pa rnam pa mang po gnas/ dag dang nyon mongs brjod du med pa ste/ rgya che phra ba de bzhin brjod du med/ zhing gcig la
4a10(1): yang brjod du med pa yi// bye brag rnam par 'drebs zhing mi mthun/ tshed dang grangs su de dag brjod du med/  dang/ sgra rtse re re la yang yang dag gzhol/ gsangs rgyas zhing rnams brjod du med gnas kyang / gas rtse
4b1(1): ga du dog par mi 'gyur / den ga nod pa'i rnam pa gcig med pa/ brjod du med pa yang dgu bcug zhos/ zhing rnams de dag 'dre bar mi 'gyur te/ ga'adre ba'i shes pa de dag kun pa med/ gcig
4b2(1): kyang brjod med shin tu yangs pa ste/ zhing gcig ci bzhin de bzhin thams cad zhing / sgra rtse gcig bzung brjod du med pa yis// mkhas pas mkha' dbyings gzhal du rus srid kyi/ skra rtse gcig gi
4b3(1): zhing rnams mang po dag ga shin tu bstan pas brjod du med pa yin/ sgra rtse gcig tu'ang de bzhin sku 'jug ste/ brjod du med pa gcig nas gcig brgyud pa'i/ sgra rtse bzung ba brjod du med pa ste/ 
4b4(1): skra rtse de dag mthar thug gang yang med// bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yi// yun ring brjod du med pa bzung byas shing // tshul 'dir brjod du med pa 'dzud pa byed// bskal pa kun kyang de bzhin
4b5(1): brjod du med/ mtha' dang dpung med tshul 'di gzung byas shing / bstan pa brjod du med pa'i spyod yul gyis/ de dgra brjod du med par rab tu 'jugabarjod du med pa'i 'jug tshul 'di yin no// mid kyi
4b6(1): dbang po brjod du med pa dang / 26/ rnam par gnon pa brjod du med pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa yis/ 5/ phyogs rnams brjod du med pa kun tu 'gro de dag sems kyang brjod du med pa ste// rgya che yangs
4b7(1): pa brjod du med pas nas// de dag dmigs pa brjod du med pa ste// des ni brjod med kun gyi mthar phyin byed// de bzhin lus kyi las kyang brjod med de// ngag gi las kyang brjod du med pa yin// de bzhin sems kyang // 
4b8(1): brjod du med pa 'byung / mos bdag pa dag kyang brjod du med/ de dag rnam shes dag pa mdzod du med// de dag shes rab gsal ba brjod du med/ brjod du med pa'i tshul rnams yongs su gnon// the tsom brjod/ 
4b9(1): du med parab tu gcod/ de dag 'byung babarjod du med pa dang // yongs su gnon pa brjod du med pa yis/ de dag ting 'dzin brjod du med pa ste/ des ni brjod med thams cad 'da' bar byed/ sems can thams cad
4b10(1): brjod du med pa ste/ zhing rnams kun kyang de bzhin brjod du med/ sems can lus rnams brjod du med pa ste/ de dag bsam pa brjod du med pa yin/ de dag las kyi rnam smin brjod med de// de dag mos pa de bzhin
5a1(1): ga brjod du med// khams kyi rnam pa tha dang brjod du med// de dag bye brag khyad par brjod du med// de dag lus mang brjod du med pa ste/ gang 'byung ba de dag brjod du meng // ji ltar 'byung ba
5a2(1): 'ang brjod du med pa ste/ 'di la 'byung ba'ang brjod du med pa yin// yang dag 'jug pa brjod du med pa shes/ de dag tshul gyis lam yang brjod du med/ de dag rab tu ston pa'ang brjod du med/ dus rnams brjod du
5a3(1): med par shin tu byung / bdag nyid che ba 'di 'dra'i snying rje can// brjod du med pa 'jig rten dag na rgyu// de dag lus rnams brjod du med pa yis// brjod du med pa rnams la yang dag 'jug// sems can gtso bo brjod du med pa'i rnams// mthong zhing shes
5a4(1): 'dra brjod du med pa yis// tshes rnams brjod du med bzhipa byed// sangs rgyas de dge brjod du med pa ston// de dag lus rnams brjod du med pa yis// de nas zhing rnams brjod du med par 'dong // rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa yis// zhing rnams brjod
5a5(1): du med pa kun tu 'do// de dag lus rnams brjod du med pa yis// skyes bu khyu mchog brjod du med pa la// rnam pa tha dad brjod du med pa yis// mchod pa brjod du med pa rab tu byed// rin chen dag pa brjod du med pa dang // me tog sna tshogs de bzhin brjod
5a6(1): med dang // sris dang byed mchog brjod du med pa yis// rgyal ba brjod du med pa bsnyen bkur byed// de dag ngang pa brjod du med pa ste// mos pa dag da'ang brjod du med pa'in// bas ma de bzhin brjod du med pa yis// sangs rgyas brjod du med la phyag kya
5a7(1): 'tshalang sbyin zhing gtong ba brjod du med pa ste// ming ma'i sems kyang de bzhin brjod du med// yongs su gtong ba brjod du med pa ste// thaMd gtong ba de bzhin brjod du med// tshul khrims rnam par dag par brjod du med// yid gsal dang bde bzhin brjod du med/ 
5a8(1): rgyal ba bsngags shing bstod pa brjod med// zhi ba'i sa yang de bzhin brjod du med// de dag bzod pa brjod du med pa ste// mi skya'i chos kyang de bzhin brjod du med// rab tu zhi ba'i brjod du med dang ldan// zhi ba'i sa yang de bzhin brjod du med// brtson 'grus
5a9(1): phung po brjod du med pa ste// zhum meng sems kyang brjod du med pa yin// phyir mi ldog pa'ang brjod du med pa ste// mi skul sems kyang brjod du med pa'o// bsam gtan mdzod ni brjod du med pa ste// rtogs par gzhog chos de bzhin brjod du med// bsam
5a10(1): gtan zhi yin brjod du med pa ste// brjod du med pa'i bsam gtan rab tu shes// de dag shes rab brjod du med la zhugs// de bas ting 'dzin brjod du med pa ste// rab tu dben chos brjod du med dang ldan// sangs rgyas brjod du med la mngon par 'jug/ spyod pa'i sgo
5b1(1): brjod du med pa ste// de dag smon lam brjod du med pa yin// de dag skyed yul brjod du med pas ni// chos sgo dag pa brjod du mod pa yin// de dag chos stobs brjod du med pa ste// chos la gnas pa'ang brjod du med pa yin// de dag chos kyi dran pa brjod du med// 
5b2(1): de dag chos kyi dbyings kyang brjod du med// de dag ye shes brjod du med dang ldan// ye shes brjod du med la shin tu bslabs// de dag phung po khams kyang brjod du med// de dge brjod med ye shes mthar yang thug/ de dag chos kyi 'khor lo brjod du med// deng
5b3(1): chos kyi char 'bebs brjod du med// de dag chos kyi ye shes brjod du med// de dag chos kyi sprin kyang brjod du med// de dag rdzu 'phrul rnam par brjod med de// tshul dbyings brjod du med pa khong du chud// dngos med ye shes brjod du med pa ste// sems kyi skad cig de dag brjod
5b4(1): du med// brjod du med tshad rnam pa tha dad pa// skad bcig sems kyis brjod du med pa shes// zhing rnams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa ste// bton pa de dag brjod du med pa gnon// zhing rnams rnam phye brjod du med pa ste// rgyan kyang de bzhin brjod pa med pa yin// gzugs dang dbyings kyang
5b5(1): brjod du med pa ste// kha dog mdog kyang de bzhin brjod du med// khyad par sna tshogs brjod du med pa ste// rnam pa tha dad de bzhin brjod du med// dag dang nyon mongs brjod du med pa ste// rnam pa mi mthun ye shes brjod du med// sems can brjod du med pa rab tu shes// sems can khams
5b6(1): kyang brjod du med pa ste/ de dag las kyang de bzhin brjod du med/ sems can dag spyod pa'ang brjod du med/ dbang po dag kyang brjod du med pa ste// de dag sems kyang brjod du med pa yin// khams kyi rnam pa dag brjod du med/ de dag mos pa'ang de bzhin brjod du med/ de dag rnam
5b7(1): par spyod pa brjod du med// kun nas nyon mongs de bzhin brjod du med// rnam par byang ba'ang brjod du med pa ste// 'dul ba de bzhin brjod du med pa 'byung // lus kyi rnaM pa brjod du med pa dag/ brjod du med pa mngon par sprul byas shing // brtan pa brjod du med pa'i
5b8(1): non gtan byed// sems can brjod pa yongs su 'grel// de dag rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med// 'od rnams brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed// kha dog sna tshogs de bzhin brjod du med// sems can brjod du med pa rnam par spyod// 'od zer dra ba de bzhin
5b9(1): brjod du med// ba spu re re nas kyang brjod med pa'i// brjod du med pa mang po rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams brjod du med pa snang bar byed// yongs su gnon pa brjod du med pa dang // de bzhin 'byung brjod du med pa dang // rnam par gnon pa brjod du med pa yis// 
5b10(1): 'jig rten brjod du med pa rnam par 'dul// de dag lus kyi las kyang brjod du med// rnam dag tshig kyang de bzhin brjod du med// mtha' yas yid kyang brjod du med pa ste// spyod pa'i khyad par de bzhin brjod du med// ye shes brgyud kyang brjod du/ 
5b11(1): ba ste// khams rnams brjod du med pa khong du chud// brtan pa gzungs rnams brjod du med pa la// shin tu bslab pa brjod med byas pa yin// sgrang dbyangs brjod du med pa shes pa ste// rnam dag dbyangs kyang brjod du med pa yin// de dag bden pa dran
6a1(1): @#/ pa brjod du med// 'gro ba brjod du med pa shes par byed// de dag spyod lam brjod du med pa ste// nan tan rnam dag de bzhin brjod du med// bag tsha med pa brjod du med pa ste// 'jig rten brjod du med pa rab tu 'dul// de bzhin gshegs sras
6a2(1): brjod du med pa yi// rnam dag spyod pa brjod med 'di 'dra ste// de dag yon tan legs pa brjod du med// de dag zad pa med pa'ang brjod du med// 'jig rten mgon po brjod du med pa'i rnams// yon tan legs pa brjod du med pa gsung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
6a3(1): brjod du med// yon tan rnam dag de bzhin brjod du med// brtan pa gang la gnas pa brjod du med// gang gnas ye shes de yang brjod du me bskal pa ji snyed zad 'gyur brjod du med// de dag mthar thug med pa brjod du med// sangs rgyas shes byed yid 'ong brjod du med/ 
6a4(1): yang dag 'jug pa'i ye shes brjod du med// de dag brjod du med pa'i chos la 'jug/ de dag chags pa med pa'ang brjod du med// dus gsum bsam pa brjod du med pa ste// deng tshad gzung brjod du med pa yin// 'byung ba'i ye shes brjod du med pa ste// mi gnas gnas
6a5(1): pa'ang de bzhin brjod du med// spyod pa'i khyad par brjod du med pa ste// smon lam khyad par de bzhin brjod du med// smon lam rnam dag brjod du med pa ste// byang chub sgrub par bde bzhin brjod du med// sangs rgyas byang chub brjod du med pa la// de dag ye shes brjod du med pas byung // don
6a6(1): rnams brjod du med pa shes par byed// thams cad mkhyen chos de bzhin brjod du med// sangs rgyas kyang bya brjod rnyed pa la// rnam dag zhing yang brjod du med pa ste// de dag spyod pa'i stobs kyang brjod du med// de dag brjod du med par bsgom byas nas// skad cig gcig
6a7(1): tu brjod med mngon 'tshang rgya// de dag brjod du med pa'i rnam 'phrul ba// sangs rgyas brjod du med pa rab tu ston// de dag cho 'phrul brjod du med pa yis// 'jig rten pad+mo du med pa rab tu ston// brtan pa chos kyi 'khor lo brjod med pa// de dag brjod du med par rab tu skor// de dag
6a8(1): ston pa'ang brjod du med pa ste// 'jig rten phan 'dogs brjod du med pa byed// bskal pa brjod du med pa thams cad kyang // zad par 'gyur gyi yon tan brjod du med// yon tan dang ni legs pa brjod med pas// zad par mi nus de bzhin brjod du med// de dag mgon po brjod du med pa la/ 
6a9(1): tshigang dbang po brjod du med pa yis// bskal pa brjod du med par bstod byas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mthar thug med// phyogs bcu'i sems can ji skad yod pa'i rnams// ma lus thams cad pade bar gshegs gyur te// sangs rgyas gcig la'ang brjod du med pa yi/ 
6a10(1): sku ma pa thams cad brjod du med 'gyur la// sku rnams re re brjod du med pa yis// brjod du med pa'i dbu rnams mngar 'gyur la// dbu rnams re re brjod du med pa yi// brjod du med pa'i ljags yangs mngar 'gyur la// sngags yangs re re brjod du med pa yi// gsung zab brjod du med pa
6b1(1): brjod du mdzad de// dbyangs gcig gis kyang yon tan brjod med par// bskal pa brjod du med par bstod byas la// sangs rgyas gcig bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad de// sku gcig ci bzhin de bzhin thams cad sku// dbu gcig ji bzhin de bzhin thams cad dbu// ljags
6b2(1): gcig ji bzhin de bzhin thams cad ldags// dbyangs kyi yan lag ldan pas legs brjod kyang // bskal pa rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa'i// bskal pa mtha' las mur thug zad par 'gyur// lags pa chags med dag mthar thug mi 'gyur ro// rdul rtse gcig la brjod du med pa
6b3(1): yi pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba brjod du med// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po zhes bya yi// zhing rnams brjod du med la rab tu 'jug/ rdul rtse gcig la ji snyed yod pa yi// chos dbyings ji tsam thams cad ma lus par// rdul gyi zhing rnams brjod du med pa dang // 'byung bar 'gyur
6b4(1): zhing gzhan yang 'jig par 'gyur// rdub rtse gcig la mtha' nga dpung med pa'i// zhing rnams du mar bstan pa yang dag 'jug/ phyogs rnams rnam par dbye ba brjod du med// zhing rnams rgya mtshod bzhin brjod du med// zhing rnams re rerang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams// brjod du med
6b5(1): pa rnam par brtag bya ste// zhing gcig ji bzhin de bzhin zhing kun tu// de dag brjod du med pa'i lus su 'byung // de dag spyod pa'i mthu ni brjod du med pa ste// khyad par 'phags chos de bzhin brjod du med// de dag rdzu 'phrul brjod du med pa ste// chags med nyid kyang de bzhin brjod
6b6(1): du med// sgral 'jug pa brjod du med pa ste// sgral rten pa de bzhin brjod du med// de dag stobs bcu brjod du med pa ste// byang chub 'tshang byed bzhin brjod du med// rtogs pa dag pa brjod du med pa ste// chos dbyings yongs su gnon pa brjod du med// de dag mdzod shes
6b7(1): brjod du med pa ste// de dag nyid kyang brjod du med pa yin// tshad dang gangs kyang brjod du med pa ste// brtan pa de dag tshul bzhin rtogs par byed// mgon po'i tshul rnams brjod du med pa dag/ rnam par tshad med brtan pa yongs su gnon// ting 'dzin tha dad rnam pa sna
6b8(1): tshogs rnams// brjod du med la de dag rab tu 'jug/ spyod pa rnam dag brjod du med pa ste// brjod du med pa'i rgyal ba mngon du 'gyur// chags med sems kyang brjod du med pa ste// brjod du med pa'i gnas kyang rnam par gnon// spyod pa mtha' yas brjod du med pa
6b9(1): ste rdzu 'phrul brjod du med pa'ang rab tu ston// zhing rnams brjod du med pa shin tu shes//  phyir sangs rgyas brjod du med pa mthong // spyod pa'i mthu ni brjod du med pa yis// ye shes bad du med pa khrong du chud// de la 'gro ba med cing phyir ldog med pa ste/ brjod med pa'i yus la'ang rab tu 'jug/ 
8a1(1): zhing tu dam par gyu/ brjod du byed pa'i skas pa 'ad par byed/ tshul gyi rnam pa brjod du myed pa ste/ brjod du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang lob/ ye shes 'arjod du byed pa
8a2(1): rab tu 'byung // skad cig re rer brjod du byed pa btod// re re'i tshig gis brjod du myed pa'i// sangs rgyas brjod du myed pa rab tu shes// byang chub dus cig mngon par sangs rgyas pa// tha dad rus
8a3(1): su khong du chud par byed// de dag spra cher 'jug pa brjod du byed// shi nang tu phra la 'jug 'ang brjod du myed// rab tu bya che'i rgyud kyang brjod tu byed// sangs rgyas rnam par mthong ba 'ang brjod du
8a4(1): myed// sangs rgyas rigs la gang zhugs de dag gi// tshul gcig nyid kyang brjod du myed pa ste// de bas zhing rgyud brjod du skyed pa la/ rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i don tu kun tu 'jug/ zhing dang seMs
8a5(1): can de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams// pha dang khams sbyar brjod du myed pa dag/ brtan pas shes pa brjod du myed pa ste// dus gsume 'dzin pa brjod tu myed pa yin// / shin tu rgyas
8a6(1): pa chen po'i mnos// sangs rgyas phal po che shes pa las/ sems kyi rgyal pos dris nas grangs la 'jug pa ya naba'i le'u ste// sum bcu rtsa drug// 
8a7(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal pos// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhag kya thub pa'i sangs rgyas
8a8(1): kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed 'di'i bskal pa ji tsam pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams bdes pa yod pa'i nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgya bla'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams bdel ba yod pa'i bskal ji tsam pa de ni/ 
8a9(1): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rab tu 'jom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams dung spri gi rgyal mtshan gyi nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smig rgyal mtshan gyi bskas pa ci can
8a10(1): de bzhin gshegs pa spu bad mo shin tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams phyir myi ldog pa'i 'khon lo rab tu spon pa'i nyis zhag cig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor sa lo rab tu ldon pa'i
8b1(1): bskal pa ci tsam pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams smon ma bzang po'i nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rkyen gyi khams spon ma bzang po'i
8b2(1): bskal pa ci tsam pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snad ba'i snying po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po la nyin zhag gcig go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'od
8b3(1): bzang po'i bskal pa ci tsam pa de ni// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer gyis su'i pad mo la shind tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'dal bar dka' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go// kye
8b4(1): rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dal bar dkal ba'i bskal pa tsas de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par mkhyend pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jin
8b5(1): rten gyi khams rgyan dang ldan pa'i nyin zhag gcig go// ma'i du yi rten gyi gyis bya du na sa na cin noni/ yo ldan 'das de bzhin gshenas pa zhugs pa pa'i sang rgyas kyin 'a na gyi kyi da kyi na / kye des ga ra ra
8b6(1): bam rtso sung na ma na yonan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po bzhugs sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi 'ams pad mo'i rapa ma gyi nyon zhag gcig go/ bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten khams khams cad
8b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i dpyod pa' dang ldan pa yongs su kar ro// shin tu rgyas pa' chen po'i mdol/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// tshe'i tshad kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ 
8b8(1): sum brgyamam brgyan pa'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'// sems kyi rgyal pos yang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sbas pa/ kye rgyal po'i rdzam
8b9(1): dag shar phyogs logs na/ sngan cad byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ro drang srong byung ba zhes bya ba yod de// de la byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems pa'i 'khor sum brgya
9a1(1): dang ldan chos ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag lho/ phyogs logs na// sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ro dpal gyi phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
9a2(1): chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa chos stond to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag nub phyogs logs na/ sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i rdo rje 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya ba mau
9a3(1): de la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i gro' de bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sum brgya dang ldan pa che so ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang phyogs logs na/ sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs
9a4(1): pa'i ro// spos kyi phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de la byang chub sems dpal spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba byang chus sems dpa'i 'khor stong phrag gsum dang ldan pa chos ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag zhar phyogs logs na/ 
9a5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ro// spong ri du zhes bya ba yod de// de la byang chub sems dpal 'jam dpal zhesabya ba// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa chos
9a6(1): ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bya ba dang shar gyi phyogs mtshamasalogs na// sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ri// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i gnas rdo rje'i ri zhes bya ba yod de
9a7(1): de la byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor brgya phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa chos gnod to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gar dang / rtswa ma phyogs mtshams
9a8(1): logs na// sngon byang chub sems dpa' la bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ri// mchod rten zhes bya ba yod de/ de la byang chub sems dpal lha'i phung po zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tong dang ldan pa chos tond to// 
9a9(1): kye rgyas pa'i sras dag stod pa// nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs na// sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ri// skor ma'i 'od ces bya ba yod de// de la byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba/ 
9a10(1): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tong phrag sum dang ldan pa chos nod to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag nu ba dang / byang gi phyogs tshams logs na// sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mi// spos kyi ngad can zhes
9b1(1): ba bya ba yod de// de la byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tong phrag lnga dang ldan pa chos stond to// kye rgyal po'i sras dag// rgya mtsho la chen po'i nang na// sngon
9b2(1): byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas// phug bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag yul shin tu yangs pa'i lho phyogs logs na// sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas
9b3(1): rtsa ba shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de// yul ba kha'i bu zhes bya ba la sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs/ yA'i gnas/ dge' 'dun gyi kun dag lar ba gser gyi gling zhes bya ba yod de// yul a du ran sngon byang chu sems dpa
9b4(1): bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas tshim par byed pa'i phug ces bya ba yod do// yul ring ba gtong ba zhes bya ba na/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas chos kyis han zhes bya ba yod do// yul dge' ba'i
9b5(1): bral tu phyin pa zhes bya ba na sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtad bzung gyi phug ces bya ba yod do// yul be'ur zhes bya ba na sngon byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs bzhugs pa'i
9b6(1): gnas zhu la zhes bya ba klus btsugs pa yod do// yul kam bon tsan sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'oganas byams khas pa phags pa zhes bya ba yod do// rgya'i gnas sa/ 
9b7(1): byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas mthu lo che'i phug/ ces bya ba yod do// yul khag/ ma sngon byang chub sems 'apo'o/ bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas pa lang gi mgo bo zhes bya ba yod do// 
9b8(1): kha tse'i yul na byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas shin tu btond pa zhes bya ba yod do// yul dgal 'phel ba zhes bya ba na sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhug sa gnas brtan gyi yug ces bya ba yod de
9b9(1): grul chu 'dzin ces bya ba na sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs Sha'i gnas 'dor po bton ces bya ba yod do// g.yul sa 'dzind kyi dkyil 'khor na sngon byang chub sems dpal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas brgyags
9b10(1): kyi phug ces bya la yod do// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas rmad ga chad ces bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpal gnas kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste// sum bsdu rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
10a1(1): 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ bam po drug cu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs
10a2(1): ga rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / 'byung ba rnam par dag pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab
10a3(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas skye ba ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas
10a4(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas
10a5(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab
10a6(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par spyod pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab
10a7(1): snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba sems dang de dag gi sems gas kyis thus sa chu nas/ bya nga bya sems dpa'i ut+pa la'i zhing po/ sangs rgyas kyi byi gyi rlangs kyis kyi
10a8(1): bams so// sangs rgyas kyis shes kyi byin dang ldan par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'odakyis spang bar mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi ga'i brjid kyis yongs su rgyas par mdzad do// 
10a9(1): rgyan gyi mi 'jig pa la bkru ba'agago// sangs rgyas gyi gyin gyi byings la 'jug pa yong duchad par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yus ba tu rtogs pa
10b1(1): na/ gas med pa zed byamams pas mthangs na sa sarnam mas cadagacig sa / rgyang ba'i gas sa gas pa sa dang/ sasacas ma gyi sa
10b2(1): dumed pa sa macu gang ma da// des byang masengs dpa' sun pa'i zhing pos chos mi byis la 'jug pa pa 'i yong du chung pas chags pa med pa'i dbyings su bsrungs pa'i mang dang / 
10b3(1): thams cad la bsgribs pa med par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas bsu bdag / 
10b4(1): snying rje chen pos smra ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyongs pa'i go cha chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid ma dang spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyun chad pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
10b5(1): mngon par sgrub pa skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par spyod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mthong ba mi zad pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i rnam pa/ gzungs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa dang
10b6(1): ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshad med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs
10b7(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par 'phrul pa chen po la rnam par sdod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la sku'i mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu brnyes pa'o// 
10b8(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang dgongs pas sbyar ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chom ldan 'das rnams kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin
10b9(1): tu ston pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab par rnam par spyod pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
11a1(1): gsung dang / dbyangs ni tshad myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa ni/ brjod du myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
11a2(1): kyi sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba ni/ thams cad mngon par khyend pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbyings thugs su chud cing ba han ni// bsgribs pa myed
11a3(1): pa'i mthar thug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras pa bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dpung skyed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te// brgya gang le ne
11a4(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam par dag pa ni rnyog pa myed par rgyud thams cad du byung bas mtha' dang dpung myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa myed pa'i
11a5(1): rgyan ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi spyan mngon par sangs rgyasamatha' dang dpung byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa myed pa'i stan ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi smra ba sma
11a6(1): pa skyed par thugs su chud pas mtha' dang dpung myed pa'o/  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa myed pa 'ig ni mo sa khams cad/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi garas
11a7(1): kyi skye ched ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brnyes pas mtha' dang / dpungad myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ljags shi nad tu yangs pa ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gsung
11a8(1): gi dbyangs rjes su 'gro bas mthal dang dpung myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i chos nyid ni sems can/ thams cad a lus pa'i sems kyi rnam pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnams par
11a9(1): dmyibs pas mtha' dang dbud myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi phrin las ni/ chos kyi sku dang tha myi dad cing rus gsum chags pa myed par thugs su chud cing / rnam par 'ag
11a10(1): pas mtha' dpa dpung myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa lta ba sgribs pa myi mngal ba la rnam par spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang
11b1(1): cho 'phrul gyi zad la yang dag khas ston pas ma tha la par bud myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa ni brjod du myed pa'i rgyas byin kyis rlabs las/ 
11b2(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa skyed pa yang dag par stan te/ bsam pa'i sa pa bzhin tu rnam par dbyigs par mdzad pas/ mtha' dang dpung byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
11b3(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / sman lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i/ nas par rold pa'i legs kyi chos yongs su dogs/ chos bams can rdzogs par byang chub par bya
11b4(1): dpung byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / dbud myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// kye
11b5(1): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas sa cig la ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubapas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings sa thal dang dpung myed pa
11b6(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcwa po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas yang dag par bstan pa'i/ bcu gang zhen/ pad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan da
11b7(1): nas 'gro ba yongs su bstan pa dang // skad cig cig kha 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe yongs su tand pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi kham sa thams cad du mngon
11b8(1): bar 'byung ba yongs su banyan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing drung tu bzhugs shing mngon par 'tshang rgya yongs su bstand pa dang / skad cig cig la 'jig rten gyi kham
11b9(1): thams cad tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dul ba'i sems yongs su sbyin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du dus la dbab bsheg pas/ 
11b10(1): sangs rgyas bsnyen bskur pa yongs su brtan pa dang // skad cig gcig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji ltar 'dul pa'i tshul bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du myed pa dang // sangs rgya
12a1(1): kyi srus tshogs rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgya sna tshogs dang / rgyan brjod du med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi ma
12a2(1): phyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par dag pa gcig ma yin pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams
12a3(1): cad du las pa dang / mabyod pa dang / da ltang byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du dbang po dang / brtsom grus rnam pa tha dang byung ba dang / mos pa dang / spyod pa nas kya dang babyung bal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du mngon par 'tshal
12a4(1): rgyab yongs su bstan pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig pa ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
12a5(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge
12a6(1): ba rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par ma smin pa mnyam pa nyid ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las mi
12a7(1): 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud du cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems
12a8(1): can mos pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sku yongs su bstan pa ni dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin
12a9(1): dmas rgyam bcom ldan 'das rnams su nga mo dang grong rdam dug shegs pa ni de'i dus pani 'ad bas dus labang payin/ sangs rgyam bcom ldan 'das rnams dang jis bu dang ldan pa'i tshul ba'i na du sems can yongs su na
12b1(1): ma nga /  ma mas rnamasems na mnas sa su gsu ma das ma pa sem sa ma su m-i ma
12b2(1): ma mas ma sa sa kyi byams sus su ma ngas / rgyas sa tha sa te
12b3(1): bcom ldan 'as kyisangs rgyas rtsings 'as mi 'da'ada'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi nul pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcug pa na/ 'jig rtem
12b4(1): gyi mams thams cad ma lus par skye thong chung gcig gis rgyas par dgong ba dang / dus gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / 'od ni gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar bya ba dang
12b5(1): sku gzugs gcig gi lus dang /  gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byon pa'i skur 'gyur ba dang / ye shes gcig rtogs pas chos thams cad la
12b6(1): bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / thugs gcig bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i gshegs stobs gcig gis de khon nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang / 
12b7(1): dus gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang gis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / thoms sacad 'gro ba thams cad dang ma 'dres par bzhugs shing / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
12b8(1): ldan 'das rnams dang mi dmigs pa'i tshus gyis rgyud kyi tshul gyi gcig pa ste / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yus dpe med cing bsam
12b9(1): kyekhyem ma pa'i chus dum das ni/ de ba'i gcigasu mas kyis kya kyigyi gyis pagras mos ba'i misate/ bgra des gra 'a 'omabs
13a1(1): jug pas 'ongasas sog pang bsgrub pa'i legs dang / sus byed pa la sus mngon par bsgrub pa'i la shes dang / chos 'ams cad gyi sa nyis pa la mngon par 'ang rgya ba mngon par grub pa'i ye shes dpa
13a2(1): sems can gyisathang thug par bdag byed pa la sems can brgyal la mngos par grub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma byed pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par grub pa'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyis
13a3(1): kyi yul ma skyes pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / yul thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la/ las kyi rnam par sbyin pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang
13a4(1): chos thams cad brjod du myed pa la chos kyi dbyings su gsung mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bas 'jug pa myed pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
13a5(1): bar byang ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad ma skyes ba la skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
13a6(1): po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mngon par/ sprub pa'i ye shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad myed pa'i khongs
13a7(1): su chud pa dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku ni dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can
13a8(1): 'dul ba mdzad pa ni/ chos yul chen po gsum gyi 'ongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig rab tu dbye ba la thams cad la mkhas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzungs thams cad kyi 'ong su
13a9(1): chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo khams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhir khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sos/ 
13a10(1): ca thams cad yongs su phyi gtong ba ni// bugs rje chen po'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rtag tu mnyas par bzhas pa ni/ dus thams cad du sems can thams cad sa dA
13b1(1): bar gzigs pa'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bar ni sems can rnam par 'dul pa thams cad khong su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
13b2(1): mas bgyibs par byed pa'ims gyi byis bams pa 'ongs su chun pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'ang cig kyig tu ni 'das pa dang / 'byed pa dang / dkar byung ba'i sangs rgyas khye
13b3(1): thams ca 'ongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyi ma gcig tu ni dus gsum kyi bskal pa'i grangs su chud par bsan pa thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras brgya 'o de dag ni
13b4(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byed pa'i 'ongs su chud pani ra da kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu khyim pa'i chos bzod par dgal pa rnams te
13b5(1): bcwa gang zhen/ brgyad kyi dkrugs sa rab tu 'jos shing nas par 'a'od ba nI/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyin tu byache pa'i chos mthong pa'i dka pa'o// mu nyegs pa
13b6(1): gzhan dang / phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par mdzad
13b7(1): pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod pa dka' ba'o// sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang
13b8(1): rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos la bzod par dka' ba'o// 'jig rten
13b9(1): gyi khams thams cad ma lus par sus khyab cing sangs rgyas kyi skurnas par phye ba sna tshogs thams cad du myi gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod pa dka' ba'o// 
13b10(1): gsung kyi yan lag lams cad mos par bya ba dang / thos par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba don yod par pa dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa myed pas snyanas pa'i tshul tu ba dad pa yang dag par babyen pa lani 'azung
14a1(1): ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'i/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten
14a2(1): gyi khams thams can kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bsam gyis myi khyab cing / thogs pa myed pa'i tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'byung zhing de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i
14a3(1): bu ga thams cad nas 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul shin tu phra ba
14a4(1): gcig sa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang rang bzhin gyi ldab srub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bsod pa chun gyi char
14a5(1): cing / sems can nam khar 'dul ba thogs pa myed la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu gtogs pa rnams la'ang myi bdel ba dang / gnod pa myed kyang rtul shin tu pra be de yang yangs pa
14a6(1): ma byas/ 'jig rten gyi khabs de dag kyang chung bar ma byas par ji ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyang thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mngal ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
14a7(1): shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// mun pa myed pa'i khams de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mun pa myed bsgribs pa myi mngal bas/ sems can
14a8(1): pha rol gyi bsgrib pa sna tshogs kyi gnas rnam par sel na/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod pa
14a9(1): dka' ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
14a10(1): bdag nyid che ba rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma po pa myed cing shin tu dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag par sbubs pa bdag nyid che bzhi sngon gyi mtha' nas rnas pa thams
14b1(1): tu ma khro ba byed cing rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da sngar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud tu rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid che ba ni
14b2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba myed cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par shes pa la gyi gnas pa ste/ 
14b3(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pas rnas pa thams cad du kha na ma 'azo ba myed cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
14b4(1): 'das rnams ni dus gsum la myi gnas par rnam par pyod cing chos thams cad la rten pa yang dag par bcom pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad
14b5(1): du kha na ma tho ba myed cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs/ rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par rang gzhag pa gcig gis len pa myed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
14b6(1): 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid rtse pa ni rnam pa thams cad du khanas lo ba myed cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sams rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mam
14b7(1): chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi zad pa'i bsod nams mnga' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba byed cing shin tu rnam par
14b8(1): rab pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gzugs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang / dbang gis chags myed par bzhugs
14b9(1): bas/  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag nyid che bzhirnam pa thams cad du khan ma po ga myed ci shig kun pa yang dag pa'o//  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam san gyi legs pa pazhi
14b10(1): brnyes pas phag tshal myi mnga' b.rang bzhugs shing/ khru mchog dang / seng ge sing mo byin te/ rgol ba'i na na gnas bu'i mthu dang ldan la/ chos thams cad la nyan pa la thugs smon ma su ru
15a1(1): mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma mtho ba myed cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su
15a2(1): mya ngan las 'das nas bsal pa marjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du skyed pa zhig yon yang mtshan gyi tshol los pa tsam gyis bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems can rnams rgya 'on shin tu sbyor zhing bya ngan las 'das nas re srid kyi yun
15a3(1): ring po zangs kyang sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon 'ad yar gyi 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du khams lo ba skyed cing shin tunas par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
15a4(1): mi byed kyi yas 'do du byed pa'i bang 'dod na byed parasag tu btugs nying / dzin can gyi 'ams kyang ring ponas bcugs kyang / 'ji rted gyi yas 'din gnas pa'i sems pa rabs kyis rjes sa nga par byas
15a5(1): du mngon par 'artom pa mdzad pas / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma lo/ pa myed cing shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ kye rgyal pa'i sras
15a6(1): bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che banas pa khams cad tu khamam kho ba myed cing shin kunas par dag pa'o// kye rgyal pa'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni/ 
15a7(1): sargyan ldan das rams kyi dag nyid shi tunas pa dag pas/ brgyal zhen/ ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamams sangs rgyas kyi tshangs pa'i byad ldanas pa ga pas
15a8(1): ma ma na pa de/ yangs rgya kyi ldan das rnams ni gas pabyed pa'i rgyus mas kyis shi nas dag pa yin// sangs rgyas ma gan 'das na pa pa ni sems can mams ca phyi
15a9(1): bzos pas shin kya rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khod kyis shin tu rnas par dag pa yin
15a10(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de rigs nas ya dag pas yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang / dpe' byad pa rang lo rnam par dag las shin tu rnam par dag pa yin
15b1(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sku rtog pa myed pas shin tu nam khas dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po bsgribs pa byed pas shin tu rnas par
15b2(1): dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad la mthu chen brnyes shing pha rol tu phyind pa ram brnyes pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te// kye rgyal ba'i sras
15b3(1): bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnas par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing
15b4(1): rgyas thams cad tu gnas pa ste/ ban+d+ha gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la rgyas thams cad su sangs rgyas ba stan pa dang / sems can sems cang gis dang ldan pa rnams pa nus pas
15b5(1): du chos btan thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dus thams cad turgyun myi 'chad pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du / dus thams cad du chags pa
15b6(1): mnga' bar gshegs pa dang / sems can thams cad la lugs rje chen po dus thams cad du myi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas cu ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprub pa dus thams cad du
15b7(1): thogs pa byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dus thams cad du 'ogs pa myed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings gnas
15b8(1): pa'i sangs rgyas dus thams cad du 'byung ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ma dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bya 'byung zhing dus thams cad du
15b9(1): gnas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i zas bcu po di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa pa/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi leskyes rgyamatsho gyi'ang ba'i tshul rnams te/ bcu yang zhes rnams kyi
15b10(1): bcos pan 'das rnam pa 'i bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ze zhes rgya ba rgya'ang ma'o/ b.ras rgyas bam ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'arna las can byed pa nyes pas regs bya ma gyi'ang paso
16a1(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho myi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge la ba'i cha ba tshad myed pa bsam gyis
16a2(1): gyi khyab la mnga' ye shes rgya tshol gyi bad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs pas ye shes rgya mtsho gyi bang pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
16a3(1): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / legs pa mang po mnga' bas ye shes rgya cho myi zad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon las dang / khyad par ya
16a4(1): bas ye shes rgya mtsho myi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun gyi chad par ba spobs pas ye ges rgya mtsho myi 'a
16a5(1): pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi/ ris thams cad ma lus pa'i sems dang / spyod pa la / ye shes rgya mtsho myi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
16a6(1): rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil kyis myi gan na pas ye shes rgya mtsho myi zad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i srasabacu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang
16a7(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho myi 'ad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhen
16a8(1): 'di lta te/ pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyis mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad la myi mkhyen pa gang yin gyi mnga' ba 'di ni
16a9(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// dig mams cad kyang lugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'dis te thams can kya
16a10(1): mapa brgya tshad myed pa dang ldan pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// bla na myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu don pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no
16b1(1): 'di lta ste thams cad kyang sems can 'dul ba la yang dag par zhugs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste thams cad kyang 'gro ba zam ses cad kyi don tu mngon par
16b2(1): sangs rgyas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa myi mnga' ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
16b3(1): rnams kyi tshul yin no// 'di lta ste ji ltar yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / 'dul bar gyur da pa'i sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mu myed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su bya
16b4(1): khas 'das pa rton pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras brgya po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul lo// kye rgyal ba'i
16b5(1): sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi / sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'isgornams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcod
16b6(1): ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams shin tu bstan pa'i sgon/ mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes ni sems can gyi gyod pa sna tshogs shin tu brtan pa'i sgo sa
16b7(1): las pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa shin tu babartan pa'i spong mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhams ni sems can rnams na
16b8(1): sa yang/ sangs dang / man sa gni sub stan pa'i mnas ba'ams pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan panas rnams ni sems canas pasams pa nas pa byon pa'i na tan kyi god lasa' mas pa'o// sangs rgyan
16b9(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i byed pa thams cad la gdams ngag dang / mamangag gis yongs su gzhog pa'i skrod mapa 'a yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub
16b10(1): sems dpa'i khyod ka'i byed par gyi smon las nas pa la dad pas 'phrul bzhin tu bstas pa'i spor mabs las pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sus pa'i 'du
17a1(1): pa dang 'jig pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang rnga mos pa ji lta
17a2(1): ba bzhin tu yongs su lagan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
17a3(1): gcig nas gcig tu chud pa'i bskal pa yangs pa de dang de dag tu ba stan cing brjod pa dang / yongs su bshad pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i sgor mtha' yas pa she/ kye rgyal ba'i
17a4(1): sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo'o// kye rgyal/ ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
17a5(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la/ bsgrub pa ste//  bcu gang zhen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bu yongs su bstas pa ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
17a6(1): las kha sbub pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsungasrang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub pa ni bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams galen pa mdzad pa yang sems
17a7(1): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa myi mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sprub pa'o// sa dang / chu dang / byed pa / rlung gis
17a8(1): kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byin rlabs kyi yul dang mnga' bas dmyigs pa thams cad yul du mang
17a9(1): pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sdug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
17a10(1): na sa sa 'i sa kyi yon sas kyang bam yin rnamam mas sa kyi slab 'o// 'dus byas bcom ldan das rnapas nas rgyas kyi ga
17b1(1): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung bar bzhugs pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
17b2(1): de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la sprub pa'o// / dum bu gsum la/ 
17b3(1): bam po gsum pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras macu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gam pa'ochos te/ bcug pa zhe na/ smon lam
17b4(1): mo la rab tu brtan zhing smon lam zhig pa gyi sa nga' bas ji skad du gsung ba de ltar mdzad cing gnyis su myi gsung pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dang po'i// phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug pa'i bskal pa
17b5(1): thams cad ru/ byang chub sems dpa'i gyod pa la yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas rab tu brtson zhing sgyid lug pa myi mnga' ba 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos
17b6(1): gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dus par 'gyur ba gcig cig gzi/ kyang 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du myed par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu gshegs pa la zag sa thogs
17b7(1): byed pa 'di ni sems cad kyi gtso bo'i chos gsum pa'o// zhe sdang ba'i sems can rnams thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa dang / dad pa'o sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa 'di ni sems
17b8(1): can gyi g.yo bo'i chos bzhi pa'o// gad kyi che bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas// bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgya
17b9(1): kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su myi 'gyur ro snyam du/ byang chub kyi sems mnyams pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos lnga pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba las
17b10(1): yang dag par sgrub cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bas 'jug gi 'jig rten pa'i rgyud la ma yin pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos drug pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges su sdon
18a1(1): sangs rgyas kyis khyad pa'i sems su lus kyi las dang / ngag kyi las dang / yid kyi las kyis slob zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'gyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
18a2(1): du yongs su sngo ba byed pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni sems can gtso bo'i chos bdun pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag cing 'od pas
18a3(1): la dang pa thams cad tu snang zhing kun tu 'od 'byung ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang zhing thams cad du snyoms pas thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso
18a4(1): po'i chos brgyad pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i bdel ba thams cad yongs su spangs/ 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad la ma chags pa dang // 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa byed pa'i smon lam
18a5(1): thams cad du mnyam pa nyid kyis 'jig rten thams cad dang snyan par byas ste/ sum bsngal dang / spros pa thams cad rab tu 'jos pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dgu pa'o// sgrub
18a6(1): bsngal gyi byi bdel ba thams cad nyams su ba ba 9// 'phro pa thams cad kyi don tu dka' thub kyis shin tu gdungs kyang / slab par sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs
18a7(1): yongs su bsrung ba dang ldan pa dang / stobs bcu'i sa'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pas mthar zug pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i tshe smra pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom
18a8(1): ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'gyod pa chags pa myed pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 
18a9(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad tu gshegs pas chags pa myi mnga' bar rnam par dpyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams
18a10(1): ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pas chags pa myi mnga' bar rnam par spyod yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa dang / bzhengs pa dang bzhugs pas
18b1(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma sbas pa thams cad kyi dgal ldan gyi gnas na bzhug rgya chags pa gyi sangal bar rnam par 'apyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chom kyi
18b2(1): dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / de ltar byung ba'i mtha' la chags pa myi mnga' bar rnam par pyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings
18b3(1): ma lus pa thams cad tsam gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs kyang chags pa myi mangs par gyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems dang khyod pa
18b4(1): la gzigs shing thugs kyi skad cig gcig la cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis sems can rnam par 'dul yang chags pa myi mnga' bar rnam par gyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku
18b5(1): gcig gis kyang tshad myed bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par khyod kyang chags pa myi sanga'u bar rnam par pyod/  pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na nemasan sems can gyi
18b6(1): khams 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad du de bzhin gsheg pa'i chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthi ri thug po bsam gyis myi khyab par bton cing gsung yang chags pa myi mngal bar rnam par phyo/ 
18b7(1): ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par khyod pa chags pa myed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs
18b8(1): brgyan mchog das la phran byed pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtshan dang dpes byed pa'ang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i
18b9(1): rgyan mchog dam pa blan byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yan lag gyi mchog ras pa drug bcu dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga brgyas yongs su gzung ba dang / rgyan brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa/ 
19a1(1): dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag ma pa la yang mu myed pas rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don dang / tshig dang yi ge brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pas rab tu tshim par mdzad pa dang / dag
19a2(1): kha myi mnga' bar seng ge'i nga ro chen smog pa dang / 'jig pa myed pa chen pos bsnyengs pa gyi mnga' bar gyurd pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la grag cing gsal te/ 
19a3(1): khong du chud par 'gyur dang / sems can bsam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar nye bar gnas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa glan
19a4(1): skyed pa'o// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin las ni stobs bcus brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres lacwa/ 
19a5(1): brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu rgyan cing bsgrubs pas chags pa myed pa'i sgo/  yul dang ldan pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhis rab tu rten pad/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gting byed pa rab tu brnyes
19a6(1): ba/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams can kyi rgyan tu su rad ya/ dus gsum gyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems canakun gyi sems dang gyod pa/ thams cad skad cig gcig dang
19a7(1): ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu mkhyen pa se/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thugs kyi rkyen mchog dam pa bla na myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od zer bye ba rjod du byed pa rab tu
19a8(1): 'byed pa mdzad de 'od zer de dag re re la yang 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dra ba brjod du myed pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
19a9(1): rgyud thams cad mu myed khyer ston pa/ sangs rgyas skye ba dang myi bral bas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir myi ldog cing don yod pa/ sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du myed pas gnas pa myed pa/ rang bzhin rnam par dag
19a10(1): nga kun tu rnam pa yar 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'anas kyi 'o mer gyi rgyan mchog dam pa phran byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pashad mo 'dum par phyin nags kyi donas so
19b1(1): zer 'dog sna tshogs du ma dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du myed pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar byed pa sems can gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed bsam gyis myi khyab pa
19b2(1): rnams kha ston pa/ bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam pa gzhan du myi 'gyur bar yung nad pa/ 'gro ba khams cad tu shin tu gsal ba 'byung se 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
19b3(1): 'das rnams kyi bzhid mo 'dzus pa bstan pa'i brgyan mchog dam pa bla na myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni tshad myed la ye/ bsgribs pa byed las rnam par dag pa
19b4(1): chos thams cad chags pa byed pa nyid kyi mthar lug pa/ mtha' dang dpung myed pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig rtes thams cad dpa 'dzin pa byed pa 'jig
19b5(1): rten khams cad kyi'o// kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa / 'jig rten thams cadan las gyen rgya 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yang dag par gyod pAn tshig gi las dang
19b6(1): bras pa bangod na byed gim par byid pa/ phung po dang ga masadang / skyes ched dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas brjo ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sgra'i brnyen mchog dab brjid/ 
19b7(1): myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od tshad myed pa mnga' pa / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa khams cad du 'od 'dres shing rgyan du sa dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs brjod du myed pa'i rgyan dang / 
19b8(1): ldan pa/ 'od kyi spang ba kun tu logs pa myed cing / thams cad chags pa myed pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ba sgribs pa myed pa'i tshad skyed pa'i mdzod du gyur pa/ 'od thams cad kyi 'byung nas su gyur ba ste
19b9(1): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom/ ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog mtha' yas pa mnga' ba ste/ kha dog yid du 'od gsal ba mnga' ba'o/ 
19b10(1): 'dog tshad myed pa mnga' ba'o// sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyis bsam pa dang / mos pa bzhin du rnam par dmyigs pa kha dog mnga' ba'o// de ma yin pa'i kha dog gzhan khams gsum cu
20a1(1): gtogs pa thams cad ris kyis gnon pa'i kha dog mangs pa'o/ kha dog thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brnyes pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog bla na byed pa mnga' ba ste
20a2(1): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla ma myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge bas shin tu rnam me dag pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byod pa dang / daMskar
20a3(1): 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs dge ba rin rje'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa pa la shin tu 'byung ba'o// chos nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad du khyad par yod pa dang / khyad par myed pa'i 'apyod pas rnam par dag pa'i
20a4(1): rgyan gyis ye shes skye ba thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs pasgribs pa myed pa'i kun rnam par dag par 'jig rten gyi myi snyan pa thams cad kyis myi snyan par brjod du myed pa ste/ 'di ni
20a5(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang rgyud nad par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na myed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byams pa chen po'i mthu dang rang bzhi
20a6(1): kyi rgyan mnga' ba ste lce shin tu dang pa yongs su rtog pa'i rnyog pa skye mang ba ka spu'i 'phrin las yongs su bsam pad lta bas kyi spyod/ phugs shin tu dam par gsal ba gzugs rje chen po
20a7(1): mnga' kha 'gro ba thams cad spyos pa/ yon gyi gnas kyi dam pa bla na myed pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i nang na thugs brtse pa can phan par mdzod pa / sems can thams cad kyi don tu ye shes chen po byin kyis
20a8(1): brlabs te/ bsod nams chen pos yongs su 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing tu 'gyur ba/ sems can rnams kyi yon tan dang / ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam pade 'phel par mdzad
20a9(1): pa de/ dos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'anas rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po'i mapar thug pa'i bsod nams kyi rgya mchog dam pazun byed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras lacu po de dag ni
20a10(1): ngas rgyas bcom ldan gnas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog das la zan byed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan gdas rnams kyi ma da chen los par 'gyur pa'i chos na ce/ 
20b1(1): bcu gdu zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad la gang par mdzad pa'i mnga' sbyar pas tshig dang 'i ge mthas yas pa la sogs pagyi gangal ba'i spobs pa sag
20b2(1): pa dang / chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su brjod pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos sadung skur pa'i chos dang po'i/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
20b3(1): nams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ji ltar yongs su sbyin pa dang / smon las ji ltar btab pa'i tshul bzhin du 'dul ba la sogs pa myi sa nge la bas mnga' che ba se/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mnga' chen
20b4(1): bos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i thams cad sems can gcig la'ang gnod pa myed par rnam pa drug tu bskyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zhes
20b5(1): rgyan rnam par bkod pa grangs byed/ tshad myed pa dang ldan pa/ nas nga mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad gcig nas gcig rna tu 'phang ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu ga zhug pa dang / 
20b6(1): gcig nas gcig tu bsu pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu bsre bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / gzhan dga'/ gzhan dang ke gzhan gyi phyogs su rab tu bzhag kyang sems can gyi
20b7(1): khams rnams 'khor cing rmongs par myi 'gyur la kaM the tsom du myi 'gyurabar mdzad pas mnga' che ba se/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos gsuM pa'o// sangs rgyas
20b8(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan phan tshun tu byin gyis brlab pa dang lug skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi/ 
20b9(1): rgyam yang dag par brtan pa dang / bskal pa grangs myed par bzhog kyang yi ge shin tu bstan pa a myi shes pa dang 'jig rten gyi khaMs ma lus pa thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par rgyan pa dang / phyi ma ru/ 
20b10(1): pa khyed cing nye bar nyon mongs pa byed pa dang ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yongs su 'dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa khams par byin gyis brlag pa la yanga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcog ldan pang/ 
21a1(1): rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi sanga' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs nas sems can gcig
