21a2(1): gi don tu bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par skyil mo krung gcig gis bzhugs pa ni yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la myi bde' ba myi mnga' zhing thugs la myi myu du ste/ gang zag de yang myi bsnyel
21a3(1): pas 'dul pa'i du sa las myi 'da' ba dang / gang zag gcig la ji ltar de bzhin du rim la pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur phug po'i sku tshel mnga' bar byin gyis
21a4(1): brlabs te bzhugs kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skyo ba myi mnga' ste/ de ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad mthar kyis rim pas sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gyi don tu yongs su spyod
21a5(1): ba la mnga'ache ba he/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos lnga pa'o// sangs yang rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
21a6(1): thams cad du yang dag par gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa la zhags logs kyi mngal ba dang / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa
21a7(1): thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad du thugs skad cig gcig dang ldan bas bzhud par byin kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa khong du chud par bya bas
21a8(1): chos kyi 'khor lo logs pa myed pas tu bskodan pa la mnga' che ba se/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mngal chen pos mang la sbyar ba'i chos drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul
21a9(1): sems can gyi khams thams can gyi don tu thugs skad cig re re la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par tshang bar mnga' che ba ste/ de la chos thams cad mngon par sangs pa rgyas pa 'ang gang yang
21a10(1): byes/ mngon pa sangs rgyas pa bang byed de// mdon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba byed kyang // slob pa'i sa la gnas shing mngon par 'chang bya bar yang myi 'arjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sems cad kyang bsrings pa
21b1(1): byed pa rtogs par thugs su rkun pas sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don tu le shes tshad byed pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i yul yongs su rgyan gyi gcod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
21b2(1): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po mnga' thun pa'i chos bdun pa no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gyen gyi skyer ched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa ni spyan gyi bu mched kyis
21b3(1): yongs su rtsub par mdzad do// snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin gang bsgrub pa de/ gangs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su la grub par mdzad do// grangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang sgrub
21b4(1): pa de/  lpags kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do// sngags kyi skyem ched sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las grang sgrub pa de ni su'i skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do// spu'i bye mched kyis sangs kya
21b5(1): kyi 'phrin las gang ba sgrib pa de thugs kyi skye mched/ na kyis yongs su sgrub pa'o// grub par mdzad do// phugs da kyi skye mched kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kang la sgrub pa de/ 
21b6(1): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmyigs pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs rnapar phye ba thams cad du grub par mdzad do// de bzhin du dmyigs
21b7(1): ba thams cad re re yang sde bzhir bsgrubs pas// sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sprub pa/ la mnga' che ba ste / 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po sbyar ba'i chos brgyad pa
21b8(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi sku'i ba spu'i bu gcig gi nang du/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gzung bar mdzad cing khongs su chud par mdzad pa dang / sems can re re zhing yang lus/ 
21b9(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod pa byed pa tsam nu 'das par mad kyang / sems can de dag la gnod pa dang / kyi bdel par gyi 'gyur ba dang / de dag su yang sems can re re zhing 'din rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu
21b10(1): yun pas rlo rnapa pa rnam pa grangs byed pa byed par gnas par bya ba dang / 'jig kyis gyi 'amam grangs myed pa gos pa gcig gis byin lus dang gnyen gyi 'amang de dag byas
22a1(1): rgyas bgyus nasas kyi bya sus gyur bya ba dang sa sadas rgyas de dag thus pa'i me yang mdod na byed pa 'dis ste mas kyi rgyud drung na med de dag na sems can gyi
22a2(1): nga ma marjod tu byed pa'i bar brjod tu byed pa rnachos kyi mal pa skor par bya ba dang / pa su'i bu kA de dag nas sangs rgyas gciganas ga ga d+ha btsun pa brjod na spyong po'i mang mdzadun byed pa byung
22a3(1): par bya ba dang / sems can gcis nas gcig tu brgyad pa brjod pa marjod du byed pa yang brjod du skyed pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo cig nas gcig tu chun pa/ brjod du byed 'a'i
22a4(1): yang brjod du myed pa la smon par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa brjod tu byed pa'i yang brjod du myed shin tu bstan par bya ba dang / 'das pa gcig nas gcig tu
22a5(1): chud pa marjod tu byen pa dang / ma 'ongs pa gciganas ga gi tu brgyad la don tu myed pa dang / da ltar thub pa gcig nas tu bdun pa mdod du byed yongs su brjod par bya bdud/ 
22a6(1): nam kha'i dbyings mtha' dang / dpung myed par bstan pa dang / kun tu mtshams myed par sems can thams cad 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang // skye ba'i skye mched thams cad 'dod pa'i nyon mongs
22a7(1): ba rgya chen po 'gegs myed pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mngal sbyar ba'i chos dgul ba'o// 
22a8(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad tu pad mo'i rgyan chen po na brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi dbyings tshad myed
22a9(1): pa thams cad du khyab pa'i skus byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi
22a10(1): ji lta bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad kyang de bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig sa re re'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brdabs pa dang // dgongs
22b1(1): bamang cig pa di ltal de bzhin bya dgongs pa ga cigs mams cad la'ang ya pa'i rgyun gyis 'ongs su dag par mngon par 'angar bya bar bya ba dang / de bzhin tu mos kyi dbyings thams pad ma sras du'i
22b2(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa rnam par dag pa/ rgyan sna chosas dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dmyigs pa/ gnas pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa 'byas klas pa mdzodan tu byed
22b3(1): pa/ mtshan nyid pa dang pa/ rnas pa la dad pa'i rgyun chad byed cing 'byam klas pa/ dus kyi chung grangs kyi tshad byed pa dang ldan pa 'gyu pa/ ma 'dres pa dang ldan pag/ bro chad myed pa dang mos pa
22b4(1): shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pa mtshan nyid sna tshogs gnas pa/ mtshan nyid la sam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa thams cad dgongs pa skad cig ma las dgongs pa skad cig ma/ 
22b5(1): gcig gis thams cad yongs su banyan kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyid tu bsgrus pa myi mdzad pa la mnga' che ba s+ye/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
22b6(1): rgyas kyi sanga' chen pos mnga' sbyar ba'i chos bcu pa ste// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sbyar
22b7(1): pa'i chos so// kye rgyal po'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad byed pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa nas
22b8(1): te/ bcu gang zhe na/ mtshan re re zhing bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan yongs su dag par 'gyur ba 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub mngon
22b9(1): bar 'tshang rgya'o// sangs rgyas kyi pos nes yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'char rgya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ka sangs
22b10(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// yon tam thams cad kyi'i byung gnas sun sum tshogs pa'i spyod pa yongs su ngas la yongs su rdzogs pas //  sangs rgyas bcom
22b11(1): ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon pang 'tshang rgya'o// sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / gargyag pa yongs su rdzogs pas / sangs rgyas macos ldan 'das rnams byang chub rtsa
23a1(1): mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sangs rgyas mnga' 'gro ba thams cad kyis zil kyis myi non pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
23a2(1): rgya'o// zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pas// sangs rgya bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas
23a3(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po dang / gzugs kyi sku la lta na don yod pa yongs su rdzogs pas / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
23a4(1): byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgyal se
23a5(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
23a6(1): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs
23a7(1): mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad byin kyis rlabs pa myed cing spros pa thams cad myed par yang thugs su chud la dge ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas
23a8(1): kyi byin kyi rlabs kyang shin tu ston cing brjod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad
23a9(1): la gzigs pa myed cing phan tshun du mkhyen pa myed do// ma khacings ma grol ba dang / gzung ba myed cing bsngags pa myed de/ yongs su rdzogs pa myed cing yang thugs su chud la// sangs rgyas
23a10(1): kyi chos thams cad la mnga' ba yang brnyes ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la mnga' sbyar ba de kho na nyid ma nor pa rnam pa gzhan du myi 'gyur ba dang
23b1(1): chos thams cad bdag gi byed yongs su 'dzind pa byed la de kho ma nyid kyi mtha' las rnam par myi 'dal yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngal chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad sdang ba 'ang rab tu mkhyen
23b2(1): ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi khabs mkhas gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtsham ma'i mtha' thams cad kyi mnga' rtse/ mtshan ma thams cad
23b3(1): dang myi 'grogs shing mtshan ma'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ma 'dres la de'i rang bzhin du ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid myed pa'i sgra'i tshul// thams cad thugs su chud kyang gzugs kyi
23b4(1): mtshan ma'i sku gzugs rnam par dag pa grangs myed pa dang / nyid gi mtshan ma dang // rnam par 'gyod pa'i mtshan ma zar myi shes pa rnam pa sanas rgya sna tshogs yang dag par snyan cing bshad pa'i
23b5(1): ye shes kyi phung po mun pa myed pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgron ma chen por gyur pas mun pa myed pa'i snang ba ston pa la 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thab sangs pa
23b6(1): gsum pa'o// chags pa myed pa'i mtha' ni sngon gyi mtha' yang ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te// chos kyi
23b7(1): dbyings su gnas pa ni 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am// da ltar 'byungaba'ang ma yin pas de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'byung ba myed kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi rigs chad
23b8(1): byed pa'i phyir shin tu bstan pa brjod du myed pas/ 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba yang rab tu brjod cing kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gis de bzhin du
23b9(1): gzigs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku'i 'phrin las dang / gsung gi 'phrin las dpa/ 
23b10(1): thubs kyi 'phrin las dang // las kyi mngon par 'dul mdzad pa 'ang myi mnga' la yongs su blang ba myi mnga' bas bzhugs shing rnam par phye ba myed pa'i mthar thug pa ste// dor ba myed pa'i chos kyi
24a1(1): gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa// bzang ba'i tshul las rnam par 'das kyang / tshul nges pa myed pa'i mdzod du gyur cing bgrang ba dang / mngon par bsgrub pa mtha' yas pa dang
24a2(1): ga 'jig rten pa dang // 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dad pa'i grangs kyi tshul thugs su chud pa'i ye shes pa sgribs pa byed pas gzigs pa rnams te// chos dbyings ma lus
24a3(1): kha thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba rnam par dmyigs pa la rdzu 'phrul la sna chogs tshad myed/ mu myed par mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs
24a4(1): mkhas pa lnga pa'o// chos thams cad lta ba myed pas myi dad pa dang / bye brag byed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mtshan nyid byed pa dang / sna tshogs byed pa dang / 
24a5(1): blang ba myed pa dang // dor ba myed pa dang // rang bzhin myed par rab tu mkhyen kyang // / chos kyi rgyud shin tu nges pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'jig rten gyi tshul dang 'gal ba
24a6(1): byed pa dang /  rang bzhin myed pa yang dag par gzigs pas thams cad mkhyend pa thams cad gzigs pa mkhyen par bya ba thams cad ma lus par gzigs pas chos la mnga' spyad thams
24a7(1): cad kyang rab tu ston la/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las kyang myi nyam pa 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni
24a8(1): thugs su chud pa'i dam pa gcig gis gzhan mkhyen par bya ba chos de'i skyon myed pa las rnam par ma 'das pa// gnas pa myed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos ston
24a9(1): myed pas lus thams cad du gnas pa rab tu mkhyen te/ de la yang nyi ma gcig gam/ zla ba byed dam/ so gcig gas// lo rgya 'am/ bskal pa 'jig pa dang 'dul bas rjes su bsnyag pa dang / phyir phyogs
24a10(1): pa myi mnga' bar dus tshad myed pa dang / nyi ma gcig dang / yud tsam gcig gis dus dzas dang / snga dro nas nyi ma phyed kyi des dang / phyi dro nas snga dro'i dus dang / nyi sa'i gung nas phyi dro'i dus dus dang / 
24b1(1): nyis bgrangs pa'i dus dang / nyi ma'i dus dang / zla ba'i chus dang / rdul dang lo dang / lo rgyu'i dus dang / bskal pa gcig gi dus dang / chad byer zangs byed pa dang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dus nas/ 
24b2(1): phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus su chos snyan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor rlobs pa myed cing phyir myi ldog/ rgyun chad par myi 'gyur/ bral bar gyi 'gyur/ bar chad par gyi 'gyur/ myed par myi 'gyur/ 
24b3(1): ni ma bar kyi 'byung / ring du myi 'gyur/ 'dzi de na gnas pa yi dasu ya rgyun 'chad par kyi 'gyus/ 'ad ni sangs rgyas bamam ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi babs stsalas pa 'dun du/ sangs rgyas
24b4(1): ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa las cad tu rtag tu du sa la bab par bzhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi 'jig pa/ tshad myed pa mngal ba'o// ba dad pa yang dag par
24b5(1): mkhyen pa grangs myed pa mngal ba'o// ba dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa/  tshad myed pa mnga' ba'o// ba dang pa yang dag par mkhyen pa zad myi shes pa mnga' ba'o// tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen
24b6(1): ba logs pa byed pa mnga' ba'o// sa dang pa yang dag par mkhyen pa sam+b+ha la mas pa sa pa ba'o// thun song ma yin pa'i ba dang prA yad+ma dag par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o// ba dang pa yang
24b7(1): par 'byed pa mapar thug pa byed pasapa la ni/ maro pa yang dag par mkhyen pade khan dang ldan pa mngal na/ pa dang pa yang dag par marje du phyag gi rgyas 'ams pa rab rtogs pa srug pa
24b8(1): chos thams cad la dad pa mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o// bsam pa dang / mos pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi tshul dang / rnam grangs tshul ji ltar rnam par bkod pa bzhin du sa tshesas myed par ste/ 
24b9(1): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhabs mkhas pa brgyad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myid myed kyang mying dang / rigs su 'byung ba'i chos thams cad tshig
24b10(1): rig sa sa kyang sa pa'i daphyis man par dngas rgyas pate/ kyid 'das pas yi du dang/ byang sa ngas pa pa na pa dang / sbyi gang byu pas na pa dang / phying se pa yin
25a1(1): bying zhing ba ma yin pa dang / mying chos ma yin pa dang / myid yon tan ma yin pa dang / mying byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / mying sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / mying zangs ma
25a2(1): ga yin pa dang / mying grangs myed pa ma yin pa dang / mying skye ba ma yin pa dang / mying 'gag pa ma yin pa dang / mying myed pa ma yin pa dang / mying yod pa ma yin pa dang / bying gcig pa ma yin pa dang / bying pa dang / 
25a3(1): pa ma yin pa dang / mying thams cad ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis brjod du myed pa dang / phyogs myed pa dang / brda' myed pa dang / tshig gi lam byed pa dang dang bral ba// sA'i
25a4(1): rnam pa thams cad myi 'byung ba/ yongs su bsgrubs pa myed pa byas pa dang / rnam par byas pa myed pa// rnam pa gcig ma yin pa/ rnam pa mang po ma yin pa yang thugs su chud la 'jog pa dang / spyad
25a5(1): pa thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog brnyas pa dag/ ste na rnam par rtog pa'i yul myi mnga' ba dag go// mngonapar 'byem mdzad pa myed pa la rab tu brtson pa dag go// rtog pa
25a6(1): dang // kun tu rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa 'gags pa dgago/ spyod pa thams cad la myi gnas par spyod pa dag ste'adi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs
25a7(1): mkhas pa dgul ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma skyes pa rab tu mkhyend pa ste/ tshor ba'i spros pa myed pa dang / 'du shes kyi grangs myed pa dang / 'du byed kun tu
25a8(1): chu byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa nye ba pa yin pabyed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis zhi b.rab tu sa byedan te/ chos thams cad skye sa ched kyi chud byed pa dang / khams rnams kyi dbyigs pa dang / chos sam sa
25a9(1): cad kyi 'jig pa dang / chos thams cad bskyed du myed cing rang bzhin gyis rnam ma' la bu dang / chos thams cad dben pa dang / sras myed pa dang / rnam par smyid pa myed pa dang / gyod pas 'byung ba byed pa
25a10(1): dang / ma grub pa dang / ma byung ba dang / grangs kyis myi brjod pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa dang / myed pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags po dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang
25b1(1): rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / skyon myed pa dang / gnas myed pa dang / yongs su gnas pa myed pa dang / yongs su smin par byas pa myed pa dang / rnam par gtum pa myed pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / sems can
25b2(1): byed pa ma yin pa dang / srog myed pa dang // srog myed pa ma yin pa dang / rkyen myed pa dang / rkyen myed pa ma yin pa dang / rten myed pa dang / rten myed pa ma yin par chos thams cad thugs su chud kyang chos kyi
25b3(1): dbyings thams cad shin tu brtan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa brnyes pa dag ste/ nges pa dang mdzes pa dang / log par nges pa'i phung po'i gsum rnam par dgod pa rnams la stobs bcus thugs su chud pan
25b4(1): le ges kyi 'jigs pa bzhis rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po dang ldan pas seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa be/ kye rgyal
25b5(1): ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
25b6(1): rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgya chen po tshad byed pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa rnams te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'das pa dang / ma
25b7(1): 'ongs pa dang / da lngar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rab sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par myi nus pa'o// bcu gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sathas gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings
25b8(1): thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba snyan pa dang / byang chub seMs drapa'i spyod pa mu myed pa dag la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ kha dog tshad myed pa dang / 
25b9(1): ga mi brjid chad byed pa/ sngang la tshad byed la// dbyangs tshad byed pa/ dbyangs kyi yan laganam par dag pa tshar myed pa/ gsung brjod pas rnam par dbyigs pa tshad byed pa/ ting nge 'dzin tshor byed pa
25b10(1): gyod pa ka shes rab dang / se shes yul tshad myed pa mnga' ba'i rnams lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye
26a1(1): tshon dgu dang bcas pa lha dang myi dang lce ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do// byams pa chen po'i 'khyod yul thogs pa myed pa dang / thabs zhugs rje chen po'i
26a2(1): slo mthar thug pas sems can la phan dogs pa yang ngo // bsod nams kyi stobs dang / mngal phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang po rnam par sbyang pa dang / car shes kyi sems yongs su dag pas
26a3(1): kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa brjod do// reg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do// theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang sems
26a4(1): rnams la len 'dogs par mdzad do// 'gro ba thams cad gdon pas kyang sems can rnams la phan gdogs pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'phrin las dang po'i
26a5(1): dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'phos pa myed kyang yum gyi skur gshegasashing // byang chub sems dpa'i sku tha ma skye bar san/ ba sprum la bur yongs su myod pa srul pa lu bu'i
26a6(1): ting nge 'dzin gyis pam thug pa/ byig yod lta bur namamadabyims pa nam ma kha'i yul chad myed par khyab pa bzhan bya ste yang chags pa gyi mnga' ba/ spyi/ phru la su bstan pa
26a7(1): can mongs pa skyed pa'i chos la yang dag par la nol la/ gnas myed pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral pas rnam pa da// rgyan shis rgya rgya che ba'i mdzod kyis sangs kyi
26a8(1): mas man/ ma@ 'i marna ban par tshun 'ad pa da na 6 las kya byas rgya kyi skad do//  y-i
26a9(1): pas swA do// sbyi kyu la'i kyi na thos kyang smra sa sa kyi 'byi pas sad // par 'gyul pa'i 'dod rten po yang dag sum sa can pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi bri sa pa sad
26b1(1): tho brnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// ye shes kyi nyi sa 'i dkyil 'khor chen pos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'jig rten byin gyis brlabs pa mapal yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
26b2(1): mdzad do// ting nge 'dzin chen po grangs myed pa la rnam par spyod cing snyoms par 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'khrim las
26b3(1): mdzad do// pyod pa'i thog sa la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i ma par lug pa'i bar thogs dang / dbus dang / kha ma'i tshus kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sa 'di la gnyis
26b4(1): su myed pas thams cad ma par 'jig rten gyi grangs kyis skye ba yongs su ston te/ skye bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten
26b5(1): thams cad tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// byab rang chub sems dpa' gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams / \u0f7fsangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma da do// mngon byar chung
26b6(1): kyang 'jig rten thams cad rtsa sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// mngon par 'tshang rgyabs kyang 'jig rten/ thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do
26b7(1): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangasargyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// thabs mkhas pa sna tshogasakyis kyang / 'jig rten sna tshogs/ 'jig rten tshad myed pa
26b8(1): 'jig rten kun tu mtha' yas pa/ phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud dang / ris thams cad kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// zhing gi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten
26b9(1): tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// las kyi rnam par sbyin pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sems can gyi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du
26b10(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// skye ba dang shi 'pho ba'o/ rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sprul pa chen po'i rgyud dang / rasangs rgyas kyi rigs
27a1(1): dang / chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin yas mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gnyis pa'o// 
27a2(1): dge bar gyod pa'i las rnam par dag cing gdung rabs thams cad tu ye shes kyi tshul rnam par rig khas su tshe'i rgyud kyi tshul dang ldan pa// sems can gdul ba thugs su chud pa
27a3(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa nyon kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshul gyi gnas la bzhugs pa
27a4(1): rnams// sma dang / tshig thams cad dang bral bar brtags dngos po thams cad dngos po myed pa las byung bar khong du chud par bya ba dang // dngos po thams cad shes pa la gzung
27a5(1): bar bya ba dang / tshus khrims thams cad thams cad mkhyenapa nyid kyi mthar thug par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /  snying rje chen pos 'gro ba mu myed pa la rnam par lta bar bya
27a6(1): ba dang / byams pa chen pos sems can byed pa'i yul sa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / dpa' ba chen pos 'jig rten brjod du myed par khong du chud par bya ba dang / btang po
27a7(1): chen pos sems la dbang sgyur ba la gnas bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i yon tan gyis rang yongs su rgyas par byed par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus ma lus par mngon par bsgrub par
27a8(1): bya ba dang / thams cad gnas myed pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed par bya ba dang / 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nam tan du byed par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa rnam par brjod pa rab tu brjod par khyal
27a9(1): dang / 'jig rten gyi dngos po la smod par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa la rtogs par bya ba mdzad cing pyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa las rnam par sbyin pa yang dag par snyan pa dang / ci sngar brjod/ 
27a10(1): pa'o tshul tu sems can gtul ba dang / yongs su ma sbyin pa'i sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyin pa'i rnams tshul bzhin du gdul ba dang / grangs myed pa'i thabs mkhas pa mngon
27b1(1): bar bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las phyir myi ldog pa yongs su bstan pa dang / ska sna tshogs nas chos kyi spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par spang pa dang / 
27b2(1): thugs rje chen po las byung pa'i chos kyi sprin kyis mngon par spang ba dang / thams cad la skyob pa'i byams pa chen po bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gsum gyis yongs su brlan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang / 
27b3(1): nam khar dbyigs khar btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bstan pa yan cad tu 'jig rten mtha' dang / dpung myed par sangs rgyas kyi phrin las yongs su bstan pa mdzad cing ye shes kyi mthu chen po thogs pa myed pa dang / 
27b4(1): sangs rgyas kyi mngon par mkhyen pa lasgribs pa myed par bsgrubs pa dang / chos rnam pa gsum gyis thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phrin las kyi mtha' dang / sru'i 'phrin las kyi mtha' shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / 
27b5(1): gsung gi 'phrin las mtha' bzab cing chags myed pa dang / ye shes nyesad pa myed pas rnam par dag pa dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' zab cing chags pa myed pa'i mthar thug pa'i phabs
27b6(1): mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gsum pa'o// / tum bu gsum pa'o// bam po bzhi la'o// 
27b7(1): rnam par rgyal ba chen po mnga' ba rnams ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgyan rnam par phye ba tshad myed pa dang ldan pa// yid du 'ong ba spangs te// mngon par byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can rnams 'jig rten
27b8(1): gyi gnas las paskyod pa dang// 'jig rten gyi tshul la mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten du gtogs pa thams cad myi rtag par shes par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tshul la mngon par zhen pa rnam par
27b9(1): bzlog par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba la sred pa yongs su gcad pa dang / 'jig rten nyon mongs pa byad bzhin nub pa la yang dag par gyod par bya ba dang / sems can gyi don rjes su dran par 'byung ba'i don la rab
27b10(1): gzhol ba dang / khyim pa'i tshul yongs su sarba ba hand pa dang / nyon mongs pa byed pa'i chos kyi spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yon tan gyi dkyil/ 
28a1(1): 'khod chad myed pa yongs su snang bar bya ba dang / yongs su 'khor chen po brnyes pas sems can rnams kyi myi shes pa'i sgrib pa rab tu gsal ba dang / bdag nyid bsod nams kyi zhing bla na byed par
28a2(1): 'gro ba thams cad la bstan pa dang / dgel ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge bI ma pa nang pa 'dus par 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par rjod pa dang / bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi don gzigs
28a3(1): khar bstan pa dang / sems can rnams rnam par dag pa'i sgor brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kha nem tho ba myed pa'i sgor bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'gyubyung ba'i sgo rab tu ba rnyed pa dang / thams cad
28a4(1): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bgreng pa mdzad pa cing mngon par 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bzhi pa'o// don gcig ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang
28a5(1): ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rnaMs ni chos thams cad mngon 'ang 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes/ byang chub kyi shing drung du byon te/ byang chub tu mngon par
28a6(1): 'ching rgya bas kyang bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / su'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyis chos kyi dbyings ma lus pathams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i phyir// byin gyi rlabs 'ang
28a7(1): myi shes pa'i sa bar zhug pas mtha' rnas par spangs pa pyod pa tshad myed pa rab tu brnyes pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen
28a8(1): pa'i yon tan yang dag par pa smrab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgya gdan rnam lngar bkras pas yongs su rgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams
28a9(1): cad du byang chub sems dpa'as rnam par dbyigs par dbyigs pa byang chub sems dpa'i byed pa dam pa bos pa rnams kyis 'al rtsubs pa// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam pa dang / 
28a10(1): smon lam khyad par can dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil la 'or thams cad kyis yang dag par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo zab mo rab tu skor pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad myed pa brtsams pas/ 
28b1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i brjod du byed pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur rad pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gyod pa sna tshogs spyod pa la yang dag par gzhol pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa
28b2(1): mnga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlob pa'i yul mngal ba// dgel ba'i cha ba la skyed pa'i sems can gyis rnam par dmyigs pa// dge ba'i tsha la thams cad pa myi dad pa dang
28b3(1): ldan pa 'byung ba'is/ byang chub sems na pa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i mabu'i gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu brnyes nas bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi rnam pa thams cad ma lus zim
28b4(1): mthar thug pa/ sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad dang / zhing gi rnam pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / yongs su
28b5(1): sbyin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / dus kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / 'dus pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam khang 'phrul pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / 
28b6(1): mthus pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnam pa 'tsho bam sus pa 'am sa/ cad tu mos pa ji lta pa bzhin du rnam par 'tshang rgyabs sangs rgyas kyi 'bril las mdzad de// ni ni sangs
28b7(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las lnga pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo skor pa mdzad la/ byir myi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir myi ldog pa'i 'jo
28b8(1): so dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis tshad myed// kha'i 'khor lo dang / myi 'jigs pa'i seng ge'i nga ro chen po'i tshul gyis thams cad ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas
28b9(1): ba'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi mdzod mun pa byed pa'i sgos snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyis chos pas cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo dang / ye shes rnam mkha'i dbyings par tshad myed pa'i tshul gyis chags
28b10(1): ba myed pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i tshul gyis bsgrims pa myed pa'i 'khor lo dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi myig rnam par spyor
29a1(1): pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos pa rdzogs pa'i 'khor
29a2(1): lo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / myi 'gal ba'i tshul gyis sas rgyas thams cad mdang 'dres par 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo dang / de dag la sordzogs pa rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
29a3(1): tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pas sems can kyi sems thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rnam pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo skor bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
29a4(1): rnams/ sas rgyas kyi phrin las pa sam gyis myi khyab pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong
29a5(1): dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i gnas su na gshegs pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do// myi'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha'i
29a6(1): rgyal po'i gnas dang na klu'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / dri za'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi
29a7(1): rgyal po'i gnas dang / myi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / snye phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / srin po'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / za'i rgyal po'i gnas dag tu gshegs pas kyang / sangs
29a8(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/ 'di lta ste grong khyer gyi sgor byon nas g.yo ba dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / yong ba rnams myig thob pa dang / 'on pa rnams sgra thos par 'gyur
29a9(1): ba dang / smyos pa rnams pa dran pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / gos myed pa rnams gros thob par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal pa rnams bdel ba 'thob pa dang / rol mo'i cha byad pa dkros ma brdungs par/ 
29a10(1): sgra yid du 'od bang rang 'byin pa dang / rgyan sdod na gtug pa dang / gnas nas ma phog pa dang / ma la spyod ma dkrol bam bskyod cing dkrol ba'i sgra 'byung ba dang / bya sna tshogs mang po'i sgra skad
29b1(1): yi thobab 'byung ba dang/ bas ma gar myi khra zhing myed pa'i sku mthong bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams sang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// mtshan dang
29b2(1): dbes kyang b.rang po bstan pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ yongs su gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / brkyang ba dang / 
29b3(1): bsdums pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// gshegs pa dang / slar bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / gzigs pas
29b4(1): kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// chos bstan pa dang / kyi gsung bar bzhugs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// rdzu 'phrus rgya
29b5(1): 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su las/ da pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams kyi yul sems ca
29b6(1): bsam pa sna chog rgya mtsho dang ldan lang/ 'jig rten gyi gyod pa thams cad rgyu zhing 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i pa chen po sa shin tu brtan pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su
29b7(1): dran pa dang ldan pa/ sngon 'grogs 'grogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / gnas pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sku
29b8(1): gzugs sa ni gyi ngoms pa'o zhes bya bar gnol pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams skye bar dkon no zhes bya bar yid ches par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs
29b9(1): pa'i gsung thos pa ni bsod nams kyi chos dkar po'i 'gyur gnas su gyur pa'o zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yid la byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag pa
29b10(1): ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa ni mtha' yas pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par lta ba dang / ma byon pa'i
30a1(1): sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i cha ba dang / mos pa'i tshul thams cad kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
30a2(1): 'das rnams nyes par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan mtha' yas pa'o zhes khong du chud par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la mngon tu
30a3(1): gyu rang par rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi rigs bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar sems pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yi zhing thams cad na snang bar khong
30a4(1): bya chud pa dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'byung bsa'ajig rten thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// dang par
30a5(1): byas pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo spyad pa byasab dang / rjes su bcod pa dang / spyan drangs pa dub / mchod pa dang / mngon mthong ba dang / mdzum 'a byas
30a6(1): ba dang / sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i sems kyis mos parabyas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la
30a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par gyu rang pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do// sangs rgyas bzong
30a8(1): mthong sar 'dod bya bas kyang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa tshad byed pa ba
30a9(1): chos kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'os par byas pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na
30a10(1): ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do// de dag las sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rnas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya gor brjod du myed pa dag 'jig
30b1(1): bya las margyam pa bas car bya/ masas pa da kyi sas pa dang bu dang bras sa kyi 'das par byung / na sa sa kyi yin 'as na dums pa kyisems pa
30b2(1): ma pa dang / byu pa dang / bams pa dag la gnas pa dge sa rgyam sa cad byed pa dang dang byar gyi khrog pa'i sus dang / ying chen pos rab tu bskung ba dang / blan gyi stonasas kyis sos sa rdzobabyed pa dang / 
30b3(1): sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thugs kyis 'jig chen thams cad du 'byung te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bris mos bdus pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
30b4(1): 'das rnams ni dgon pa la bzhugs sam/ zhi bar bzhugs sam/ dben par bzhugs sam sangs rgyas kyi rnam par pyod pa la bzhugs sam/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i gnas la bzhugs sama'i
30b5(1): gcig pu 'byes par bzhugs sam spu kyi snang bar la zhugs sam/ ye shes zab mo'i gnas la gzhugs so/ sangs rgyas da kyi yul gyi stobs tshad myed pa la bzhugs sam/ skul yongs
30b6(1): su pyod pa skyi mthong bang bzhugs kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gzhan gyis kyitshugs pa'i ye shes dang smon las kyi tshul gyis chos
30b7(1): pa bzhin du 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyun myi 'chad par 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// sangs rgyas klu yongs su tshol las kyang sangs rgyas kyi
30b8(1): 'phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// sangs rgyas gnod sbyin yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas myi 'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas ste bye chen po yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas srin po yongs su chos
30b9(1): dang / sangs rgyas kyi dang phyi ma yin yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
30b10(1): rgyun myi chad do// chos bston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// sangs rgyas gcig brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pas kyang sangs
31a1(1): rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam thams cad gcig tu brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun myi 'chang ngo // byang chub sems
31a2(1): raba'i spyod pa gcig rnam par phye ste/ spyod pa ba dang brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// 'jig rten gyi yul sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// 
31a3(1): sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jig rten gyi yul du brjod pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// yul ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun myi 'chad do// nyin mtshan dang / zla ba yar kham dang / 
31a4(1): mar kham dang / zla ba dang / lo 'grangs par bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pa nas/ de bzhin du bskas pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i bar du bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pas
31a5(1): kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ sems can rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las brgyad
31a6(1): pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnamasal 'byung gnas lta bu sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun la rnam par spyod pa la bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / #
31a7(1): ba lta bu / sems khong du chud par bya ba la shin tu mos pa lta yu/ dbang po rnams la skyabs pa lta bu/ sems can skye dgu thams cad la 'dul ba lta bu ya/ 'gro ba thams cad la mo sa kha lta bu/ bya ba chub
31a8(1): sems dpa'i thams cad la 'byung ba lta bu/ byang chub tu zhugs pa rnams la skul ba lta bu / gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa rnams pa ye shes swa pa lta bu dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
31a9(1): 'jig rten gyi rtag par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun gyi 'chad par brjod pa dang / phrin las mdzad pa'i mthar thug par bsam pa dang / chos kyi rgyud nyams la myed pa'i dngos por brjod pa
31a10(1): dang / srid pa'i tshul ma gnas cad la brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad skyo bar bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sems su 'thun par bya ba dang // sku mo'i sa ras bu sems can rnams kyis
31b1(1): shes par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyis 'jig nyes thams cad du dgal bar bya ba myed par bstan pa dang / sems can rnams la sa byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa mnyes pab gyis shig par
31b2(1): bsam pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa chos kyi 'khor lo skor pa ba stan tu kyi rung bar khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnams kyi tshol ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas la dbyigs
31b3(1): par brtson pa'i sems la dgod pa dang / yun tu dran pa rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa mabong ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa dang / skyo ba'i dbang po phyir bzlog cing yongs su dag par mdzad pa
31b4(1): dang / sangs rgyas la mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyo bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis brdag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la dmyigs pa'i rkyen 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa babs
31b5(1): cad tu byin par 'gongs par mdzad pa dang / sru thams cad bshisaste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis sems can rnams yongs su bzung 'am mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par 'jug
31b6(1): pa dang / dregs shis smyos pa'i sems can nam sa sdos pa la dgod pa mdzad cigayongs su mya ngani las 'das pas sonapas kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun gyi 'am dza/ 
31b7(1): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las dbul ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ 'jig rten thams cad na sems can/ sme ba sngags
31b8(1): 'don cing ngu ba dang / mya ngan byed pa dang / mchis 'byin pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhe 'am/ thugs chen po zhe'am/ ded dpon chen po zhe 'am/ phan nga ra bzhid la thugs
31b9(1): brtse ba can zhe 'am lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa pa/ 'gon tu gyur da la// blun myed la/ bsod nams zhing nus par gyur pa to zhe 'ag sangs
31b10(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'byung bar dgal zhes rnam pa de lta bur sme sngags 'don cing mya ngan byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams kyi la sam pa dang / yid la bya ba de das
32a1(1): de dag gi sgor sangs rgyas kyi phrin las tshad myed pa rgyun gyi 'chad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'dal ba'i tshe/ 'di lha sa sems can rnams kyi sems
32a2(1): dad par bya ba'i dbang dang sems can rnams dad pas mchod par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par spyod par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya
32a3(1): ba'i dab pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyam par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams 'dul pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang dang / 
32a4(1): sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dmyigs par bya ba'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa sa phyogs dang yul sna tshogs su sems
32a5(1): can rnams kyi dgel ba'i rtsa bsags par bya ba'i dbang gis sosacan rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang / ring srel byin kyis rlob ste/ swa dang / 
32a6(1): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / A ma yin dang / nasa? mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / zho phye chen po dang phyi'i gan thams cad tu 'dul ba dang / mos pa'i tshul
32a7(1): ji lta ba bzhin tu cu gtud dang / ring bsrel byin kyis rdzoba'o// rang gi sprunas par bye ste/ su gdung dang / ring bsrel chad byed pa/ grangs byed pa/ dpag tu myed/ bsam gyis kyi
32a8(1): khyab pa/ brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa byin gyis rlob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod chen gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gtsu pa 'jig rten thams cad du rnam pa bye ba de'i yul dang / phyogs rgya
32a9(1): klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / myi'i gnas dang / srin po'i gnas dag su gdung dang / ring
32a10(1): ya srel mchod par byed par 'gyur bas/ sku gdung gi ring bsrel dbul dang / phyag sem gyi mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i mchod rten la glong thams cad nges par sangs rgyas dras par/ 
32b1(1): 'gyur te/ chos la rab tu nyen par 'gyur ro// dgel 'dun la dad pa rab tu 'job par 'gyur ro// yul dang phyogs kyi gnas de dang de dag tu'ang rgyun gyi chad par/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson pa'i bsam la
32b2(1): sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// bsod nas byed par 'gyur ro// mkhol ris de dang de/ yongs su dag pa rab tu 'bob par 'gyur ro// rigs dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid ce pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
32b3(1): long khyod ches po dpal khor rnams pang dag pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ wA dang khyi'i bum sum tshogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// log par lung ba byed pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
32b4(1): sangs rgyas 'byung ba don yod pa rab tu sgrub par 'gyur ro// chos dkar po la gnas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i lam yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/ 
32b5(1): theg pa gang la dad pa'i smon lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyu rang ro// / de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag la rin tu gzo' ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom lda
32b6(1): 'anas rnams la rten pa dang / bskyabs pa tshal ba dang / 'gon btsal ba dang / dpung gnyen btsal ba'i sems bskyedapar 'gyur te/ de sar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
32b7(1): ni yongs su mya ngas las 'das kyi yod tan lasas gyis kyi khyab par spyod pa/ masong rnams 'ang myigs pa la lan gyi gnas dag te/ sangs rgyas macom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dzis rtes na 'byung na sa sems
32b8(1): can rnams kyi dge ba'i ma gzham pa mang po rab tu ba gas pas bsod nams kyi tshogs rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sang pa rgyas kyi phris las bcu pa'o// 
32b9(1): pa'i sras brgya po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgya chen po tshad myed pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa rnams so// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs ma gtogan
32b10(1): par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis tshad gzung bar myi nus pa'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par gyi nus pa'o
33a1(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su myed par 'gyod cing / dngos po rnam pa gnyi su myed pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos rnams
33a2(1): te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lung stond pa la gnyis su myed par gyod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can sangs rgyas kyi rjes
33a3(1): su dran pa la brtson pa rnams kyi sems dang / bsam la brjod du myed pa 'byam klas pa rnams la gnyis su myed par spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don ma lus par mngon par
33a4(1): sangs rgyas las gnyis su myed pa'i sku rnam par rnam par dmyigs par/ mdzad do// ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rang bzhin gnyis su myed par thugs su chud pa
33a5(1): mngal ba'o// 'byung ba dang / ra ltar byung ba'i mkha' gnyis su/ myed pa dang / sngon gyi mjal dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung pa gnyis su myed par zhugs su chung ba mapar 'an/ 
33a6(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gnyis su myed las dus gsu rgyasangs rgyas kyi zhing ba me su TI ga khar rab tu mkhyend cingarton pa thugs su chur pa lang 'o// sangs rgyas gcig dang
33a7(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mying gnyis su byed yum thugs su chud pa mngal ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs su chud pa dang / 'dul la mdzad pa'i rnam par dmyigs pa gnyis
33a8(1): su byed par thugs su nun la mnga' ba'o// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa gnyis su myed par zhugs su chud pa mngal pa'o// 'das pa dang / sa byon pa dang / daltar byung / 
33a9(1): ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig ste/ gnyis su myed par zhugs su chud pa mngal pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
33a10(1): 'das rnams kyi gnyis su myed pa me khyod cing dngos po gnyis su skyed pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin
33b1(1): gshegs pa bzhugs pa chos thos cad la rab tu zhugs pa rnams so// bcu gang zhe na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa la
33b2(1): bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bugs rje chen po myi mnyam pa la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon las ji lta ba bzhid tu 'byung ba la
33b3(1): bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su myi gtong ba la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dngos po myed pa
33b4(1): la gnas pa'i chos nyid la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas la gnos gan sa rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skal pa mnyam pa la rtsi dad cing don yod pa ya bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
33b5(1): ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasani chos thams cad nyams pa byed par gzhos pa la bzhun
33b6(1): pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa byedapa'i thugs kyi rnam par gyod pa sa bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi mnyan
33b7(1): pa nyid la 'jug pas grub pa myed pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la lazhugs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhug
33b8(1): pa chos thams cad la bzhugs pa rnams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad a lus par mngon par mngon par mkhyen pa rnabs le/ 
33b9(1): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings sa lus pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa klangs pa slu ba la dag thams cad mngon par mkhyend pa dang / pa 'ongs yang 'grangs pa mthal dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa
33b10(1): dang / ra zhir 'iphrum gangs sem po'i dag 'ams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / tshig gi lam mas 'das bkris cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig chen gyi chu mapa' dag thams cad mngon rjer
34a1(1): bar mkhyend pa dang / sems can gyi bsdam pa dang / shes pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i// dge ba'i rtsa la chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po
34a2(1): dang / rnam pa sna tshobs su rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la bsam pa tshad myed pa yongs su myi gtang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye ges 'bar bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
34a3(1): mapa' dag thams cad mkhyen pa dang / chos thams can 'tshang rgya ba'i mkhyen pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /  'jig rten kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtha' dag zhes
34a4(1): cad mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ga'i myig 'phrul gyi rnas pa lta bur dbye ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dge ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad
34a5(1): ma lus par mkhyen pa'o// dus bu gsum pabam po lnga pa / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
34a6(1): ga 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po// stobs tshad byed pa/ stogs phul pa myed pa/ stobs kyi nyam pa/ som snying po dang ldan pa/ stobs myi shigs pa/ stobs 'jis rten
34a7(1): thams cad kyis bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ stobs sems can thas cad/ kyis myi 'phrogs/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan stobs/ chen po'i sto pas rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
34a8(1): kyi sku ni/ pha ros kyi gnod pa mas cad kyis myi shi gas/ myi chod pa'o// 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyis sku tsheyi dbang po nyams par myi nus pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi basprul pa'i mye'i gdung bas
34a9(1): jig par gyi rus pa'o// 'jig rten kyi khams thams cad 'jig par gtogs pa'i chu'i phu por 'grongs pa 'i myi 'grongs par myi 'gyur ba'o// bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad dang / lha khams
34a10(1): cad kyi dpung dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lte 'phye chen po dang / myi dang / myi me yin pa thams cad kyi dpung dang / sha za dang srin po rdzas
34b1(1): zad kyi dpung dang / sems can sa lus pa thams cad kyi dpung gyis brgal bar dka' ba'o// rdo rje ri rab kyi ri tsam gyi char pa dang / khor yug gi ri chen po tsam 'am/ stong sum gyi stong chen po tsam kyi
34b2(1): rdo rje'i char 'bab kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu gcig kyang 'bul bar myi 'gyur te/ bag tsha ba'i gas myi mang 'o// bzhugs
34b3(1): sas/ bzhud dam gzims kyang rung ste/ spyod lam 'gyur ba myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa yang na bzhugs pa'i yul de dang de'i 'khor dag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes na kun tu 'bab par gyi
34b4(1): bgyur ro/ sangs rgyas kyi zhas ring ba rnams la yang gnod par myi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis rlabs pa'i sems can rnams la yang gnod par myi 'gyur zhing myi g.yol na de
34b5(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku g+ha a smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu po chen po stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dang / 
34b6(1): gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgyes na chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa'i 'jig/ rten gyi khams thams cad ri rab kyi ri dang bcas pa
34b7(1): khor yu ga dang / khor yug chen po'i ro dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang / ri dang / nag tshas thibs po dang / sems/ can gnas za dang pa kun dang bcas pa/ de lta ba'i 'dzin
34b8(1): rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ka gcig du btsud de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur zug par bzhag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs ma gtog sa
34b9(1): par sems can rnams kyis shes par myi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spu'i ba su'i khung bu gcig gis bzung ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i
34b10(1): su ra thug par la snums shing ka shes par bskams shing gshegs sam/ bzhugs sam/ bzhengs sam/ gzigs kyang lung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thu gas skad cig tsam yang skyo ba myi
35a1(1): ma 'o/ char cing dub par myi 'gyur ro// mthu dang stobs la yongs su nyam par 'gyur myi mnga'o/ spyod lam rnam par 'gyur ba myi mnga'o// kye rgyas kha'i sras 'di lta ste/ 
35a2(1): dben na/ nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin kyang skyo ba myed do// nub pa myed do// gnod pa dang / myed par myi gyur ro// myi g.yo/ myi 'byung ba
35a3(1): kyi 'jig go// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang la spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams a lus pa thams cad la skams kyang de'i rgyus thugs ska cig tsam du yang myi bde la nga
35a4(1): sku nyams myi 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bu po che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi gyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
35a5(1): 'das rnams gshegs skabs gcig tu bzhugs pas// sangasargyas zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang yang brjod du myed rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dal zhing
35a6(1): zhugs bskyed pa gcig gis bskal pa dad pa'i rim pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du myed rdul shinatu phra ba snyed 'byung bar mdzad do// de lta bur gshegs pas
35a7(1): khaskul pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gshegs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyud ji snyed pa'i bskal par bzhud de/ 'jig rten gyi kham sa thams cad kyi rdul shin
35a8(1): tu phral snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du 'khor kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i 'khor yug chen po'i rdo rje'i ri dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa la ba skyes pa snyed kyi rdul shin tu
35a9(1): pra la snyed kyang de la kha spes pa de bsnyed/ ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu btsud de/ ba su'i khung bu gcig tu ji ltar ba bzhin du sU'i ya su'i khung bu thams cad du btsud de/ ba sru'i khung bu yang / sems can thams
35a10(1): cad snyed du gyur da la// de dag thams cad bsnams te/ de snyed kyi ba spu'i khung bur tshul de bzhin khu bshams te/ thugs bskyed pa de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyu
35b1(1): nying gshegs sam/ phyogs kyi dra ba thams cad du rgyu nyid gshegs sam nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'grangs pa sngon gyi mthar gtogs pa nas
35b2(1): gzung ste/ phyi ma'i mapa'i bskal ba'i mur phug par de bzhin gshegs las bskal pa thams cad/ pAr gyurd kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa la bzhud pa la kha byon pa ni nyams par gyi
35b3(1): 'gyur ro// sku nyams chud par myi 'gyur ro// thugs rnam par 'khrug par myi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin nyams par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
35b4(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi maphul po che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi chos gsum pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms gcig bzhes nas bskas
35b5(1): ba larjod du byed par skyil mo krung gcig bcas pas nyin mtshan gyi rgyud du sngon gyis phal dang // phyi ma'i sa pa'i mur gtogs pa'i bskal pa 'das par bzhugs kyang / sU myi g.yol zhing
35b6(1): pa del pa'i dam pa la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par byed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pas nas par spyod kyang/ sems can 'ga' tsas la'ang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las drun can
35b7(1): 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su bkod de/ 'jig rten gyi kham sa de dag gi sems can gcig gi lus kyang / 'jig rten gyi sa
35b8(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i rdul shin tu pra la snyed tsam du che ba de lta bur gyur da ya/ sems can gcig gi lus kyi tshad ji tsam pa de tsam gyi lus su sems can thams cad
35b9(1): kyang gyur la/ sems can de dag re re'i gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khams cad kyi ljid ji tsam yod pa de tsam tu gyur da te/ sems can gcig ji ltar lci ba de bzhin tu/ sems can thams cad
35b10(1): re re'i ljid kyang de tsam du gyurd te/ sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig la phyi ma'i me 'a'i bskal pa'i mur thug par pa snams te/ phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig gis
36a1(1): ji ltar bsnams pa de bzhin du/ phyag sor thams cad kyi che mo la'ang de tsam re re ba snams kyang de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sku mnyel ba 'am zhugs dub par myi 'gyur te/ thugs
36a2(1): bskyed pa'i tshogs shin tu phra ba gcig tsam du yang sdug bsngal myi bde'i pa skye bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rnam pa
36a3(1): ya 'jug pa re re dang / de sta bu ya 'jug pa nam mkha'i khams a lus pa'i dbyings kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ sgra'i che mo'i cha shas kyis gzhal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa thams cad re re zhing
36a4(1): yang skra'i che mo'i cha shas kyis gzhal te/ nam ma'a'i dbyings kyis kun tu khyab pa phams cad ma lus pa'i sla'i rtse mo'i chashas kyi tshad kyis nam me kha'i dbyings la 'jug pa thams cad du zhugs te/ de
36a5(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i gyod lam 'di'i tshul dang / skyil mo krung gtsi/ sa tu bzhugs pa'i spyod pas sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi ma'imakha'i mur thug pa'i bskal la zad par mdzad de/ bskal la
36a6(1): 'da' bar mdzad cing / bskas pa la rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chenapo'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos
36a7(1): bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig la dbu sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed byin kyis brlabs te/ dbu re re 'ang/ 
36a8(1): ljags sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i tshul shin tu phra la rnyed byin kyis brlabs nas/ de dag re res kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sma skad kyi gsung sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du/ 
36a9(1): myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed me brjod de/ chos kyi dbyings su ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sA sad kyi gsung
36a10(1): de res kyang / mdo sde sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bshad pa/ mdo sde re re sa yang chos bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin
36b1(1): tu phra la rnyed rab tu gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos pa brtan pa gcig las kyang chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du skyed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed brjod par gyur da la/ chos snyan pa
36b2(1): gcig las ji ltar de bzhin tu chos bstan pa thams cad las kyang de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge brjod de/ de ltar brjod pas bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin
36b3(1): tu bral snyed rab tu ba han la/ bskal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu gasnyed zad par gyur kyang / da dung gzhan yang bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang
36b4(1): brjod du myed pa'i rdus shin tu phral snyed du rgyud cing / rab tu bston pa'i tshul gyis rnam 'grangs 'dis/ bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin phra ba snyed rab tu ba snyams rnam 'grangs 'di
36b5(1): 'dra bas bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu/ phra ba snyed zad la/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed kyi bskal pa 'das par gyur pa te/ phyi ma'i
36b6(1): mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa zad cing 'das par byas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i srul pa chos thams cad snang ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos thams cad rab tu shes par khastan
36b7(1): cing gsung bstan pa dang / the tsom thams cad rab tu gcad pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'khor lo bskor pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ams cad
36b8(1): brjod pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rkyen dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par ye shes kyi smon ma chen
36b9(1): khos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ba stod pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa dang / myi 'jigs pa chen pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi spyod pa rgyun gyi 'chad de/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig gi byis kyi drangs/ 
36b10(1): kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i srin chen po dpe' thams cad la dpe' myed pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs
37a1(1): pa/ sna'i rtse mo'i chags kyis gzhal pa sa lus pa thams cad chags pa myed par rnam par dbye bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa de snyed
37a2(1): de snyed du/ thugs kyi skad cig re re la phyi ma'i mtha'i mu thug pa'i bskas par sustsal pa mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i srul pa'i sku thams cad la sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sU re ye la 'dal bar gyur da la/ 
37a3(1): gzhung de bzhin du dbul re re ka 'ang / de snyed de snyed kyi ljags mnga' bar 'gyur te/ A ka sa re re las kyang de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sma skad kyi gsung chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i seMs
37a4(1): can gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad pa khyud la/ dbyangs kyi yan laka dang / sma sAd kyi gsung de dag re res kyang / de snyed de snyed kyi mdo la sde bshad par gyur da la/ mdo sde de dag re re la yang / 
37a5(1): de snyed de snyed kyi chos bstan pas pa/ rab tu gzhol par mdzad de chos pastand pa de dag re ne las kyang de snyed de snyed kyichos kyi tshig dang / yi ge brjod par gyur la chos kyi tshig dang
37a6(1): mi ge de dag re res kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cadadabyangs kyis rgyas par bkang le// sems can gyi khas ma lus pa thams cad go bar mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs
37a7(1): ba'i dbyangs la dub pa myi mdal ste/ nyams par myi 'gyur lathogs pa myi mngal bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo/ skor yang / bskal pa khyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du
37a8(1): rgyun 'chad par myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po 'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi dgyod pa'i rgyal tshan gyi chos lnga pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas
37a9(1): ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs dpal gyi de'us brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po ltar shin tu brtan par mub par mngal ba dag ste/ de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du byon na/ bdud sdig to can gyis ga seMs
37a10(1): tsacan tha ma sa cad snyed kyi sde gzugs sna tshogs can shin tu mye stug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar ka da' pa/ rab tu sdud pa'i gzugs can 'jig rten thams cad gom tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can// rab tu
37b1(1): skye ba ya'o ba la skyed pa'i gzugs can bdud shin tu myi stug pa'i/ gzugs/ chad la/ rab mchog por 'jigs pa/ 'jigs pa chen por bskyed pa 'gro ba thams cad gsod pa/ 'jigs rten thams
37b2(1): bung bar byed bya// de lta bu ga tag gis byang chub kyi shing drung dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / nam mkhal dbyings kyi mthar thug par gzugs kyang / byang chub kyi shing rlung ma bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshes
37b3(1): ba rnams la la snyengs myi mda'a'o// bag tsha ba myi mngal pa/ ba spu gcig kyang g.yol ba myed do// thugs kyi cha shas shin tu phra ba 'gal tsam gyis kyang de ltar rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzugs la mtshan ma rnam pa la dad pa
37b4(1): 'dzin pa kyi mda' ste/ shin tu brtan no// g.yolas myed do// myi sgul to// 'gyur ba myed do// rnam par rtog pa myed do// shin tu zhi'o// bsnyengs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang shin tu phral lo// sdug pa dang / 
37b5(1): khrod khro bshin tu spangs so// sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rgyun myi 'chad de/ byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// thugs rje chen po'i gnas kyis dbang po shin tu dben pa'o// bka tsha nga
37b6(1): byi ba ngal ba'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// thugs shin rtsa brtan zhing nyams la myi mngal ba'o// tshul zil kyis gnon lapas zil kyis myi non pa'i thugs dang ldan la ste/ bdud
37b7(1): thams cad dang / bdud kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad shin tu zil kyis gnon to/ shin tu spaspa 'gong ngo // de ltar zi lad kyis mnan rte spa gong ba dang / 
37b8(1): de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs tshol lo// de dag la 'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag/ cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul ba mdzad pa nye bar smra ba ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
37b9(1): pa'i byang chub las phyiran gyi ldon par 'gyur ro// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu po che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi pyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos drug pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
37b10(1): 'das rnams kyi gsung thogs pa myed la ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dang / de dag thams cad tu sems rnams gdul ba'i don gyis rnam par dmyigs par kun tu khyab par 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
38a1(1): gsung de ni ri rnams la sogs pa myed do// ri rang la thogs pa skyed do// rin po che'i ri sa thogs pa myed do// khom yuka dang khor lug chen po la sogs pa myed do// lA'i khyim la sogs pa byed do// klu'i
38a2(1): khyim la logs pa byed do// gnod sbyin gyi khyim la thogs pa myed do// dri za'i khyim la thogs pa myed do// lha ma yin gyi khyim la thogs pa myed do// nam mkha' lding gyi khyim la thogs pa byed do/ mye 'am ci'i
38a3(1): khyim la thogs pa myed do// lto phye chen po'i khyim la thogs pa myed do/ myi dang myi ma yin pa'i khyim la thogs pa myed do// gal te brgyal 'jig rten gi khams thams cad na yod pa'i sgra chen po
38a4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gang ste/ maco 'dres par gyur da kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rnam pa'i rnam par dmyigs pa la la sgribs pa myed pa
38a5(1): yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' shig de dag gi na pa'i rnam par dmyigs pa la s+yAng nge/ lha me lA ne se/ ko par mdzad pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyang rlag par myi 'gyur te
38a6(1): 'odi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'istobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bdun pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
38a7(1): 'das rnams kyi thugs ni chags pa myi mangs pa ste/ bskal pa bye khrag khrig brgya song brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par yongs su sbyangs pa'o// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / ra skar 'byung
38a8(1): ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rgyan gcig tu gyur da pa'o// rtog pa myed cing rnam par dang ste/ shin tu gsal ba'o// bdag gi zhes bya ba myi mngal ba'o// chos thams cad la myi gnas pa'o// gnang ma gnas
38a9(1): pa ma yin pa'o// phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o// ma skyes pa'o// dmyigs pa thams cad kyis dben pa'o// zhi zhing gnas myed pa'o// chom pa myed pa'o// 'du shes sna tshogs thams cad la myi gnas pa'o// 
38a10(1): dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa'o// rang bzhin gyis 'od dang zhing gsel ba'o// yongs su dag pa'o// dmyigs pa dang / yid la byed pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o// chos thams cad nyon
38b1(1): mongs pa myed pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral la dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstas pa'i mtha' phug pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kun nas khyi zad pa dang ldan pa'o/ 'du shes
38b2(1): kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad dang / tshad myed pa dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad 'gag pa'o// tshig gyi las kyis brjod tu myed pa'i yul lo// myi zad pa dang / 
38b3(1): chags pa myed pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'o// ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// bstobs bcu'i rgyan tu gyurd pa'o// chos thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o/ babs mkhas pas khyung ba'o// chos sna tshogs
38b4(1): chos du a dang // chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa dang / myi 'gal pa'o// dus gsum tu tha dad pa myed pa'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chos gzhi la myed khams cad kyi mnga'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa'o/ 
38b5(1): chos thams cad la mngal ba'i 'byung gnas dang / mdzod du gyur da pa'o// te/ chos kyi tshul thams cad la dgongs pa khyad par du rmongs pa myed pa'o// zhing gi rgyud du gtogs pa thams cad dang / 
38b6(1): phyogs kyi dra ba dang / rgyud 'byam klas pa me lus pa thams cad la myi gnas pa/ brtan zhing myi g.yol la nyams pa myed pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu gzigs pa/ chos ma lus pa khams
38b7(1): cad kyi mthar thug la/ zad pa thams cad yongs su zad pa thugs rnam par grol zhing zag pa myi mngal ba dang // shes rab rnam par grol yas shin tu rnam par grol ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myi zad pas klas
38b8(1): ba chags pa myed par rnam par gyod pa/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ dus gsum thams cad du bsgribs pa myed par 'byung pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems dang 'gyod pa 'ams
38b9(1): cad ma lus par thugs skad cig gis rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu po che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos brgyad pa'o// 
38b10(1): gzhan ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni/ sku myi mnga' ba ste/ rang bzhin gcig tu 'gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul tshad myed pa'i sku'o// mtha' dang dbu pa myed par
39a1(1): yongs su grub pa'i sku'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis zad par myi nus pa'i sku'o// khams gsum pas gos pa myed pa'i su'o// brten pa'i spus rnam par dmyigs pa'o// lhag
39a2(1): pa'i bsam pa dang / rjes su 'dren pa'i byin kyi brlabs kyi sku'i rang bzhis yang dag par ston pa'o// bden pa myed pa dang / 'jus pa skyed pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o// chos kyi sku
39a3(1): bzhud pa dang / byon pa myed pa'i sprul/ 'dus ma byas pas 'jig pa myed pa'i sku'o// mtshan nyid myed pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no// yul na gyi gnas pa dang / phyogs
39a4(1): namyi gnas pa'i spu'o/ ma lus pa thams cad kyi lus kyi sku'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi masu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa'i su'i rang bzhin no// sus thams
39a5(1): cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i sku sna tshogs su rnam par dmyig/ pa mdzad kyang chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ ye shes kun tu snang ba'i snying po can no// sku yongs kyi mdzod
39a6(1): chu chu dad pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam pa pa dad pa myed pa/ shin tu bstan pa'i su 'o// khams ma lus pa ngesacad rgyas par 'gengs pas kun tu khyab pa'i sku'i rang
39a7(1): bzhin no// myi g.yo myi 'gongs pa'i skurnam par dag pa'o/ yod pa/ 'ang ma yin myed pa 'ang ma yin pa'i tshul dang / tshul ma yin par rab tu brjod pa'i sku'o// sems can gyi mos
39a8(1): pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur bapa'i sku'o// 'gags pa 'ang ma yin sa 'a kags la yang a yis pas 'dul la ton pa'i sku'o// yon tan rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'byung bas shin
39a9(1): tu 'phags pa'i su'o// chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid du yang dag pa'i bgrub pa'i sku'o// rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi zhing bslebs pa byed pa'i mthar phug pa'i sku'o// thogs
39a10(1): kha gyi mnga' las chos thams cad shugs su chud pa'i sku'o// thams cad kyi rjes su song ma'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par dag cing 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku'o// 
39b1(1): phyir myi ldog cing bsgrings pa myi mnga' la sangs rgyas rnam par 'a rad pas ye shes thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang zhing yang dag par gzhol bas thugs su chud pa'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas ba
39b2(1): ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi 'apyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dgu pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mnyam pa myed pa dang
39b3(1): mnyam pa zhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs su chud pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'o// mngon par 'grub pa'i 'apyod pa khyad par du 'phag
39b4(1): pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o// tha dad pa myed pa'o// sangs
39b5(1): rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' gyod pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa'i tshul thams cad thugs su chud pa'o// smon
39b6(1): lam dang 'gyod pa'i chen pos yongs su myi dog pa'o/ spyodapa thams cad myi mnyam pa myed pas yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o/ spyod pa'i btobs la thu ba
39b7(1): par dka' ba'i 'gyod pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba'o/ spyod pa thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa legs par 'apyad pas rgyad
39b8(1): dmas la myed pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshad myed par 'gyod pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis 'byod yul mtha' yas pa'o// las thams cad kyis rab tu brjod pa ma yin pa'o// 
39b9(1): kham gyi yul myed pa'o/ lam thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'o// ye shes dam pa'i stobs kyi tshul mkhyen pa'o/ bam tsha ba myi mnga' pas chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i khor lo dang ldan pa'o// 
39b10(1): dge ba dris pa dang a dris pa la rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi tshul son pa mkhyen pa'o// mnyam pa myed pa dang mnyam pas shin tu dag pa'o// sku dang thugs dang / gsung gi yang dag par 'gyod pa
40a1(1): rnams la zin las gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsgos pas brnyes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par gyod pas brnyes pa'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs pas
40a2(1): cad la skyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mdzad pa thams cad rab tu 'byung ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi bstan pa tshad myed pa'i gnas kyi cha ba myed pa dang ldan pa'o// don par
40a3(1): shes pa'i ye shes thams cad kyis mthar zug par myi 'gyur ba'o// 'jig rten gyi sems kyis pyad pa'i shes pa thams cad kyis bsam gyis myi phyag pa'o// chos thams cad ma lus par mkhyen cing gzigs
40a4(1): pas sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o// dus gsum yangs pa thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra ba mtha' dang dpung myed pa ma lus par mkhyen pa'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don mkhyen pa'i phyir
40a5(1): phra ba'i ye zhes thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lusapa thams cad rnam par dag pa phyir myi ldog pa'i ye dashes kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las brjod du myed pa// 'jig
40a6(1): ten bya khams thams cad du spyod pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku / 'grangs pa thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shesakyis yi ge myed pa'i chos thugs su chud pa'o// yi ge sa
40a7(1): tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad spos shing brjod pa/ mkhyen pas brjod du myed pa thugs su chud pa'o// kun ro tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis dge ba'i chos spyad pas thams ca
40a8(1): rnam par dag pa'o// dam bcas pa'i tshul bzhin tu sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / skye mched ji ltar thugs skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad khong tu chud par ton pa mkhyen pa'o// 
40a9(1): chos thams cad kyi don tu chos yongs su btang zhing rim gro bya bar thugs su chud pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yul du gyur da pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad yul tu
40a10(1): gyurd pa'o// ru swa gsum khams cad la lugs skad cig gis chags pa myed par mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byed pa ma lus
40b1(1): bar yul du gyur da pa'o// 'jig pa skyed par 'dus kha thams cad yul du gyu rang pa'o// / thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing rnam par dag pa'i yul thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o// sa mtshams byed/ 
40b2(1): cing thug pa myed pa'i mngon par shes pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du brjod pa'i ma lus pa thams cad thugs skad
40b3(1): cig gis mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o// sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad las mtshams ma bcad pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rnam pa khams cad ma lus pa myed pa'o// rus gsum gyi rnam pa las
40b4(1): cad la mtha' yas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'irnam pa thams cad la tshod myed pa'o// shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad la lhag ma a lus pa ye/ de dag thams cad khA ga ma myed par
40b5(1): mngon par sangs rgyas pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pos byung pa nga thams cad thugs su chud pa dang / mkhyen pa khams cad rgyun
40b6(1): chad pa myed de ga de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i skus mtha' dang dpung myed par pyod pa yin/ chags pa byed pa'i thugs
40b7(1): kyis gyod pas mtha' dang / dpung myed par spyod pa yin/ thugs rje tshon po'i spyod pas dus thams cad du rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par chos bstan pa la gyod pas ma 'as dpa pung myed par 'apyod/ 
40b8(1): pa yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu bo che chen po'i gongs/ sangs rgyas kyi gyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bsdu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag
40b9(1): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo'i che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi gyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos rnams te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems
40b10(1): can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis myi khyab cing dpag tu myi nus pa dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas
