60a6(1): bo dag de bzhin tu gang gis las rnams shes te/ khong du chud pa dedag kyi sdig pa lashags pa ni gshin tu dag par 'gyur ro// shin tu bstanas pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'jig pa rten gyi khabs
60a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba bsnyed kyi dgal ldan gnas kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur da to// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i sas
60a8(1): ris drug gi lha'i bu tshad myed grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa dag gis kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i rigs drug po de dag gi lha'i bu mo rnams kyang bud myed kyi
60a9(1): kyus de las gyurd te/ bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyu ra to// de nas lha'i bu mo dag gis/ kun tu bzab po'i yongs su bsngobs rgya cher bshags te/ sa bcu thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin myed
60a10(1): stobs kyi rgyan yongs su 'thob pa'i don tu sems can gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis rgya chem bshags pa byas nas/ de dag las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub
60b1(1): sems dpa'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rin po che bdun gyi pad mo chus shin tu phra ba snyed la 'od cing / 'od chen po rab tu gtong ba mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi dpel byed pa'ang po re re nas kyang sems can gyi khams dang mnyam kha'i 'od
60b2(1): gzer yab po 'byung ste/ 'od gzer de dag la yang sems can gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing / sems can rnams las bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos stond pa mthong bar gyur da kyang / de tsam gyis
60b3(1): ting nge 'dzan dri ma dang khrel ba'i spyod yul gyi cha shas tsam yang legs par mthong par ma gyur da to// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis me tog gi sprin las sogs pa snga ma de dag dang / ba spu'i bu ka re re nas kyang / sems can gyi khams
60b4(1): dang mnyam pa'i me tog gi srin mngon par smra khad te/ byang chub sems dpal rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa la mchod pa byed par gyur da to// me tog ji snyed cig gtor ba de dag
60b5(1): thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs su gnas par gyur da to// spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab pa de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du sems
60b6(1): can gang gi lus lal ba pa de dag kyang 'di lta sted dper sa/ bsam btan don pa la mnyam par gzhag pa'i de dge slong gi lus kyi bdel ba des bu dang ldan par gyur da to// gang yams kyi bsgrib 'a
60b7(1): nyes pa'i myed pa de dag ni spos dri de tshor ba tsam gyis gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar gyur pa te/ nang gi dngos po'i nyon mongs pa lnga brgya dngag phyir rol kyi
60b8(1): dngos po'i nyon mongs pa lnga brgya dang / 'dod chags la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / zhe sdang la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa song phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / gti mug la dpyod pa'i nyon mongs pa stong phrag
60b9(1): nyi gu chacha gcig dang / cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // de bzhin du 'phral gyi 'dod chags la spyod pa dang / 'phral gyi zhe sdang sa spyod pa dang // 'phral gyi gti mug la 'gyod
60b10(1): pa dang 'phral gyis mnyam pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / myi shes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang bar gyur to// gang gis 'od gzer spos kyi phung po gzi'i brjid nas par 'phrul pa'i 'od rab tu
61a1(1): thob pa'i don du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyangs shing la skyed pa/ de dag gis gdugs kyi srin de dag myika lam du mthong bar gyur da te/ de dag gis kyang 'khor los sbyar ba chu klung gang 'ag li bye ma snyed kyi
61a2(1): dge ba'i cha kha bskyed par gyur pa to// de ni 'di ltar 'khor los bsgyur pa'i sa gser gyi dra bas dag pas 'thob pa'i phyir dge ba'i ma pa rab tu bskyed par gyur da te/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi
61a3(1): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gu 'khor los sgyur ba byed do// der sems can snang po yongs su sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'di lta se dper na/ bcom ldan 'das de
61a4(1): bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo 'i blo gros kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khaM sa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar sgrub pa zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das de'i 'phrul pa/ dge' slong dang / dge la slong ma dang / dge
61a5(1): bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs dang / gzhung de bzhin du skyesad pa'i rabs kyi sde'i khyad par thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed pa dag tu myi 'gro ba de lta bu'i skad cig myed do/ 
61a6(1): yang cig byed do// sud tsal byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshanakyang zag ste/ thos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba 'gyur ro// de bzhin tu 'kho som srur ba'i sa gser gyi drangan
61a7(1): dag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sos dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu gas la ba'i mtshams skyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis phog pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa pa de dag gis sems can yongs su 'dul
61a8(1): zhing sa bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta se dper na/ tshad myed pa'i bsam gtan thob pa ni ji srid du bsam gtan yongs su nyams paras gyur pa/ de srid bu tshangs pa'i gzhal skyed khang yang 'thod la / tshangs
61a9(1): ba'i 'jig rten na bde ba gang yod pa de dag kyang myong ba yin/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa gser gyi dra bas yongs su dag pa la gnas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che'i 'od kyis su la 'phog
61a10(1): par gyur da pa de dag sa bcu 'thob par 'gyur te/ chos tshad skyed pa la/ snang ba chen po 'ang rab thob par 'gyur ro// stobs rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu sbubs pa'i phyir myig yongs su sbyangs pa bcu 'bar
61b1(1): tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzhung de bzhin du yid yongs su sbyangs pa bcu 'ang rab tu 'thob ste// sha'i myig rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khri ga brgya hong gi rdul shin tu brab
61b2(1): snyed cig rdul shin tu phra bar byas te/ rdul shin tu phra mo de dag byang chub sems dpal de dag gyis/ lag pa g.yon pas blangs te khyer la/ de snyed kyi 'jig rkyen gyi khams 'das pa dang / rdul cig bor te de ltar cig gis na gci
61b3(1): du bzhag pa'i tshul dang thabs de lta bur ba brang ba'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su rdul de dag thams cad blar gyur da ya// de ya bu'i tshul du gang du bor dang / kang tu ma khor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad shin tu
61b4(1): pra ba'i rdul tu glags la// de ltar mad pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba de dag kyang / khyer te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas// rdul shin tu phra ba gcig khor laH/ tshul de 'dra bar phyogs bcu
61b5(1): kun tu rtul shin tu phra ba de dag zad par gyurd nas/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten de dag thams cad gcig tu pasdoms te/ sangs da rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi chu zhed du gyur da la/ sa ga na rin po che de
61b6(1): la ji snyams tu sems/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de che zhing tshad myedapa bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin nam// gsol da pra bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
61b7(1): glang gis dpe' bstan pa 'di thos par gyurapa sa/ thos nas kyang glo ba ches shing ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes dang / med kyi 'du shes skyed pa mchis na/ sems can de dag kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bkal #
61b8(1): paka lag na rin po che de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ lag na rin po che khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// lag na rin po che rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ngas bla na myed pa yang par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bas/ 
61b9(1): to/ de lta bu dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ye ges thob par gyur da to// rnyed par 'gyur ro// lag na rin po che 'di lta ste dper na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa
61b10(1): de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dper na rnam par bkod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rdul shin tu phra yar blags la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re zhing yang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag
62a1(1): zan/ chug shin tu grwa ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhig yod par gyurd te/ zhing de dag ma ji lta ba bzhin tu zhing thams cad nas 'ang// de snyed cig yod par gyurd la rdul de dag thams cad kyang tshul de bzhin
62a2(1): du bkodado// rnam zangs 'di 'dra rdzus shin tu phra ba bkod pa'i tshul gyis lan pargya bcur bsnyes te/ rtul gyi 'bru re re la'ang zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu mngon par grub par gyur da kyang / de dag thams
62a3(1): cad byang chub sems de ba'i sha'i myig gis la sgribs pa myed par mthong ste/ lag na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' sha'i myig las kyi rnam par sbyin pa yongs su grub pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig brgya'i rdul shin tu phra
62a4(1): pa snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems skad cig gis mthong ste/ de ni 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ya dbang sbyar zhing 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal pos gser gyi dra bas dag la pho ba
62a5(1): pa'i bsod nams rnam par sbyind pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ting nge 'dzin kyis yongs su grub pa'i shel gyi me long sgron ma zhes bya ba mdog dag ste/ bzang zhing lasal ba bzhin no// 
62a6(1): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo'o// / sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las// dpe' byad bzang po'i 'od zer ba stan pa nA~Mle'u ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig 'o/ dus bu gsum pa/ 1
62a7(1): bam po brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// bya chub sems dpa' de dag sa smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni
62a8(1): sems can gyi snod ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dmyigs te rdul tsam zhig brjod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems can myi mkhas la 'gyod pas kun nas non pa
62a9(1): bdag nas/ bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa/ 'jig tshogs la shin tu chags pa/ phyin ci log la rab tu rten pa the tsom la rab tu gzhol la/ log par lta ba yongs su rtogs byung bste/ mongs pas bsgru bas
62a10(1): pa/ 'khon pa'i rgyud du gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yam dang myi ldan pate/ rnams kyi don tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // kye rgyal ba'i skas dag 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'
62b1(1): gzhan la zhe sdeng skyed pa tsam tu kha na ma thol ba'i che ba'i chos ni 'gal tsam yang bdag gis a/ mtho do se// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan la khor khrod ba skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpal ni sgrib pa'i chos kyi sgo brgya
62b2(1): gong phrag brgya po 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ brgya stong phrag bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' myi mthong ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// chos kyi thong ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// / 'jig rten gyi khams
62b3(1): kun nas nyon mongs par skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ngan song du gnas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ myi khom par skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nad yang pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// skur la yang la 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ngang tshul
62b4(1): myi gas la kha 'dzin par 'gyur ro// brjed ngas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// blo chung ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// myig gi bsgribs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i kha sgribs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sna'i kha sgribs pa
62b5(1): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lho'i bsgribs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sus kyi bsgribs pa 'jis par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i bshes/  gnyen 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i grogs go 'dzin
62b6(1): bar 'gyur ro// theg pa dma' ba dang 'dril ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ skye bo ma rabs dang 'phrad pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid che ba'i skye bo la mos pa myed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ 
62b7(1): yang dag pa'i lta ba myi mtho ba/ myi rnyed pa 'dzinid par 'gyur ro// mu stegs can gzhan gyi nang du skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi yul dang / brten pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang ring
62b8(1): du 'gyur ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen myi mthong pa 'dzig par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad du 'gyur ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// myi dge ba'i chos rnam par 'phel ba 'dzig par 'gyur ro// skyes na
62b9(1): das la ba thob pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// mtha' 'khob kyi yul du gnas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// myi'i nang na u sngo byed par skye ba 'dzin par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lA'i nang na myi srung par skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur// 
62b10(1): klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / myi 'am chi dpa/ lho phye chen po dang / srin po myi srun par skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos la dang ba myed par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byis pa'i
63a1(1): chos la len pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// theg pa dma' ba la mos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po sa yid ches pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bskal par gnas pas 'jigs pa mang pa 'dzind par 'gyur
63a2(1): 'khor bas skyo ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la spong ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'grus pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa 'dzind par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po
63a3(1): sa dka' ba myed pa 'dzind par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' dang spyod pa la 'thun mong du khyad pa myi 'thob pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i lasam pa yongs su ma dag pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ 
63a4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa zhum zhing dma' ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu sems bskyed pa yongs su myi 'dus pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yongs su sgyid lug pas rab tu
63a5(1): zhig par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// las kun nas nyon mongs pa 'dzin par nga 'gyur ro// rnam par smin pa ma dag pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi stobs bdag nyid che ba ma yin pa 'dzin
63a6(1): bar 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi rgyud byang bar myi nus pa 'dzin par 'gyu rohaM/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun 'chad pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ga dmas ngag yongs su
63a7(1): myi zin pa/ 'dzi nad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'grubapar myi 'gyur ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs ba'i yul dang ring ba 'jim par 'gyur ro// bcud kyi yul ya
63a8(1): gnas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yus la myi gnas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i go cha la mos pa myed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi 'jigs
63a9(1): ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i las kyis skyo ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lta ba dang / the tsom la mngon par zhen pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sems yongs su rmongs pas bsgribs pa 'dzin par 'gyur
63a10(1): byang chub sems dpa' dnga'agrogs pa'i las tshungs phyur pa 'dzind par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims nyams par gyur bas tshul khrims ngan pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i sgo'i mngar
63b1(1): ma byi nad pas gnod sems dang / gti mug dang / khrob 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'grus chen po las myi ldog par bya ba la zhum la 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind kyi thob pa'i khrug pa 'dzin par
63b2(1): 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang myi mthun pa'i phyogs shes rab 'chal pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la myi mkhas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi thabs la thabs kyi
63b3(1): mkhas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la rnam par myi spyod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyis 'byung ba khong du myi chud par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa
63b4(1): myig 'byam klas pa bcu myi 'grus pa'i dmul long lta bur 'dzin pa 'gyur ro// sdig pa myed pa'i chos kyi rgyud mngon par khasgrub pa la glen zhing lkugs pa 'dzind par 'gyur ro// dpa' bo gzhan dang nor ba'i
63b5(1): dbang po 'dzin da pas sna yongs su nyams pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sems can pha rol gyi tshig gyi rgyud myi shes pa'i lce'i bsgribs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sems can gang zag pha rol la zhe sdang bas
63b6(1): las kyi bsgribs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// smyos pa'i sems thob par 'gyurapas sems kyi bsgrib pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sdom pa gsum dang myi ldan pas las pa sgrib pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 
63b7(1): ngag gi nyes pa bzhis kun nas nyon mongs pas skye mched kyi bsgribs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// chags sems dang gnod sems dang / log par lta bamang las yid kyi las la sgrib pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// chos yongs
63b8(1): su btsal ba la rku sems 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i dmyigs pa la thogs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la shin tu zhum la 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa la sgyid
63b9(1): lug pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sgo spang ba rgyan 'char pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dran pa'i soms dang thugs nyam chung ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa 'dzin/ 
63b10(1): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa'i gnas rnam par spong ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i chud myi za ba'i gnas la myi rten pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon myed pa yid kyis
64a1(1): mchor pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang // daltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang ring ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras rag
64a2(1): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gcig la gcig ngan sems kyi sems bskyed pa ni de dag la sogs bya ba sgribs pa'i chos kyi sgo ba phye stong phrag bcu'i rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal sras dag byang chub sems dpa
64a3(1): reg pa la zhugs pa rnams ni/ bas tshug tu ngan sems kyi sems bskyed pa lta bur khams po pa che ba'i chos 'ga' tsam yang mthong ngo // / de bas ma rgyal sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gyurab tu rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub
64a4(1): sems dpa'as chos bcu la brtson par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la don pa'i sems su bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad myi spong ba dang / zhing thos
64a5(1): cad la myi bzang pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba thams cad la mos pa dang / dad pa che ba dang / nam mkha'i na dbyings kyis klas pa'i chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid rnam par
64a6(1): bsgoms pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gtang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sa 'jug bgro /  sangs rgyas kyi byang dul dbyang ba dang / ma dag pa yang dag par shes pa la bzon par
64a7(1): bya ba dang // sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas yongs su myi skyo ba dang // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gnas pa la mthon bar chags pa myed pa se// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems
64a8(1): dpa' chos bcu po de dag la mngon par batshon par bya'o// de chos brgya po de dag la gnas pas rnam par dag par byed pa'i chos bcu rab tu 'tho ba se/ brgya gang zhe na de/ 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang
64a9(1): dge ba'i la shes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yongs su bzung ba rnam par dag pa dang nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par bsgom pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa
64a10(1): dang / mtha' dang dbung myed pa'i sems rnam par khyad pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyis grogs bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa dang / bskal pa khams cad la mngon par chags pa myed
64b1(1): de ris mas cu ba sas gnas papa 'i shes byas thas pa 'bus btsun par 'gyur te/ bcu ga zhen/ 'di par sems pan khams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pas 'jug pa dang / 'ardzo rnam
64b2(1): rnam par sbyin pa rab tu bye ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la ye shes snang bar 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul dang / sdel lo dag la le gas kyis 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la
64b3(1): ges kyis 'jug pa dang / yi ge thams can la spobs pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi skad dang / tha snyad dang / tshug la mkhas pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang 'jig rten
64b4(1): gyi khams thams cad du lus la snyan pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / khor kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan 'byung babastan pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / skye mched thams cad du
64b5(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ ye shes 'byam klasapa bcu po de dag rab tu 'dzand to// de de ltar ye shes 'byam klas pa bsdu po rab tu gnas las/ yang dag par gzung
64b6(1): pa la 'jug la bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra'i sbubs su gzung pa la 'jug cing / sA'i sbubs gcig 'jig rten khyams bsam gyis myi khyab par mngon par bsgrub pa la 'jug
64b7(1): pa dang ga sems can thams cad kyi lus su la su zhing sems can gcig gi lus brjod du myed pa'i lus su mngon par ba sgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / bskal pa brjod du myed pa sems kyi skad cig tu gzung ba la 'jug cing ses
64b8(1): kyi skad cig brjod du myed pa'i bskal par/ sonod pa dang / chos gcig sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du yang dag par gzhol ba la 'jug cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad chos gcig tu gzud pa la 'jug pa dang
64b9(1): skye ba ched gcis brjod du myed pa'i skye mched du byas te/ brjod du myed pa'i skye mched du byas pa la 'jug cing skye mched myed pa skye mched gcig tu bstan pa la 'jug pa dang / dbang po gcig brjod du myed pa'i dbang por
65a1(1): bya stsal 'jug cing / dbang po brjod du myed pa'i dbang po gcig tu gzud pa la 'jug pa dang // dbang po thams cad dbang po myed pa dang tha myi dad par 'jug cing / dbang po myed pa dbang por bya ba la 'jug pa dang
65a2(1): 'du shes thams cad 'du shes cig tu byin kyis brlab pa la 'jug cing 'as 'du shes gcig/ 'du shes thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa sa 'jug pa dang / tshig gcig rnam par brjod pa tshig brjod du myed pa rnas par brjod
65a3(1): par bya ba la 'jug cing / tshig gcig rnam par brjod pa tshig brjod du myed pa rnam par brjod par bya ba la 'jug cing tshig gi rnam par brjod pa thams cad sla gcig gi dbyangs su byin gyis brlab pa la 'jug pa dang gtus gsu
65a4(1): thams cad khasam gtan gcig tu bsdus te/ bsam gtan gcig po dus thams cad du kun tu sbyor bar snyan pa la 'jug pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras yang+ga dag khar gzung ba brgya po de dag sems kyi bsam pa bcu la gnas te
65a5(1): nam par dpyad par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pas cad kyi spyod pa la phyi spyod pa'i sems kyi masas pa la gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'du shes dang yid la byed las kyi gnas
65a6(1): pa'i sems kyi bsam pal gnas pa dang / sdug pa'i bsam pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyis zas pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dpung byed pa'i sems
65a7(1): kyi bsas pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa la mkhas pa'i sems kyi bsam kha la gnas pa dang / chos zab mo tha myi dad pa la mkhas pa'i sems khas pa pa la gnas pa dang / dogs
65a8(1): ba thams cad la nad myed par bya ba'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / dus thams cad tha myi dad cing mnyam pa'i sems pa la gnas pa dang / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
65a9(1): sems kyi bsam pa gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs tshad myed pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa sel/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems kyi bsam pa bcu po de dag la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag
65a10(1): bar gang khar gzung la bcu de dag rnam par byang par bya'o// de sems kyi bsam pa bcu po de dag la gnas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos la mkhas pa'i snang ba bcu 'thob po/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
65b1(1): zab mo snang ba la mkhas pa rab tu thob po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos
65b2(1): mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa la mkhas pa la rab tu 'thob po// sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad pa'i snang ba 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'amyi dad pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo// sangs rgyas/ 
65b3(1): kyi chos kyi rgyan la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig pa'i mos pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa'i tshul la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'aro ba'o// 
65b4(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rang gi/ sems la rag lus pas rab gyi stobs dpas buM phyir myi ldog pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras da/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mkhas pa'i snang ba bcu po de da/ 
65b5(1): rab tu 'thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bas na/ byang chub/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos de dag los nas rim 'gro dang / shes chen po'i bsam pas gzung bar bya'o// 
65b6(1): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'as chos 'di la gnas pa la/ ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyangadakon pa ma yin te/ las khrod chung ngus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos1
65b7(1): thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa'i byin gyi rlabs rab tu 'thob po/ 'das pa dang / mkhyen pa dang // da sAr byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang mnyam pa nyid du yang 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
65b8(1): de zhes de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid
65b9(1): rab tu thob las/ lnga rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog gi 'asrin gyi char mngon par bab lo// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos kyi srin gyi char mngon par khab bo// gzhung de bzhin du phye ma dang / ne bza' dang rgyal mtshan
65b10(1): dang / gdan dang / gtugs dang / nor bu rin po med pa/ sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan dang / rgyan dang / lAb sub thams cad kyi srin gyi char mngon par phal po// rdzas las 'das pa'i rol mo dkrol ba'i 'phrin dang / 
66a1(1): snams las 'das pa'i rol mo brkyang ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab bo// rdzas las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa'i sprin kyi char mngon par phab bo// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i de bzhin
66a2(1): gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa brjod du myed pa'i sprin kyi char mngon par lab lo// swa rdzas las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes gsungs pa'i rnam pa brjod du myed pa'i sprin kyi char mngon par labago/ 
66a3(1): lha rdzas las 'das shing chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs mngon par brjod pa'i sprin kyi char mngon par phab po// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa rnam pa brjod du myed
66a4(1): ba'i si sIn kyi char mngon par phab po/ byang chub nye bar brtan pa'i rnam pa brjod tu myed pa'i sprin kyi char mngon par phab po// 'od zer snang ba'i rnam pa brjod du myed pa'i 'phrin gyi char mngon par phab po shin tu
66a5(1): bstan pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi rkar rnam pa brjod du myed pa yang mngonapar phab ste/ 'jig ltar 'jig kyi khams 'di'i gling bzhi par de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du / de bzhin
66a6(1): gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang ba'i snying po byang chu bra la/ byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang na bzhugs ler snang pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus rgyas par gang b.ru
66a7(1): bzhugs te/ chos ston pa 'di'ang thams cad du 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang // phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i chos nyid rab tu 'thob las/ sangs rgyas kyi
66a8(1): zhing brjod du myed pa'i phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'das pa'i pha rol nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi ba bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa'i pha rosod nas/ byang chub
66a9(1): sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed kyang 'ongs par gyur pa te/ phyogs bcu bkang nas de dag 'di skad zer ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam lung bstan pa'i
66a10(1): chos nyid brjod pa legs so// legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag kyang thams cad kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar mying 'thun pa sha sa ka ste/ 'jig rten kyi khams kun tu dpal zhes bya pa dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs
66b1(1): pa'i mtshan kun tu dpal gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba gsag kyi drung gas 'dir phyin te/ thams cad na'ang chos snyan pa 'di nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu/ tshig 'di dag dang / si ke 'di dag dang / zho bar
66b2(1): bya ba 'di dag dang / brjod pa 'di dag gis lngas chad byed par gyung bar gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag cag kyang dpal du gyur pa khyag ta ka/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyi nad to// ji ltar bdag cag
66b3(1): 'khor 'dir phyind pa de bzhin tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par tshang rgya ba'i gzhir byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
66b4(1): kyis phyogs bcu bkang ste phyin par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos phyogs bcur ba ltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ga rab tu brjod pa
66b5(1): dang / de bzhig gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang ba'i rgya ba'i dbyings yongs su brjod pa dang / smon lam chen po 'i dbyings kun tu grags par khyad ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang khas/ khang
66b6(1): khakhams cad kyi sangs yongs su 'dod pa dang / rgas di smra ba bzhi tu sangs rgyas 'asrung byastan pa dang / sems can gyi 'ang dang po mig ma 'ongs su srid pa'i tshul banyid du/ sangs kyang / 
66b7(1): byung ba mnyes par bya ba brjod pa dang / byin gyis rlabs pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa don yod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / dge ba'i mji skar bskyed pa bzhin du
66b8(1): gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpal mang po'i mthu chen po stan pa dang / sems can thams cad la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgras bskul ba khyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs
66b9(1): dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// thams cad shin tu dang sems kyis/ bsgrib pa thams cad rnam par gsal gyis pa/ yon tan 'byung nas 'jig rten gtso 'i/ 
66b10(1): smon lam dam pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ mkhas mchog skyes bu seng ge dag/ spyad pa mi 'dral sngon spyad spyod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gso rnams kyi/ spyod pa thams cad rim gyis brjod par bya/ 'di la
67a1(1): dpel myed mcho ga rnams kyi// bskal pa'i grangs dpa'ajig rten grangs dang chos la btand pa/ rgyal ba rnams kyi 'gyur ba dang // yongs su brjod kyi sa dang pa'i yid kyis nyon// de dag sngan cad smod la
67a2(1): gyis// sems cad ji ltar sdug bsngal rnams las dgrol byas zhes// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// 'jig rten smon ma skyes pa rnams kyang mthong // spyod pa ji ltar shes gyur pa te/ gsung ba'i mchog dzas
67a3(1): kun la mchod pa byas pas na// sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnyed de// thams cad mkhyen nyid rag la mngon sangs rgyas// sngon gyi mye'i rnams seng ge rnams// sangs rgyas phyogs bcur 'od skad rab tu 'bar mdzad cing // 'od zer
67a4(1): dra ba rab 'gyed pas// phyogs bcu la 'jig rten snang mdzad mthong gyur da nas// bdag cag rgyal ba'i yon tan gyis// brgyan pa'i 'jig rten smon ma'i dam par 'gyurang byas te/ stobs bcu mnga' ba kun mkhyen par// myi'i ser
67a5(1): ker bya zhes smon las 'des// nged kyis sems can thams cad kyi/ 'dod chags zhe/ sdang gti muga' bar 'gyur ba'i// sug bsngal rnams las rab bkrol te// ngan song thams cad yongs su
67a6(1): gabar bya zhes/ 'di 'dra'i sron las rdzogs byas te/ de nas dpa' nga chen po byed la spyod/ blo btan phyir ldog myi 'gyur pa// stobs bcu rnams kyi gas byed rab tu 'aro ba// skyes bu seng de/ tu
67a7(1): gang rnams kyis// 'di 'dra'i smon lam sngar btab phyir ldog myi 'gyur bar// 'jig rten rnams mgyod mdzad pa// de dag don yod spyod pa brjod par bya// bskal pa bzang po gcig la yang // sangs rgyas stong grangs tshang yar
67a8(1): kun kyang 'byung 'gyur te// / kun tu gzigs pa gang brjod pa// de dag rim gyis bshad pa 'di 'dra'o// bskal pa bzang po gcig bzhin du // brjod tu myed pa'i bskal pa khrag khrig de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas ma byon de dag gi
67a9(1): bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis brtan par bya// zhing rgyud gcig po ji bzhin du// brjod du myed pa'i zhing rnams thams cad kun bzang ste// ma byon so bas bcu'i skyon myed pa'i// spyod pa thams cad de bzhin bshad par+ya// rgyal ba
67a10(1): ka ba 'og kang 'byung dang // ci mtshan de'i smon lam nas pa ci 'dra dang // rgyal ba kang gis gang gi sung // bstan mdzod mkhas pa'i sku tshe ji tsam dang // chos kyi rnam pa dge ba ni// gang gis bsgrubs te das pa kharnyes par gyur pa/ 
67b1(1): pa dang // 'jig rten ji ltar brtul ba dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos cing gnas dang / nas dag zhing yang ci 'dra dang // sems can rnam par dag dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang // bstan pa'i dus dang dus byin dang / de las gang
67b2(1): dag nas par dag 'gyur dang // sems can rnams kyi las gang dang // spyod pa gang dang zham 'grol ci 'drar 'gyur pa dang // dbang po rno rdul bar ma dang // gyod mchog sems can 'dul ba 'ang bstan par bya// 'di 'dun
67b3(1): shes par 'jug pa dang // spyod pa'i ngas rnams kyis rab tu zhugs gyurd cing // bzang po'i 'gyur gnas 'aspyod pa dang // 'gro kun ye shes 'khor lo khyod zhugs pa// lus kyi las la chags myed cing // ngag la chags
67b4(1): myed lnga dbyangs thams cad rnam dag la/ sems 'khyod chags myed pa/ yis// / dus gsum a lus rgyas par khyeb par byed// / 'di 'dra kun tu bzang po'i// spyod pa'i mchog sa pha rol da phyin pa thob
67b5(1): gyur da khaka/ brjod du myed dkyil 'khor rnams// chos dbyings kun/ tu rab tu brjod pa khyed// ma 'ongs dus kyi bskal pa dang // 'byas klas zhing rnams brjod tu myed pa thams cad kyang // skad
67b6(1): cig sems kyi rab tu shes// chos nyid de la rnam par rtog pa byed// kang rnams pyod pa'i sa 'dril la// spyod pa'i dam lasarjes su zhugs par gyu ra pa'i rnams// byang chub sems
67b7(1): dpa' mchog rnams kyi/ yon tan spyod pa phyogs tsam bshad par bya// mtha' dang dpung myed ye shes can// stobs bcu rnams kyi spyod yul mchog la zhugs gyur pa pa// thams cad shes snakhas pa'i
67b8(1): rnams// phyi ldog spyod las rab tu zhugs kyurd cing / 'od byed blo gros dam pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam mchog la zhugs gyur pa// / dpe' zla myed pa de dag gi// ye ges tshul dang spyod pa brjod pa
67b9(1): bya// rdul phran gcig gi chags la// 'jig rten khams rnams 'di rnyed dag zhes pa dang / spyod pa rgya che bos gyur dan// 'jig rten de dag thams cad myos par 'gyur// / rdul phran gcig la ji la ba dang // de bzhin
67b10(1): d+ha ya sems cad ma lus gzung byas te/ ye shes bzang po/ de dag ni// 'jig rten khams la 'jug pa bsam myi khyab// / de dag rus kyi rnam pas 'ad// rdul phran gcig gi khyon gyi lal yang dag 'jug// rdul bran
68a1(1): gcigs de bzhin tu/ zhing yangs rnam pa pa dang kun la 'jug// rdul phran thams cad re re ya/ zhing rnams brjod pa myed pa mang po 'dzud pa byed/ rnam pa pa dang du ma dang // gcig dang tshan
68a2(1): skyed de bzhin rab tu shes// ji snyed ci'ang ma lus pa'i// chos dbyings gzung ba thams cad yang dag gzung byed cing // mtshan nyid la dang sna tshog ga ste// sems can grangs kyi skal ba rgyud kyis nyam// 'jig rten
68a3(1): phra bar 'jug pa sa// phras shin tu gzhol par 'jug byas te/ brjod tu myed par bstan pa'i// bskal pa thams cad ma lus 'jud pa byed// de dag ring dang zung ba dang // rus kyi skad cig sems can rnas
68a4(1): bgyi 'thun shes/ shes spyod myi mnyam ma yin pa'i// ges bas de dag thams cad khong du chud/ yangs dang yangs sbyinamakhas pas na/ 'jig rten zas mo rnams la rab tu 'jug pa byed
68a5(1): sa pazhid nams te/ zhi lapa de bzhin nas/ rkyen sus 'jud do// phyogs rnams bcu po mamasacu/ phyogs rnam sa kun pa 'dug cing gang cig cas dang // 
68a6(1): 'jig rten khams rnams 'byos gas la/ tshad byed ga'i mjid ldan par rab tu 'jug/ gang yang zhing rnams mtha' sas shing / dpung byed gzung ba byas ning chus kyi dbyings su
68a7(1): 'dzud// zhing gi rgyud la mkhas pa'i rnams// shes rang ldan pas ye shes rab tu 'byung // bzang po'i yon tan ldan pa'i rnams// phyogs dang 'jig rten khams kyi rgyud du gyur pa dag/ ji snyed yod pa der
68a8(1): brgyag te// brjodan tu myed pa deng dag ras zhes/ ning da ni shi sa kyi brjod du byed pa'i zhing rnams sa kyarab tu mapyong // de dag tshul yang rab tu shes// las rnams gang gis sbyangs pa'ang kho cu chud/ ga sang
68a9(1): shing na las byas dag/ sas rnams thag khrig kun nas nyon mongs par / 'tsho bas kun tu bsgrub byas la/ de nag khams pad chud kyang ci 'dra shes// bdod du myed pa yangs pa'i rnams zhing gci
68a10(1): bstan pas de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa// de 'dra'i zhing la 'dug pa dang / gapa la grangs skyed de dag kun la 'jug// 'jig rten khams ni gcig las pa// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad yang dag 'jug pa/ 
68b1(1): byed/  'jig rten gcig tu baspongs myi 'gyur// 'jig rten khams rnams de bzhin 'dres kyi 'gyur// spyi'u tshugs rnams dang kong ma'i rnams// blan de 'og gis sa rnams yongs su gzung byas te/ 'gro ba'i rnams / 
68b2(1): bying thogs pa// 'jig rten kun sa 'jug cing rab tu shes/ spen zhing rgyu ba'i rgyud rnams dang / zhing rnams mtha la yas mapa' dang / dpung yod ma yin pa// sna tshogs yangs pa rab tu shes// rnam pa gcig zhes rnam pa
68b3(1): tha dad shes// zhing gi grangs rnams rab tu shes ye shes chags myed mthal ldan kun gyi grangs rnams kyang // bzang po'i theg la spyod pa yis// / rgyal sras kun tu bzang rnams rab shes // 'jig rten thams cad
68b4(1): phul pa dang / sems can rnam par sprul pa dang de bzhin zhing myal dang // chos rnams spyod pa'i tshul shes pa// sangasargyas phul ba'i pha rol byind pa'i rnams// 'jig rten phra zhing zab
68b5(1): sa dang / yangs shi na chogs 'angs pas sa mchod rnamasagachags pa dang rgas pa smranapa ste/ gnas pa'i mig rten nas/ bya rgyal rnam par grub pa'is
68b6(1): chos dbyings 'dug par bya ba la shin tu bslabs pa yi// rgyal sngas mtha' dang / dasung skyed pa// phyogs bsdus lus khams cana'agrengs par byed// mjig rten khams rnams de dag gis
68b7(1): phyi ni bskas pa sems can skyed kyis mapar thug cing / zad par brjod par byi nus te// mying bshang gal te sangs rgyas gsungs gsung// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyi sang // mtshan rnams mtshan nyid kyi 'atsun
68b8(1): rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan// bas can pa brjod myed zad byas kyang / mtshan nams gcig nas gcig brgyad sa thar zug myed// 'on kyang dmal ba'i sems myed khar/ mkhas pa rnams ni dus gsum
68b9(1): 'de gshegs sangs rgyas phyid/ chos kyi dbyings la byung ba ste/ sangs rgyas le shes sa la'ang rab tu zhugs/ dran mas tshigs byed dag pa nye/ lags byed 'di rang san ning tho thos sa ca/ 
69a1(1): gas pas// ye shes blo bros mchog ldan pa// chos dbyings bshad pa pha rol phyind pa tho ba// / keng gis 'jig rten mkham sa kyi rnams// yangs dang phra ba rnam kha sna tshogs shes gyu rad cing
69a2(1): der ni 'das pa'i dus rnams la// sems gcig bskyed pas rab tu 'jug pa khyed/ myi'i seng ge de dag tu// sangs rgyas spyod pa/ sna tshogs rnam pa chags myed par// / byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas shing
69a3(1): rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rton pa mdzad// / de bzhin ma 'ongs dus rnams kyi// rjes su gang byon de'i bskal pa ci 'dra dang // de la myi'i seng ge gang // / skye bar 'gyur bar de dag kun kyang shes// smon lam
69a4(1): gyod pa ci 'dra' dang // spyod yul gang rnams bsgom pa gang gis gru ba gyurd cing // bsgrub pa'i rnam pa ci 'dra bas// bskal pa ga yaM byang chub 'tshang rgya dang // de dag 'khor kyang khod tu chud// su chos
69a5(1): tshad dang / sems can 'dul ba ci 'dral ba// / chos kyi sgo mo gang zhig gis// 'gro bar chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba shes // de ltar kun tu bzang po'i// / ye shes mchog gi sa la smrabs
69a6(1): pa'i spyod pa'os gnas shing // de dag thams cad rab tu shes/ de ni 'grog so kun gyi 'byung gnas yin// dasar byungapa gzung byas shing // 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad
69a7(1): bdag chags ma lus par/ 'jig rten khams la rab tu 'jug/ de bzhin chos kyi dbyings nasas rab tu shes// de na spyi'i gtso rnams// dgra las rgyal zhing thams cad gzigs ji snyed pa/ phyi thun
69a8(1): thos pa dpo'o rnams/ chos kyi mnga' la la rol phyind pa snyes pa// sems can 'dul dang zhing rnams rnam par dag pa dang // rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnams// sems pas bskal pa yangs pa zad par byed/ 
69a9(1): skye bu'i mchog rnams 'dus mdzad cing / 'jig rten mchog tu phyin pa'i byin rlabs das pa la/ myi zad mdzod kyi ye shes yangs pas 'jug/ ye shes suHla mkhas pa rab tu 'jug/ tshigs myed myig gis bse
69a10(1): dang // chags myed rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa bsgrub byed cing / chags pa myed pa'i lus yengs dang / yangs pa'i lces kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed pa// dam pa'i sems la chags myed de// bsam pa kun tu rnam
69b1(1): yangs nas lar dag dang ldan// ye shes 'byung gnas gdag nyid de // tus gsum sems rnams a lus des khyab po// / sustsal ba'i pha rol phyi nad tho ga cing // zhing rnams srul po'i bslabs pa'i rnams// sems can srul
69b2(1): la mkhas pa dag// sprul pa sprul pas 'jig rten 'dul ba byed// 'du shes rnam kha yod pa'i lus se// des ni 'jig rten sna tshogs ma lus rnam khar bris// de dag thams cad rab tu shes// sangs rgyas ye shes tshul la rab tu
69b3(1): 'jug// 'khor rnams brjod du myed pa dag // sangs rgyas sku rnams re re dag kun la 'jug cing mthong bar byed// sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i mtha' 'ang myed// ye shes zab mo mthong bas na// / ye shes/ nyi ma shin tu
69b4(1): kasas par shar gyur da pa'i// phyir myi ldog pa'i spyod khal// 'jig rten 'byas kAs kun tu 'jug pa khyed// / ji lta'i tshul tu zhugs gyur cing // 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rnam par bkod 'dral bar// 
69b5(1): sems can tshul bzhin rab tu 'phags// khams gsum khams cad/ myig yor tshul 'drang shes// 'on kyang rtog dang rnam rtog/ byed// 'jig rten mthal dang dpung myed kun la rnam par rtog pa
69b6(1): byed ka/ rtog dang rtog myed mkhas pa che/ rtog pa'i shes pas rnamapar rtog pa byed/ bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i rnams// semasabaskyed gcig la yang dga'abya bar 'dzud byed cing // 'jig rten gyi ma/ !6Ta
69b7(1): 'di mthong nas// skad cig sems kyis thams cad shes par byed/ brjod du myed pa'i zhing rnams kyang // sems bskyed gcig gis thams cad yongs su 'dal bar byed// bskal pa brjod da byed zad byed kyang
69b8(1): sgra tshe'i chags gcig las g.yol ba myed// bla skal pa brjod du myed pa dag// nyi ma gcig dang yud tsam gcig tu 'dzud byed kyang // ring dang zhung la gzhol ba myed// skad cig gcig gcig la 'jug pa'i pha rol da byind// sems
69b9(1): kyi rnam pa 'jig rten kun// 'jig rten ma 'gon po'i rnams// 'jig rten rnams sems can kun gyi sems yin no// rnam pa gnyis kyi grangs su zhugs// 'on kyang de dag kyi gnyis rtog pa myed// sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'jig rten
69b10(1): te// sems can zhing dang sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin no// 'on kyang 'jig rten mgon po'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun la gcig tu snyoms/ lu sa rnams brjod du myed pa yis/ phyogs bcu ba/ 
70a1(1): cad rgyas par bkang zhing yu nyon// 'on kyang lus la gzhol ba myed// chos nyid rten pa gnas myed rab tu shes// 'on kyang myi'i seng ge rnams// / gnyis la gnas pa'i shes pas byur pa ma yin te// myi gnyis
70a2(1): pa la'ang gnas pa skyed pa/ gnyis dang gnyis myed chos rnams rab tu shes/ di skar phyig byung ba rib dang / myig yor sna brtan de bzhin mi lam 'dra ba dang // myis sa rnam par sprul pa gan 'gro ba thams cad ma lus rab tu
70a3(1): shes ka/ de ltar spyod yul nyams myed las// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs kyi rjes su 'byung ba yin// kun tu bzang po'o ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings la shin tu bdag pa yin// / snying rje chen po mtha' yas kyang // / sems can myed dang
70a4(1): mnyam khar zhing rnams thams cad bsgom// sngon nas nyon mongs nyams myed pa'i// / bsam/ dag pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gro// myi zad mkha' ltar rnam dag pa'i// rgya che shin tu yangs pa'i sa la rab tu zhugs// gsung ba'i
70a5(1): seng ge thams cad kyi/ 6/ tshul gyi 'akyil 'khor thams cad rjes su dran// sa 'jig rten rab tu spros pa la// smon las tshad myed yongs su gdab pa byas pas na// de dag spyod pa yongs su dag// 'jig rten
70a6(1): khams rnams thams cad rgyas par khyab// sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal/ sras dang // de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnams thos pacad dang / 'jig rten rnams dang 'jig rten chos // chags myed pa
70a7(1): dad myed pa'i tshul du shes// chos kyi sku'i snying po can// de'i lus la 'jig rten thams cad gzung byas shing // 'jig rten de'i lus yin yang // 'jig rten kun kyis de la gos pa myedaka/ ji ltar dang pa'i tshugs la ya// 
70a8(1): gzugs brnyan yongs su snang yang der song 'phos pa myed/ de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyi// rjes su lus 'gro der song 'phos pa myed// de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis// / gos pa myed cing 'jig rten yongs su dag bsan
70a9(1): lus ni mkha' dang 'dra la se// de'i las rnams gang yang skyes pa myed// myi zad pa'i lus shes pas// de ni nas yang skyes shing 'gags pa myed pa ste// rtag dang myi rtag ma yin par/ 'jig rten kun la'ang rnam par dmyigs pa byed
70a10(1): lta ba'i rnam pa rab tu 'gags// brtan pa de dag lalta ba ston pa byed// bdag gi myed cing gnas pa myed// / len pa myed cing chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam// / ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa zhig nga// sA tshogs mtshan nyid rnam pa tha dad/ 
70b1(1): gzugs 'phrul byed/ 'on kyang de la 'gro ba skyed/ gang ku'ang de bzhin gyi dmyigs so// spyas tshad myed ma yin te/ spya sa tshan gyis dmyigs par bya ba 'ang sa yin no// da byed tshad dang ldan par yang / tshogs kyi dbus su 'aton
70b2(1): ba rab tu byed/ de bzhin rtogs pa'i blo ldan la/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa rnams las byung // sems ni tshad yod ma yin// tshad myed pa la gnas pa'ang de dag sbyin// 'du shes rnam pa gcig myin te// de dag tshad myed pa
70b3(1): dang tshad dang ldan pa nyon// / lam gyi rgyud dang 'brel pa myed// tshad myed rnams la gnas pa 'ang de bzhin myed// sangs rgyas chos rnams zab pa ste// shin tu yangs khas zab cing zhi bas de bzhin za ba/ zab mo sna tshogs rgyud
70b4(1): nams dang // mtha' yas zab pa rnams kyang rab tu shes// ye shes bzang khro rmongs pa myed// rgyud la dri ma myed pas ya sam pa rnam par dag/ byin kyis rlo ba la mkhas pas na// srog chags bye ba shin tu dag par khyed/ 
70b5(1): dge ba byed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// rab tu brjod cing dge rnams par don// / gnas la mngon par ma chags pas// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu/ sems can byed mthar da phyin gyur pa
70b6(1): kyang ka 'dig rtenas byas thams cad de ga thong cacun/ 'dig rten pams bad sa smras par/ rnam par sangs rgyas kyang de kar gyi 'das/ chos rnams bzang ba'i tshul la sa ngas// sems can tu
70b7(1): ba gA nga tshul shes kyang grangs la skyes pa myed// / chos kyi srin cen char 'bebs shing // / 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad spang bar byed// sangasargyas byang chub ma lus la// sems bskyed gcig gis de dag rab
70b8(1): tu 'jug// de dag phyir ldos myed pa ste// / sems can kun gyi khams las phyi myi ldog// sangs rgyas sku ni thob gyur kyang // chos rnams 'di dag lu sa yod ma yin rab tu shes// lus rnams kun gyi tshul la mkhas// lus
70b9(1): kyis rnam phye 'jig rten rab tu shes/ sems can kun tu rgyu ba dang // bskal pa rnams dang zhing la pha rol phyind pa thob// / phyogs rnams rgya mtsho ga cen mtshor// se shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la mkhas khas zhugs// sus
70b10(1): rnams thams cad re re las// / sems can kun gyi lu sa rnams sna tshogs ji snyed dang // sangs rgyas U ni mtha' yas pa// ye shes shin tu yangs pa 'di ston to// skad cig gcig gi ru sa tshul la/ myi'i gtso bo 'byuSh+Ta/ 
71a1(1): ba rab tu shes/ skal pa mang po brjod du myed// myi'i seng ge bgrangs pas zad myi 'gyur// de dag mya ngan 'dal ba yang // / skad cig gcig la tshad myed shin tu yangs pa 'byung // ring ba srel
71a2(1): rnam dbye ma pa po yang // ye ges dri myed phra bas ston pa byed// de m+be/ 'ongs dus kyi yang // / myi'i seng ge mtha' yas smon las 'debs pa'i rnams// / byang chub dri myed sems la skyed pa// / ye shes yangs shing shin
71a3(1): tu phra las shes// bzang po'i spyod la gnas bcas shing // de bzhin dus gsum gshegs pa'i sems can gtso bo rnams// ji ste skyes par gyur par gyur pa dag// de dag thams cad a lus rab tu ges // de ltar
71a4(1): rab tu shes pas na// mtha' dang dpud myed spyod pa'i sa dang de bzhin du// ye shes 'byung gnas blo gros la// ye shes 'khor los spyod pa phyir myi ldog// ye shes phra mo rab yangs pa// stobs bcu rnams kyi spyod yul
71a5(1): mchog la de dag zhugs// bzang po rtogs pa'i blo can rnams// / phyir myi ldog la 'jug pa brjod byan// / sangs rgyas rgyal ba thams na cad kyi// yang dag gzhos par bya la de dag zhugs pas na// 
71a6(1): spyod las phyir ldog byed pa ste// byang chub dam pa zhi bar 'tshar yang bya// de 'dra'i sems rgyud gcig la yang/ mkha' dang dpung myedasems rnams yang dag 'jug pa byed ga/ gin tu langs pa'i tshad
71a7(1): myed las na/ 'du she sra de dang de la yang dag pa sbubs// nyon mongs myed dang / nyon mongs dang // slob dang myi slob sems kyang de bzhin rab tu shes// / sems rgyud de dag re re la 'ab// sems rnams brjod du myed par
71a8(1): mngon 'tshang mya// gcig dang gnyis su shes pa myed// de dag yongs su 'dres par 'gyur ba 'ang myed pa ste// so so 'i 'du shes rnam pa sa// sems can de dag skyes par gyur pa pa yin// 'di na 'dug par mtho ba gyurd kyang
71a9(1): sems can brjod myed gzhan dang gzhan sems ldan pa'i rnams// gzhan gyi zhing phyin 'du shes kyang // 'jig rten sna tshogs rnams la rab tu skye// / 'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug gas/ spyod pa'i mchog gis rjes su
71a10(1): zhugs khar gyudad pa'i rnams// kun tu bzang po'i mying 'thob ste/ 'jig rten mgon po kun gyi rjes su skyes// / sems can dbye ba la la ni// ngan song 'grangs pa'i mying phyogs mtho ris 'bya shes 'gyur// ya a mtho ris
71b1(1): sa rnams kyi// rnam pa kun la ngan song 'du shes 'gyur// 'jig rten gyi mtshungs rgal la ltos// / rnam pa la dang la la rab tu skyes// / 'du shes rnam pa a ba layas te// / gcig sbyin yangs la 'jig rten rab tu 'jug/ 
71b2(1): 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// 'du shes dra ya myi mnyam rab tu shes/ myig 'phrul sgyu ma'i tshul gyis na// skad cig gcig gi sems kyis rab tu gzhol// de bzhin dbang po rnams la ste// myig gi
71b3(1): skye mched na pa swa'i skye mched dang // lce dang lus dang yid la yang / 'jig rten rnam pa tha dang 'du shes 'jug/ myig rnams re re'i yul la yang / mtha' dngang pung myed myig rnams rab tu 'dzud pa khyed // rnam la tha dad
71b4(1): dus se// / tshad myed kun la'ang zhen par 'gyur ba'ang myed// 'on kyangaphan tshun gcig gis gcig/ bdo zhing gnod par 'gyur ba de dag kun na myed// bdag bdag so so'i las kyi rnams// ji ltar ba chags
71b5(1): pa'i tshul bzhin nyams su myong // / bzang zhes bya ba de dag kun// @/ tshad myed stobs dang ye shes sa'i shes rab kyis// 'byam klas myig rnams thams cad ya / rab tu zhugs pas shin tu
71b6(1): rtogs pa yin// de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyang // thams cadam lus rnam pa thams cad 'jig tshul du// thams cad shin tu zhes kyang rgya chen gyod pas mya ngan myi 'anga'o// 
71b7(1): sangs rgyas shin tu bstan pa dang / sems can la stan dang de bzhin zhing rnams khastan dang // dus rnams shin tu bstan pa dang // snyan pa sna tshogs rnams kyang shes// yal 'di la 'das gyurd kyang nga / gzhan dang
71b8(1): gzhan rnams ma 'ongs dus la gnas pa yin// 'on kyang ma/ 'ongs dus kyi rnams/ la las da ltar byung khar rab tu shes// de 'dra'i tshul can gcig myin pa'i// 'jig rten mtshan nyid tha dad thams cad par shes// 
71b9(1): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tshul gyis// / sangs rgyas ye shes kun tu mtha' yang yas// / shin tu rgyas po chen po'i mdo'o// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba yas// kun tu bzeng po'i
71b10(1): spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u te bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// tum bu gsum pa// bam po dgul pa// bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen pos rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba
72a1(1): 'das pa dang / mkhyon pa dang // re lngar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sku gcig pas mnyam pa nyid banyes pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan bka gas pa skyed pa'i spyod
72a2(1): phul mngon par mabyed pa// ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi su sanga' bu/ mtshan nyid yong nas myed pa'i chos la brten pa/ chos kyi dbyings myi gnyis pa'i spyod yul gyis yang dag par spyod pa/ mtha' dang zung byed
72a3(1): mtshungs pa'i mngon par 'chang rgyab la rnyes pa rnam par tha rad pa'i bsgrib pa spyod pa'i spyod yul la la shin tu dgyes pa/ chos kyi skunam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' gras pa mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
72a4(1): po brang 'ang ba la rtsegs pa'i gzhas myed khang // de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can// 'od kun nas 'byung ba// rgyan chen po dang ldan pa/ 'od dang sring gsal pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po
72a5(1): ban// sangs rgyas skye ba/ chos kyi dbyings mapa' dang dpung byed pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus las byung bag ga ni 'od por gyis rnam pa brgyan pang/ byang chub som so pa sas
72a6(1): rang bzhin tu gnas pas rab tu bsgrubs pa/ chos tshon pa'i gzhi / su rang ba/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa// de bzhinagashegs pa'i 'od dang ldan panam ma kha'i dbyings kyi mnus
72a7(1): gtugs pa// ye shes kyi yul yang dag pa'i mkhal spyod yul chags ba skyed las rnam par gsal ba sa// byang chub sems dpa sems dpa'i chen po rin po che bzang po'i pad mo chen po rang rang gi/ 
72a8(1): smon lam kyis byung ba'i dbus kyis snying pos// 'khor pa kus kyang tshe gcig gcig sogs// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / gzhan nas byind pa// ye shes men po rnas par bye ba'i spyod yul la gzhol pa// chos kyi
72a9(1): dbyings du myi dad pa'i gzhi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ nam ma pa'i dbyings gzhi skyed cing / mthul dang dpung byed pa la rnas par 'o pa/ chos thams cad 'grub pa skyed cing mngon par grub pa skyed pa mngongs tu byas pa
72a10(1): byang chub sems dpa'i lus la sa a g.yos su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu bob pa// 'jig rten gyi khams byams cad du kun gyis brjod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so shos sos mngon tu byung ba// sang so rgyag
72a11(1): byang chub mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes snang pa thob pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yus rgyun la cha ba bya rang bzhin chos kyi lus gcig cing ba myi dad pas gzugs kyi lus mapa' yas pa'i sgo kun tu 'aton pa/ 
72b1(1): chos kyi byings mtha' dang dpung myed pa la 'jug pa shin tu shes pa/ sems can gyi khams su rnam par spyod pa las phyir myi ldog pa le// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang // yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid thob
72b2(1): pas sprul da pa mngon par sgrub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sAng mdzad dang / sngon lhan cig tu skyes shing dge ba'i tsam pa lasags pa sha stag la 'di ltar de byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
72b3(1): bo dang / kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal dang // rdo rje dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang // rnam par grol ba'i bsgribs pa myed pa'i zla ba dang // nyi ma'i 'od zer dri ma myed
72b4(1): pa'i snying po dang // mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i blo dang // 'od dri ma myed pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od gzer gyi rgyal po dang // blo gros rgya mtsho'i mchog 'dzin 'acing blo la rnam pa regs la bas mngon
72b5(1): par shes pa'i dpal dang // byang chub sems dpa' se sa dpa' chen po stobs bcu mye 'jigs pa seng ge'i nga ro chen pos rnam [] par rtse bas mngon par shes pa dang // de dag la tsogs pa
72b6(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye pa khrag khrig stong brjod du myed pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// / de nas de'i tshe
72b7(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi badz+rod spu nas// / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer/ 'od zer gyi 'kho bye ba khreg khrig brgya stod grangs myed pa mang po'i 'od zer dang ldan pa byung ste// / des 'jig rten gyi
72b8(1): khams 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas// 'jig rten g.yas phyogs su lan bcur bskor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i bstan nas// / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
72b9(1): khrig brgya stong mang po bskul pa byas te// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byas klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod pas// / ngan song gyi rgyud thams cad kyi skye ba dang // shi 'bo ra ba tu zhi bar byas se// / bdud kyi khyim thams cad zis
72b10(1): kyis mnan nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas// rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gdan bstan pa bya ste// sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa 'byam klas pa// rab tu bstan
73a1(1): nas// 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// / nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par rgyas par khyab par byas nas phyir 'ongs te// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
73a2(1): gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la g.yas phyogs nas bskod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyi spyi bor nub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag lams cad ngo
73a3(1): mtshar che ma 'dzin cing // dga' bzor bar gyu rang te// 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba 'di'i lta bu byung ba sam/ chos chen po brjod par ni 'gyur du nges so// snyam nas rtogs pa'i blo yang thob par gyur pa to// 'od zer
73a4(1): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su gyu ba pa'i dpal gyi lus la log par gyur dam lag tu de nas de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
73a5(1): su byung ba'i dpas pad ma'i brten las langs te/ bla kos phrag da gcig la bzar nas// / pad mo'i snying po de la lus so// du g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na la
73a6(1): der thal mos latud de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes dang ldanapa'i yid la byed pas// / de bzhin gshegs pa ya tshigs su bcad de gso yang la// rnam dag blo mnga' yon tan
73a7(1): mkhye nad pas 'phags// spyod yul chags pa myed pa'i pha romed phyin / dus gsum mnyam pa'i chos nyid mnyam ston pas// khyod la bdag ni hi hang rim 'gro bgyid// mtshan nyid byed pa'i
73a8(1): spyod yul pha rol phyind// mtshan gyis shin tu brgyad pa'i sku 'aton/ mdzad// dri myed 'od zer song dang ldan pa 'gyed// bdud kyi sde rnams ma lus rab tu 'jom// / phyogs bcu kun na gang rnams ji mchis pa'i/ zhing rnams
73a9(1): thams cad ma lus rab bskyod kyang // thug rje ldan pas su la 'ang 'jigs myi mdzad// / khyod kyi 'phrul ma gu ni de 'dra'i tshul// nam mkha'i dbyings la mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyang brnyes
73a10(1): sems can stong phrag bye ba khrol bar mdzad// sems can kun gyi sdig cen rab tu spyod// bskal pa gahong tu lartul zhugs dam po spyod// byang chub mchog gi las ni yang dag bsgrubs// chags pa byed pa'i ye shes spyod yul
73a11(1): sangs rgyam gyon da dang zhi co tu gyur/ rnam dzin khyod kyis 'di nas 'on bkyel/  gi rten mas padas lus dran bskyod das/ ngos rna la sams sa 'ad brtan pa gyis/ da 'i
73b1(1): rna lus 'dir de dag ma lus zhugs// / del ba dag blo gros lhas skyes te/ chos je khyod la bdag u dus la pa hA// shis rjes pa'i chos la rab la slabs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'dus 'gyur snyas// tshogs 'di dag sa
73b2(1): 'dus pas rnam par dag/ 'jig rten slob dpon mgon pan po ma rab bsngags pa'i/ ye shes sa pa la yas ldan pa yul ma chags// de 'dra'i mthul chen dpal po 'di dag khyin// de don 'jig rten slob dpon drang srong khyod// ye shes
73b3(1): stobs dang khatshon 'grus a tha la ya sa byung // byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag snang bar mdzod/ chos rab bdag gis gang zhus de yang shod// drang srong chen po'i khyod yul 'di la san cing // yang dag sa nor brjod par nus gang lags
73b4(1): skyes bu khyu lachog rnams kyi sras gang lags// 'jig rten mgon po gsol po khyod kyis bshad du gsol// tshigs su bcad pa// de dag gsol sa phrag tu// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas myi bsnyengs pa'i sa rba
73b5(1): byi nad pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer khod kyi 'od zer khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myedastong pa dang ldan pa byung ste// / de 'jig rten gyi khams 'byas klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten g.yas
73b6(1): phyogs su yan bcur bsor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam kham 'phrul la nas nas// / byang chub sems dpa' bye bas/ khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bskul ba byas so// 'jig rten gyi
73b7(1): khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod nas// ngan sod kyi rgyud thams cad kyi skye ba dang / shi 'pho ba rab tu zhi bar byas te// / bdud kyi khyim thams cad zi bad kyis ma nan nas
73b8(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang brgya pas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gdan pa san par bya ste// sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa// 'byam klas pa rab tu bstan nas// 'jig rten gyi
73b9(1): khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa // nas mkha'i maphas gtugs par 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par rgyas par khyab par byas nas// / 'phyir 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
73b10(1): sa g.yas phyogs nas bskod nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i kha'i sgor nub po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dres byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa reg par gyu ra a thag tu
73b11(1): kun tu bzang po la/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bza pa po'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri sngon ji 'dra ba de yas byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri brgya phrag stong 'gyur da du bzang zhing khyad
74a1(1): bar du 'phags par 'dug se/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i ke dan ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi lus kyi seng ge'i khri las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi seng ge'i 'i
74a2(1): brgya phrag spong gyur pa tu bzang zhing khyad par 'phags par snang ngo // de las na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
74a3(1): po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrus chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du chun pa dka' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dka' bar 'gyur ba/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa
74a4(1): 'di lta bu bstan na/ bye rgyas pa'i sras de dag gi sngon gyi mtshan mar 'gyurade skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang los/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
74a5(1): bzhin bshe ga sra ba'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi cho 'phrul chen po
74a6(1): 'di 'dra ba dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan pazhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan par dgongs pa dang // cho 'phrul chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag rton pa mdzad do// de nas
74a7(1): chos chen pogayos par gyur da to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras
74a8(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras legs par spobs par mdzod cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'gyur ba bsanang ra khong du
74a9(1): sred par bya/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'dus pa'i 'di ni shin tu dag pa he/ byang chub sems dpa'abye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa'o// kye rgyal pa'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon spyod pa
74a10(1): shin tu kyang pa'i las kyang dmas cad shin tu spangs/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rig pas shin tu 'phags/ rgya chen po'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i mchog thob pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod
74b1(1): lus dang / spyod pa dang / tshul la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song pa'i 'du shes yid la byed pa ma nyams pa/ snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad la rnam khamalta ba/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes
74b2(1): pa chen pos rnam par rol pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin rangab gyi rgyud du lend pasangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dpal gyi byin gyis rlabs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa yon tan dang legs
74b3(1): pa tshad myed pa mang po dang ldan pa sha tag 'odas shing 'dus pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bsnyen bkur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mchog tu phyin pa// ting nge
74b4(1): 'dzin dang snyos sa par 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad kyis rnam par ro la pa'i mngon par mkhas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsapa pa'i gnas chud la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la the tsom yongs su chad la
74b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis byin tu brlabs pa/ semasacan thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang rnam par grol pa'i lam yang
74b6(1): dag par bston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyudayang dag par 'gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyasagyi chos thams cad bstan pa sa pha rol tu phyi nang mchog thob pa/ natra
74b7(1): de dag la sogs pa yon tan mang po tshad myed pa'i khyad par gyi mthar thug pa yin gyis/ kye rgyal po'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye
74b8(1): ba 'byung ba bstan pa dang / sku yang dag par lastan pa dang / dbyangs rab tu brjod pa dang / thugs kyi mthu dang / re yul gyi gnas dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskod pa mngon par khwa smrab
74b9(1): pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po snyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phrogs pas dgrogs pras dge ba'i rtsa la 'byung ba bstan pa la legs par
74b10(1): spobs ma mdzod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ don 'di nyid yang bslas brjod pa'i phyir de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
74b11(1): gzhan dam gtsunam na ga pa dang rtsom / gas du phyin ma byanas na maca yo sa du di ga
75a1(1): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ chags myed blo gros shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas blos/ ye shes mthal yas yul a mnyam pa nyid du gyu rad rgyal ba'i spyod
75a2(1): yu le tsar myed legs par yang god cigasangs rgyas sras rnams thams cad rab tu dgal/ rgyal po kha mchos rnams 'byes pa ji ltar byang chub sems khong du chud/ ji ltar de dag yang dag palta/ de bzhin gshegs
75a3(1): phu ba sa ci 'dra sku dang dbyangs ci 'dra'/ skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi yul dang spyod pa cing de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub ji ltar rnam 'tshang rgya/ chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rgyab pa ci ltar bskor bde'i gshegs mya
75a4(1): ngan 'das par yangabadag nyid kyang gsungs sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas 'di dag dga' bar mdzod// gang gis bde gshegs chos rgyas chen po mthong gyurd cing / gang rnams 'grogs shing dge ba yang dag skyed byed
75a5(1): pa/ de dge bsod napas 'phel ba 'ang nor brjod par mdzod/ dang bde gshegs mthong na dzir 'gyur de dang 'grogs cir 'gyur// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das dang / 'on tam bzhugs kyang rung
75a6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams gang gis thos par 'gyur/ yon tan 'byung gnas rnams la/ gang rnams dad pa skyed/ de dag don kyang ji 'gyur 'khor 'dir la snyan pa mdzod// byang chub
75a7(1): sems dpa' 'di dgra thams cad thal sbyar cing / bde bar gshegs dang khyod dang bdag la kun kyang snod/ 'dri ba'i sems can dag la khyod kyis lung yang ston/ yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' rnams
75a8(1): kyi khyod bstan/ de dag don tu chos rab ldan pa'i gsung mchog nas sa mkha' 'dra khyod kyis skye bo rnams kyi the tsom gcad// dpe dang rgyur ldan tshig gis de bzhin gshegs rigs ton/ thos nas sems
75a9(1): na khraka ShI ga byang chub ma s+hog/ sems skyed/ ji ltar zhing rnams thams cad ma sus bkang zhing / rgyal ba'i sku'i yan lag sna tshogs yang dag 'don/ ji ltar thaka khrig chos dang ldan pa'i gsung bar brjod/ sangs rgyas byab
75a10(1): chub dpe' dang rgyu yis bstan par mdzod/ gang zhing phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams// khrag khrig thams cad kun bzlas pa mang po bye ba mtha' yas 'grangs song ya dang / de ring rgyal sras 'dir 'dra'i 'khor 'dra ba/ byang chub
75b1(1): sems dpa' rnams kyis mthong bar shig tu dka'o// de bar rgyal sras rang bzhin dag pa bshad pa mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa zhams kyi rigs yangs yongs su ston// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad lal 'an te/ 
75b2(1): sangs pa'i chos kyis sol zhing chos la don gnyer gnas// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu ba'ang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs/ 
75b3(1): pa'i rigs byu ba po'i dpal la dbyigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' pad mo'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
75b4(1): skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa tshad myed pa'i chos kyis byung ba 'di ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i gnas te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba ni rgyu
75b5(1): gcigs yin pa dang rkyen gcig ma yin pas yang dag par 'grub 'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ chos bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa/ chos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong tshad
75b6(1): byed/ grangs myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul yang dag parabaskyabs pa'i rgyus de bzhin gshegs pa zhams 'byung bar/ 'gyur ro// brgya gang zhes 'di lta ste/ sngon 'gro ba
75b7(1): thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems tshad pa la skyed pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang // yasas ba dang / skrag pa'i las sa la sngon shin tu sbyangs shing yang dag par
75b8(1): bsgrub sa pa dang / byas sa pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po tshad myed pas sems can yongs su pa skyab pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / spyod pa dang smon lam tshad myed pa rgyun 'chad pa myed pa yang dag par bsrubs
75b9(1): ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po myi ngoms pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang sangs rgyas mchod cing rimo 'gro bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i rgyun tshad byed pa'i yang dag par
75b10(1): bsgrubs pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi sa ma rnam par dag cing tshad myed pa yang dag par ba sbubs pa dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa tshad myed pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / lam gyi yan lag rnam par
75b11(1): nga byas rna yon sa mamanabyed nam um myo bya bya ga na ces dudon
76a1(1): dgod pa tshad myed pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i chos tshad myed pa khong du chud pas mthar phyind par bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag chos
76a2(1): bcu po 'di dag la tshogs pa chos rnam par tha dad pa brgya stong tshad myed grangs myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i rgyus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'gyur bar 'gyur ro// kye byal ba'i
76a3(1): sras dag 'di lta ste dper na ye tong gsum gyi hong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba ni rgyu gcig gis 'byung ba sa yin/ rkyen gcig gis/ 'byung sna yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag stong gsum gyi song chen po'i
76a4(1): 'jig rten gyi kham sra ni rgyu tshad myed pa dang / rkyen tshad myed pa dang nye ba smra ba pa tshad byed pas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar srin chen po'i char dus las kyi 'da' bar rab tu 'bab pas kyang rgyu byas la/ rlung gi
76a5(1): dkyil 'khor bzhi chus kyi 'chad par ldang bas rgyu byas na yongs su 'grul par 'gyur ro// bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhen 'dis ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khod yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya
76a6(1): ba ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir snang do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor longasasu sems pa zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i phung po yongs su khe skam pa'i phyir sdang ngo // rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su nano// 
76a7(1): pa zhes bya ba ni gzhal myed khang thams cad yongs su dgod pa'i phyir ldang ngo // rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa pham
76a8(1): cad kyi rkyen tu skyes pas yas dpa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs kyi gnas kyis rnam pa'i rgya marnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par dbyel bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
76a9(1): rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ldang ste/ kye rgyal la'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa'i rnam pa tshad skyed pas spyong gsum kyi song chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos nyid rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang 'thung ba
76a10(1): des 'byung bar byed pa gang yang byed de/ 'gyur yar 'gyur ba yang byed pa ma yin na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs par myal bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rgyu gcig ma yin
76b1(1): pa dang / rkyen gcig ma yin pas byung bar 'gyur te/ kye rgyas pa'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu tshad myed pa dang / rnam pa tshad myed pa dang / yang dag par
76b2(1): bsgrub pa tshad myed pas 'byung ste/ 'di ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung tu sngon mchog kyi srin gyi char 'chen po bab pas kyang rgyur byas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung dkyil 'khor bzhi la rgyun
76b3(1): gyi 'chad par ldang bas kyang rgyu byas na yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po dran pas yang dag par bzung zhing gzungs kyis chud kyi za ba zhes
76b4(1): pa yod de de ni bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi sprin chen po'i char yang dag par bzung ba'i phyir ldang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po sdug mdzong dngazhi gnas kyis
76b5(1): bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de sa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs/ su bskam pa'i phyir ldang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa// d+ya
76b6(1): zhes bya ba yod de gde ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thams cad yongs su bsngo ba phyir ldang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyis 'khor chen po srus pa'i rgyan rnam par bkod pa rnam khar 'byed cing rnam
76b7(1): par 'bod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni sems can sngon yongs su smin pa'i byas pa rnams kyi rkyen tu byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa myed pa'i stobs dang shugs
76b8(1): kyi phyir ldang ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la brdzogs pa'i rnam pa tshad myed pa dang / yang dag par kha sgrub pa tshad myed pas// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos nyid rab tu
76b9(1): thob pa'i phyir 'byub par 'gyur te/ de la 'byung bar byed pa 'am skye bar byed pa gang yang myed de/ 'byung ba'ang myed pa 'am yin no// de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dkara' ba'i sgo dang pos khong du chud par bya ba 'dis// byang chub
76b10(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na
77a1(1): song gsum gi gong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung yar 'gyur ba'i tshe gcis tug sug cing ba kyi dang pa zhes bya ba'i sprin ches po'i 'char 'bab ste/ de ni stong gsul gi gong chen po songs su bstsu/ 
77a2(1): ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor sa gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis bzung la 'am bzod par myi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byum
77a3(1): ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sa tha myi dad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi srin chen po'i char 'ab pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i de dag nyid kyi stobs dang shugs kyi stobs bsgrubs pa'i sems kyi rgyud a gtogs par
77a4(1): byang chub sems dpal bsam pa dam pa can dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bzung ba dang mchod par myi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo gnyis pa 'dis kyang / byang chub
77a5(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang/ dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yar 'dis
77a6(1): dog kye rgyas pa'i sras dag de bzhin du de lazhin gshegs pa dpral bcom pa sanga'i dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chog kyi sprin chen po'i maramangon par 'bab pa yang kang nas kyang 'ongs pa byed pa
77a7(1): kab tu yang 'gro ba byed de/ byang chub sem sa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang // shugs chen pos mar mngon par 'bag pa yang yod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo bsum pa 'dis kyang byang
77a8(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dang gzhan yang 'di la ste dper na
77a9(1): phrin chen po'i char mngon par 'bab pa de dag ni/ stor gsum gi stong chen por gtogs pa sems can thams cad kyisas shes pa 'am/ bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
77a10(1): gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams ni srin chen bo'i char de la sems pas mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro// / sprin chen po'i char de la bltas myig 'azhugs par 'gyur ro// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i
77b1(1): dbang phyug chen po na ma gtogs te/ de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i chab yongs/ su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis de la chung ngu na char pa'i thigs pa gcig kyang ma rig par myi 'bab po// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin tu/ de bzhin
77b2(1): gshegs pa de yang dag par 'byung ba'i che/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi srin chen po char mngon par 'bab pa yang / sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes pa 'am
77b3(1): bsam par myi nus te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char la sems pas mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po de dag ni ma
77b4(1): gtogs te/ blo shin tu sbyangs pa'i mthu dang / shugs kyis de dag la ni chung ngu na tshig dang yi ge 'ga' tsam yang ma rig par sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud pa myi 'bab po/ kye rgyal ba'i sras khong du chud par bya/ 
77b5(1): pa bzhi pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyiskye ba 'byung pa khong du chud khar
77b6(1): bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang 'di sa ste dper na/ srin/ chen po'i mar de dag 'bag pa'i nang ka rab tu zhi bar / byed pa zhes bya ba'i smin 'i cham 'bab pa yod de
77b7(1): de ni skye'i phung po de rab tu bzhi par byed do// 'byung bar byed pa zhes byaba'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa yod do// de las chu'i phu po de dag 'byung ngo / yongs su cod pa zhes bya ba'i smin
77b8(1): po'i char 'bas pa yod de/ de ni chu'i phung po de dag yongs su gcod do// yongs su smrab pa zhes bya ba'i srin chen po'itshar 'bab la yod de/ de ni nor bu rin po che mang po yongs su 'grub par byed do// rnam par
77b9(1): 'byed pa zhes bya'i srin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni hong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par 'byed do// kye rgyal ba'i srasu dag de bzhin gshegs la yang dge par 'byung ba la'ang
77b10(1): rab tu zhi bar bye ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod do// de ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad rab tu bzhi khar byed do// 'byung bar byed pa zhes
77b11(1): bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod do// de ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i a ba'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'byung bar byed do// yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab yod de
78a1(1): de ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su gcod do// yongs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i chang 'bab pa yod de/ de ni thams cad/ 
78a2(1): mkhyend pa'i chos rin po che yongs su grub par byed do// rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa rnam par 'byed do// 
78a3(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo lnga pa 'dis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'brum pa jo
78a4(1): tu chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta nye dper na/ sar smin chen po yang ro gcig la chu'i phung po yang rnam par myi tog yod kyi/ de skar rnam pa tshad myed par tha dad pa'i char nam par 'bye ba
78a5(1): rabapa boka kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin tu/ de bzhin gshegs da pa'i thugs rje chen po'i char srin ro gcig pa sa las de ltar tshad skyed cing nas pa pha dang pa'i chos kyi char sna tshogs
78a6(1): 'bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs par yang yongs su 'byung ngo // chos nas par bye ba tshad byed pa yang spang zhing yod do// / kye rgyal ba'i sras khong du chud par bya ba'i so drug pa 'dis kyang // tu
78a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dkal bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
78a8(1): dag gzhan yang 'di lta sted per na song gsum gyi sor chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i tshe// 'og ma nyid du gzugs la spyod pa lnga'i bu rnams kyi gzhas myed khang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
78a9(1): de'i 'og tu 'dod pa la 'byod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi gzhal myed khang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu myi rnams kyi gnas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de ma yin pa'i sems can smag
78a10(1): ma gzhan nams kyi gnas na bar bye ba sna tshogs 'grub par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byu ba'i tshe yang thogs nyid tu// byang chub sems
78b1(1): dpal ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgyun 'arnams 'byung ngo // de'i 'og tu nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'brub par 'gyur ro// ro
