129b2(1): 'di gan ces smras so// ga kye rgyal ba'i sras legs par ba gnad pa mdzod cig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyu 'thun 'azhi gang ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes
129b3(1): shig pa spyod pa'i gang dge ba'i bshes nyen ni gang bachog 'argyas rtsom pa ni gang dbugs byind pa ni gang sems can songs su smin par bya ba ni gang
129b4(1): tshul khrims ni gan sung stan pa ni ga kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sa 'jug pa ni klung
129b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ni ga pa sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa ni ka 'jig rten gyi khams
129b6(1): 'jug pa ni gang bskas pa lnga 'jug pa ni ke nga dus gsum bstan pa ni gang rus gsum la 'jug pa ni dang / 
129b7(1): phyi skyo zhing yongs su sprid lug pa byed pa'i sems bskyed pa zhi gang / kun tu byed pa'i ye shes ni ka gzungs ni gang kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'as
129b8(1): sangs rgyas lasam khas rjes su rtogs pas bya ba ni ka pa / kun tu babang po'i sems bskyed pa ni gang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos ni gang snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa ni gang
129b9(1): gang gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen ni kang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus pa'i sems ni ga yongs su dag pa ni kang
129b10(1): pharo lad tu phyind pa ni ga shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ni ga rab tu rtogs pa ni gang
130a1(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs ni yang/ mnyam pa nyid ni ga nga/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam migang/ chos stand pa ni gang / yongs su gzung ba ni gang / spob bla ni
130a2(1): tu thob pa zhi gang / sangs rgyas chos zab mo la 'jug pa zhig pa/ gnas su bya ba zhig pa/ sems bskyed pa btan pa ni gang / nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa ni gang// bsam gyis myi khyab pa mig pa/ dgongs te
130a3(1): bshad pa la mkhas pa ni gang / ye shes rnam par dbyes pa la mkhas pa i gang // kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa ni gang // ril po ni ga pa/ rnam par thard pa ni
130a4(1): kyang / mngon pa dgas pa ni gang / rig pa ni gang / nam par thos pa ni ga / skyed mos las ni gang / l+h+wa byed 'don gang/ dga' pa ni dang / rgyun ni gang / lce rgyal ba'i sras byang chub pos
130a5(1): dpal rnams kyi sems skyed pa myi sprul pa ni gang/ skrag pa'i bas ma pa yongs su myi gtong pa la gnas pa ni gang / ye shes kyis rnam par lta ba ni gad chos shi nad tu bstan pa zhig pa/ yongasu dag pa ni
130a6(1): gang/ phyag rgya mig pa/ ye shes snang ba ni gang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas tshungs pa myed pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu zhum ba myed pa'i sems skyed pa zhig pa/ lhag pa'i bas mkha'i bo lta bu nig
130a7(1): rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla ma myed par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ye shes kyis 'jug pa rgya mtsho lta bu mig pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par pyod pa rin po che lta bu ni gang / theg
130a8(1): pa chen po'ige/ cha rdo rje sta bu ni sems bskyed pa zhi gang/ brtsom pa chen po ni ga pa/ brtsams pa chen po'i mthar phyin par zla ba ni grwang// dad pa myi phyed pa ni gang / lung bas nad pa ni gang / dge ba'i ma pa yongs
130a9(1): su bsngol ba ni gang / ye shes khong du chud pa ni gang / sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dpung myed pa ni gang // kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi gter ni gdang sdom pa ni da // rnam
130b1(1): bar 'grus pa ni gang sems can la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang/ zhing la nam par 'phrul pa ni gdo// chos la rnam par 'phrul pa ni ge nga / lus pa nas par 'phrul bzhi gang smon lamal rnam khar
130b2(1): 'phrul pazhi dang / spyod yul la rnam par 'phrul ba zhi gang// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa ni lar / mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang / rdzu 'phrul la rnam par
130b3(1): 'phrul pa ni gang / stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gang// rnam par phye ba ni gang khyam mchog go mthu phyung ba ni ga pa/ stobs ni gang / myi 'jigs pa ni gang // byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pA n+ti kra dra pas ni grang / sus ni gang
130b4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi las gang / rang bzhin ni gang/ ngag ning gang / ngag yongs su dag pa ni gang / yongs su 'dzind pa ni gang gis shin tu bzung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'byung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems
130b5(1): dpa'i ngag gis ni ngag gi sas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ sems ni gang / sems skyed pa migapa/ sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba ni gdang / kye rgyal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni gang / bsam pa ni ga
130b6(1): ldam pa'i bsama' ni gang sa sbyor ba ni gang/ mos pani gang/ 'jig rten nikhams su mes la la 'jug pa ni gang/ sems can gi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ni gang / bag chags ni yang se bar le nad pa ni gang / k+ShatraH
130b7(1): nag tan ni gang/ kye rgyal pa'i sras byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'grub pa zhi gang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las 'gol ba'i lam ni gang/ skyon skyed pa ni ga pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges par los pa ni gang na sangs rgyas kyi chos
130b8(1): la 'byung ba ni gang / byes bu dam pa'i mying thos pa ni gang / las ni gang/ lam chad byed pa ni gang // sam gyi migs ni gang/ lam bsgom pa ni gang / kye rgyal pa'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lab gyi byam ni gas / rkang ba'i
130b9(1): yang gi lag pa ni gad/ ste zhi gang / snying po ni gang/ snying ni gang / ko tsa ni gang / mtshon tshani gradang / mgo ni yang/ myig ni gang/ kye rgyas kha 'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi na bzhi gadra/ sngon 'ang / s+ye ni gang / 
130b10(1): khyos ni gang // yid rnam par rgyu ba ni gang/ 'gro ba ni gang gnas ni gapa/ bstan la 'jug pa zhig par/ las ni gang ga nam par spyod pa ni kang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ni gang lta ba ni gang
131a1(1): rnam par lta ba ni gang // rnam par sgyings pa ni gdu / seng ge'ing ro na gang / sbyin pa yongs su dag pa na ka nga/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni gang/ bzod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang brtson 'grus yongs
131a2(1): su dag pa ni ga dang bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dang 'arnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni gdang / byams pa yongs su dag pa ni gang / snying rje yongs su dag pa ni gang / dgal ba yongs
131a3(1): su dag pa ni gang // btang snyoms yongs u dag pa ni gang / don ni gang // chos ni gang // bsod nams kyi tshogs ni gang // ye shes kyi tshogs ni ga dang / rig pa skyed pa ni gang // kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yongs
131a4(1): su tshol ba ni gang / chos rab tu brjod pa ni gang nga / chos kyi nan tan ni gang/ chus ni gang / brjod kyi las zhi gang / bcud kyi las bzlog pa ni ga dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba ni ga / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las ni gang / 
131a5(1): nga rgyal gyi las ni gang / ye shes kyi las ni gang// kye rgyal ma'i sras byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi bcud kyi rlabs ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs pa ni gang / chos kyi byin kyi drabs pa ni gang
131a6(1): dga' ldan na gnas ri kang/ dgas ldan gi gnas nas tshil 'pho ston da pa ni sa pa/ mngal ma gnas pa ston po zhig pa/ shin u hA ba'i rgyud do/ nad pa mig pa/ cher skye ba ni yang / gang mo cher dgod pa/ nywadu tu
131a7(1): ni gdang / gom pas rnam par gnon pa ni gdog/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhon nu las kun tu tond pa ni gang / btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar sto nad pa ni gang / mngon par 'byung ba ni gang dka' ba 'byod
131a8(1): pa'i sbyor pa ni snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba ni gang / snying po byang chub la 'dug ya ni gang // snying po byang chub la 'jug pa rnams kyi ro tshwar rmad tu 'byung ba'i chos ni gang / bdud btul ba stond pa ni gang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
131a9(1): stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni gang / chos kyi khor lo rab tu bskor ba ni gang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i chos dkar po 'i rnamapa ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
131a10(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa ni gangade skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpal sems
131b1(1): dpa' chen po kun tu shes par la dmyigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs de dag thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rgyu thun pa ste/ bcu gang
131b2(1): zhe na 'di ltar chud myi za'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul cig tu bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i shes gnyen gyi/ mthun pa dang // shi na tu 'chags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rga ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / nanatan du bya ba'i phyir
131b3(1): pha rol da tu phyind pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang // 'byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / byang chub brtan pa'i phyir/ smon lam gi rgyu mthun pa dang rgya chen po yang dag par 'chags pa'i phyir 'aspyod pa'i sku mthun pa dang / tshul
131b4(1): cig tu bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rgyu mthun pa dang / sems rab tu dang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas mchod pa rgyu mthun pa dang / pha lta bur brjod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshes pa thams cad dang rgyu mthun pa'o// 
131b5(1): kye rgyas pa'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthun/ da pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po lA na myed pa thog par 'gyur pa dag
131b6(1): go// kye rgyal pa'i sras bcu po/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi khomamagyi 'du shes ste/ bcu gang sem 'di ska dge ba'i rtsal thams cadas myi dge' bar 'du shes pa dang // dge ba thams6
131b7(1): cad la byang chub sems kyis yon tu 'du shes pa dang / sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi/ snod cu'i du shes pa dang // smen/ sa ma thams cad se smon lam myed par 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad la 'byung bar 'du
131b8(1): shes pa dang // spyod pa thams cad la spyod pa myed par 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad sa sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'du shes pa dang / gcig tu 'aspyod pa thams cad la rag gi lam myed par 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgya ba thams cad pa
131b9(1): par 'du shes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gnyis su myed par 'du shes pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing
131b10(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du shes rnam par bzlog pa la mkhas pa bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar
132a1(1): sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i don tu spyod pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i don tu spyod pa dang / bslab pa thams cad nan tan bya bya ba'i don tu spyod pa dang
132a2(1): pa'i ma pa thams cad khAs chags pa'i don tu spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig tu bya ba'i don tu spyod pa dang / ye shes rab tu shes par bya ba'i don tu spyod pa dang / bsgom pa yongs su bsgom pa'i don tu spyod pa dang
132a3(1): zhing brgyan pa'i don tu spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyen bkur ba'i don tu 'aspyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim 'gro bya ba'i don tu spyod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
132a4(1): rnams kyi spyod pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po la spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyas ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
132a5(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes panyen te/ bcu gang zhe na 'did ltar byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhog pa'i dge ba'i shes gnyen dang / dge ba'i ma pa la spyod pa'i bshes gnyen dang
132a6(1): ro lang tu phyind pa la/ 'jug par byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / chos thams cad ton pa'i 'ashes gnyen dang / sems can thams cadayongs su smin par bya ba la gzhog pa'i lashes panyen dang nga / 13
132a7(1): spobs pa la rnam par gdon myi dzad par byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / 'gro ba thams cad gyen tu spyod pa'i yeshes gnyen dang / bskal pa thams cad tu gnas shing myi skyo bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / kun
132a8(1): tu bzang po la spyod pa la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la/ 'jug cing 'bab par byed/ pa'i yeshes panyen ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
132a9(1): dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus bcom pa ste// bcug pa zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs u smin par bya'o snyam se// brtson 'grus khacom pa dang / chos thams cad bzung bar bya'o snyam se/ 
132a10(1): brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad yongasu sbyong bar bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus chom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad shes pa da bA'o snyam ste/ brtson
132b1(1): 'grus tshim pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyes byas zad par bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang // sems can dmyal ba dang // byel seng gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi lcug bsngal
132b2(1): thams cad rgyun gcad do snyam ste// brtson 'grus chom ya dang / bcud thams cad las/ rnam par rgyal yar bya'o snyam ste// brtson 'grus tshim ya dang / sems can thams cad la/ 'khrug pa myed par bya'o snyam ste/ btson
132b3(1): 'grus bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya'o snyam ste/ brtson 'grus chom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya'o snyam se// brtson 'grus bcom pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu
132b4(1): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi brtson 'grus tshim pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
132b5(1): ba thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag/ ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi dbugs phyind pa thob sbyin pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bdag ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas
132b6(1): pa yin gis/ da rgyang gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la dgod do// zhes te dbugs phyin pa rab tu thob bo// bdag ni 'jig rten gyi bzod pa thams cad kyis rgod la myed pas gzhog pa yin/ 
132b7(1): gyis// da tu gzhan yang cod pa myed par dga' ba la/ rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam zhes dbugs phyind pa thob bo// bdag ni byis pa'i chos las 'phags kyis dadung pha rol yang byis pa'i chos las gyen tu bskod
132b8(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos la/ dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyind pa thob 'o// bdag ni dge ba'i zhi pa btsal/ ba la lartson pa yin gyis da dung gzhan yas dge ba'i tsha pa tshol bar brtson pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs
132b9(1): byind pa thob po/ bdag ni pha rold tu phyind pa'i lam ma zhugs pa yin gyis// da dung gzhan yang pha royad tu phyind pa'i lam rtswa 'jug pas dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyind pa thob bo// bdag ni sangs
132b10(1): rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar yin gis da cung gzhan yangs sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyind pa thob po// bdag ni dngos po myed pa'i/ chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin gyis
133a1(1): datung gzhan la sadang dngos po myed pa'i chos kyi tshul la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyi nad 'tho ba po/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad myi spong ba la brtson pa yin gyis/ bcang gzhan
133a2(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad myi spong bar brtson pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyind pa thob bo// bdag gis ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur gyis dacung gzham
133a3(1): a thams cad mkhyend pa'i byang chub tu smon sa ma yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyind pa thob pa'o// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod myi zad par zhugs pa yin gis
133a4(1): da cung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod myi zad par 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyind pa thob po// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag zhi byang chub sems dpa' rnams
133a5(1): kyi dbugs phyir da pa thob pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dadapa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbugs phyi nad pa bla ma myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyakha ba'i
133a6(1): sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpal rnams ni sbyin pas kyang sems can gyi khams/ ny+dza tu tu
133a7(1): yongs su sbyin par byed do// gzugs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin par byed do// chos stond pas kyang sems tsam gyi khams yongs su sbyin par byed do// sbas pa mnyam pas rkyang
133a8(1): sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin par byed do// gnas myed pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin
133a9(1): par byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'bas pa yang dag pa/ bstan pas kyang sems can gyi khas sa yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che gnyid brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams
133a10(1): yongs su smin par byed do// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul las kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin par byed do// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang tshul gyis 'jig rten du byed pa sna tshogs/ 
133b1(1): sa bcu ngan ma na gta ma ma bya man tu mag shA pa ma pa pas ma sa san du / 
133b2(1): kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin par byed de// kye/ rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims rnams kyis sems can yengs su smin par bya ba ste/ de da/ 
133b3(1): gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin par byed pa dag go// kye rgyal la'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di
133b4(1): ltar byang chub kyi/ sem pa myi nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spang pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la phan par dga' bas rnam par lta ba'i tshul
133b5(1): khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub sems dpa'i la srab pa thams cad la nan tan dra bya ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad myi
133b6(1): dmyigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byangachub tu bsngol ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad la phyir phyogs su myi/ lta ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos
133b7(1): thams ca nges par rtogs pa la mdzen par zhes pa myed pa'i tshulakhrims dang / dbar ze sdom pa'i tshul khrims sokyi rgyal ba'i bras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams#
133b8(1): kyi tshul khrims ste// de dag ye gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa bA na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag rgong / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa
133b9(1): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi tshu lung stand pa ste/ lung stand pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams na ni// bdag bcag lung bstand to zhes bya bar shes so// bcu gang zhe na 'di ster
133b10(1): snying lag pa zhes byang chub kyi sems phun gsum tshogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang kyi rgyud las lung bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i 'aspyod pa la myi sgo ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o// 
133b11(1): bskal pa thams cad tu zhe non pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la na na tan tu byed pa mi b+hang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lu bstan pa'o// de bzhim gshegs
134a1(1): pa thams cad kyi bka' la gcig tu chad par mos shing yid ches la mngon par dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'artogs shing / 
134a2(1): sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod pa brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o// dge ba'i khashes gnyen thams
134a3(1): cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bsten pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la stond par 'du shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstand pa'o// sden gyi byang
134a4(1): chub kyi smon lam rjes su srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bsnga nad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstand pa ste/ lung bstand pa de dag gis u bstan
134a5(1): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstand to zhes bya par shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni khyad nga chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khyeng chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste
134a6(1): su gang zhe na 'di ltar sngon gyi smon lam la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa ma 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pas 'jug pa dang / pha rold tu phyind pa la 'jug pa dang / bsgru ba pa la 'jug paH!\u0f85tra
134a7(1): dang / smon lam rnam sa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / mos pa tha dad pe la 'jug pa dang / zhing gi rgyan las/ 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gri rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / skye ba bstand pa la 'jug pa'o
134a8(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras brtse po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpal la 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
134a9(1): la 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar mu myed pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byeng chung ba la 'jug pa dang
134a10(1): mu myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la jug pa dang / mu myed pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dang / mu myed pa'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / mu myed pa'i sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa dang / mu myed pa'i
134b1(1): 'gyu 'phrul gis rnam par 'phrul pa la jug pa dang / su byed pa'i sku sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang / mu myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin da la 'jug pa dang / su byed pa'i stobs dang myi 'jigs pas 'jug pa dang / mu myed pa'i mya ngan las
134b2(1): 'das pa yongs su bstand pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la/ 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma 'byon pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i de bzhin
134b3(1): gshegs pa thams cad su 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi sems can gi bsam ya nga mapyod pa la 'jug pa ste/ sems can gi bas ma kha dang 'apyod pa la 'jun
134b4(1): pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi bas ma kha dang spyod pa la rab tu 'jug 'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'a'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems
134b5(1): can thams cad phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi da ltar byung ba'i sapyod pa la 'jug pa dang / da sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i 'dod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems
134b6(1): can thams cad kyi phyi dge ba'i 'apyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems brgyathams cad kyi sems kyi khyod pas 'jus pa dang / sems/ can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'gyod pas 'jug pa dang / sems #
134b7(1): can thams cad kyi som pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bag la nyal pa'i 'aspyod pa/ la/ 'jug pa/ dang sems can thams cad kyi dus dang dus ma yin/ pa yongs
134b8(1): su spyi nad par bya ba dang rnam par 'dul ba'i spyod pa la/ 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems
134b9(1): dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang 'byed pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gi khams la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di
134b10(1): ltar 'jig rten gi khams rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la chung ngur 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
135a1(1): rnams la chen por 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams rnams sa rtul shin tu phra mor chud par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten khams rnams sa rab tu phra bar 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la
135a2(1): 'das par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la 'byung bar 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la/ sangs rgyas dang bcas par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas myed par 'jug pa'o//

135a5(1): bska mad pa la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i bskal da pa la 'jug pa dngad ltar 'byung ba'i bskal pa la/ 'jug pa dang / grangs/ da yod pa'i bskal da pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs myed pa'i ba sA sa
135a6(1): pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs yod pa grangs myed pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs myed pa grangs yod pa'i bskal da pa la 'jug pa dang / bskab de pa thams cad la bskal da pa cig tu 'jug
135a7(1): pa dang bskal da pa ma yin pa la bskasad par 'jug pa dang // bskasad pa thams cad la skad cig cig gis 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba 'i sros bcu po de dag mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khaskal da pa la
135a8(1): 'jug pa rnams ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskald pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi dus gsum bstand pa ste/ 
135a9(1): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyas gsum shi nad tu stond to// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'das pa'i lus la 'das par bstand pa dang / 'das pa'i chus la ma 'ongs par bstand pa dang / 'das pa'i dus
135a10(1): la da ltar 'byung bar bstan na pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i chus la 'das par bstand pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la da ltar 'byung bar bstand pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rjes la myi zad par bstan da pa dang 'i da ltar
135b1(1): 'byung ba'i chus la 'das par bstand pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i rgyus la ma 'ongs par bstan de pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i chus la mnyam panyid u bstand pa dang / da ldan 'byung ba'i du se la rus gsum skad cig tu bstand kha'o/

135b8(1): yongs su sgyid lug pa myed pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad mnyan pa sa myi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug myed pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad bstan pa la myi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa
135b9(1): byed pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smind par bya ba dang gtul yas myi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa myed pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
135b10(1): sa rab tu dgod par bya bas kyi spro zhing yongs su skyed lug pa myed pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par 'jig rten gyi khams re rer byang chub sems dpa'i da pa 'byor/ 
136a1(1): pas mI skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa myed pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad tu rjes su spyad pas myi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa myed pa'i sems bskyed pa dang

136a5(1): kun tu dbyel ba'i ye shes dang / skye ba kun tu dbyel pA'i ye shes dang / skra 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu dbye pa'i ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu dbyel ba'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas

136a7(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi kun tu dbyel ba'i ye shes ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po kun tu dbyel ba'i
136a8(1): bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag yi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs ste/ bcu gang zhen 'di ltar chos thams cad myi brjed par 'dzin pa'i phyir thos pa'i
136a9(1): gzungs dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir chos khong rgya chud pa'i gzungs dang / chos kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i gzungs dang / sangs
136a10(1): rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis myi khyab pa thob pa'i phyir chos snad ya rab tu thob pa'i gzungs dang // da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos mngon tu thos pa yongs su myi zad pa'i phyir ting / 
136b1(1): nge 'dzin kyi gzungs der// sgra skad dang // tha snyad dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil khor la/ 'jug pa'i gzungs dang // 'das pa dang / ma 'byon pa dang / da ltar dbyung ba'i sangs
136b2(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos bsam gyis myi khyab pa yi nad tu stond pa'i phyir nas gsum gyi gzungs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dpung myed pa/ rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad shi nang tu stond pa'i phyir rnam par sna tshogs su
136b3(1): spangs pa'i gzus dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba brjod du myed pa thams cad du rna ba'i dbang pos khyab par byed pa'i phyir thogs pa myed pa'i rna ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang myi bsnyengs pa la
136b4(1): rab tu 'god pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gzungs so// kye rgyal pa'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs ste/ de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bzon
136b5(1): par bya ba dang gi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub semasadapa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas bstand pa rjes su rtogs par bya bad ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar mngon par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas dang /

136b8(1): nams so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems skyed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar snyems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su stob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po
136b9(1): dang ldan pa'o// sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ang gyi lus kyis len pa'i phyir snying rje ches po dang ldan pa'o// sems bskyed pa de ni ci 'dog pa thams cad yongs su gtob ba'o phyir btang ba thams cad
136b10(1): yongs su gtong ba sngon tu 'gro ba zhes/ sems bskyed de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes yid la byed pa sngon tu 'gro ba'o// sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab
137a1(1): pa thams cad la nan tan du byed pas yon tan gyis rgyan pa'o// sems bskyed pa de ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du nyams par myi 'gyur bas rdo rje lta bu no/ sems bskyed pa de ni chos dkar po thams cad la yang dag
137a2(1): par gzhol bas rgya mtsho lta bu'o// sems bskyed pa de ni gzhan gis ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smos pa'i ngag dang tshig bzod pa'i phyir rin po chen po'i dbang po dam pa lta bu'o// sems bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la dbugs
137a3(1): byin pa chen pos sdug pa'i phyir bde bar byed pa'o// sems bskyed pa de ni chos thams cad rab tu dbyel pa la mkhas pas myi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tun phyind pas rtogs par khong du chud pa'o// kye rgyal pa'i sras bcu po

137a5(1): sras bcu po 'odi dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos ste/ brgya gang zhe na/ 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bskal da pa thams cad tu gnas pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i khyod
137a6(1): pa'i chos so// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams mchod cing rima'agro bya ba'i smon sam mi kun tu bzang po'i baspyod pa'i chos so/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i dpyod
137a7(1): pa la dgod pa i kun tu bzang po'i pyod pa'i chos so// dge ba'i cham thams cad yang dag par sartags pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i bapyod pa'i chos so// pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam ni
137a8(1): kun tu ba dang gro'i yod pa'i chos so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so// 'jig rten gi khams thams cad brgyan pa'i smon sa ma ni kun tu/ 
137a9(1): bzang po'i 'apyod pa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad skye ba bzung ba'i sngon sam ni kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so// chos thams cad yongs su btsal zhing rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i smon la ma ni
137a10(1): kun tu bzang po la spyod pa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rngu ldan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i 'gyod pa'i chos so// / kye rgyal
137b1(1): kha'i sras bcu la de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi kun tu 'bang po'i spyod pa'i chos sde// de dag gis ni smon cing mngon pa brtson par byas na byang chub sems dpa' naras khyur tu kun tu bzang ze'i mas ma
137b2(1): dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob pam 'gyur ba das go rgyam bu gsum pa/ bam po bcol lnga pa'o kye rgal ba'i sras 'acu zes di dgas byang chub sems
137b3(1): dpa' rnams kyi 'aning rje chen po lab tu mos paste/ de das gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams cag tu rgyun gyi 'chad pas sems cas kyi khams lags par sa 'o// cu gang zhes/ 'di skar sems can gyi khams bzhon skyed sa
137b4(1): nams la rnam per lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sems can gyi khams theg myed pa la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i a pa dbul ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen
137b5(1): po rab tu thob pa dang g.yun ring po nas gnyid kyis brgyal ba'i semasacan gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /  dge ba myed pa'i sems cam gyi khams la rnam par lta pa'i snying rje chen
137b6(1): 'os tu thob sa dang ga 'dod chags kyis bcings pas grags pa'i sems can kyi khams la rnas par sna ba sa snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / srid pa'i gang chen mchor rab tu la gsol par gyur
137b7(1): 'i sems can gyi mas la nas pa lta pa'i nying rje chen po rab tu yo 'i dang / sun ring po nas na pa'i sems can gyi khams la nas par ba'i zhing rje sem po 'ab sa thob pa dang // dge pa'i chos pa zas
137b8(1): byed pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i nying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chom las shin tu 'khyams par gyu dad pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thosa'oso//

137b10(1): skas bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkyen gang gis byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi/ sems kyi rkye nang rnams ste/ btsu ga len 'di ltar sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyind par bya ba
137b11(1): ram par 'argyal par bya la'i phyi nang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen kyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa'i rtenang ni byang chub kyi sems kyi byes so/  sems can thams cad 'a
138a1(1): pa'i yo byad kyis bstug pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi kye nang to sems can thams cad kyi myi shes pa'i bsal ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ sems can thams cad la
138a2(1): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyenang do/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cid rim 'gro bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyend to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i ga
138a3(1): pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gzugs dang mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ kaM sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs pa 'jug cing
138a4(1): khong khu chud par byed pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen te/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dpam bsnyengs pa thams cad yongs su stond pa'i rkyen da ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang
138a5(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi rkyend te/ de dag gis byangang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bA na myed pa yang dag par
138a6(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes banyen nams la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ 
138a7(1): dge ba'i bshes gnyen nams la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa bsu po 'di dag bskyed par bya ste bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar rim 'gro bya ba'i
138a8(1): sems dpa dgal ba'i sems dang ji skad rtsa bsgo ba bzhin du nan tan bya ba'i sems dang / yid myi dbyung ba'i sems dang / ji snyam ya kyi byed pa'i sems dpa/ gcig tu nges pa'i rkang pa 'dzin kyi sems dang
138a9(1): dge ba'i za ba thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyurd pa'i/ sems dang / smon sam gcig pa'i sems dang / ston da pa'i sems dang / baspyod pa'i mtshungs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems ste ga kye rgyal ba'i sras
138a10(1): bcu pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa rnams so// sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed pa'i tshe yongs su dag pa bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chud mye la la'i phyir sdug
138b1(1): pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can ji lta bur 'dul ba bzhin rtsa bstand pa'i phyir gzugs yongs su dag pa dang / rtswa skad dang tha snyad bsam gyis myi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
138b2(1): yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstand pa lnga/ mkhas par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang / myi shes pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes yongs su dag pa dang / byang
138b3(1): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir skye ba yongs su dag pa dang / sngon bskal pa'i mnyam par spyad pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i za ba yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir las zoms yongs su dag pa
138b4(1): dang / smig pa'i las thams cad spababs rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par sbyind par yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi/ sems thams cad dang tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir smom lam yongs su dag pa dang kug tu bzang
138b5(1): po'i theg pas 'byung ba'i phyir spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/  yongs su dag pa bcu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas rnams kyi pha
138b6(1): rold tu phyind pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dog pa thamasacad yongs su gtang ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su spyang pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha
138b7(1): rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs kyis bsam pa myi/ 'khrugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi/ stobs la sbyar ba'i phyir bzod pa'i phe rold tu phyind pa dang / mos pa thams cad las phyir myi ldog par b+ha ba'i
138b8(1): phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / dran pa rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi kha
138b9(1): ro lad tu phyind pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i phyir ye shes kyi pha rol phyi nad pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i snyoms ma yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
138b10(1): rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhos par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu byinang pa'o// kye rgyal pa'i
139a1(1): / sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i pha rold tu
139a2(1): phyind pa lA na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams
139a3(1): cad la rnam tha dad pa shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ris bsam gyis myi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos thams cad cig pa dang tha dad par yang
139a4(1): dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i shes pa khong rtsa chud par bya ba dang // chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa thams cad shi nad tu bstand pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings malus par thams cad kyis klas
139a5(1): ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad la ma 'ongs pa'i rjes kyis 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'das pa'i lus kyis 'jug
139a6(1): ba'i shes pa khong rtsa chud par bya ba dang nga / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la da ltar 'byung ba'i rjes kyis 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa dang smon lam k+ShaTA
139a7(1): rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya khas gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i shes pa khong tu chud par khyA kha dang / 'das pa dang / mkhyen pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'byen
139a8(1): pa gcig gis 'byung ba'i shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chu
139a9(1): sems dpa' nams snang ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thong pa dang / bsam po rnga lta ba bzhin du smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu mos bas sangs
139a10(1): rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag go// kyi/ rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu rtogs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs pa
139b1(1): dang chos thams cad la tha dad pa rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad sa mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang bsam pa thams cad la chags pa myed pa'i ye shes su rtogs pa dang sems can thams
139b2(1): cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi baspyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang 'ag la nyal ba'i spyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
139b3(1): dge ba dang myi dge ba'i spyod pa rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par che ba dang / 'phrul pa dang / byin kyis rlabs su thams cad rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lus par mngon pa
139b4(1): sangs rgyas pa'i byin rlabs rtogs pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa ste// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa bla myed pa thob sa
139b5(1): 'gyur ba dag go/ sakye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po dri dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs/ ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos/ thams cad kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad
139b6(1): grul da pa lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad sgyu malte bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dpa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags
139b7(1): ba myed pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin du tu mos pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la shi nad tu gus pa'i bsam pa myi gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
139b8(1): thams cad kyi sa ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po mnyes par byed pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bab pa yid ches pas myi gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems
139b9(1): las myi ldog par mkhas pa'i stobs kyi shus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpal rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
139b10(1): stobs bcu bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad sa mnyam pa nyid dang
140a1(1): chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / dge ba'i cha ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang 9/ byang chub
140a2(1): sems dpa' thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / smon lam thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / pha rol da tu phyind pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mnyam pa nyid
140a3(1): kye rgyal po'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpalta rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams can la mnyam pa nyid bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur pa dag go
140a4(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam rnams te/ bcu pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mying tsam mo// chos thams cad mi sgyu ma lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni myig gsor
140a5(1): lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni rten pa tsam mo// chos thams cad ni las dang dpral ba'o// chos thams cad ni myi zad pa'i sbyor ba'o// chos las/  cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed pa'o/ 
140a6(1): chos thams cad mi don dam pa'o// chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'arnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam ste/ de dag la gnas/ 
140a7(1): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la mkhas par bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos stond pa ste/ bcu
140a8(1): gang zhe na 'di ltar zam mo'i tshes bstand pa dang / yangs pa'i chos bstand pa dang / sna tshogs kyi chos bstand pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brjod pa mang po'i chos bstand pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i
140a9(1): chos bstand pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa'i chos bstand pa dang // chus gsum dang sngam pa'i chos bstan pa pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba'i chos bstand pa dang / sangs
140a10(1): rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i chos bstand pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bas pa pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi / mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmyigs pa dang ldan
140b1(1): pa'i chos bstand pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bsdu po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstand pa ste// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems/ dpo' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan da pa chen
140b2(1): po bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag rga/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i mag dang bsod nams kyi/ tshogs rnams yongs su gzung
140b3(1): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa la chos yastand pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / dpel dang mthun par bstun pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / chos kyi tshul dang sgo thams cad yongs su gzung
140b4(1): ba dang / gzungs thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / the tsoms thams cad yongs su gzus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
140b5(1): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dashin tu bstand pa'i sgo rnams/ na yongs su gzung ba dang / chos snang ba'i sgo thams cad yongs da su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul da pa dang
140b6(1): rnam par 'osad pa dang byin gyi blangs rnams yongs su gzung ba'o// kye rgyas nga'i sras su ma de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi yongs su gzung ba ste/ de dasus gnas shing byang chub sems
140b7(1): dpa' rnams de bzhim gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po yongs su gzung la bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta/ 
140b8(1): chos thams cad la rnam par ma brtags pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon par 'ju byed pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la myi gnas pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du snang
140b9(1): ba'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad sa u myed pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sposas pa dang // chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad lachin
140b10(1): gi bye brag mkhas pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la de kho na nyid bstan pa'i spobs pa dang / sems can gyi/ sems dang skyed pa thams cad la bsam pa tri lta ba bzhin du tshas par byed pa'i spobs pa'o// kye rgyal
141a1(1): ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi spobs pa/ ste// de dag sa gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa la mkhas pa bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag ro/ 
141a2(1): kyi skal pa'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltaram sems can thams cad yongs su sbyind par byed cing 'phrul ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / chos khams cad snang ba rab tu thob ba 'i dbang dang / 
141a3(1): dge ba'i cha ba thams cad la 'aspyod pa'i dab pa dang // ye shes chen po'i dbang dang / myi gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang dang / dge ba'i cha ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngol ba'i dbang dang / bzon 'grus la thams pa thacangs
141a4(1): cad las phyir myi ldog bzhi ye shes kyi dbang dang / bcud thams cad shi nad tu pham par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / gang /  dga' bar 'gro ba'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub
141a5(1): rnam 'dod par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas pa'i ye shes kyi dbang // dkye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi dbang ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpal rnams
141a6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbang blan myed pa yob para'agyur ba dag go// kye rgyas pa'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi myi gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di
141a7(1): ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la myi gnas pa dang / sems canathams cad la myi gnas pa dang / chos lam thams cad la myi gnas pa dang/ bya ba thams cad la myi gnas pa dang / dge ba'i za ba thams
141a8(1): cad la myi gnas pa dang // skye ba'i skye mched thams cad la myi gnas pa dang / smon lam thams cad la myi gnas pa dngang / spyod pa thams cad la myi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa myi gnas pa
141a9(1): dang sangs rgyas thams cad la myi gnas pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ myi gnas pa ste / de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems yangs par 'gyur/ 
141a10(1): ba yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su dag cing pA ma myed pa/ thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems mnyam pa nyid de bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'a so
141b1(1): nams thams cad la chags pa la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / smon la mnyam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems cas kyi rims thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can kyil ba
141b2(1): rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / chos la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang nga / zhing kun nas nyon monges pa dang rnam par dag pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / 
141b3(1): sems can gyi mos pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa gnyid dang / spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang myi bsnyengs pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems
141b4(1): mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i khong du chud par bya ba la sems mnyam pa nyid do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems mnyam pa
141b5(1): de de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs mnyam nyid rgya che zhing bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba/  dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems
141b6(1): dpa' rnams kyi ye zhes mangs par bsgrub babyed/ bcu gang zhen 'di ma gar sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi mas pa khong cu chud bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i mishes mngos par 'asgrub pa dang / sangs kyas thaTha
141b7(1): kyi zhing sna tshogs khong du chud par bya bar zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang / phyogs kyi dra bA rnam par dbyel ba thams cad// khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par la sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
141b8(1): sgye'u tshugs su rgyu ba dang / spel bzhir rgyu ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos thams cad cig pa dang tha dad pa 'byam klas par rnam par dgod pa la mkhasaHpa khong du chud
141b9(1): par bya ga la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / lus kyi rgyud thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la 'jug par zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang // 'du shes kyis phyi nad ci log tu gyur da pa'i 'jig rten gyi na
141b10(1): pa'i 'du shes dang rlom sems khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrus pa dang // chos kyi rgyud thams can la 'byung ba gcig gi mthar thug par 'jug pa khong du chud par bye ba sa zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par 'gyu
142a1(1): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyi/ rlabs khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon la bsgrub pa dang / 'gro ba thamam cad kyi dus gsu/ 
142a2(1): bya 'jus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad rgyan myi gcod pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes mngon
142a3(1): khar bsgrub pa ste/ de dag sa gnas shing byang chub sems dpal rnams chos gang la'ang mgo mengs par myi 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spub pa ste/ bcu
142a4(1): gang zhen 'di ltar sems can sul pa dang // ru mi sprul pa dang / zhing srul pa dang // mchod pa sul pa dang // dbyangs sru lad pa dang / spyod pa dang smon lam 'phrul pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par
142a5(1): rna ba dang gzul pa sprus pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chubadab spruld pa dang / chos bstan pa smras pa dang / byind kyi rlabs spru lad pa ma// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni
142a6(1): mas rnapa gas pa rje de sa ma sems dpa rnams sa bams pa zlan ngas pa ma pa zan byed pa se 'gyun pa gso/ 
142a7(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin te rlangs pa ste/ bcu gang ldan ra 'di ster sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs dang / chos kyi byin rlabs dang / sems can gyi byin gyis rlangs dang las
142a8(1): kyi byin gyis rlabs dang nga / tod pas byin gyis rlabs/ dang / smon lam gyi byin gyis rlabs dang / spyod yul gyi byin gyis rlabs dang / chus kyis byin gyis rlabs dang / dge ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyis rlabs
142a9(1): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs ste// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs bra na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal 'di
142a10(1): za sa bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shi na da/ tu dbugs phyin pa rab tu// rnyed pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe nas/ kye rgyal ya sa 'asras 'di a byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sa 'ongs pa'i chus de bzhin gshegs pa
142b1(1): gang ci snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mnyes par bya'o zhes dbugs phyind pa chen po rab tu thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dka par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la 'ang sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim
142b2(1): 'gro bla na myed a bya'o// mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bla na myed pa bya'o zhes dbugs phyind pa chen po rab tu jo bo'o// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mchod nas kyang gdams dag
142b3(1): gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i ar byung bar gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i// gdams ngag dang yan ngag bstand pa mdzad kyis// gdam ngas dang man ngag de'ab bdag gi sa pasan
142b4(1): ba lag pas rim gror byas te mnyan la yang dag par nan tan rtse bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du sems te// bdag bskal da pa brjod du myed par byang chub sems dpa'i
142b5(1): spyad pa spyod pa'i che/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub semasadapal rnams dang myi 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal 'di
142b6(1): snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa'i che/ 'di lta ste 'tsho ba myed pa'i 'jigs pa'amagrags pa myed pa'i 'jigs bu 'am/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'im/ ngan
142b7(1): song gi 'jigs pa 'am/ 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa'ang rung ste/ ji snyed kyi 'jigs par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni rnam par bzlog par gyur nga/ ring rtse byas par gyur da/ rnam par bcil bar gyur te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag
142b8(1): tu ces kyang myi 'jig pa par gyur da to// myi sdang bar gyur da to// spyi g.ya' ba myed par gyur to// ces kyang / 'jigs par myi 'gyur ro// sdang bar myi 'gyur ro// smyi g.yal bar myi 'gyur ro// de bas na brtan zhing rnam par gnon la zil dkyis
142b9(1): myi gnog pas / bcud dang mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis myi thub par gyu dad to// zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob 'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam cu sems bskyed dang / bdag byed
142b10(1): chub sems dpa'i 'argyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smi nad par bya'o// rab tu dgod par bya'o// de dag byang chub thob par gyur nga nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
143a1(1): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dang ba chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ tshe'i tshad kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i rim 'gros mchod pa dang kum bsti bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
143a2(1): de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sku gzugs la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mchod rten tshad myed pa mang po bya'o// de dag gi bstan pa / yang yongs su srung bar bya'o// de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su gzung badra ma myed las yongs su gzung bar
143a3(1): bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bA na myed pa'i mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o// sdud par bya'o// grub par bya'o/ yongs su sbyang
143a4(1): ngar bya mnyam par bya/ bsgyur par bya byin gyis rlangs par bya/ bskyod par bya/ snang bar bya/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pas dgang bam bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems
143a5(1): dpa' 'di ltar sems laskyed de/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par bya'o// nem nur gcad par bya'o// bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ sems khong du chud par bya'o// nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog par bya'o/ 
143a6(1): ngan pong gi sgo gcad par phyim/ bde ba'i lam gi sgo dbyel bar bya'o// mun pa rnam par gsal bar bya'o// khyed kyis snang bar bya'o// bdu tham cad dang bdud kyi las rnams rab tu gsul par bya'o// dra na myed bkri 'de ba !Sh+ya
143a7(1): chen po thob pa 'gro ba thams cad du yang dag par bstand par bya'o// rab tu bskyed par bya'o zhes dbugs byond pa chen po rab tu thob bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan du yang byang chub sems dpal 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
143a8(1): 'thong pa ni don yod pa ste/ ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ sangs rgyas ltar 'dod pa de tsam na mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong lani rgyum 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du
143a9(1): 'gyur ba ni rgyag 'chad par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas u d+ham 'a bal rali me chog lta bur bskal pa thams cad du skye zhing mthong bar dka' ba rnams las chos mnyam pa yang rgyan gyi
143a10(1): chad par 'gyur te// de ltar bdag gi bsam la yongs su dag pas sems bskyed pa g.yol thams cad yongs su spangs pa drang ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa myed pas sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas mthong ba'i byin/ 
143b1(1): kyi rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyind pa chen po rab tu theb po/ kye rgyas pa'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltaraM sems bskyed de degang gi tshe bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgyas pa de'i tshe/ 
143b2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang ngo // bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang / 'gro ba thams cad re rer sangs rgyas skye ba yongs su bstand par bya'o// 
143b3(1): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi rnga chen po brdung bar bya'o// chos kyi sprin gyi char chen po mngon par dbab pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa chen po rnam par dag par
143b4(1): ba'i phyir seng genyi ro chen pos nam gla sel da pa'i smon lam chen pos chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa'i bskal dad par chos lastand par bya'o// 'on kyang snying rje chen po'i byin kyis bdag gi lus la drub rngab byed par 'gyur/ ngag dang
143b5(1): sems la chu ba la myed par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyind pa chen po rab tu thob bo// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ dbugs phyind pa chen po rab tu thob pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
143b6(1): sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po la mngon par 'tshangargya ba bla na byed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgal pa'i srasabasu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la
143b7(1): 'jug pa rnams ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa'i lus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos za ba mo la 'jug pa dang po'o// 'jig rten gyi khams bgrangs pa de dang dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams

143b9(1): khams yongs su dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su shes pa gang ji rnyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rtsa da ltar 'byung ba'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yab mo la 'jug pa gsum pa'o// 'jig rten khams khams
143b10(1): cad tu sna tshogs su 'jug pa 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zla ba/ mo la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o// sems can kyi las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs thams cad la/ 'jug pa 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa lnga pa'o
144a1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs la 'das pa rnams kyi
144a2(1): tshams sbyor ba shes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa 'dren pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa shes pa 'di ni
144a3(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa rgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' da ltar 'byung ba'i saras rgyas bcom ldan 'das nams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgya
144a4(1): kyi zhing rab tu shes so/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor rab tu shes so// chos bstand pa rab tu shes so// sems can gdul ba rab tu shes so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi yang rab tu shes te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos za ba mo la 'jug pa
144a5(1): dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten da gyi chos rab tu shes so// nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so// nyidarang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i chos
144a6(1): rab tu shes so de bzhig gshegs pa'i chos rab tu shos so// chos de dag sa yang nam yar gyi tog las rab tu zhugs nas rnam pa sa dad par ston te/ chos de dag kyang gzung ba byed pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings rjethA pa
144a7(1): su 'dzud do// chos rnams rnam par brtan tu myed par yang shes so// chos de dag ji lta ba bzhin du yang rab tu shes te/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa
144a8(1): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu pa ste/ de dag la / gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes chen po na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bsu po 'di/ 
144a9(1): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi spyad pa baspyod do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'a thams cad mchod pa dang rim 'gror bya ba la gnas shi dang / byang chub sems
144a10(1): dpa' byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa 'aspyod do// sems can yongs su skyes par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa khyod do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams
144b1(1): sa dga' par byams gnas gi kyang chu ba sems dpa' byang dub soms dpa'i byed pa byed do dag nga'i sa pa dang tul lan sa ma sa gnas shing byang chum sems dpa' byang chub sem pa dpa'i sus pa nyid dang / mang sa rgyas gyi'ang
144b2(1): yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su myi gtang ba la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i 'byud pa spyod de/ pha dro'ang
144b3(1): tu phyin pa thams cad sa 'jug pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
144b4(1): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de// byang chub kyi sems tshad myed pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs papa 'chang rgyal la gnas shing
144b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 'byor do// kye rgyal ba'i/ sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas su bya/ na pa rnams ste/ gnas de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
144b6(1): ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang // bcud thams cad rab tu pham par bya ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang nga/ lus dang sros
144b7(1): thams cad la myi lta ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang // mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos bzhin du 'tshar gcad pa'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir sems btan pa bskyed pa dang
144b8(1): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lho byi chen po thams cad yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir
144b9(1): semams btan pa bskyed pa dang / chos zab mo la rnam par bsgom pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir / sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang 'arjod du myed par byang chub sems dpa'i baspyod pa spyad
145a1(1): pas myi skyo ba'i rgyud tu bya ba'i phyir sems brtan pa/ bskyed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de/ dag na byang chub pa sems dpa' rnams/ kyi/ sems bskyed brtan pa/ rnams te/ de dag sa gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
145a2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye ges chen po btan zhing bla na myed pa khrob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nung thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tsom byed cing
145a3(1): yid gnyis khyed la so ma nyis myed pa rnams lde/ bcu gang zhe na kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de// sems can thams cad sbyin pas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// tshul khrims dang // bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang
145a4(1): shes rab dang ga/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis yong su bsdu bar bya'o snyam yang de sa de de skan gyi 'brum snyam pa'i nem nur byed/ yid gnyis skyed/ the tsom myed de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di ni nes nur thams
145a5(1): cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang ji rnyed tu ma 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad bA na myed pa'i
145a6(1): shes pa'i bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad ma chad ci bsnyen babum ni sems paskyed pa sanyes pam bya'o bras yang de sa de kyi 'byungagam pa'i ni ma nur gyid pa 'di 'azhis byed/ bcom byed de ren na
145a7(1): gnas ma yin no// 'di ni zhem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan/ yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od zer sna tshogs kyi 'dra ba'i
145a8(1): brgyan gyis yongs su rgyas par dgang ngo snyam yang de la/ de de ltar myi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nu ma myed/ yid gnyis myed/ the tsom myed de// de ni gnas ma yin no/ !'di ni ne me nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa gsum pa'ong
145a9(1): kye rgyas pa'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de ma 'ongs pa'i bskasad pa'i mur thug par myi skyo ba'i rgyud kyis / sems can tshad myed pa yongs su smis par byal ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams grangs myed
145a10(1): bsam gyis myi khyab pa te/ mtshungs pa myed pa/ tshad myed pa gzhal du myed pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ su myed pas mtshams myed pa / mdzod du myed pa'i yang 'arjod du skyed pa grangs dang bgrang la las 'das
145b1(1): pachos kyi dbyings kyis klas par/ nam mkhas dbyings kyi mthas btugs pa thams cad bla na myed pa'i yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'gran myed pa'i gadrul bas yongs su sbyin pa dang / gdus par bya'o snyam yang des de de ltar kyi 'gyur rnam
145b2(1): pa'i zhes nur myed/ yid gnyis myed/ the tsom myed de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// 'di ni the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems ba skyed de/ byang
145b3(1): su ba sems dpa'i 'atad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes nas/ de la nom nur myed cing / yid gnyis myed pa dang / the tsom myed par gnas pa yin te/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems
145b4(1): bskyed pa lnga pa / kye rgyas pa'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal 'ang/ snyam ste/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos thams snang bar gyu dad pas chos thams cad mngon du gyurang
