164b10(1): chub sems dpa' ni bA na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems la rag lus par yid/ ches par bya ste// bsam pa yongs su dag pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdud cing yongs su

168a7(1): nga'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i rtsa la yongs su bsngo ba bla na myed la thob 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes
168a8(1): khong du chud pa e/ bcu gang zhe 'di ltar gtong ba'i sems kyis rnam/ 'phrul pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos pa'i ye shes 'ong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mthal dang dpung
168a9(1): byed pas bcud rnamamags 'o bachud pa dang / mimam mipa'i lags 'a chung bas// ridags pa 'a 'jug pa'i phyogs sod tu chung ba dang / de zhin 'ashegs pa khams cad kyi gsung sa mangs 'as yangs rgyas kyi ras
168a10(1): mas cad la yid ches par 'jug pa 'i ye ges khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas yA skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung rgya la pa rung se/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tshad myed par 'gyur bar yid ches par byas shing tshes dbang po thams cad
168b1(1): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes khong du chung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par pyod pa bsam gis myi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / sems kyi skad cig cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed
168b2(1): bar 'gro zhing gnas par bya ba'i phyir sems can cig gis khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsastan pa dang / bzung ba
168b3(1): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i rgyun kyi ye ges khong du chud pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes khong du chud pa rnams te// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
168b4(1): dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye des khong du chud pa blan byed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag no// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dpung myed pa sems te/ brgya ga phen 'di skar yangs rgyas
168b5(1): thams cad la sems skyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dpung myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad tu 'jug pa la sems skyed pa rgya chen po mtha'/ dpe dpung myed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhing dang tu saM dang chos kyi dbyings su 'ju
168b6(1): ba la sems skyed pa mtha' po mthal dang dpung myed pa dang / chos thams nad nam mkha' dang mnyam par lta ba la sems skyed pa rgya chen po mthe'u da dpung myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa thams cad la rgya cher rtag la
168b7(1): sems skyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dpung myed pa dang / tus gsum gi sangs rgyas thams cad yid la bya ba la sems skyed pa/ rgya chen po mtha' dang dpung myed pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'ang 'jus pa la/ sems bskyed pa
168b8(1): rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la sems skyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dbang bus myed pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa lnga sems skyed pa mtha' dang dbus myed
168b9(1): pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams bcad kyi dbyangs rnam par lta ba la sems skyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus myed pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus myed
168b10(1): ba rnams 'a/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos mthas dang dbus myed pa thams cad kyi ye shes rgya me po rgya mtsho'i lta bu bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang
169a1(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad la bgrang bas sbyar ba'i gter dang / chos thams cad la nges par rtogs pa'i gter dang / chos thams cad la gzungs sdang ba'i gter dang / chos/ 
169a2(1): g+ha thams cad la so so yang dag par rig pas rab tu snang ba'i gter dang / chos thams cad la brjod du myed pa'i tshul mkhas par khong du chud pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang chos 'phrul thams cad la lo lo rtog cing lta ba
169a3(1): gter dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du mngon par sgrub pa'i mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang myi bral ba'i gter dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i skal pa khasam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su grub par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i
169a4(1): gter dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dga' ba dang rab tu dgal ba dang mos pa chen po rab tu rnyed pa'i gter ro// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi gter te/ de dag la gnas shing bya ba
169a5(1): chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyigater bla na myed pa thob pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba la brtson par/ byed pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dag
169a6(1): kyisas pa seM dug zhen 'i shA sadus rgyam kyims padas kyi 'thugs kyi larnas pam sdom pa dang /  rgyas thams das samasas kyi bye ba na'i sos pa dang /  byang chub ses
169a7(1): dpa' thams cad las sam pa rlabs po che'i sdom pa dang / dge ba'i 'ashes gnyen thams cad la bsam pa myi 'dod pa'i sdom pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba thams cad la yongs su myi rgyu ba'i sdom pa dang
169a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' chung ba ba'i lam thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i sdom pa dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba myed pa'i sdom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya'o'i sdom pa dang/ 
169a9(1): bdud thams cad rab tu 'pham par bya ba'i sdom pa dang / ro mang du phyind pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pam bya 'i'i sdom pa ma// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'i dag mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsngos pa ste/ 
169a10(1): de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes chen po'i sdom pa bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 
169b1(1): 'di ltar skas pa 'dzod du myed par tsho'i tshad byin gyis rlobs par tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin grangs myed pa la nges par rtogs par gzhog cing ye shes kyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang pa dang / 'jig rten ring
169b2(1): khams thams cad h+yan rnam par dbye gtu mas rab tu rgyan par byin gyis rlabs pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin tu las kyi rnam par sbyin pa byin kyis rlob pas las la dbang
169b3(1): dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu skye la ston pas skye ba la dbang pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar lta bos mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par
169b4(1): tshang rgya 'as smon lams dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bton pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo dang sdang ba mtha' dang dbus myed pa yang dag par ston pas chos la dbang la
169b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang myi bsnyengs pa skad cig skad/ dacig tu go bar yongs su com pas ye shes la dbang ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni bya ba sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste
169b6(1): de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ sangs rgyasathams cad kyi byang chub kyi mnga'i pha rol tu phyin pa ye shes kyis rnam par 'phrul pa bla na myed pa tho'i bar 'gyur ba dag god// kye
169b7(1): rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can la rnam 'phrul pa dang / zhing la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos la rnam par 'brul
169b8(1): pa dang / lus la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / smon lam la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / spyod yul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang
169b9(1): rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems
169b10(1): dpa' rnams kyi sems can se rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa se// bcu gang zhe na// 'di ltar sems can thams
170a1(1): cad sems can myed pas sgrol ba'i rnam par 'phrul gdang / sems can gyi/ 'du shes kyi rnam par byin kyis rlab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can thams cad la dus la bab na chos bstastan pa
170a2(1): rgyun myi bcod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad sA'i sbubs gcig tu btsud kyang gnod par myi 'gyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang
170a3(1): sems shrI khams thams cad 'jig rten gi khams su byin gyis rlabs te pha rol shes par byed pa dang / yongs su bton pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems cam gi khams thams cad du rgya byin dang 'tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten mgol
170a4(1): 'i dbapa yongs su com pa'i mal bar 'phrul ba dang / sems cam gi khams thams cad du nyan thos dang rab sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang mtshan dang chog dang spyod lam yongs su bton pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems cas/ 
170a5(1): gi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob pa yongasasu bton pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i gtongs mngon par rdzogs pa
170a6(1): pangs rgyas pa'i gzubs kyi sku dang / mtshan dang / dpel byad bza'apo sna tshogs kyi rgyan yongs su bton pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par
170a7(1): 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing la rnam par 'phrul pa se// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar zhing thams cad zhing cig tu byin gyis rlol ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / zhing thams cad
170a8(1): rtswa'i sprulas cib cu lun pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / gang thams pad dmyi 'ad ltas bcug pa'i rnam khar 'phrul pa dang / shing thams cad skyil mo krung cig gis rgyas 'am 'gengs pa'i lus cig yongs su chen pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
170a9(1): dang 'di thams cad rang gi lus su chud par yongasu rton pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang // zhing thams cad rab tu spyod kyang sems can 'jigs par myi 'gyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba
170a10(1): nyidi cig tu yongs su 'aton pa'i rnam par 'phrul padang/ zhid cig gis rnam par phye ba shing thams cad kyi brgyan rnam par phye bar yongs su bton pa dang/ zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ 
170b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu zhig gis yongs su khyab par sems can thams cad ma yon pa'i rnam par 'brul pa dang / zhing phra la dang me ba dang yangs pa dang rgya me ba dang bab pa dang / snrel ba'i dang khyi lu tshugs su rgyu ga dang bzhi mnyam pa/ 
170b2(1): pa 'jug par yongs su gzhol bas phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par phye ba la 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad yongs su son pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing la
170b3(1): rnam par 'phrul 'a'o// kye rgyal ba'i lus bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bcu bang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad chos cig tu yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / chos cig po chos
170b4(1): thams cad du yang das 'am gzhol bar byed kyang / sems cam gi 'asam yang nga myi 'gal 'angarnam par dmyigs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par sgrub par khong du chud par bya ba'i pha rom gyi
170b5(1): par bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang // chos thams cad 'du shes dang bral re ba'ang sems can mang pos khong du chud par bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos thams cad tshul cig tu 'dzud cing tshul mtha' yas par 'aton pa'i rnam par
170b6(1): 'phrul ba dang gcos thams cad la mngod du byed par 'jub cing blo rgya gong gis pa'os gi rgyud tu man pa'i rnam par 'azhus par rtso thams pam mo kun nas rgyam so 'grubs mas lab das padas su ca
170b7(1): dang / chos thams cad chos kyi sgo cig dang myi 'gal ba la 'jug pa'i tshul khong du chud par 'artson pas skald pa brjod du myed cing myi zad par rnam para'aphrul pa dang / chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa sems ma/ 
170b8(1): mang po bzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus myed par yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos thams cad la chags pa myed pa'i mthar byind cing mthal dang / dbus myed pa'i sgyu ma'i phra ba rnam
170b9(1): pa ma dad pa 'atub pas laskas dpa su byed par gyi zang par sems can la com pa'i rnam par 'phrul la so/ !kye rgyal pa'i sras bcu po'i rab ni byang chul sems da'a' rnams kyi chos la rnam par 'phrul 'a'o// kye rgyal ba'i/ 
170b10(1): sra sa bcu po 'di dang ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lu su byin kyis rlob cing mos par byed pa la 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul
171a1(1): ba dang / rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi 'du shes su byin kyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sangs rgyas cig gi skur mos shing 'jug pa'i rnam par/ 
171a2(1): 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas cig gi sku sangs rgyas ma sus pa thams cad kyi skur 'jug cing gzhan la yongs su brtson pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dpa/ zhing thams cad bran ma ka byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
171a3(1): dus gsum thams cad chos kyi sku cig gis yongs su rgyas par sems can la 'aton pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang // lus cig tu ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhig cing lus mtha' skangs pa las rnam par ldang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang
171a4(1): lus cig gis mngon par sangs rgyas shing sems can de snyed kyi lus su yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi khrus sems can gcig gi lus su bton pa'i rnam par 'grub pa dang
171a5(1): sems can thams cad kyi lus chos kyi skur ston cing chos kyi sku sems cas gi lus su 'aton pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa se// kye rgyalaba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lum lA nam
171a6(1): ba 'phrul / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'asu ma ba das mi byang chub sems pa rnams kyi rlos lam sa rnas par 'gyul te/ bcug zhi na 'di lta byang chub sems dpa' phams cad kyi stom lasa'ang gi thog
171a7(1): lam bya byin kyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi smon lam kyi sostobs dang / mthu mngon 'am rdzogs par byang chub bar yo ngas su com pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can ji ltar
171a8(1): sbyim pa 'ang 'ang bas pa bzhin du blan byed pa yab dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pada'atshang rgya bar bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul la dang / skal ba la mu myed par thams cad tu smon lam rgyun myi gcod pa'i rnam par 'phrul
171a9(1): ba dang rnam par sbyin pa'i lus sadas gyen du skyod de ye shes kyi lus la'ang myi gnas pa'i smon lam dbang sgyur bas us thams cad yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rang gi lus tshang du 'gyur bas pha rol gyi tshogs kyi
171a10(1): smon sam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rnam par 'phrulal pa dang / sems can thams cad yi ngas su smin par bya ba'i/ smon lam las phyir myi ldog pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ska lad pa bgrangs pa thamasa? cad byang chub
171b1(1): gyi byed pas byas pas dpa 'i'i don lasagyur gyi' pa'i rnas par 'phrul pa dpa / slo'i thungs cig tu ngon par/ cang rgyaba'i smom sa kyi byabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bams par du rgyas par dgang zhing 'dig me mi khangam 'don du byed
171b2(1): pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i sems can cig tu bton pa'i smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos kyi tshig cig brjod pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par bka ste/ chos kyi sprin chen po 'byung ba las chos dud rtsi'i char
171b3(1): rab tu 'bab cing rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i glog snang ba dang / yang dag par de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug smra mngon par 'byung bas sems cam gyi khams thams cad yongs su ngoms par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byas pas rnam
171b4(1): par che ba'i rnam par 'phrul pase/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi smon lams rnam par 'phrul 'a'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems da'al rnams kyi dakhyod yul yan pa
171b5(1): par 'phrul la s+ye/ brgya gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub chub sems/ dpal rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ sems can khams kyi spyod yul du yang snang ngo // kye rgyal 'di sras
171b6(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khyod yus la mngon par dga' ba 'ang yin la bdun kyi dpyod yul la gnas 'ang yang snang // kye rgyal ba'i / sras byang chub sems dpal rna 'as ni mya ngan las yangs pa ni pyod yung / can
171b7(1): dang yang ldan la 'khor ba'i spyod yul las kyang myi ga yi'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chul sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyisaspyod yul dang ldan la byang chub sems ngaba'i spyod yul gyi rgyud kyang myi gcod la / 
171b8(1): rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'i spyod yul dang yang ldan yaH/ sems tsam mazhi ba rab tu ma zhi pa nye bar ma zhi ba'i spyod yul can rnams kyang rnam par myi spo ba po/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub
171b9(1): sems dpa' rnams ni bla ba ba myed pa dang / ro ba myed pa dang / spros pa/ myed pa dang / myi sngo pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / rnam par myi dmyigs pa dang / bar snang dang mnyam pa'i 'aspyod yul dang yang ldan pa/ 
171b10(1): sems can sngos pa dang mtshan ma thams cad du dmyibs pa'i gyod yul can rnams kyi gnas na/ yang snang po// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stobs dang rnam par/ tha dad pa'i skyed yul dang yang ldan la phyogs cig pa'i
172a1(1): ka pyod yul thams cad du 'ang skar po/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can myed pa'i 'apyod yul dang yang ldan la sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya bra yang rnam myi spong ngo // kye
172a2(1): rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni khasam gtan dang // rnam par tha rad pa dang / rtog pa dang ye shes dben pa'i spyod yul dang ldan la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang skye bar yang snang ngo / kye rgyal ba'i sras bya ba
172a3(1): chub sems dpal rnams ni re ba'i ma gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyam dang spyod yul thams cad kyang bob sa nyan thos dparang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyod lam dang cho ga la da yongs
172a4(1): su bcon te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa se
172a5(1): brgya gang zhe ma 'di ltar so sor yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes kyi zad pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mongs pa myed pa'i gzungs/ da thams cad thob pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / smon la mashin
172a6(1): rgyarnas par gdon myi za pa 'ams pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su 'dzin pa dang / khong du chudaba'i ye shes pa rnam yang 'khrul pa dang / rang gi sems kyi ye shes pa
172a7(1): ro lar kyi sems kyi ye shes dang // sems cig las sems cam thamasacad kyi spyod pa dang / rnam par g.yonye bar byed pa'i ye shes sa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad kyi bas ma kha dang 'ag/ 
172a8(1): la nyal ba dang bag chags dang // nyon mongs pa'i nad la gang dang 'byond pa'i sman yang dag par gtong ba'i ye shes la rnam pam 'phrul yang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i so bas 'amyal skad cig TIg gis 'jug pa'i ye shes pa
172a9(1): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / t+yas gsum gi skald pa'i grangs thams cad la chags pa myed pa'i ye shes yangs pa sems can gzhan gyis thol par byed pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang thogs pa byed pa'i sems
172a10(1): kyi skad cig tu mngon lan 'tshang/ 'argya bar 'gro ba thams cad tu mngon su ngon pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can cig gi 'du shes kyis sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang bya ba mngon gsum du
172b1(1): 'jug pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ladang / sems can cig gi sgra dbyangs kyis smra thams cad la gadrug sa yongs su 'aton pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul la sa// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems
172b2(1): dpal rnams kyi ye shes kha rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems/ dpal rnams kyi mngo' par shes pas pa rnam par 'phrul pa 'ate/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gi khams thams cad
172b3(1): du bus yongs su ston kyang lus cig tu dmyigs pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul la dang / de bzhin gshegs pa cig gi 'khor gi dkyil 'khor tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gi dkyil 'khor dang / 
172b4(1): chos bsam pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems cam cig sems can la dmyigs pas byang chub kyi rgyud rjod du myed pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhi dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems
172b5(1): kyis go bar byed pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam 'a 'phrul pa dang /  dbyangs cig gis 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du go bar byed/ med cing sgra rnam pa dad pa thams cad du shes par byed pas / sems can
172b6(1): gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tu phyin par byed pa'i mngom par shes pa la rnam par/ 'phrul pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdom gi mtha'i mur thus pa'i skal dpa sems kyi skad cig cig gis rjes su dran zhing
172b7(1): shes pas las kyi 'bras bu rnam par sbyin pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon gsum du ston cing sems can gis go bar byed pa'i mngon par shes pal rnam par 'phrul la dang/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad brgyan
172b8(1): par bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas thams kyi byang chub tu 'gyod pa'i smon lam yang dag par
172b9(1): skyed pa dang chos kyi snang ba rab tu 'akye ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lha dang // klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam kha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / ste phye chen po
172b10(1): dang // rgya byin dang 'tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyis mngon par shes par nyan thos dang ra nga sangs rgyas/ dang // byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / byang
173a1(1): sems dpa'i dbel ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su srung ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras mdor na byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par shes pas chos
173a2(1): sa ma 9ban kyi sa pa gyu sa pa stsu//  rgyal pa'i thas phram 'di pa'i byang chub ses
173a3(1): 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa se/  bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gi khams rjod du myed pa'i yang rjod du myed pa rdul shin tu phra ba cig tu 'dzud pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rdul shin tu phra kha cig la chos kyi dbyings
173a4(1): thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig yongs su 'dzin pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rgya mtsho la thams cad kyi chu'i phung po chen po l+ya pra sU'i// dung bu cig tu blugs // chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'jis
173a5(1): rten gi khams su 'gro yang sems tsam la gnod par myi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul/  la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'arjod du byed pa'i brjod tu myed pa rang gyi lus su btsud de bya ba thams cad yongs su
173a6(1): nyon pa la mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ 'khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri bsam gyis myi khyab pa thams cad spu'i lung bu cig tubres te/ bajig rten gi khams thams cad tu 'gro yang sems cam
173a7(1): rnams sngar bar myi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa de dang / skal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa skal kha cig tu byin kyis rlabs te/ skal pa cig la dzod du myed pa'i yang brjod tu myed pa'i skal pa 'du ba dang 'jig pa
173a8(1): hen kyang sems can la gnod par myi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams/ thams cad tu chus 'jig pa yongs su 'anyend pa dang mi dang rlung gis 'jig pa yongs su nad kyang sems can la gnod par myi
173a9(1): 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tshig cing mu dang mi dang rlung gis 'jig kyang longs spyod dang nye bar s+yad la thams na cad kyis yongs su gang bar byas shing sems can la kun tu btond pa'i/ 
173a10(1): rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten/ gi khams bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i lag pa'i thil gis blangs te/ 'jig rten/ gi khams brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par bkod kyang sems can la gnod par myi 'gyur ba'i rdzu
173b1(1): 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / zhing thams cad na mkha'i rang bzhin du yongs su bstartan pas sems can go bar byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa e// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
173b2(1): rdzu 'phrul ya rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa se/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang 'dul ba myi gter khas sems cas kyi
173b3(1): stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa / nam kha brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa thams cad rgyan rnam par phye bas rgyan par yongs su som pas zhing gi tobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad lus myed par 'jug pas
173b4(1): chos kyi stobs la rnam par la rdul ba dang / skyed pa rgyun myi gcod pas bskal pa'i sebs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / gnyid kyis log pa sangs par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi sebs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i
173b5(1): skyed pa thams cad skyed cing rab tu 'dzin pa'i phyir 'byed pa'i stobs la rnam byed par 'phrul pa dang // sems can gi khams thams cad yang dag bar sgrol bas sangs rgyas kyi sobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos
173b6(1): thams cad bdag po myed par ma ngon lam 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir rang 'byung gi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesam lus par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhye nang pa'i
173b7(1): te zas la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gto ba bas snying rje/ chen po'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa'o// kye rgya'o ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi/ 
173b8(1): hi ba sa la rnam par 'phrul pa ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sems can la nam par 'phrul pa 'a du ba la man N+yA da stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa yan chab kyi bar bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa se/ 
173b9(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rnam par 'phrul pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod na bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tsha brgya'o// 'dod na mngon par 'tshang myi rgyal
173b10(1): 'dod na mngon par 'tsha ba yang rgyal bapyod pa yang rgyun mye gcod do// kye rgyal po'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni smon lam chen pos 'byung ba se/ sgo mtha' stongs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs
174a1(1): su brtan pa la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// sha kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' kyi rnam par rtse ba ste/ rgya gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gi lus gzhi pa'i
174a2(1): lus byin gyis rlob pa byed kyang / sems can gi lus 'byer par myi byed pa 'di ni rnam par rtse ba dang po lo kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zhing gi lus la sems can gi lus khyim gyis rlob
174a3(1): kyang zhing gi lus 'dres par myi byed pa de ni rnam par che ba gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi/ sku la sems can gi lus byin kyis rlob kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dma' bar myi byed
174a4(1): pa de ni rnam par rtse ba gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpal nyam thos dparang sangs rgyas kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su son kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen
174a5(1): por yang myi byed pa de ni rnam par che ba bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal spyod pa'i lus la / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i lus yongasu su ton kyang spyod pa'i rgyun myi
174a6(1): gcod pa de ni rnam par rtse ba lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba'i lus la spyod pa yongs su ton kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub 'am dze6
174a7(1): bar len par myi byed pa de ni rnam par che ba cug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'khor ba'i rgyun yongs su ton kyang mya ngan las 'das pa sa mngon par chags
174a8(1): pa myi skyed pa de ni rnam par gyi ba bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal 'khor ba la mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su yin kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas shin tu mya ngan 'das par myi
174a9(1): byed pa de ni rnam par che ba brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal mnyam par bzhag bzhin du 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng pa dang / 'dug pa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su bton kyang
174a10(1): ting nge 'dzin gi/ mnyam pa nyid 'khrug par myi byed pa de ni rnam par che ba dgul pa'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin/ gshegs pa cig gi zhabs kyi chung nas/ chos/ thos nas/ lus kyang myi snang bar myi byed la ting
174a11(1): 'dzin gyi stobs kyis // de bzhin gshegs pa'i'akhong gi dkyil 'khyom brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa gzhan dang gzhan ta rnam pa dgod pas lngang yang lus tha dad par yang myi byed ting nge 'dzin ma dad par yang mya byang
174b1(1): lu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing kun chub par byed las/ ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing chos 'dri ba bzung ba'i rgyun kyang myi gcod de// de de ltar/ mnyam par 'o zhag bzhin du lus
174b2(1): myi snab bar yang myi byed la/ ting nge 'dzin kyi lus dang sgo mngon par sgrub pa re re las kyang brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi lus dang sgo mngon par sgrub cing de lta bu'i tshul gyis skal da pa thams cad zad par gyur
174b3(1): kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gi sgo mngon par sgrub pa'i mtha' gang yang myed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi rnam par the ba ste// de dag la
174b4(1): gnas shing byang chub sems dpal rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpam rnams kyi yul se
174b5(1): bcu zang zhen// 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug/ na par sems can la yongs su ston pa'i yul dang // 'jigarten gi khams thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs su ma mngon pa
174b6(1): sgrub la/ 'gro po thams cad kyis rnam par sbyin par bya ba'i yuladang / sems can gri khams thams cad du yul pa mngon par/ sgrub pa rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
174b7(1): sku byang chub sems dpa'i lus su mngon por sgrub pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'o lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang / na mkha'i khams 'jig rten gi khams su mngon par sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams
174b8(1): na mkha'i khams su mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'khor bar mngon par sgrub pa dang / 'khor la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang sems cam cig gi skad du 'arjod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rten par
174b9(1): mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang / mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas lus kun tu ton cing lus cig tu byin kyis/ brlab pa dang / lus rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad mngom par sgrub pa'i yul dang / sus cig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par dgang
174b10(1): ba'i yul dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems skyed pa'i skad cig re re la mtha' yas pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub cing rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i yul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul to// de dag la senas/ 
175a1(1): shing byang chub sems dpal rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i yul bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur la dag ko// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo' sangs rgyas rma dag chad ces bya ba bam po bcu dngu
175a2(1): pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad dang 'du 'dzi myed pa'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skyes khug pa skyed par
175a3(1): bya ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyind par bya ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sbyor ba'i stobs dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi skyed pa rab tu shes par bya ba'i phyin pa ye shes kyi
175a4(1): tshobs dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yi sto bas dang / phyi ma'i mthal mur thug par rgyun chad la myed par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa thams cad kyis 'byung bar kun tu bsas pa dang zhes pa
175a5(1): chen po las phyir myi ldog par bya ba'i phyir theg pa'i stobs dang / sgra'i sbubs cig/  tu sangs rgyas/ 'byung ba thams cad dang 'jig rten gi khams yongs su/ dag pa thams cad kun tu bstan pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / 
175a6(1): sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang myi bral bar skye ba'i phyir byang chub kyi stobs nang/ chos kyi tshig cig brjod pasasems can thams cad kyi bsam 'a dang dbang po ma lus pa sma ga ma myed pa
175a7(1): mtha' dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i btobs te// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen dpa'i ye shes dang to ba
175a8(1): bcu dang ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mying 'jigs pa se// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpal rnams ni
175a9(1): sgra thams cad 'dzind pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin te/ de 'di snyam tu shar phyogs dang / byar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs nas ton pa la la zhig bdag gi gam tu byon te/ 'gro ba chen po rgya tong rab tu bshag par
175a10(1): gyurd na bdag gis de bzung bar myi nus snyam du myi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu'ang rjes su myi mthong ngo // sgyu'ang rjes su myi mthong bas myi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing btan la zhum pa myed pa'i yid kyis
175b1(1): 'gro ba thams cad la ci 'dod pa de dris shig ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yi ge dang / brjod pa dang / sgra dang / skad thams cad kyi tshams sbyar ba rab tu
175b2(1): rtogs par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs stobs dbang skur ba'i spobs thogs pa myed par dam pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa thob pa yin te/ de dag 'di ltar shar phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / sgo phyogs dang / nung phyogs mas zhig
175b3(1): 'ongs te/ bdag la chos kyi the tsom chen po zhag dris par gyur pa na/ bdag gis lan myi lon pa snyam tu myi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu'ang myi mthong ngo // rgyu 'ang rjes su myi mthong bas/ myi 'jigs pa chen po'i de ba thob cing 'gro ba thams cad
175b4(1): kyi dri ba yongs su dri ba ci yod pa rtag pa dang // 'jigs shing spu ldang ba myed par byos la gang 'dod pa de dag dris shig ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stong pa'i chos / 
175b5(1): du chud par rtogs pa yin te/ bdag dang ba dag gi dang / byed pa po dang /  byed du 'jug pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / srob dang / gse'i pa ngadang gang zag dang / phung po dang khams dang / skye ched du lta ba
175b6(1): bral te/ sems namakha' dang tshungs pa'i rjes su song ba de dag/ 'di snyam du bdag la/ la la zhig gis lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis gnodapar bya la 'am cig tu myi 'gyu re 'am skam tu sems dpa' mye re byed/ 3
175b7(1): chub sems dpas mtshan ma dang rjes su myi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bralaba'i phyir te/ mtshan ma yang rjes su myi mthong bas myi 'jigs pa chen po'i
175b8(1): dal thob cing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon tu 'dor ba la rab tu brtan pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpal rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis byin du rlabs te/ sangs rgyas kyi snab
175b9(1): ngas nye bar brtan cing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byod lam dang spyod pa dang / tshul rab tu gnas la 'askyod lam rnam par rtags shing ji lta bu bzhin du gnas pas de dag 'di snyam du bdag 'amyod la ma la/ la la zhig gis brgal bar myi 'gyur ram skam
175b10(1): spyi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma yang rjes su myi mthong ngo // mtshan ma yang rjes su myi mthong bas/ myi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing 'khor gi nang tu phyin nas chos ston pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i
176a1(1): sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las yo su nid yongs su dag pa dang / gtsang ba dang / btsang / s+tha dang / nges pa dang ldan zhing ngan par pyod pa drang / ngan tu byed pa dang / ngan tu sma pa dang bra lA yin
176a2(1): des ni 'di snyam tu bdag gi lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las ya / la la zhig gis rgal bar myi 'gyur ram snyam du myi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma yang rjes su myi mthong ro// mtshan ma yang rjes su myi mthong bas 'jigs pa
176a3(1): dang bral zhing myi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob 'am/ sems can gzhan chos la sbyor bar byed pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lag na rdo rje rtag tu phyim bzhin drung bas yongs su srung ba chen
176a4(1): po thob cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gis rtag tu rim 'gror bya ba yin/ brgya byin dang / 'tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gi mgon po rnams kyis rtag tu phyag bya ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
176a5(1): kyis dgongs pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam tu bdag cag la 'dud dam bdud kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lnga 'am/ mu stegs can dang / mu stegs 'apyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu la dag gas/ sems can dmyigs pa
176a6(1): pa yang mngon par zhen pa la la zhig 'ongs par chad byed par myi 'gyuraram zhes bya bar sems pa myed de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan mayang rjes su myi mthong ngo // mtshan ma yang rjes su myi mthong bas 'jigs/ 2
176a7(1): pa dang bral zhing myi 'jigs pa'i dam pa chen po thob pas/ dga' zhing yid bde ba dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad la nan tan tu byed pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams
176a8(1): ni sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa'i dran pa rab tu thob cing dran pa'i dbang po mchog dang ldan pas yongs su rmongs pa myed pa yin te/ 'di dag 'di snyam tu/ bdag cag gis chos kyi tshig dang yi ge/ byang chub sems dpa'i kham dang ldan pas pa de/ 
176a9(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas khyab pa la la zhig yongs su ma zin pa 'am/ chud za bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ba myed dam zhes bya bar sems pa myed de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma yang rjes myi mtho ba // mtshan ma yang rjes
176a10(1): su myi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing 'jigs pa myed pa chen po thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa ya ba dag par gzungs/ pa'i phyir nan tan tu byed pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub
176b1(1): snyoms dpa' rnams ni thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes khong du chud par rtogs shing byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/ rgyun myi 'chad pas sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin par byed cing // de dag sangs
176b2(1): rgyas kyi byang chub tu smon lam dang bsam pa chen po rab tu btab ste/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed nas ched du bsam te/ 'jig rten gi zhanas 'dod pa dang 'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa can du skye ba bzung zhing 'dod pa'i
176b3(1): dge ba'i rtsa pa dang / 'khor gi longs spyod chen pos sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don tu bdag gis yongs su bzung bar byed kyang / de dag 'di snyam tu bdag cag sems can gi 'du 'dzi'i gos pas yongs su gos par 'gyur te/ byang
176b4(1): chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thard pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / spobs pa'i bar chad dam tshig tu myi 'gyur ram zhes sems pa myed de/ byang chub sems
176b5(1): dpa' de dag gis rgyu yang rjes su myi mthong ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'id lam la rgyun myi 'chad par spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang gi
176b6(1): yo bang tu phyind pa dam pa thob ba dag se/ de dag gis 'jig rten gi rnam par 'khrug pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i/ lam la rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ba rjes su myi mthong ngo // rjes su ny+tsad+ya
176b7(1): myi mthong pas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing myi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin na po dam pa thob pas/ 'jig rten khams kyi gnas/ thams cad kyi skyemached thams cad tu skye ba bzung bar smon lam rab tu 'debs
176b8(1): myi 'jigs pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems ma nyams shing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas las theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa dag te/ de dag
176b9(1): ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems kyi stobs dang shugs la gnas shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang 'byod lam/ yongs su ston kyang de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag nyan thos dang rang sams rgyas kyi thes pa 'am cig gis
176b10(1): 'byung pa ra myi 'gyur snyam tu sems pa myed de// byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'ang rjes su myi mthong ngo // rgyu/ 'ang / rjes u mi thong pas 'jigs pa dang bral shing myi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu byind pa dam pa thob pas theg pa thams cad mnyam
177a1(1): pa nyid du btond cing theg pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa pa yang dag par bsdus pas
177a2(1): dkar po'i chos yongs su sdus pa yin/ mngon par shes pa dang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin// rgyun chad pa myed par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rab tu rten pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs
177a3(1): su rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul la mngon par dbang skur yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa nye bar blang ba de yang rgyun myi gcod de// de dag 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can
177a4(1): yang yongs su smin par ma gyur da ya/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba nod par myi nus pa 'am cig tu myi 'gyur ram zhes bya ba myed de/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu'ang rjes su myi mthong ngo // rgyu 'ang rjes su myi
177a5(1): mthong pas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / myi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rold tu phyind pa dam pa thob pas sems can yongs su smyin pa'itshul ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su ton te/ byang chub
177a6(1): mas dang spod pa 'a rgyan gyi shes/ byang chub sems dang sa bya ngon thos te 'bang rgyad byin 'am/ bya bachu sems dpapa pas su sbyin pan kyang 'dun gyis cadang /  kyi ji
177a7(1): ba bcu pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' nams kyi myi 'jigs pa se// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams myi 'jigs pa chen po bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems/ 
177a8(1): dpa'i myi 'jigs pa las kyang phyir ldog par myi 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa se/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub
177a9(1): sems dpa' rnams me An par pha rol da tu phyin pa rnams yu batshon zhing gtong ba yongs su gtong la 'jungs pa dang / bral pa yin no// tshul khrims yongs su dag la tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad rab tu gas khyad pa yin// bzod pa phun
177a10(1): gsum tshogs pa sa bsam pa myi sprul pa yin/ brtson 'brus chen poyo dang / ldan la dus thams cad tu phyir myi ldog pa yin te/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i ye shes dang ldan la 'khrug pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin// shes rab kyis bzhi na
177b1(1): byang zhing sdig pa'i lta ba dang bral ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de stan ma khatan par pha rol tu phyi nad pa la brtson pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos ste/ de ltar 'pha rol da tu phyind pa'i lam dang mthun pa de ni
177b2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gi khams yongs su sdud cing 'jig rten gi zad zing dang / chos kyi sbyin yongs su gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/ bzhin 'dzum
177b3(1): pastan par smra ba/ tshig 'jam pa// sems can thams cad kyi sems mngon par dga' ba// don yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi don khong du chud par byed pa/ myi mnyam pa'i sems myed pa
177b4(1): sems can thams cad la snyoms par don tu sems pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i us te lhan ma brtan pas/ sems can gi khams yongs su sdu ba'i phyir nan tan du byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/ de ltar bskul
177b5(1): ba'i dngos po'o lam dang mthun de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres/ na pa gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'/  rnams ni yongs su bsngol ba'i tshul la mkhas shing rnam par sbyin pa la
177b6(1): reb byed par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rnasu ma ba yongs su lnga zhing 'dzin shin gi snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la ye ram pa myed par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu gnas shing sems can gi don tu/ 66\u0f7f
177b7(1): yongs su sde se// kye rgyal ba'i os de ltar ma khastan par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad batshams pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ltar tshol zhing sems can gi don yongs su tshol pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres
177b8(1): pa he// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang zhing
177b9(1): 'jig rten pa thams cad lam la yongs su skye ba myed pa'i yid dang ldan te// 'phags pa'i spyod yul la mngon tu ltas la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba las phyir phyogs te/ sems can thams cad yongs su smyin
177b10(1): pa la mngon par brtson zhing bdag gi bde ba la chags pa myed de/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha radad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dad re/ snyoms pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par ldang ba la mkhas pas rang gi dbang du 'gyur/ 
178a1(1): ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing 'khor pas yongs su skye ba myed pa'i sems dang ldan te/ 'khor ba la bza' shing gi ra ba lta bu'i 'du shes chen po thog pa dang / bdud kyi khyim thams cad na gnas pa dang // rgya byin dang 'tshangs pa dang
178a2(1): 'jig rten gi mgon po thams cad kyi dbang chen po yongs su ton cing / skye ba'i skye ched thams cad du gzugs rnyan byung bar gyur pa la zhags pa thub pa'i rab tu byung ba'i thams cad kyi lta ba dang bral te/ 'jig rten pa'i rang bzol dang
178a3(1): sngags dang btsug la ba dang / yi ge dang / bshod thabs dang / grangs dang // rtsis dang // rang gi zed me dang // 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su son cing / bud myed kyi cho ga dang / mtshan ma dang / cha lugs dang / rgyu tshal
178a4(1): thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / dpyad pa dang / 'dri ba dang / rtag pa shin tu brtan pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog thob la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa la rol
178a5(1): tu phyind pa'i mchog thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dor lta ba dbang dang / na ldan pa dang / nga rgyal ba thams cad kyi cho ga dang spyod lam yongs su ston pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa// de bzhin
178a6(1): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'tshang rgya ba skad cig skad cig tu btond pa/ spyod pa'i rgyun yongs su myi gcod pa e// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltarathabs mkhas pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa'i mchog thob kyang 'atand pa 'u dru'u
178a7(1): myed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma 'dres pa'i chos ste// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang snrel bzhi la mkhas shing ye shes
178a8(1): kyis rnam par che ba dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog thob pas// 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas kyang 'khor ba'i sgo yongs su tond pa// sems can myed pa'i mtha'i 'askyod yul dang ldan yang sems can thams cad
178a9(1): yongs su smin par bya ba ma btang pa shin tu tul ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog thob kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'bar ba sems can la yongs su stond pa/ chos kyi ye shes cig tu sdug pa'i lus dang ldan yang / sems can gi ske
178a10(1): mtha' yas pa yongs su stond pa// bsam gtan chen po la lam gtan cha' yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyis rtse zhing longs pyod pa ma sems can la rnam par spyod pas cig tu dga' bar dgal zhing mos la khams gsum pa
178b1(1): thams cad las phyir stas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa ma gtad / brtag tu chos kyi dga' bas dga' zhing mos kyang lha'i bu ma rgya phrag song gis sgra rab tu phyung ba dang / rtse ba mtshan dang dpe
178b2(1): byad bzang po dang / dge ba'i mchog rgya phrag tod gis rgyan pa'i lus dang ldan yang / dbul ba thams cad kyi tshul yongs su ton pa rtag tu kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i las dge ba s+yad kyang // sems can dmyal ba dang / byol so ngo gi skye gnas
178b3(1): dang shin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba yongs su tonod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog thob kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus las gyen tu ma g.yos pa dag se/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar
178b4(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes mu myed pa dang ldan pas/ de'i phyir de dag nyan thos dparang sangs rgyas kyis kya pa 'ong du chud par dka' na/ sems can byis pa gzhan gis lha mos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni byang chub sem
178b5(1): rapa'i chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// kye rgyal pa'i sras byang chub semasadapal rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang / da ldan pa ste/ las shin tu dag par 'apyod cing srog gcod pa dang bral ba
178b6(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong zhing / 
178b7(1): sems can thams cad kyi sdug sngal gi phung po rang gi lus kyis len par mkhas pas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi gyi skye gnas dang / shin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug sngal sems can gi don tu yongs su skyo ba myed pa'i sems dang ldan zhing
178b8(1): sems can gi khams thams cad grol ba la zhugs pa/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyis che zhing yongs su yongs skyed pa la chags la myed pa'i yid dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems can rnams sdug sngal gi phung po las grol la mngon par tshon pa sa
178b9(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar snying rje chen pa'i stobs yongs su myi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa e/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// kye rgyal po'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams
179a1(1): ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing mthong na dga' ba si/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gi mgon po thams cad kyis phyag bya ba// 'gro ba rnams cad mthong bar smon pa/ sems can thams cad
179a2(1): mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan 'dag se// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sngon nas las kyi mtha' la na ma tho ba myed pa dang ldan zhing yongs su dag pa'i las kyi tshul gyis 'gyod pas
179a3(1): de'i phyir de dag mthong bas 'gro ba thams cad myi ngoms pa yin// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar 'gro ba thams cad mthong par dga' ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos
179a4(1): 'dres pa brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems brtan pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i go cha shin tu bgos pas// de dag ji ltar nyon mongs shing byis pa'i skye bo'i 'bru 'dzi dang
179a5(1): ji ltar nyen tam Ta/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyis nang du ji ltaradabyen kyang rung ste// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che bzangamed po 'ongang bsdam pa de 'jig rten par myi byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras rje
179a6(1): ni 'di lta ste dper Da/ nor bu rin la me chen po byam pa'ang po zhes bya ba su dang byed pa ni// pad ma 'i jib du ji ltar brnoms kyang rung me/ nang du bcu nanor bu rin ze Na'i 'odagasas zhing bza' ba de nyid rnam par myi 'aspong ste/ hu cu rtsa
179a7(1): chu de thams cad kyang 'a rtog pa byed par rab tu dang bar byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chul sems dpal yang byis pa'i skye bo 'i 'du 'i ji lta bu sen kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa pa'i sems rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing sA bzang ba
179a8(1): chud zos par myi byed de/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa de las zlog cing thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems rim po che'i 'od gsal zhing snang ba de nyid la rab tu 'god do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ji ltar nyon mongs
179a9(1): par gyurd kyang rung // byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzi dang ji ltar en ta ma/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar phyi nad kyang rung e/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che de nyid 'jigs par myi byed pa de ni sangs rgyas
179a10(1): kyi chos ma 'dres pa e/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi yul gi ye shes chos la dbang pa'i pha ro sarba tu phyind pa dam po wo Ta se/ rang 'byun
179b1(1): gi ye shes kyi dbang sbyar pas dbang sbyar zhing go phed skyon myed pa la gnas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas pa ring tu myi spong zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa la rim 'gro bya ba'i rgyan myi gcod de/ de ltar tshul phun gsum tshogs pa dang 'gro ba thams
179b2(1): da du dge ba'i shes gnyem sten pa las phyir myi ldog cing de bzhin gshegs pa la rim 'gro bya ba rgyun myi gcod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa se/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
179b3(1): bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ma 'dres pa bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag
179b4(1): ni byang chul sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rtenagi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i lam dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i las dang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'grogs thams cad
179b5(1): dang me pa'i tha ci byab sa pa dang / sem sa pa sa dbas cad sas su phyin par bya na'i sas dang / na'ongs pa'i byas s+ho/ nakyi phyi yi pa'i shAmajug par yongs su zung ba'i las dang / 
179b6(1): 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du 'gro yang / 'jig rten gi khams cig nas myigaye' ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi sa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i'od zer gyel ba'i 'od kyi las dang / pad ma'i snying po la byang chub
179b7(1): sems dpa'i gzugs 'khod pa yongs su bstan pa'i 'od zer gi las dang // mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsan pa bzung bas dkon mchog gsum gi rigs rgyun myi gcod pa'i las dang / 'jig
179b8(1): rten thams cad du rgyu zhing chos bstan pa dang / sems can gdul ba yang dag par sgrub pa'i yul pa'i las dang // nam 'dod pa dang nam sems snyed pa na smon lam yongs su rdzogs par sems can la yang dag par sond pa'i byin
179b9(1): kyi rlabs kyi las so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las e/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs po'i phrin las rgya chen po bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba
179b10(1): dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus so// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad tu byung ba myed pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa myed pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad
180a1(1): sa/ 'gro ba thams cad du myi dmyigs pa myed pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis dmyigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni bden pa ma yin no// 
180a2(1): 'jig rten gi bden par rnam par dmyigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus rdzun pa ma yin pa'o// phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gyus myi 'chad pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni rgyun myi zad pa'o// bdud thams cad
180a3(1): kyis kyi bshigs pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni brtan tha ma/ bdud kyi rgol pa thams cad kyis myi sprul pas byang chub sems da pa'i lus ni u ba mo// bsod nams rgya ba'i mtshan gyis shin tu rnam pam dag par sgru
180a4(1): bas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi mtshan nyid myed pa'i mthar thug pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan nyid myed pa'o// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
180a5(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas byang chub semasadad pa'i lus ni kun tu song ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sus te/ de dag la gnas
180a6(1): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku myi zad pabla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di das ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi sas
180a7(1): te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gi khams thams cad yus cig gis brgyas par dgengs pa'i lus kyi las dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du sgo yongs su ton pa'i lus kyi las dang / skye ba thams
180a8(1): bya gnas pa'i lus kyi las dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams tu 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang nga / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad las pa cig gis kun tu
180a9(1): khebs par byed pa'i lus kyi las dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lag pa cig gis nyug pa'i lus kyi las dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rang gi lus/ 'dzind pa dang / 'byung ba yongs su com pa'i lus/ 
180a10(1): kyi las dang / sems can gi khams thams cad lus cig gis yongs su 'dzind pa'i lus kyisas dang / sems can gi khams thams cad lus myed par khong du chud pas/ zhi nga yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs
180b1(1): ba kun tu tond pa'i lus kyi las so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi lus kyi las te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gro ba kun gyis rnam
180b2(1): par rig par bya ba bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ bcu gang zhe ma/ 'di ltar nan tan dang bral bas pha rolab tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
180b3(1): dadang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su myi gtong bas sdu ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug sngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len kyang yongs su myi skye bas snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba
180b4(1): thams cad yongs su skyeb pas byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba/ thams/ nye bar mtshol bas bsod nams kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang cig tu/ 'dres pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang / skye
180b5(1): ba'i skye ched thams cad thams cad las 'das pas chos kyi rang bzhin dang / thams cad du sgo yongs su tond pas thams cad kyi/  rang bzhin dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad
180b6(1): yongs su son pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang / nam 'dod pa'i dusasu mngon par rdzogs pam 'tshang rgya bas byang chub kyi rang bzhin/ no// / kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag mi byang chub sems #
180b7(1): dpal rlabs kyi rang bzhin te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpal rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin bla na myed pathob par 'gyur ba ras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag mi
180b8(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dag ste// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bde bar byed yas byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni 'jam pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems im par byed pas bya
180b9(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snyan pa'o// yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni myi rtun pa'o// rmi lam na yang log par mye smra bas la byang chub sems
180b10(1): dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'dren rdo rdzas su 'brab ba ma// rgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten gi mgon po thams cad zil kyis gnon pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rgya che ba'o// chos kyi rang bzhin ngo so
181a1(1): bas/ byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ngag ni zab mo'i dbyangs su grag pa'o// dus dang las dang rnam par smyin pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su sonod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab ni rnam
181a2(1): pa tha dad pa'o// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod pa la 'jug par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'gro ba thams cad la 'gol ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
181a3(1): rnams kyi ngag ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag so// kye khyal ba'i snas byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de yang las rnam par
181a4(1): dag pa bcus yongs su sbyangs pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la mos par yongs su dag pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i sngon ma thos pa la mngon par yongs su dag pa dang / 'gro/ 
181a5(1): ba thams cad kyi yid du myi 'ong ba'i tshig yongs su sbyangs pas yongs su dag pa dang / sngon gyi mthar dag gi nges bzhi' dang bral par yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba dang mos pa chen pos
181a6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par tong pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra chenabos de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa yang dang par ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa 'dzod/ nyudu tu
181a7(1): bas yongs su dag pa dang / bam ma 'a thag pas sems can gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pas yongs su dag pa dang / klu'i dbyangs dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkril ba'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
181a8(1): la mngon par bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon gsum du chos thos nas/ rang gi lus dbul bas yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos smra ba thams cad las
181a9(1): chos thos nas 'am/ 'gro bya ba'i bdag dbul zhing snying thag pa nas yongs su gtod pas yongs su dag pa se// kye/ rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni las rnam par dag pa bcu po de dag gis shin tu sbyangs par 'byung
181a10(1): ngogakye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas/ de yab yongs su 'dzin la bcus yongs su bzung bas 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sna'i dbang po la sogs pa
181b1(1): thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'byung ba yin/ klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gi dbang po dang / dri ba'i dbang po dang / ska ma yin gi dbang po dang / nam kha lding gi dbang po dang / myi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / 
181b2(1): phye chen po'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po langs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'byung ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang khri la sogs pa chos pa'i thams
181b3(1): cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'byung ba yin te/ kye rgyal kha'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni yongs su 'dzin pa bcu po de dag gis/ shin tu 'byung ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de ltar shin tu bzung bar
181b4(1): 'gyur la de yang dgos la bcu yongs su khrul bar byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mngon 'am dga' bar byed do// 'jig ten gi khams su go bar byed do// dbang po'i khams la 'jug 'jug par
181b5(1): byed do// mos pa'i khams rnam par dag par byed do// nyon mongs pa'i khams gsel bar byed do// bag chags kyi khams spong bapa/ byed do// bsam 'di khams spyod par byed do// ldag pa'i bsam
181b6(1): mas nab par 'bar par bya na/ rab mas rgyas pa bya sa 'das pa mas yang dag par rtogs pa byedanas pa cu ba dngas yongs su tho#
181b7(1): sras bcu po so de dag mi byang sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ bcu gang zhe 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin ci rton pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems mi sa lta bu'o/ sangs rgyas thams cad
181b8(1): kyi ye shes bya chen po'i mthil dang dbus byed pa thugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni mya mchol lta bu'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu yo la yang 'gro ba thams cad rab bye dmod pa'i phyir/ 
181b9(1): byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems ni ri bo chen po lta bu 'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i myed cing bsam pa dag pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems nor bu rin po che lta bu'o// chos thams cad la rab tu no// 
181b10(1): bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rdo rje lta bu'o// bdud dang mu segs can gzhan dang phas kyis rgol/ ba thams cad kyis myi sprul pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni ri'i rgyal po rdo rje khor yug shin tu/ 
182a1(1): btan zhing myi shigs pa lta bu'o// 'jig rten gi chos thams cad kyis myi gos pas/ byang chub sems dpal rnams gi sems ni pad ma lta bu'o// skal pa thams cad du 'byung ba dang mthong bar dka'
182a2(1): bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni me tog u tum 'bar ra lta bu'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyis rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag dang rab rib kyi rmugs pa sel ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems zhi
182a3(1): nyi ma lta bu'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyis 'dzod du myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi sems zhi bar snang lta bu 'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ de dag la gnas
182a4(1): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs rgya chen po yongs su dge pa bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur pa dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems snyed pa
182a5(1): sebacu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgrol kha bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems skyed do// sems can da thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gsal bar bya'o zhes byang chub se mAs
182a6(1): dpal sems skyed do// bags chags kyi tshams 'bres pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems spyod do// chos thams cad la ba com myed pa thob par skyem zhes byang chub log rkyen
182a7(1): dpa' sems skyed do// sems can thams cad kyi sdug sAl gi phung po rab rtu po zhi bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems snyed do// ngan song dpo myi khonas pa thams cad gcod par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'
182a8(1): sems skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems skyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i sla ba pa ya na na tan tu bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems skyed do/ 
182a9(1): bla'i sbubs su 'jug pa thams cad ma sus pa 'gro ba thams cad tu sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub tu 'tshab rgya gsan par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems skyed do// 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang
182a10(1): dbang po rab tu rtogs pas/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu grags par bya bar chos kyi dza bA na myed pa brdung par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems skyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub
182b1(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skyed pa yi// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya chen po 'i phrin las bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag 'o// ta/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
182b2(1): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / mtha' dang
182b3(1): dbus myed pa khong du chud pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / skad cig tug tu 'dzud pas chus gsum thams cad rgyas par dag ba dang / gshegs pa dang skye ba dang 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'tshang
182b4(1): rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das tshe chen po madron gsum tu shes pas sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du rgyas par dag pa pa dang / bag chags dang / dbang po nam kha la lte bur khor tu chud pas
182b5(1): sems can gi khams thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams/ cad 'o du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldanadapas myig g.yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang
182b6(1): sgyu ma'i dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa lta bu khyod du chud pas mtha' dang dbus myed pa rgyas par dag pa dang / rang bzhin myi dmyigs pas myi skye bar rgyas par dgang ba dang / rang gi sems dang gnan
182b7(1): bi sems la thogs pa myed pas chags pa myed par rgyas par dag pa ga dang / sems skyed pa thams cad la mngom pa 'jigs par byang chub bo yongs su son pas dbang gis rgyas par dag pa 'a'o// kye rgyal
182b8(1): ba'i sras bcu po de dgra ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi sems kyis rgyas par dag pa pa se// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpal rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rgyas par dbang ga/ mtha
182b9(1): rang dbus byed pa'i rgyan bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ste// bcu gang len 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad
182b10(1): mthong par dad pa phyir ldog pa myed pas byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi dbang po ni dga' bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
183a1(1): rabs pa mi mngon par mos pan bya ba thams cad ma thogs pa skyed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang za ni byar mya ldan 'am// byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa thams cad rgyud phyir ci/ 
183a2(1): pa'i phying byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po mi gnas la me/ shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa'i chul khong du chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi dbang po ni pra la 'o// sems pas thams kyi nganapa pa
183a3(1): yongs su grub par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rgyan myi chad pa ze/ chos thams capas rab tu rna pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi dbang po ni rdo rje sa bu'o// de bzhin gshegs
183a4(1): thams cad kyi yul snang ba thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi dbang po ni rdo rje'i 'od phro ba ltar srung bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang lus cig tu gyu dad pas// byang chub
183a5(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po na tha myi dad pa'o// de bzhin gshesapa'i stobs kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir byang chub sems da dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni chags pa myed pa'i shA rang byin pa pa ma
183a6(1): kye rgyal ba'i sras de ra bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnamasakyi dbang po se// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po rgya chen tho yongs/ huSh+Tatu
183a7(1): su rdzogs kha bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal za'i sA sa bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam bA se/ bcu ga zhen/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
183a8(1): bsam pa 'jig rten gi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa/ nyan thos/ de pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la khya ba dang mdzes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
183a9(1): pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes su 'byung ba'i lam dang mthun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa 'du
183a10(1): dang mu stegs can gzhan dang mu stegs spyod pa'i rgol ba thams cad kyis myi phrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye ges kyi dkyil 'khor gis rnam par dag
183b1(1): pas kun nas nyon mongs pa/ myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa chos ji skad tu thos pa yongs su myi mthong bas shin tu zin par yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khas pa
183b2(1): skye ba'i te/ ched thams cad kyis ma gos pa yongs su nyams pa myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ye shes phra ga la zhugs pa'i phyir zab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi
183b3(1): chos thams cad la shin tu brtson pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsame pa e/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa pa'i dgongs par bla na myed pa
183b4(1): cad bsags pa la phyir myi ldog par dbang sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i tshul a nad pa la nem nur myed pa dang / byang chub
183b5(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam la smon lam dang 'apyod pachen po'i rgyun yongs su 'dzin pa/ dang / byang chub sems/ dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas thams cad la !
183b6(1): 'jug par byang ba la phul du phyind pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ldog pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbangasbyar pa mngon gsum du sbyar ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
183b7(1): kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa chos sna tshogs kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs pas rgya che ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa brtsams pa thams cad zer da phyind par byed pas gcol po byu dad pa dang / byang chub
183b8(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi ldag pa'i bsam pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan thams cad la dbang sgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon gi
183b9(1): smon lag gis yongs su bzung bas shin tu brtan pa dang // byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi sdug pa'i bsam pa sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang gdul ba la rgyan gyi 'chang bsgo// kye rgyal ba'i sras
184a1(1): dbyapa 'i da ni byang ma pas smra rnams kyi'amam pa te/ de nyal pan shi nga 'i sems das phams kyangs rgya sde kyi sa pa kyi ma sa yang dag 'dus skye
184a2(1): 'gyur ba dag go// / shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo la sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba / bam po nyi shu pa / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba se/ 
184a3(1): bcu ga pa zhe na/ 'di ltar rnam par smin pa la re ba myed par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i sbyor ba dang / gzhan la gnas pa myed pas byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi tshul
184a4(1): khrims dang / bslab la rang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / sdom pa dang rtul zhugs dang // dka' thub thams cad tu yid dam bcus pa A nan tan du byed pa'i sbyor ba dang / bdag dang pha rol gi 'du shes byed
184a5(1): bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / gshepa thams cad rnal zin cing sems can gi ngan tu byas pa thams cad bzod pa'i sbyor ba dang / lus dang ngag dang sems tha
184a6(1): dag par skul yas brtsams pa thams cad thar phyin pa'i sbyor bsabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams cad las phyir myi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang / 'dobo pa'i 'jug pa dang
184a7(1): nyon mongs pa'i khayog 'khor yongs su myi spong bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsem gtan dang rnam par thar da pa dang/ ting nge 'dzind dang // snyoms par 'jug pa dang // mngon par shes pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i
184a8(1): sbyor ba dang / bsod nams la sogs pa thams cad la skyo ba myed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi nan tan gi sbyor ba dang / sems can myed pa la zhugs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i
184a9(1): chen po'i sbyor ba dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gis dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug sngal rang gi lus kyis lend pa'i snying rje chen po las phyir myi ldos pa sbyong ba dang / chags
184a10(1): ba myed par khong du chud pas 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i sbyor ba dang / sems can/ gzhan gi rgyud du phyin par byed pas
184b1(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir myi ldog pa'i sbyor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba ste// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems
184b2(1): dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i sbyor ba bla na myed pa thob par 'gyur drag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sgrub
184b3(1): bar dka' ba'i dge ba'i khra kha sbyor bas rlabs po che'i mos pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pas sna tshogs kyi mos pa dang / id zhum pa myed pas rgya chen po'i mos pa dang / chos zab mo'i tshul la zhugs las
184b4(1): zhi bar byed pa'i mos pa dang / sems rgya chen po skyed pas yangs pa'i mos pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu' dang ldan pas shugs su ldan pas rang gi skabs phye ba'i mos pa dang / bdud kyi las thams
184b5(1): cad rab tu 'joms pas myi 'phrogs pa'i mos pa dang / las kyi rnam na par smin pa la cig tu nges pas shin tu gdon myi za ba'i mos nga pa dang ci 'dod pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su ston pas mngon tu 'gyur
184b6(1): pa'i mos pa dang/ stobs dang myi ldan pa skyed pa'i phyir chus gang tu'adod pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lung gnad pa yang dag pa ma gnod pa'i #
184b7(1): mos pa'o// kye rgyal da'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa yi// de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpal rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa bla na myed pa thob pa
184b8(1): 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gi khams thams cad 'jis
184b9(1): ten 'i khams cig tu mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rteg gi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgya mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pad mo'i gdan cig la zhugs pa'i de
184b10(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su khyab par mos pa ma 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad na mkha'i rang bzhin du yang dag par gsan par mos pa la/ 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad sangs
185a1(1): rgyas kyi rgyan gyis rgyan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis rgyas par gang lar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams
185a2(1): thams cad sgra'i sbungs cig tu dgod par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gri khams thams cad sems can cig gi lus kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang dar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad de bzhin
185a3(1): gshegs pa cig gi byang chub kyi shing dang // de bzhin gshegs cig gi snying po byang chub kyis yongs su rgyas par gang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gigyi khams thams cad du sgra'i dbyangs cig gis go bar bya ba dang
185a4(1): sems can gi khams thams cad kyi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa laM 'jug pas tshimakhar bya bar mos pa lang 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi
185a5(1): khams su mos pa la 'jug pa e// de la gnas shing byang chuban sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas/ kyi zhing la mos pa bA na myed pa thob par 'gyur ba rab bo// kye
185a6(1): rgyal ba'i slas pa n+ye po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisems can gi khams su mos pa la 'jus pa e/ bcu gang zhen// 'di ltar sems can gi khams thams cad 'ang !
185a7(1): bzhin gis lus myed par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad sems can cig gi lus kyi rgyud du 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems tsam gi khams thams cad byang chub sems
185a8(1): dpa'i khong tu 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang // sems can gi khams thams cad du sems can cig gi lus
185a9(1): yongs su zhugs par 'gyur bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod tu mos pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi/ khams thams cad brgya byin dang / 'tshangs pa/ 
185a10(1): dang / 'jig rten gi mgon po dang / ci 'dod pa dang / bar mos pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang cha byed du mngon par/ lta bar mos pa la 'jug pa/ dang sems krI khams thams cad nyan thos dang rang sangs
185b1(1): rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog dang cha byang chu yongs su btan par mos pa la/ 'jug pa dang / sems can gi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gis yongs su rgyan par byin kyis rlab cing yongs su
185b2(1): snyan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang 5/ sems// khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po dang / gzugs kyi sku lnga tshogs kyi 'khyod lam dang tshul dang 'aspyod pa
185b3(1): yongs su na cing gzhan gis zhig par bya ba mos pa la 'jug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gi khams u me sa pa la 'jug pa e/ be dag la
185b4(1): gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgyes pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba bla na myed pa thob par byed pa dag po kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams
185b5(1): kyis / lus kre nis bya kyitechags dang /  'ims / sem sas sbyin pa smra ba'i 'as
185b6(1): lcags dang / 'jig rten gi khams yongs su dag par skye ba'i bag chags dang / spyod pa'i khag chags dang / smon lam gi bag chags dang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i bag chags dang / chos mnyam pa nyid nges
185b7(1): dar rtogs pa'i bag chags dang / skyed pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bag chags so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpal rnams
