220a4(1): dpal rnams snying po byang chub tu dong ba dang / gom pa dor ba dang bdeg pa thams cad chu ting nge 'dzin gi sgo la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig skad cigabacu rnam kar 'tshang rgya ba las kyi 'das ba'i phyir/ bya ba chub sems dpas
220a5(1): nams snying po byang chub tu dong ba dang / swa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / swa ma yin dang // nam mkha' snying dang / mI 'am tsi/ dang / lto bye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
220a6(1): mgon po mas cad gyi mdzad pa drang byer/ byang chub sems dpa gsas nying 'i byang chub tu dong pa dang / sa pa skyed pa'i 'ashes rnams nas par bye 'i byang dubasem pa nas kyang ba spyang pas yin/ 
220a7(1): rten gi khams thams cad rna pA par lta ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing phyogs thams cad su rnam par phye ba'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub yongs su snand pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub
220a8(1): rtsa dong ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba sems cag 'jal ba'i dbang gi phyir yongs su snyan pa dag go//  nad tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdol/ sangs/ 
220a9(1): rgyas yal po che zhes bya ba bam po nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa// kye rgyal bang+ge brasu po/ 'di dag ni byad skems dpa' rnams kyi snying mo byang chub la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gi khams thams cad rab tu skyed cing / 
220a10(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'khod 'o// 'jig rten gi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed cing byang chub sems
220b1(1): dpal rnams snying po byang chub la 'khoran/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad rdo rje li rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing byang chub sems dpal rnams snying po byang chub sa 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la rnam par
220b2(1): lta zhing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// yid nam mkha' dang mnyam kha la rnam par myi rtog cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po bya ba chug la 'khod do// ji ltar mthun pa'i lus dang 'khyod la mam yongs su ston pa
220b3(1): cing byang chub sems dpal rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod de/ rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin da rjes su rtog par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chubs 'khod do// de bzhis gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin rlangs
220b4(1): rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// bdag gi dge ba'i tshe ba'i thus 'gro ba thams cad byin kyis rlog cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub sa 'khod do// 
220b5(1): kye rgyas pa'i sras bcu po lade dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying pobyang chub la 'jug pa'o// kye rgyas pa'i sras byang chub sems da dpa' rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchogs 'khod nas kyang ngo tshar rmad
220b6(1): tu byung ba'i chos lasu byar ste// bcunang zhen ste nyal ba'i sras des snying zong / byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i snang chub sems dpa' rnams la te 'jig rten gi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de lazhin gshegs pa
220b7(1): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstand te/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhingakye ded dpon rgyal bar gyurd/ cig/ rgyalal bar gyur dacig ces gsung brjod de/ 'di ni ngo tshar ma du byung ba'i chos
220b8(1): dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog sa 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob pa Ang dag par mdzad de 'di ni ngo tshor rmar du 'byung ba'i
220b9(1): chos gnyis pa'o// k+She rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog a 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ sngon skan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs ste/ byang chub sems dpal de dag la kun nas
220b10(1): bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par bskya ba ste/ 'di ni ngo tshararmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'ji
221a1(1): rtag gi kham sa thams cad kyi cha dang ges pa dang sdong po dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod ko lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'jug cing phyag tshal te/ 'di ni do tshar rmad rtsa byung ba'i chos 'azhi pa'i
221a2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i phyed pa khams cad las yang dag par 'dal ba'i ma'ang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin la dron su 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams ca
221a3(1): sa yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo tshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o// kye rgyas pa'i sras rgya tsho'i mchog gi dam pa dri ma myed cing ku nas sdeng la 'od gsal ba'i sna'i snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpal
221a4(1): nam sa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen pos kun nus yog par 'gyur te// 'di ni de tshar mad tu byung ba'i chos chug pa'okye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub
221a5(1): sems dpanya rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba shi nad tu rgya chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams
221a6(1): gyur ba dan 'tshar ma byung ba'i chos gdun pa 'o/ kyi rgyal pa'i sras nyid la byang chub mchogs 'dod pa'i byang sems dpa' rnam po ye shes mchog gis sems can tham pa ca kyi/ 6
221a7(1): bsam pa dang dbang po dang byed pa mngon tu gyur pa te/ 'di ni ngo tshar mad tu byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shinan du rnam par dag pa
221a8(1): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da mngon tu gyu rad te/ ting nge/ 'dzin de thob ma thag rgyanam mkha'i dbyings tshad myed pa dang / rtsas gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kug nas gnas par gyur das/ 'di sa ngo tshar rad rdza
221a9(1): byung la'i chos dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub sachos ya 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi lus kyi las drus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing ye shes chen po chags pa myed pa rdul
221a10(1): dang bral ba'i ldeng ba dang ldan par rgyu nad te/ 'di ni ngo tshar rmad du gyung ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal bu'il sras bsu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ngo tshar mang du byang ba'i chos nams te byang chub sems
221b1(1): dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyas pa'i sras don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang / dag par mthong nas/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'jug pa'i byang chub
221b2(1): sems dpa' bcud 'tshul la ston te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa na zab mo dang g.yul la mos dpa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid
221b3(1): yang dag par snyand pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i brgyad 'dus pa ston to// yid gnyis dang ye com rgya 'gyur ba'i myi dang lda rnams kyi yid gnyis dang the com gcad pa'i phyir bcud 'dus pa smon to// brgyad kyi de
221b4(1): yongs su sbyis par bya ba'i phyir brgyad 'dul ba ston da to// zab mo dang sa yul la mos pa'i lha dang myi rnams kun nas bsdug dang / kun nas 'drus pa'i lha dang myi rnams 'phrul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dus pa ljonan
221b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thung ba myed pa yongs su stan dan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston pa // sems can gzhan mosame shing spo bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// phyi ma'i skye bo
221b6(1): nams pa snying rtse ba'i phyir bcud 'phrul pa ston to// snying po byang chub kyi kha gi bcud kyi las/ yongs su stand pa dang / byang chubasems dpal bdud kyi las thams cad las 'das pa yongs
221b7(1): stand pa'i phyir bcud 'dul ba ston te/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis nyams smad cing stobs myed par byas pa yongs su stan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag par stan
221b8(1): pa'i phyir brgyad 'argyal ba ston to/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa dag chos nyid rjes su 'breng bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i bdud 'dus pa ston to// kye rgyas pa'i sras
221b9(1): don bcu po de dag gi dbang mthob pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jud/ 'phrul ba ston do// kye rgyal la'i sras don bcu po 'di dgoni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par
221b10(1): rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyas pa'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jud dang las/ der nyon rmongs pa thams las 'das zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su
222a1(1): rdzogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin// byang chub sems dpa'i bas gtan 'byam klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad
222a2(1): yang dag par bsams pa yin/ chos snang ba rnam par spyad par bya ba thams cad gi nad tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khru khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin// sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang dbyangs su ldan
222a3(1): ba yin byin kyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyis rlabs pa yin/ 'das pa dang mabyon pa dang sngar 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dpa gsung dang dgongs pa rnas par gyi rtog pa thob pa yin/ skad cig TIg gis rus
222a4(1): gsulags par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin / 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa phyin/ zag pa
222a5(1): bad pa shes pa ma shes pa'i bar gi stobs dang yang ldan pa yin te/ k+She rgyal ba'i srasabacu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegasadon pa'i stobs mngon par rdzog par byang chub pa ste/ rmobs bcu po de dag dang
222a6(1): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'grol/ kye bral la'i sras de ltar mngos par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma ca
222a7(1): gi chos kyi 'khom me chen po rnam pa bcur bsko'i ta/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / so so/ yang dag par rig pa lazhi'i sgra rjes su bklags pa dang / bden pa la zho'i tshul gyis shi nang khu ba dgas pa
222a8(1): dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thadad pa sgribs pa myed pa'i rjes su gsod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dgal bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa myed cing blta bar dka' sa g.yol pa skyed cing sdug bsngal yigasal shing 'byin pa dang / 
222a9(1): sngon ni snying rje chen po la byin kyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig nyen gi khams thams cad rgya grags pa dang/ bskal dpa grangs myed par chos ston pa rgyan myi 'chad ya/ dang / dbang po dag / stobs dang / byang chub kyi sanas ga dngang / bsam gta
222a10(1): dang / rnam khar thard pa dang // ting nge 'dzin pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang legs par spyad pas bskor ba 'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sngornam pa lecu po de dag la sogs pa rnams tshad myed par de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'kho
222b1(1): lo bskor 'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sra sa de bzhin gshegs pa dgral bcom la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan ga sems gi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus phrogs pa myed pa dang mdo/ 
222b2(1): bar 'gyub ba skyed par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhen 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gi khams thams cad myi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul la khas ma pa ji
222b3(1): sta ba bzhin du stond pa dang / dus la yab pathob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin tu myi 'khrul pa dang // dus gsum shes par bya ba reg tu rtogs pa/ dang / lus gi dbang zil gyis myi gnon pa dang // tshig gi dab dmyigs par dkal
222b4(1): ba dang / 'ashes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa / kye rgyas po'i smras chos dkar bon sa pa la cu me de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yab dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byams kyi 'bar lo sems cas gzhan
222b5(1): gi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa myed pa dang / mngon par myed par 'byung b.ra'agyur ba'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las de rdzogs par mdzad zin pa 'ide bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
222b6(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas yongs sumya ngas las 'das pa mem zhen te/ bcu gang zhen 'di ska yang dag par jis ga bzhin rgya tu byed byinan pa yongs su las sa
222b7(1): pa dang / chus byas khams cad med pa san tu kyi rung bar gnad pa dang / mya ngas las 'ongs pa'i phyogs bde 'ar 'grogs 'jigs pa dang zags pa khams cad dade bral ba yang dag pa ldan pa dang / gzugs kyi lus sa zha la
222b8(1): labang khyernams la gzugs kyi sus kyi rtag pa nyid kya yar dag par gagad pa dang / chos kyi skul yang dag par gyur ba dpa rna ma par 'gyur ba'i brdu byiran gyi glegs pas yangs su sa de ba dang / 'a bye lams tsam 'a da dazung byu na
222b9(1): ma chung mi mams sa mthams thams pas rgyal pa'i sa sad rgyas bco ldan las na rgyas la
223a1(1): mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo/ shin tu skor te/ 'dul ba thams sad shin tu 'dul nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin rtse lung sta dad par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa myed
223a2(1): pa'i 'o// 'pha yongs su mya ngan las 'das ba chen po yongs su mya ngas las 'da'o// kye rgyal po'i sras don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa skyed pan
223a3(1): zho 'bang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to/ kye rgyas pa'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su myosbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi spos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs
223a4(1): tham/ don chad myed la khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o/  mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa le// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang smon lam chen po rgyun myi 'chad par byed pa'o// sems can gang gis 'di thos 'a
223a5(1): 'gyur te/ zos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par 'gyuranas kyang nan tan gis yang dag par sgrub pa de dag thams cad myur rnyen tu bla na myed pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon yar 'tshang rgya bar
223a6(1): 'gyur na/ kye rgyas pa'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chuba'i bye chub sems dpa' nan myur byed pa rnams kyis grub kyi nan can dang kyi ldan sa rnams kyim yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub
223a7(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhan tan la gnas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang // yon tan gi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mya wa 'i'i me tog chos kyi sgothams cad la ya dag
223a8(1): ngam gzhom la/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gi lam thams cad las sayang dag par 'das pa/ nyag zos dang rang rgyas thams cad kyisas dang bral bu 'gro ba thams cad dang mthun 'oms yin pa chos thams cad kyi sgo ldang bar byed pa 'gro ba/ 
223a9(1): thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di rim 'gror byas te mnyan par bya'o// blang bar bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// yongs su 'azung nas kyang nges par rtogs pa'i spos
223a10(1): yongs su sbyang ba dang smon sam mngon pade sgrub pa la tshon par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar chon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no// 'jig rten las
223b1(1): 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sker yang dag par gnos pa'i chos kyi na ma grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bu dang chos kyi nas zang 'di'i chos nyid thob bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi 'ams med byed grangs/ 
223b2(1): byed pa rnams rab tu gsos par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal khar 'gyur re// phyogs bcu 'i sangs rgyas bcomam ldan 'das kyang dgyes par 'gyur ce byas
223b3(1): chug segs dpa' kun tu bza po la zhal stan danas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i bu legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'jig des las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i lesu byang chub
223b4(1): sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sen tan gi 'byung gnas don nas par gdon kyi bu'i me ton chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gnos pa ye shes kyi zhes 'jug pa/ 'jig den gyi lam 'ayas pams sa yang dag par 'das pa ga pa
223b5(1): zos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi a ma dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mthun mong ma yin pa / chos thams cad kyi sgo snar yar/ dbyed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge
223b6(1): ba'i tha la rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di stand pa ni rgyal ba'i lu khyod kyis chos 'di dag la legs par slabs pas shi nad tu byangab ste/ rgal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi khyin rlabs dang / mthus mos la'i
223b7(1): chos kyi nam grangs 'di legs yar bshad de/ nged kyis kyang bsngags sa// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par po sngags so// / kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di da sngar dang
223b8(1): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir nged kyis byin kyis rlab pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po kun tu babang pos/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan
223b9(1): rlabs kyis phyogs bcun smras te/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor khams cad la ltas nas chos kyi/ dbyings yams cad du bltas te/ de 'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
223b10(1): stong du brtul zhugs dka' smad pa// / gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba/ khrag khrig sko pa las byung ba'i chos kyi sras// gang rnams de dag sems can bye la khrag khrig steng rnams byang chub rab 'god pa / dpe' zhwa
224a1(1): myed pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshang gis che cig mnyan par byos pa// gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas myi gnas pa/ gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'dre
224a2(1): ba thar khyed sems can/ 'du shes myi gnas dang // gang rnams/ de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang / yon tan myi gnas pa// de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa 'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par byed pa/ gang rnams de
224a3(1): dag srid pa gsun na las dang / nyon mongs bcud kyi dbang sor snang // glang rnams de dag pags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa stond pa po// gar rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pazhi zhing rab zhe
224a4(1): 'gro ba rnams le 'byod pa'i rim pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya/ gang nams de dag brgyad g.yol 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dra bar byed pa'agro ba thams cad las sprul pa sna tshogs wa dad
224a5(1): mtha' yas rab tu ston da// sems skyed gyur da ma zhag tu gnas dang / 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad stond byed pa// de dag yon tan sna/ tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya/ 
224a6(1): srid pa'i rgyan ga sems can thug ba sngal nyen cing skye dang zhabs gzir bar / mi nga bya ngan dag gis gces ging gnord byas nyon mongs sun bya dru ga zir mthong nas// de dag la rad par bya byed ting rje bya sheg skyed/ babs
224a7(1): nas ye shes mchog 'gor ba// de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam ba shud kyis che cig mnyan par gis// ga sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dgal bar bsam gtan las la yang rnam par chen// shes rang thabs
224a8(1): kyil ro la da byin da cod khyams dang snying rje ldag pa'i bsam kha dang // dga' ba 'i chos la rtson zhing / btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang 'khyod spyad pa// de dag spyad ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon 'das bstan dkyis
224a9(1): de dag nyog// gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig skong gis lus skems pa// gang rnams byang chubazhi ba tshol phyir/ srog la lta ba skyed par 'gyur ba dang // gang narnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag pa
224a10(1): ga gi la de la mye tshol ba/ byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan/ thub la de dag kun kyi skyod mchog brjod par bya// rgya/ mtsho'i chu thigs 'grangs par re nas thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi// de dag yon tan skal da pa
224b1(1): bye ba khrag khrig khya la stong khya brjod byas kyang // dpe' tsam bya bar myi nus legs par brjod cing bas na yar myi nus 'od kyang go// sems ldan pa'i don tu sangs rgyas yul rnams bsand par bya ba mnyas par byos /  gang dag / 
224b2(1): pa zhams kyi/ don phyir dge ba kun 'dzind dkar po 'phel byed kyang // mtho bar myi sems dmal par sems myed myi dma' chos tshol ngoms par yod myi 'gyur// 'gro ba kun gnas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtshol chen shes rab
224b3(1): shing sdong ste// ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin/ byams pa'i rlan yin snying rje ma po dga' ba sdo po brtan pa sdom la ste/ phe ba ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang po kho tog me tog yon tan/ 
224b4(1): can// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can// dgar byed pa// de dang de dag pad ma lta bur 'dus byas mgos 'gro ba rnams la snang / sa bon mos pa la gzhi 'a bsam pa khyams
224b5(1): kyi king+ga rtsa 'phrul bya 'khor de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po 'i ngas ka/ rims kyis dkar sa ngas yongs su spel galus yin dben pa rnams ni zhangapa ste/ dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mdo yin ral
224b6(1): rnam par grol ba dge/ stong pa don dam sul dang phugs/ yin byams dang snying rje dag ni myi gnyis te// de dag seng ge lta bur bdag myed sgra 'byin 'dud sde rab tu rlag par byed// 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor bu'i 'brog mgon nyon
224b7(1): mongs myi zad khyams 'gyur te// bcud kyi bya a rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs gyur da pa// lam ni rab stor da myi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag gis// lam gi mtha / 
224b8(1): khrid 'jig pa myed pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god// 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad tub cing // yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug sngal dag la gzhol zhing spug lngal 'ab
224b9(1): 'bar ba// sems can mthong nas/ snying rje skyed de nyon mongs pa'i nad pa kun gsol zhing // nad nams zhi bar byed pa stor phrag rgya bcu ma bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston pa// rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams
225a1(1): dkar snagro la chos stond pa// sdig pa spangs la dge bar snyen ci de sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces// gang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen de ye shes dbang por dbang skur ba// rgya chen
225a2(1): byang chub yan lag rin cen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor// tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzinang mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon/ ye shes no ba li gzhung can nyon mongs 'jom zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa
225a3(1): chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas sker ba'i// 'khor lo mchog rnams skor zhing pha rol dargol ba dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms// ye shes chu ni zab cing myi zad shi nang tu rgya che chos kyi ro dang ldan// byang chub
225a4(1): yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang bar 'gro kun shes pa dka'// thams cad mkhyend pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yus rnams dag cingalhag pas ma dge/ de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho 'a chungs med sta nad pas
225a5(1): zad par myi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dga'aphags rtag tu yus gis myi gos/ 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyudad pa// bsam gtan mngon shes rab/ 'phel ye shes che mi lpag pa'i bsam bgyi sgrub pa// gang dag de dang nyer
225a6(1): phrad shes ram ye shes mchog gis ram tu 'dra bar gyu dang // de dang de dag len tan ri rang shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis ltas// skrag pa'irnams ma pa mchog ni rdo rje tshungs gling 'dra sde brtul zhugs thams cad 'jam/ 
225a7(1): sangs byas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyend pa'i 'apyod las bsam pa myi phyed de// bcud dang nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni myi spyod rab brtan pa// de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bab pa dag las bzlog par byed// byams
225a8(1): ba'i hri na rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog cen rgyu ldog pa// rngub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas gzhi la dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrogs so so yang dag rig dang tshul khrims yan las brgyad ldan chu'i char 'bebs
225a9(1): Tha kade dang de dag ljin cen zhog mongs gi byed sems can des phyir mngon par 'phags// shes rab rab dga' dang zhes pa dag ni 'anas te chos kyi rgyas mtshan sbeng // ye shes shing rtags yin te ma dang gro'i sgo 'byedran pa' de dag ni ba yin/ 
225a10(1): bdeg gnams zhe lam chen bzhi ste shi nad tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab rgyan pa// srid pa gsum ma btud sde dag gis myi thub grong khyer chos nyid dag tu stend// thams cad// rkye nad pa'i chos mchog shing las rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang ga brtan/ 
225b1(1): gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rold babazhin mthu byams dang snying rje myi gnyis yin// stond pa de dag 'gro ba kun na srub myed mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra// srid pa'i mtsholananas 'don cing g+ha myi rnams kyang mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog la bden
225b2(1): tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer 'breng ba mdzes// 'od sngar kun 'char nyon mongs 'jom zhing srid pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu skam par byed// stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i smasma nas 'bo la sems 'acan pad me/ 
225b3(1): yongs su rgyas byed pa// de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun tu 'byung // chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun kyis ltas na mdzes pa ste// nyan thos dang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs cang skar ma 'dra la dag ni
225b4(1): zil gyis mnan// sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum cu 'phel dang gri pa rnam par ston / de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa na mkha'i mtha'// chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang pon/ 
225b5(1): tan drag gis rkyen// ye shes rdo sde mnga' ba thabs ni myig ste tshes la dbang chen sbyar gnas pa// sus dang mtshan dang dpel byad bzang po sna da tshogs kun gyis lta ba'i dbang po ste// chos kyi 'gro ba kun las rgyal
225b6(1): bde dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin pa/ srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'damadang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po// byams pasnang dang thugs rdze bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos
225b7(1): srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus skond chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa/ ka de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel// 'khor las rab tu 'das shing nam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang // phyir ltos kyi
225b8(1): rgyang zla gros me 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la/ chos kyi dbang por dbang skur 'jig rten dam ye shes phyir ldog myi 'gyur ba// thams cadas mkhyend pa'i// yon tan dbang phyug grags cen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang/ 
225b9(1): mkha'i khal dbyings lnga bur dang rnam bral dbyigs pa thams cad rnam bsal dpa// 'gro ba kun tu bya ga nyams len// skye mchog ci le 'ang gnas pa myed pa ste/ 'gro ba kun tu 'gyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu myi gnas
225b10(1): ba/ de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dpa' dra// de dang de dag sho nad tu rgya chen yabs ldan sa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos// / chu 'dra de dang de/ dag byams dang snying rjes nyon mongs rnams zhi ba
226a1(1): tu gsel/ de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal/ ston pa de dag myig nas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu d+hu/ de dang de dag/ rin cen 'dra se shin da tu dkon zhing
226a2(1): 'gro ba'i dbul yang gsel/ de dang de dag rdo rje sta bur srid pa gsum ma lta ba kun tu 'joms// de dang / de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed// ston la de dag nor bu rim cen tshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi chug tu byin
226a3(1): de dang de dag me tog lta bu ro rgyas pa byang chub yan lag rtsed/ 'phreng ba lta bur do dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas// de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon myed rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhi me// de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum mchos
226a4(1): dang ye shes kyis ni lag chags dag gtugs 'dra// de dang de dag stobs kyi nga bA res nyon mongs tshul las skyob par byed// ye shes rgyal mtshan sbe ba'i thugs mngal de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyas mtshan skol de dang de dag 'aton pa'i gnas// 
226a5(1): snga sogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu blags// gos 'dra de dang de dag d+hu/ 'phral yon tan 'gro ba kun las khebs par byed// theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mthal yas de deng de dag 'jig rten gsum las ka byin da/ de dang
226a6(1): de dga'ab tul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu rgyal la gnas// de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khas cen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'das / klu'i dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul tu chos 'char 'phemam sa de
226a7(1): makus mer me tog tu dum 'ba' zhungs 'dra shin tu dkon// dbang po wA bu de dang de dag nyes mongs 'jol zhib babyedas kyi sde rnams 'khrug/ gyi ldog 'kho ma los bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsus// / de dang de dag ljon
226a8(1): las wA bur mun pa gsel ling sems can lam yang stond/ de dang de dag mu klung lta bum yon tan der cing lam rgyan rjes su 'gro/ de dang de dag las pa wA mu ba ral la myed pral tag tu 'gro ba spol bru dang khru chen lta bur rmon/ 
226a9(1): am rab btab ye shes gang chen/ mtshol thob byed// de dang de dag mnyand pa lta bur 'gro la ye shes thar can mchog la 'god pa// de dag skyed mo tshal gyi dgal la che zhing 'gro la yang dag 'aspyod pa ston da/ de dag chos kyi rnam sa ras
226b1(1): mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal myed khang dag pa/ mkhas pa de dag sba na lta nad zhing byed cing nyon mongs rab tu gsel/ rlan gis rgyas pa'i gangasa'i lta bur te dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so// de dag sangs rgyas lta khur
226b2(1): ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel/ yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan myin yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed// de dang de dag rgyal ya ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas// / de dag thams cad
226b3(1): mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs// zhi bskyed pa de dag stond pas rab sngags 'gro ba kun la ston da// de dang de dag rang gi ye shes 'ayul dang thams cad mkhyen kyi skyed/ yul shes// de dang de dag tshad
226b4(1): skyed dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na grub bskyed// de dag ye shes myi/ 'jigs blo gros 'chang thams cad mkhyend pa'i chos kyang shes / gang ma gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang myi ngarnams ji snyed lja nga khod pa
226b5(1): sa bcugs gams gzugs kyi nges lang cing bying dbyas pas sub ba ga/ gzugs rnam sa can sas 'das gi snying dang / rnas pa zas sar byab bams par byed// de dag tsum 'gros ras/ 
226b6(1): kyis rnam pa kun tu brjod par myi nus so// gang dag 'di 'dral yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po myed pa'i chos gnas shing / yod dang myed pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon
226b7(1): gsum can// thams cad mkhyen kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa myin// de dag 'aspyod la 'jug pa yid 'o ba 'jig rten dgal bar byed pa bshad par bya// chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa
226b8(1): kun 'as rtogs pas// mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin kyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying sde dag kyang byed// sprul pa'i ye shes sme dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'
226b9(1): sa nor yid can rtse cig mnyam pa myed pa legs par grag/ lus cig la ni mtha' yas sus dang rgya chen lus rnams wa dad rab tu stond/ sems myed yid myed sems kyi yul myed 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston da// 
226b10(1): khyu mchog brjed pa'i pha rol na phyind pa de dag dbyangs cig rnam rna bar brjod byed kyang // 'gro ba dag gi sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod// nyon mongs rgyad byung lus dang bral yang sems cam rnams kyi
227a1(1): sus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi su sa la dbang sgyur te/ brjod du skyed pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba togs ging sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston // de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' chungs
227a2(1): par yang dag shes// 'gro btsun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston // de dag lus rnams gang la yang gnas pa myed de lus kyang de dag stond par byed// 'gro ba thams cad kyin skye ba dag dang rgya mthug nas pa
227a3(1): ji snyed pa// thams cad kun tu skye ba'i lus dang ldan lang skye ba dag la gnas pa myed// rang gi lus la mkhal 'dra ngos/ sems can sems sa sna tshogs rnam pa ste// mkhas pa kun la dang pa spyas de das sus mi mtha' yas kun tu
227a4(1): ston byed kyang // / me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan brtags dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams/ thams cad mkhyen da yA mchod pas rkang gnyis gso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing // mkhas pa lasam 'a thag pas lus
227a5(1): kyis 'du byed 'chong pa dam la kun tu ston mkhas pa// / de dag rgyal bzhabs da kyi chung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ 'khor nams kun nas sda bzhir tshungs khyed de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed// chos kyi ma
227a6(1): spyam sa bu'i chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dpa' 'gro ba kun la smond/ sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shi nad tu rgya chen sems kyang rab su ston du// 'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du shes drag 'jug pa ston kyang
227a7(1): grags pa myed /  bgro rin rjes ga/ di dag la rag tu log ma'i sems su 'gro la sben ga ya yar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyong rdza ma thal yas rgya chen dag kyang ston dag ga la yar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtsog 'grus btab dang shes
227a8(1): rab thams ka la lar tshangs pa'i lam bcu da kha cog tu zhi pyod pa'i mchog kyang rab tu ston / mkhas pa rtog skyed de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston pa/ la ar skye ba cig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyakha bas dbang
227a9(1): spung pa/ la lar nyan thos gzugs su sbyar cing la ya dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su sbyar// bye ba khrag khrigs pa po li zhing cu mya ngan 'da' yang spyod/ lam ldog pa myed do// de dag la lar lha dbang rgya byin lnga dang bcas par a lar tshangs pa ru
227b1(1): 'gyur// de dag sa khang lha'i bu mo brgyas skom la lar cig pu 'askyod pa stond/ la yar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la yang rgyal po dbang phyug sbyar ba/ ya ra chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes pa rgya mchog gzugs kyang ston da/  sa khar bud sted
227b2(1): spya rtsal pha rol rab byin la khar dka' thub can d+hu 'gyur// la lar 'dod pa'i long 'askyed rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub la byed/ la la ra mya ngan 'das dang tshe'i sa dang a la ga na dang byis par ston// de dag khyod pa bas ma ma skye bo
227b3(1): byos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur// la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi grol lar gnas pa ston// la lar mdal zhugs la lar rnam pa sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo bsgom// sa lar skye bas lam gA ngan 'das pa la yang bze/ 
227b4(1): yang rab tu slob ka kha lar bud myed tshogs kyi dpung gnas la lar ting 'dzin la war mngon par 'byung // la lar// khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub sing gi drung na bzhugs// la lar 'khor lo rab tu bzlo ba zhing la lar
227b5(1): sna tshogs ches rnams rab tu tshol ga sa lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing gnasas bye ba pa rgyang bya ba 'gro'am ldog byed kyang // byang chub dag tu spyod pa de dag tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldeg ma yin no// 
227b6(1): bskakhad pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyi nad pas skam pa bye ba rgya phragadag// gru mchog sems cig nang ston sems cig skal da pargyar yang de bzhin stonang par byed// 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang
227b7(1): mye tog rtog pa'i yul zhams thams cad ston/ batshogs pa skyed cipa phyogs la gnas myed spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston da// gang phyir rgyal ba nges rgyal ni de dag nyi co'i phyogs myed kun na bzhugs pas na// 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal
227b8(1): ba ji rnyed pa dag thams cad rgyal cig steng rgya mthong // sangs rgyas zhing rnams sgrub dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong // de ltar brtson pas na lad pa/ khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad myi 'gyur// de ltar khro/ 
227b9(1): ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shis// sems can cigs mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bya ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams// de dag 'gro ba cig dang / ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed// srab pa
227b10(1): 'di'i phyogs la pha rol de phyind te// ma spabs rnams ni ston pa byed// dbang po rnon po dang mi 'bring dang gang dag dab pa po 'bar bzhes nas// 'gro ba skams pa yod dang skam pa myed pa la 'khor lo'i bskor bar byed// dbang po'i re la gabang
228a1(1): dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang / dbang po dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa 'ang rab tu shes// de ltar khams dang mos dpabasam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chag pa rnams kyang shes
228a2(1): ldog gi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sems spyod da lngar byung ba 'ang de bzhin te// sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol da phyind kyang 'od dang 'gro ba yod pa yin// ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston par byed// de ltar sems kyi
228a3(1): sems spyod lnga tshogs kun nas nyon mongs nyon mongs myed pa dag/ sems cig la gi khong du chud nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen da rnamam sangs rgyas/ sems kyi skad cig rtsig gis 'gro ba nam phye rang gi shes pas rdzogs gyur nas pa/ 
228a4(1): sems kyi tshul shes sems myed rab tu gzhob las ye shes mchog la kun kyang / shakod// rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu phags// sems skyed cig gis khrag khrig mtha' bas zhing dang phyogs
228a5(1): na nab sa thams cad tu 'ab 'gro// de ltar ye shes dbang sgyur 'gro zhing skal pa bye ba khrig zer byed kyang // sna chud shin tu/ mA ba cig la zhugs par gnas la sa gar yang 'pho pa myed// 'chol ba'i don tu spya mkhan gzugs
228a6(1): rnam pa g.yonas grob rganas da kyad kyang/ sum thun ca 'dus pa myor byigs gzugs pad ma yin pa'ad phyogs pabyed//  ma 'as pa sogs sapas dashes nas chen sbru ma zugs pa rnams// / ca
228a7(1): ba dug gsum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal cher khyab par byas shing rab tu ston da/ nyi mo khwa ra mkhal la rgya zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa rnams/  rtogs mun mas ji snyed dag tu sra ya pa de ni mu dang 'dres ma yin// de war tshis nyid dag pa'i/ 
228a8(1): dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin da tu 'phags pa rnams 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyis yul la skang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin/ yi la ga nyid kho go i lam dgan bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs wa dang byed/ le ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po
228a9(1): zad par gyis kyang mtshan mo de ma za dang / de dag chos nyid rang bzhin tshungs par dzes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun stond to// skad cig/ cig la skal pa bye ba zad khyed/ de dag ye shes zad myi 'gyur// rol dbang po'i sul gnas pa 'jig
228a10(1): rten dag dang mnyam chu thos pa'i sgra/ kun nas sgra'i ldan na de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g.yol ba skyed// de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes 'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag/ rtog pa myed par sems can snga rnams
228b1(1): dzi nyid par ni chos dang spyod pa ston/ dpyid zla dag gi smyig sgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes zhes// de na sa chu nyid myi 'gyur btung rgya myed cing je bas rnge skom rnam 'phel ya// de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems
228b2(1): can dag gi nyin mongs g.yol ba rnams// shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bya myed phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel/ gzugs ni dbupa lta bur khyu mnos sngon rje tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'dra/ 'du shes thams cad lcig skyag bur
228b3(1): rag pas 'dres byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra// sems ni spyi 'dra smra bo bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshonas rab tu ston pa// de ltar phung po 'god pa stond kyang dbang skur dag ni de la gnas pa myed// skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang myed 'grus
228b4(1): 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byin byed dang / khams ni chos da byings tshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston// dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden sa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu stond// de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par 'dod
228b5(1): pa stond pa byed kyang gnas pa myed// 'ong ba myed phyogs su 'gro ba myed la rgyud du gnas pa myed pa'i// nyon mongs rgyas sa byung bde las dang las las spug sngal de ltar lan gsum cu// rkyen las rag
228b6(1): las 'byung lo'i rnams dang yod dang myed las rab tu 'das pa'i// yang dag don dam dbul ma'i lam ni dngos po myed la gnas pa rab tu/ ston/ 9/ skad cig rtig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig snga
228b7(1): tshogs rnams kyang ston// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs myed khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston pa byed// sdom pa gsum gi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing tha ra pa gsum yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
228b8(1): cig la theg pa gsum du 'bod pa de bzhin sten// gnas dang gnas ma yin par rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol da phyin/ khams dpemos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun tu 'gro ba khrob 'gyur pa// myig gi yul
228b9(1): gyur sngon gi gnas pa drag zhing nyon mongs shi bar mkhas pa dag / sangs rgyas stobs khacu dag gis ye shes shi gad tu 'das kyang stobs la dmyigs pa myed// sangs kyis thams cad rjes su dpog skyer 'gro ba kun tu ma ngom gsum
228b10(1): mchod bzhed de/ nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes bya khyi mar la bya ba 'ang snyed par 'gyur ba myed/ 'byung bas thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro la 'don par mdzad// 'di'i gnas la/ rgyal sras 'jigs myed ci
229a1(1): sngon kyang zhi bar spyod par myed/ la rgyal pa gyi mang las ma las g.yol ba'ang myi mngal dgongs pa nyams pa'ang myi mngal ste/ bos dpa 'a rtson 'grus cing 'dzin shes rag nam khar 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams byed pa
229a2(1): thams cad mkhyen sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun las mngon gsum mkhyend/ mnga' ba// 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid myi 'phrogs chags pa myed skyes pa// chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob la zla ba'i
229a3(1): mchog ka de dag yon tan mang po don ldan pasam pa'ob las de tshor 'du shes gnas pa rnams/ spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas nas gnon cing / tshul khrims kyi g.yo dbug byin de de dag 'gro ba
229a4(1): thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed// lung stan pa rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed// sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing pa sems/ dpa' myed// skam pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye
229a5(1): shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skye bo'i 'du shes myed// gzungs kyi na tshul dang yang dag mthal dang stobs rnams thob cing yang dag den gyis dgas// bstan pa tshungs myed sems kyis mangs pa byang chub 'i brnam par
229a6(1): 'chang yang bya/ sems kyi spyod pa thams par babang pa'i ga na byed pa'i mchos tu rtsom pa byed/ ci rde 'a kyib dang byam par byab la chog pa byang chub das babyed pa ma/ bcog sa pa'as dbyi ba
229a7(1): rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyob pa'i pha re ldad pa 'i yang phyind gyu rang pas/ khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pamangon 'tshang rgya// mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gis chos
229a8(1): mchog ston byed pa// yin tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyag mchog tu 'gyur// dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa myed pas mnyas pa myed pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra smes/ ye shes mchog dang de bzhin sprul
229a9(1): pa skyab cing byang chub zhi bar nye khar 'gro// mkhas pa de dag skal pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyi nad rab tu thos/ zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro ba gnas shing zhes nur bcal bas mkhas pas rnams
229a10(1): ye shes lasam gis myi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing nam phye pha rol phyin dang// snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'tshad yang rgya// ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha ro ya byin pacir/ 
229b1(1): mngon par shes pas rnam par che na/ rig pa'i skang ldan rnam 'grol nyon mongs phral bas 'gros skyed mos tshal dang 'dra// gapas dkar ba'i spyod pa'i zhal skyed khang mdzes 'ang tshogs smyon pa snyen pa po// 'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams rtsa
229b2(1): ma rab tu ston dkyang sems las g.yel ba myed// bsam pa shi nad tu shes pas bstand pa rab tu mkhas pas pha rol du phyin gyu dad pas// mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya sbar ba'i ye shes kyis 'gro ba dag dang myi tshungs
229b3(1): zhum byed kyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa'i so 'dra// ye shes rgya mchol 'dra der yon tan myi zad don tu spyod pa chen po skyed// de dag rin ben 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rdza lta bu la go cags pas gnas// shin tu rgya chen rtso ma la rab tu
229b4(1): mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub myed pa// byang chub mchog tu lung stand skyon myed khong du chud po'i rgya chen sems la gnas/ sangs rgyas gter mchog myi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chu 'tshang rgya'o// rtog tu kun rdzob shes
229b5(1): pas dbang sgyud rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pas na/  zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul sa rnam par 'phrus pa'i ye shes gyur la gnas/ gnas dang smon lam skyed yul ye shes rnam par
229b6(1): 'phrul la la yang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba dag la rnam par che babyed pa khrag khrig tum mang po ston/ mngon par shes pa'irdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'brus zhing nges par rnam par che/ l+yA/ ts+raH
229b7(1): mchog de dag sa ngas rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa myed/ mkhas pa 'jigs pa myed dang bag cha myed dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shi nad tu rgyan// sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams khams
229b8(1): khad byed cing shi nad tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan// de dag lus kyi las kyi/ dngos po shind tu rgya me dag rgya bdag cing dge// de yang byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis rlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed/ dam pa de dag bems
229b9(1): skyed cig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston/ rgyal po la dbang po lo ba pas rtag tu dbapa po'i ting 'dzin dab pal rab tu gnas// bsam pa dag cing g.yo'i sgrarnams dang bral te lhag pa li bsam pa ngon gsum
229b10(1): 'gyur// mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dang dag la rab tu ston/ bag chags thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa'ag tu 'dzis// nan tam bya ba 'grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyend par 'tshang
230a1(1): yang s+ya// bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon myed gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang thob// mkhas pa 'di lam gi nad tu bslab pa de dag myid ni yon tan sgo nas grags/ mtha' yas sems kyi yul
230a2(1): ldan lags pa phyed par sa ma nams yang tu skem par byed// ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan yang gin su stogs/ spyod pa lakra ba lta bur dgal dang ldan pa go na snyid le la gas mchog/ snying ni rdo rje/ 
230a3(1): A du snyid rje'i go la gos ye shes dab pa'i mtshon sa yin/ DA she se rab mgo lo chos rtog byig yis byang chub spyod pa yang yin pa yin/ tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs myed la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te/ spobs pa
230a4(1): yin lus zhi rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin// spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin// tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni mas yin/ stong pa chags myed dam pa 'aspyod yul lo/ 
230a5(1): gang gis de dag snar yar 'gyur ba'i snang ba'i bde yang gshegs pa'i ye shes yus// / sems rgyan/ spyod a rnam lar lnga pa/ ye shes mchog sde rnam pa sna tshogs skyengs// sems can dben zhing chags
230a6(1): dang bral ba'i sbyin pa snyems la myed pa'i tshul khrims dang /  bzod pa myi 'azug ma nyon 'grus kyi ldog dab skur ba ni la gtan das pa yin/ chu ba myed cing gas ma'ala'adra ba shes rab byams pa
230a7(1): sems can rnam par 'dres// skyon myed snying rjen ma dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mo ngas gnas la btang yang snyoms// don ni zhi ba chos kyi/ yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la sdes// ye zhes tshogs ni
230a8(1): ral gi rnon po lta bu sna ma chen po'i rig pa ste/ 'gro ba rnams la thos pa ljon pas myi ngoms skas dpar 'dren kyang 'jigs pa skyed// nan btan byed la gnas te bdud rnams 'atul nas brgyad dkyis ma yang rab
230a9(1): bad/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phrin las gang yin ye shes 'byed dang lhag pa'i bsam khas 'dzind/ nga rgyal las nams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi'ang bya ba myed// / brjed kyi byin gyis rarlabs bco
230a10(1): mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis 'phags// chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po/ 'chang pa lha'i gnas su 'dongalha rnams byas te shi 'phos bsod nams mchog gi ma pa ba zhi shind du/ 
230b1(1): phra bar 'gro// skye ba mchog zhi nye bar bstan nas mchog gis gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar khyed// mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo dang 'askyed dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston// chags pa myed par
230b2(1): mngon par byung bas byang chub ging drung chos kyi rgyan kyang khyed// stong pa'i stan la 'od zer 'dra ba yangs pa la kye zhing yang dag skul la byed// bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phag sangs rgyas chos kyi kha khor lo
230b3(1): rab tu ba skor// sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstas nas 'dren pa de dag tshungs pa skyed par bzhud// gang gis skald pa phye bar na ma lar rtse zhing yang dag byur 'gyur nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig steng phrag tu ma sangs
230b4(1): yon ta ni rab 'god kyang // rnam pa kun tu sems can myi gnas chos la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i// de dag gis ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor stan do// de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyus cheg rtsu
230b5(1): 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/ zhing rnams bye ba stong du s+tha che cig dzal skas da pa khrag khrig rgyar 'dzin te// lag tu khyer te zhing rnams te/ ngo bar 'gro yang lus la ngas cu ba gang yang myed/ mkhas pas khyer nas rdzi stir
230b6(1): nas pa shed kya khri bdags da pabyed// 'di zhen byedapa'i shing gi can nams 'dags pa la dang 'phrin pa dang/ gags pa sgra cig ni thug tshus chog de dag yang dag pa gad/ 
230b7(1): ba sa ba spu'i bu gang rgya mtsho'i chu rnams ma lus khongs chud rab stond kyanga'aphel zhing 'gri ba skyed 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur myed bya ba de yang ston// 'khor yug khrag khrigashin tu phra ba'i rdul bas lag gis skyes khyer zhig
230b8(1): zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed rdzu 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog myi byed// / zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de / de la dra'i rjes su dpag pa bzad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag myi zad do// / 'jig
230b9(1): rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag lte rnams ji snyed dang / gang yang zhor yu'i 'od dang mye'i 'od dang / gang na gang rnams skadab pa 'od// mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu cig khung bu 'gyer// 'jig rten kun gyi ngan song
230b10(1): sdug bsngal zhi khar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston da// 'gro ba ma lus sgra'i rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rgya mchog de dag tshig cig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bam brjod// srog chags bye ba rnams
231a1(1): kyis yid tu 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgul bar 'gyur// / rgyal bas ldan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa thams cad de las thos par 'gyur// gang yang 'i snyed 'das pa'i skal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs ska la par ston// gang
231a2(1): yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar 'byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par stor nga // khyu mchog dag ni zhi rnams tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa 'a dang stond par byed// 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag sgra che cig sa rab tu 'god/ 'das dang mabyon pa dang
231a3(1): phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang spyar rnam par 'grus la ston// sprul pa'i byin rlabs sa shes pa'i mkhas pa'i de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems // de snyed du sa rnams rdul dang
231a4(1): bral ba ston dkyang lus la gnas pa gang yang myed// lam chud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun kyi/ lu sa stu sa shi da// rgya byon tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lnga dang myo'i rnams/ gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams
231a5(1): la dad cing sangs rgyas skul mos pa la sangs rgyas byang chub 'ang/ 'gyu ba'i spyod la dag dang thams cad mkhyend pa'i spyod pa ston// 'gro bkun gyi 'du zhes 'dra ba ras dang 'bring dang ba mar 'jug pa rnams/ rnams
231a6(1): ston dang// de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston dang // de dag gang la 'jigs sbyin pa dang yul byin de dag bya ba ston dang ston kyang lta lo/ lhur len ma yin/ gzhan ya phyir zhing gang du ston pa byed/ de dag sems can rnams
231a7(1): kyi la sa ma kha ji bzhin spyod pa yang dag 'jug// lus ni nam mkha' lta bur dag dang yid la chags byed/ 'jig rten gsum gyi/ gtso// / tshul khrims spos kyi grug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan/ chos kyi go pa skyon myed thob cing
231a8(1): thams cad mkhyen da pa'i yid bzhin nor bu ste / bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang skur thams cad mkhyend pa'i rgyal po'i thabs sa gnas// pha rolang phyin pa rtags 'gyu labyer khyo yin te glang po mngon par zhes papa mchog ye shes rdzu 'phrul
231a9(1): ta ste chags pa myed papa' dro gas 'ab nor bu dam pa yin// spyod pa btsun mo 'azang mo lbu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o// thabs la shin datu mkhas pa blon po yin te ma las pa de dag 'khor los sbyar// stong pa kyi ma te ting kho nad
231b1(1): grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje go tsa'o// shes ras ral gi yin te dran pa gzhu' mdzes dpang po rno ba mnga' yang yin// 'jig rten/ mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin kyi rlabs 'i gdugs te ye shes rgyal mtshan sgreng // de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs
231b2(1): kyis bcud kyi sde dang dbu pa rnams 'dus pa 'jom // gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes u ma shes rab shi dang // me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin da ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyas mtshan rgyan// stong pa na mthar rgyan pa rdzi bu yin/ 
231b3(1): te rnam par spyod pa bzab mo btsun mo yin// tha rad pa/ bdul gyi bzal ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gi rtse / de dag 'aspyod pa de 'dra yid 'ong khyad par phags shed pas gong du ma nga // gang gis skasad pa byes khrag khrig stong du skyo ba
231b4(1): yongs su kyi skye bar// ston pa mchod cing nam dag zhing la tshon las 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god// khan ma tho kun myed ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed// zhing rnams rdul gi 'brur dwag sa le re nas kyang bgrar zhing
231b5(1): par lus gyur la // bar rna mkhal ches 'di yang sgra yi sa gzhal te zad par nus srid de// skad cig cig la 'gro rnams kyi sems ni 'gra tshul shes khar nus srid kyi/ sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni skal pa rgyar
231b6(1): rjod 'ad par gyi bus so / gang gig sog pan nas dag di nag nga ba bdad cing gar phya ga zhas 'ded dang / gang ni gsug dus rnams pas bathob par byas 'des 'ged par 'dod pa dang / gang zhig das btsa
231b7(1): gshegs pa'i sku gsung dgongs dang mnyam cu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/ des ni rdo rje lta bur bstan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan slab parabyos/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdolamam po ki u ma
231b8(1): bcom ldan 'das gnyen yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal skabs myed pa a zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i nang po khrang tshigs pa rgya chen po cas na / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'ja ma dpal la sogs
231b9(1): pa 'di lta ste na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam nges pa'i ye shes dang / pang / rtam pa das pa'i ye shes dang / chags myed dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang bla ba
231b10(1): dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri phyed dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul snyed dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpal rnam par snang pa'i dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dar mi'i rgyal mtshan dang/ mi
231b11(1): bas ma dra de shA cas sa shes byed nom can pa na sang rtsa na bangam mganagan ma ma gsas mi lda mnam ma lan ca dang pa ga ba mi ma
232a1(1): rab rgyal mtshan dang rin cen rgyal mtshan dang / chags myed rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang // dri myed rgyal mtshan dang nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang rdul skyed rgyal mtsha
232a2(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang byang chub sems dpa' rin cen gzil brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi' brjid dang/ ye shes rdo rje la gzil brjid dang / bri ma myed pa'i gzi'i brjid dang / chos kyi e ma'i gzi
232a3(1): brjid dang bsod nams ri bo'i gzi' brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzil brjid dang / kun nas dpal gi gzil brji da dang / kun nas 'od dpal gi gzil 'dzid dang / byang chub sems dpal phyogs bcu bsna pa dus rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzil
232a4(1): brjid dang / byang chub sems dpal sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad ma'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po
232a5(1): dang gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpal pad ma'i dpal da gi snying po dang // byang chub sems dpa' bzeng po'i myig dang/ rnam par dag pa'i myig dang // dri ma myed pa'i myig dang / chags pa skyed pa'i myig dang
232a6(1): kun nas lta ba'i myig dang // shind tu rnam par lta ba'i myig dang / su pa la'i myig dang / rdo rje'i myig dang / rin po che'i myig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i myis dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan
232a7(1): dang / chos kyi dbyings spong ba'i blo gros gcod pan dang / byang chub dam la 'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pam dang / sangs kyis thams cad yang dag par byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las
232a8(1): mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil kyis non pa myed pa'i cod pan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpal chos kyi dbyings nam
232a9(1): mkha' kun zas ldar ba'i cod pan dang // byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud can dang / klu'i dbang po'i/ gtsug pud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spras pa snang ba'i gtsus phud dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug pud dang / smon lam
232a10(1): rgya mtshol thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rin cen rgyal po 'i gtsug pud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gye ba'i nor bu rin cen/ 'brug sgra 'i gtsug bud dang // nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad la myi dad par rnam par dmyigs
232b1(1): pa'i rin zhen rgyal po rgyan pa'i gtsug pud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas g.yog pa'i rgyal po'i gtsug pud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ chos kyi 'khor la skyes
232b2(1): pa'i gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpal tus gsum gi mying thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpal rgya chen po'i 'od dang / gzi' brjid dri ma myed pa'i 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / 
232b3(1): chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang // nyi ma'i 'od dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpal lnga'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang la mngon par shes pa'i
232b4(1): dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / mi log dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dpal dngas/ tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpal kus nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpal tshangs pa la dbyangs dang
232b5(1): mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sgra'i dbyangs dang/ 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang/ mi dab rgyal po thob pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun turgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtshol thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / 
232b6(1): brjod kyi dkyis 'khor thams cad rab tu 'phrul ba'i dbyangs dang / snying de ches po'i tshul gi sprin rab tu rdzogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byangachub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug sngal rab tu zhi bar byabs dbugs
232b7(1): 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang /  bsod nam pa'i 'os/ 'u phyags pa dang / yon tan gi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / 
232b8(1): grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun tu snang bas 'phags ma dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang pa/ ye shes rgya mtsho la 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang bya
232b9(1): chub sems dpal 'od/ dpal dang mchog gi dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang rabs gi dpas dang
232b10(1): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpal rol dbang po'i rgyal po dang / chos kyi dbang po rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyas po dang / 
233a1(1): lha'i dbang pol rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang myi g.yol ba'i dbang ze'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems
233a2(1): dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang lags pa byed pa'i sgra dang / sa 'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sna dang / sprin gi dbyangs kyi sgra dpag chos kyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i cha ba ba tu
233a3(1): snog pa'i sgra dang / sngon gi smon la ma yongs su skul ba'i sma dang byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor gtsem myed par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpal rin po e'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma myed pa'i blo dang / chags pa
233a4(1): byed pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang yangs pa'i blo dang / kun tu spang ba'i blod pa/ byang chub sems dpal chos kyi dbyings su steng ba'i blo dang / de dgas sogs khwa khya chub sems dpa'
233a5(1): lnga stod pa ma ste / kun nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang po'i spyod pa dang / smon las gyis byung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams/ da pa byas las 'gengs pas tshogs pa byed pa'i spyod yul ban / de bzhin
233a6(1): gshegs pa lasas cad kyi drung du 'dong bas// sus mtha' mas pa'i byin rlung dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/  yongs su sman dpa// rnam par dmyigs par bya ba la sgribs pa byed pa'i/ 
233a7(1): myig gi dkyis 'khor rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngonabar 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe'/ nye bar 'dod pa rgyun myi gcod pas tshad myed par phyin pa chos rgya mtsho 'i tshul thams cad la ye shes sna ba pa rab tu thos pas spa ba
233a8(1): a' yas pa dang ldan pa// me se yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag las skal pa mtha' yas par shin tu stan pa pa// myi zad pa mngon pa'i bsam pa co lta ba bzhin cu gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas / nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas
233a9(1): pa'i ye shos kyi spyod yul rnam par dag ci myi gnas la sems can gyi khams sems can myed pa dang nga / srog myed par yongs su shes pas raba'i ba myed pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gi 'phra bas rgyas par 'gengs par rnam
233a10(1): dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs/ cig bzhugs e// nyan thos k+Shu 'phrul chen yo dang ldan pa lnga rgya ste// thams cad kyar bden pa'i tshul gi rang bzhin mngon par khong chu chud la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon gsuM u gyur pa chos kyi rang bzhin du
233b1(1): bzhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho la la sa khyen tub 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas spong ba dang / parga la nyal ba dang bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa chags pa skyed pa'i gnas la rten pa nam mkha' lta zhi pa
233b2(1): lags par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tsam dang nem nur dang yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi le shes rgya mtshol la mos pa'i las chu zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gi dbang zo sngon gyi rgyal bas bya ba byas ya/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan
233b3(1): pa dang bde ba'i don tu zhugs pa gsol ba ma teb lar dge ba'i shes gnyen du gyur da pa// sems can gzhan srung ba lnga zhugs pa 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa sems can thams cad
233b4(1): yongs su myi gtong pa'i sems dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byed yul la byung ba ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan pa'i yongs su zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par bzung ba'i smonan la ma gis yang dag par skyed pa
233b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du byung ba / mngon gsum du gyur pa/  thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig gong// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de
233b6(1): dag dang nyan thos kyu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag dang kra 'jig rten gi dbang 'o/ 'khor dang cas pa de dag 'di snyam chu gur te// de bzhin gshegasapa'i yul dpa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yus dang de bzhin gshegs

233b8(1): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin/ gshegs pa'i mthu dpa pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gi smon lam dang / sngon
233b9(1): legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i cha 'dang dge ba'i shes gnyen gi skyabs dang / dad pa'i phyig yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam kharnam par dag pa dang / 
233b10(1): bas ma 'a thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing yang dag par zhugs pa a togs par lnga dang bcas pa 'i 'jig rten gis 'jug pa 'am kho bcu chud pa 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par
234a1(1): rtog pa 'am/ bzung ba 'am rnam par spyod pa 'am ka rnam khar sgom pa 'amarnam par bye ba 'am/ rnam par 'grol pa 'a marab tu brjod pa 'am/ sems can pha rold kyi rgyud tu phyind par bya bar ni myi nus
234a2(1): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bas mkha'i tshul ji lta ba dang sems bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang / brda sna tshogs su gyur da pa/ dbangasgrub
234a3(1): ba li sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbang po lnga tshogs su rnam par dag pa 'asam pa dang sbyor rnam pa gzhan dpa gzhan can sems dpa' sam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas
234a4(1): chos ya stan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu zhugs pa lta yang yang dag par stan pa khrang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smom la ma mngon par sgrub pa lta yang yang dag par bstan gra / sngon gi byang chul sems dpa'i
234a5(1): pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i dkyil la dor yongs su dag pa lta ma pa ya pa dag par bstan grang/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par da 'phrul pa lta yang yang dag par khwa stan grangasngon byang chub sems
234a6(1): bston gra dang/ sngon byang chub seMs dpa'i lam 'i rgyan yongs su dag par mu dza da pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang sngon byang chub sems dpo le 'byu ba po'o tshul rgya mtsho la mngon par smra ba pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang/ sngon gi
234a7(1): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par sgrub pa dang / nam par 'phrul pa'i rgyag dung na gsum tshogs pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grangang / byang chub sems dpal sngon gi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la lta pa dang yang dag par bstan grangang / mngon par
234a8(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rnam par 'phrul pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo snyer ba'i rnam khar 'phrul la dang khyu mchog gi mthu lta ya pa yang dag par bstan grang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
234a9(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa lta yang yang dag pam pas na grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gi khams 'dul ba'i thabs kyi/ sgo ste yang yang dag par bstan grangang / de bzhin gshegs pa
234b1(1): pa yams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer la/ mnga' mdzad pa ste yang yang dag par bstan grang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems/ 
234b2(1): can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ yog pa zhes pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
234b3(1): thams cad kyi bsod nams dang yon sten pa'i tshe 'phrul mdzad pa lnga yang ka dang dag par bstan grad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sems kyi tshul la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs snyan dmyigs pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par la stan grang de
234b4(1): bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dge par bstan brang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang / rjes su stan pa'i tshe 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang
234b5(1): yang dag par bstan grang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems cam thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gi spyod yul yasam gyis myi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / 
234b6(1): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi gos 'azugs du kyis mnyen pa nas seng ge nas par 'byings pa zhes byaba'i ting de te 'jidad pa' ba dang bzhus pa dpe' byed pa / 'gro 'a jams par gyun ma la mtha Ta
234b7(1): snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa thugs rje chen po sngon tu 'gro la thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par bzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhags
234b8(1): thag tu yo pra legs pa rgyag chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus myed par yangs shing rdo rje thub pa myed pa'i rgyal mtshan gis a'i gzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ga kun tu bkra ma pa/ rin po che du ba'i me tog si la mas
234b9(1): chal par gang ba / nor bu rin po che dam pas mdzes par bkram pa dang / bye tu N+ya'i ka pas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro bas rnam par snang las rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu
234b10(1): rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klu gi phung po sa shind tu rgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgogangapa dang / rtab pa dang / pu shu dang skar khung byas shing khri phang grangs myed pas rnam par dag pas rgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad dang 'dra
235a1(1): ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyas dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che'i rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po'i sa thams cad kyi rla bas kun nas g.yogs pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rab tu sgreng ba dang sdog pa dang rta khabs
235a2(1): thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang phyi rol kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gi sa li gzhi la stegs bu brjod du myed pas rgyas pa dang / phyogs lagu nas the ma skas kyi phreng ba zhor bu rin po
235a3(1): ches rtsegs shing shigad tu rnam par phye ba sa ba tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyu ra to// 'dze yi tshal thams cad kyang mu zhe dgapa par shin dadu yangs shing rgya che bar ku nAs gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed par
235a4(1): rdul shishi tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang chu zheng kun tu rgya che zhing la ngas pa dang /  rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa la ma nor bu ris po che sna tshogs brjod du byed par kun nas khyab pa dang / nor bu rin khe sa grangs byed
235a5(1): pa'i ra bas kug pas skor ba dang / dzin 'i che sna/ tshogs kyis shing A la'i phreng bas mdzes par rgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur da to// sangs rgya kyi zhing de dag sa spos chu'i chu klu pa tshad myed pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil la'i
235a6(1): spos kyi chu yongs su gang ya / rin de me sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres pa bya da sa/ g.yas phyogs su 'byol zhing 'dab ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su rdzogs pas rab su rgyan pa dag kyang kun gas gags
235a7(1): bar gyur pa to// rin po che'i me tog yun da ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi pad mo rab tu rgyas shing shin datu 'phags pas mdzes par rgyan pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa tshegs pa'i phreng ba bas ma gyis myi
235a8(1): khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun gas g.yeg pa nor bu rig be che thams cad grangs skyed pa'i dra bas kun nas rgyan cing mdzes pa dang // nor bu ris po che'i gzhal myed khang nor bu rim po che thams cad kyis rgyan pa grangs myed pa
235a9(1): spos thams cad kyi ngad kun nas/ 'byung ba bcug spos kyi sprin rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur pa to// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs myed pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtsham dang / ba dan gi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal
235a10(1): mtshas dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshag dang / rgyan gi rgyal mtshan dang / 'phreng ba 'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dris bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin the che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang las kun tu rgyas
235b1(1): dpar 'azhengs pa'i rgyas mtshan dang / nar thun na za che li rgyal po de zhin gshegs la thams cad kyi mtshan gyis 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal ma tshan dang / nam bu rim tha cha'i rgyal po seng ge yid tu'ang ba'il rgyas mtshan dang /  rgan za
235b2(1): me'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyon pa rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu ris po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gi brgyan rnam par bye ba thams cad phyogs kun na sa rgyas tu
235b3(1): 'gyur ba dag kyang kun gas gnas par gyu dang to// dze ta'i tshal gi nom mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal/ myed khang gi sprin bsam gis myi khyab pas rgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur da te/ 'dze tal tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shib grangs
235b4(1): myed pa'i sprin gis kun nas g.yog cing rgyan pa dang / brjod du myed pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor zhing rgyan pa dang / rol mo chung ba dang / dkrol ba brjod tu myed pa'i phrin las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la la stod pa'i
235b5(1): dbyangs dang / nga ro ma snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas rgyan pa dang / rin po che'i da pad ma brjod du myed pa'i sprin gis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang /  rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du myed pa'i steng/ lnga rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan
235b6(1): bcing bas byang chub sems dpa' 'ad cing de bzhin du shenas pa pa bskyed pa'ing byungs snyan pa babyin pa'i sprin ris kun nas brgyas pa dang nga dbang po brjod du skyed pa'i gzugs nyam sa dron par 'byal pa'i no bu ring
235b7(1): ba che'i 'bru'i sprin gis kun gis brgyan pa dang / su trik+ka dkar po'i dra bas spris marjod kyu myod ba'i kun nas largyas pa dang / ! mu tig dmar po'i khang pa tshegs pa'i sprin brjod du myed pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / ro rje lta bu sra ba'i mu tig
235b8(1): gis sprin brjod du byed pa'i char mngon par 'babs pas rab tu brgyan kug nas gnas par gyur pa to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rdza la bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis
235b9(1): gyi khyab pa'i phyir ro// rgyu bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku cig gis 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rnam par 'phrul bsam gyis myi khyab la'i
235b10(1): phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku cig tu zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing / rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin kyi rlabs yongs su son pa kha kha sam gyis myi khya ga pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
236a1(1): rgyas shin tu bra la cig la chos nyid dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs rnam nas par dmyigs par yongs su sten par mdzad pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhis gshegs pa rnams la spu'i bu ga gcig tu thA na ni
236a2(1): mtha'i de bzhin gshegs pa cig nas rtog tu rgyud pa yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa la sam gyi myi khyab kha'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer cig gi sgo zhes / 'jig rten gi khams a b+ha a k+ka sa la snang bar 'gyur pa khas ma gis
236a3(1): myi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la spu'i rtse mo cig la sprul pa'i sprig 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
236a4(1): rnams la bru'i sgo ba gnas 'jig rten gi khams su 'dru ba dang 'jig pa'i bskas pa/ yo dras su ston pa la sam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'dze to la 'tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kug nas gnas par gyu rad pa de
236a5(1): bzhin tu / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi dbyings klas pa/  ga nas ma kha'i mthal gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas ging rab tu brgyan pa dang ga gi nang tu sdud pa dang de bzhin gshegs/ 
236a6(1): pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'dze ta li tshal du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin/ gshegs pa'i 'khor yi dkyis 'khor kya mchos shig un par gan pa dang rgyan thams naSh+Ta
236a7(1): cad kyi sprin gi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po ma thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu spang ba dang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'babe bas brgyan pa dang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyi spen gyis kum nas yos par rgyan pa dang
236a8(1): g+ha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprig gi char rag tu'ar ba las rgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa lhun gyis rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu
236a9(1): 'bab pas rgyan pa dang / 'bred pa dang lnga ldi dang sel mo 'di'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin char rgyun myi chad par mngon par 'bab pas rgyan pa dang / spos sna tshogs gzugs spos phyogs kun nas khrul pa'i sprin dang / na bun gyi char thams cad kyi/ lus kyi
236a10(1): dbyibs star mngon par 'bab las rgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi 'dra bal sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhi bu'i char rgyun myi chad par rab tu 'bad pa dang / rin po che khams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang bden gyi sprin lnga'i bu
236b1(1): me'i lag na khyer kha nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi/ pad a rin po mo sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can chu ba sngon po dang ldan pa'i ze ma la rol mo bkod pa kun nas wA 'byin cing dbyangs snyan pas sgrog
236b2(1): pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa wa dad pa'i 'phreng ba dang / se mo des rgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to// / de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin da
236b3(1): chen po eng ge rnam par 'gyongs pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshol sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du skyed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha ros gi 'jig rten gi khams gser gi sprin sgron ma la rgyas mtshan zhes bya ba/ 
236b4(1): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gi gzi' brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpal rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes lhang/ byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du skyed pa'i rdul shin
236b5(1): chu phra ya snyed dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gi dkyis 'khor rgya mtsho la de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gis brgyan pa dang lnga rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gi tshar mngon par
236b6(1): bamangs/ skams gya bram gyi dran gyi pan sa can byas dang / rnams da na thamam dzad pa'i smin zhi dmangan pa gtad 'a dang / 'breng ba'i yin thams ca dag/ nga kyi pa 'o'i ma mdzin/ 
236b7(1): bar 'bab pa dang / lnga rdzas kyi rgyan gi sprin gi char mngon par 'akye ba dang wA rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi char mngon par sgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gi chur mngon par 'bab
236b8(1): ba dadang / lha rdzas kyis rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gi sprin nam/ mkha'i dbyings as byin kyi rlabs pa dang / rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi/ sprin gi rgyun yid du nyod pas nam/ mkha'i dbyings rgyas par dgengs par byed cing skye mched kyi 'jig te na gi
236b9(1): khams gas ba der lhags zhes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la kha der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs su rten te khab pa rtsegs/ brgyas kun dang ldan zhing no bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / srer
236b10(1): na' khron dbu na pa'i phyogs rab tu snang ba'i dad mo'i snying pa can dag mngon par sprus nas la/ nar bu rin la me sring gzhin gyi byas po'i rla bas khyan gyis kun zhas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs gas spyi zung lams nas
237a1(1): 'khod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du skyed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gi snying po zhes bya la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gi snying po zhun
237a2(1): nas snang ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi thugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan
237a3(1): gcig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la thams cad spos lnga ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel la'i byin gyis rlabs dpa/ sangs rgyas 'byam kla sa pa thams cad rin
