237a4(1): po che sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi dang dra ba chen pos kun tu 'brel pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lte ldi dang / 'phreng ba'i dra ngas kun nas 'brel par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / sangs
237a5(1): byas kyi gang gi 'khor thams cad 'breng ba dang lnga ldi dang / se mo 'o'i rba bas kun nas 'brel par byin kyis rlab pa dang sangs rgyas kyi na zhing gi dkyil 'khod 'ams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi 'greng bas yongs
237a6(1): shul zur yar byin gyis 'arlab sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi tshul rnam sa cad ner bu rin po 'i sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'bres par byin kyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad zhes sna tshogs kyi lnga sngos !
237a7(1): kun nas yongs su blangs shing bzung bar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par smras pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal
237a8(1): gi 'od zer gi lnga ldin pa 'phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel par byin gyis rlabs pa dang 'jig rten gau khams thams cad
237a9(1): kyi gzhi la nor bu rig po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i 'breng la dang lnga sngo la dra bas yongs su bzur bar byin gyis rlabs pa byed cing myi sa med kyi 'jig rteg gi khams gan ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste kra 'khor dang bcas pas
237b1(1): bcom ldan 'das sa phyag tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu snang ba'i ngad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par spru la date/ rin po che thams
237b2(1): kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan kyis kun nas rgyan pa'i byang chub/ sems dpa'i lus su byin kyis rlabs nas dkyil mo krud bcas te 'khod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
237b3(1): pha rol da gi 'jig rten gi khams rin po che'i ri ba rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas mer pags la'i gzi
237b4(1): brjid ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshob brjod du myed pa'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de nas gnang nas/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams
237b5(1): cad gzugs spos kha dog sna tshogs dang /  dri kha dog sna tshogs su ldanan po'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dag ra dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos
237b6(1): na sa sa 'gyu na ba med kyis rgyas yang dgang ba byings mang ma ldan nas dag dod rgya ma dang 'a ba
237b7(1): sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhi ba brjod du myed pa'i rdul shi nad tu phra pa
237b8(1): snyed kyis rgyas par dgang pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po/ 'dangs 'byung pa sa thams cad kyi dbul gi kha dog dang dra ba'i rab kyi/ sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu pra
237b9(1): bsnyed kyi dpyas par dag papa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu zhin po me skam ma'i byas mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi brgyan dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi spris sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdum shin tu bral
237b10(1): snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbying sa thams cad rin po/ tshe'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du skyed pa'i yu ba shi nad tu pra ba snyed kyis
238a1(1): rgyas par dag pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rig le ste 'dzas bu'i chu klung 'jig nyen gi khams thams cad mya spang ba'i yul dang ldan pa lor rab kyi spris sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa'i tshul gi nad tu phra ba
238a2(1): bid nyis rgyas par dgapa pa dang / ga gas ma la nyid dbying sa lams can nor du ran ma ma nyam tha ma gyi dbyings rnams pa rab tu snang nga nar bya smin sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'arjod du byed pa'i rgyas shidang tu phra ba byed kyis kun gas kya bar nyid kyis 'ab pa
238a3(1): dang sems can gi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che yi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi spris sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par do dab pa dang / chos kyi
238a4(1): dpyongs thams cad sbyin ma mkha' rin po me'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs kyi sngon gi skyes pa rab tu snang yang yongs su ston tsa pa ka/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyon pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi spris sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjon tu byed pa'i rdul zhin tu bral
238a5(1): rked kyis byas par dgang ba dang / phyogs bsumams pa da'im mo ma'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snyi ze byang chub rab tu gang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i di rab kyi smin yang brgyas kyi zhing 'arjod du byed pa'i
238a6(1): rdul shin tu bra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / phyi mchen 'jig rten gi khams gan ba den skrag sA nas/ bcom ldan 'das gan ba der dong ste khor dang bcas pas bcom ldas 'das la phyag 'chas
238a7(1): gam gu phyogs su btan te 'a la legs pa'i spos kyi rgyal po lams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa'i mu cig ga dra bas kun nas khyag pa da ga seng gol khri gor du dzin pa'i sa lha'i dbang porab tu snang ba'i rgyal ma can gis pad tshal phreng zab ma dag
238a8(1): mngon par sprul nas/ rin po me snye gi drabs kun nas brgyas pa dang / yid bzhig gi rgyal tha' cod pasacings pa'i byang chub sems dpal lus su byin kyis rlabs nas dkyil mo byang bcas le la dze / byang phyogs kyi 'jigs
238a9(1): ki kharal rgya mtshos nas rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa'i rdus shinang tu bral steng gi la rob gi 'dig rten gi khams na theb 'o gas yo sa su skas pa zhes bya ba / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nas sa pa'i dbus nam ral snang po'i yangs
238a10(1): kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chags myed pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho brjod du byed pa'i rgyal po/ nang tu phra ba snyed dang ldan cig su bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ bzo drug
238b1(1): 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i snam bu li sprin gi rgyan gis brgyan par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang // mdog ser po'i sprin gi brgyan gyis la rgyan par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 
238b2(1): nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gi char rab tu 'bal ba'i rgyas kyis brgyan par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / nam akha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po'i nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gi sprin gi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin
238b3(1): kyis rlabs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ser gi mdog gi nang tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi brgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis rlangs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po cha 'bar po'i gos kyi spri na gis rgyas par byis kyis rlabs la dang
238b4(1): mkha'i dbyings nor bu'in me che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs rnyan gis sna tshogs su 'gyur ba'i gos kyi sprin gi brgyan kyis brgyan par byin kyis rlabs pa dang / na sa mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu rin po che'i sna ma 'us khra bo'i rdo ltar
238b5(1): skar ba'i sprin gis yongs su rgyas par byin kyis thabs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcul kun nas rim po/ che'i rgyal po rnam par snang pa'i dpal 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gis yongs su rgyas par byin
238b6(1): kyis blangs pa dang nam ma'a'i dbyings phyogs pa su kun nas zho tshul rgyal po ldam ba girang thug pa salas phyogs kyi dbyings nas pa da ro'ogs kyi ljin gyis yongs su rgyas pa byin gyis rlabs pa dnga' dngas mas
238b7(1): dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gi gos kyi sprin gim kun nas g.yeg par byin gyis rlab pa byed nyid myi mched kyi/ 'jig rten gi khams gan ma de lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga ma ba der do ste 'khor dang bcas pas
238b8(1): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas khyad phyogs u rten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa dang / seng go Sh+Ta h+ye du rgya'i lad ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul zhes/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyas po seng ge
238b9(1): mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su rgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgya mtshan 'gro la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/ dkyil e krung bcas te 'khod do// byang dang shang gi phyogs tshams kyi 'jig rten
238b10(1): ga khams rgya 'tsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i tshul shi nad phu phra ba snyed kyi pha rosang gi 'jig rtem gi khams sa chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs/ 
239a1(1): pa'i spyan gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpal chos kyi dbyings su shinan tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la brjod du myed pa'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba rnyed dang / 
239a2(1): lhag cig tulacom ldan 'das des gnod nas 'khor gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho 'de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i sI sa 'is kun nas khebs par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten
239a3(1): gi khams 'byas klas pa thams cad spos kyi khang pa legs pa'i sprin gis kun nas khebs par byin gyis rlabs pa dang/ 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa legs pa thams cad gi sI ga gas kun nas khebs par byi/ 
239a4(1): kyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad tsad na gi khang pa rtsegs pa li sIT gi sa kun nas khebs par byin kyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rtemagi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad me tog gi khang pa legs pa'i sman gis
239a5(1): kun nas khebs par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams/ 'byam klasapa thams cad rin po che'i khyad pa rtsegs pa'i sprisprin gis/ kun nas khebs par byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi kham/ 'byam klas pa
239a6(1): thams par rdo rje'i khang pa zegs pa'i sIs gis kus nas khebs par byin kyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byas klas pa thams cad gser gi khang pa legs pa'i spris gos kus nas khebs par byis
239a7(1): kyis rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gos kyi khab pa legs pa'i sprin gis kun nas khebs par byin gyis rlabs pa dang 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad 'ad mo'i khang pa legs pa'i sprin
239a8(1): kis kus nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / byi mu ched kyi 'jig rten gi khams gan ba der lpags nas bcom ldan 'das gas pa dos der snre 'khor dang bags pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ bya ba dang shar
239a9(1): gi phyogs tshams su brtan te/ nor bu ris po che'i khang la rtsegs pa'i sgo/ chos kyi dbyings thams can la mngon pa malta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos tshungs pa myed pa'i pad mo la snying po cas dag mngon par sprul nas
239a10(1): rig po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gyi dra bas yongs su brgyas pa dang / nin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas skyil lo krung bcas te 'khod do// shar dang / 
239b1(1): lho'i phyogs tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzod tu byed pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gi 'jig rten gi khams spos kyi sprin gis rgyas pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po'i
239b2(1): ngas rgyas kyi zhing gas byang chub sems dpal chos kyi 'od phro ba dang ldeg pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod rtsa myed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams shind u pra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom
239b3(1): ldag 'das des gnang nas pa 'khor gi dkyisas khor rgya mchol de nas 'phags ke namangs la'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyis 'khom gser gyi kha dogs bu'i sprin gis kun su khyal bar bya ba dang / na ga la'i dbyings thams
239b4(1): cad rin po'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sprig gis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod 'dru'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khong gi sprim gis kun tu khyab par bya la dang
239b5(1): nam sa kha'i dbyings thams cad rin pa me la dog sA lu'i 'od kyi/ dkyil 'khor gi sprin gis kun su khyab pa bya ba dang / nam ma kha'i dbyings tham pa cad pad so'i snying po'i 'od kyi dkyil gaben gi sprin gis kun pa bya
239b6(1): par bya ba dang / gas sa kha'i dbying sa mams cad na bu'i rgyal po zhin po tso shing gi yas ga'i dkyig 'kho lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sIn gis kun du khyab par byas dang nam 'a'i dbyings thams cad de
239b7(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i btsug gtor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi sprig gis kun su khyab par bya ba dang nam ma kho'i dbyings thams cad 'dzamabu'i chu klung gi gser gis kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gi 'dzin
239b8(1): gis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam/ mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi/ dkyil/ 'khor gi smin gis/ kun u khyab par bya ba dang / na ma mkhal dbyings thams cad zla ba dang skar ma'i tshogs kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi/ 
239b9(1): dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gis kun tu khyab par byed cing myi mched kyi/ 'jig rten gi khams gang na la der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shas dpa 'i phyogs tshams su stan te rin po che'i rdul
239b10(1): dang bral zhing rnam par sna ba baphun gsum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa legs pa dang/ seng ge'i khri rin po mi seng ge rdo rje'i pad ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che la 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i
239b11(1): na na bas ngamatsha nams dang cwa gas shes mas yo nas masam pa da na bya na rgya ma rgya bas gamams meng 'a ci rab tu sa bas
240a1(1): dra las yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas skyil mo kru bsas te yod do// sgo bab nub kyi phyogs tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshol sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed
240a2(1): pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gi 'jig rten gi khams rin po che'i nyi ma'i rab tu snang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor/ mo 'i ye seshes kun tu sdang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa'
240a3(1): bcud kyi dkyis 'khor thams cad nas par thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba / byang chub sems dpa mi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la brjod du skyed pa'i tshul shi nad du phra ba snyed dang lhag cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'a'o ba/ 
240a4(1): gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad gas me tog 'od phro ba'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings sngar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dngang / ba spul bu ga thams cad nas rol mol 'od phro ba'i spris nam mkha'
240a5(1): ltab sangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu la thams cad nas nom bu rim po de la 'od phro la 'i sI sa na ma mkha'i dbyings sbyar yangs pa rab tu dbye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od
240a6(1): bro ba spos dang / gtugs spos sna/ tshogs kyi rnam par gdugs pa'i sprin nam a Sha yi dbyings ltar yang sa ma/ rab u dgye kha dang / ba spu'i yug thams cad nas krus nas par sprul pa'i glog 'od bro ba'i sprin dam/ na
240a7(1): mkha'i dbyings ma wA na yangs pa rab tu dbye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams/ cad/ nas nor bu rin po chen ma par snang ba/ 'od khro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dbye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rim po
240a8(1): gser rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od bro ba'i sprin nam akha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po/ dpal gi snying po/ 'bar ba 'od phro ba'i sI ma nam mkha'i dbyings ltar angs pa rab tu dgye/ 
240a9(1): ba dang ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho la ltar tu sa gsum gi rgyud du snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i 'od phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings sngar yangs pa rab tu dgye khar byed cing
240a10(1): myi mched kyi 'jig rten gi khams gan ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das g.ya ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs kyi tshams su brtan te nor bu rin po che chen
240b1(1): po 'od zer gi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol pa'i thig les chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu spang ba'i khang pa legs pa dngang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma 'od phro ba'i pad yo'i snying po can dag mngon par
240b2(1): sprul nas/ rin po che'i rtul po'i dri ma myed pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan cings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
240b3(1): su sa su byin kyis rlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// nub dang byang gi phyogs tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rtsal shi na de tu phra ba snyed kyi pha ros dge 'jig rten
240b4(1): gi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes la la de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gi li lo kun nas rnam par spang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par sna ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal
240b5(1): zhes bya me/ byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtshog brjod du myed pa'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de nas gnang nas 'khor gi dkyis 'khor de nas 'phags te/ 
240b6(1): dang ba byed payang 'i mas pa dang / bcu'i rnams da/ ma mams cadanas rgyas sa na gshegs pade bzhizhin shegs pa ma pa kyi gag tan pa sprin than tu kyil dang / 
240b7(1): mtshan dang dpel byad bzang po thams cad dang // ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas chus gsum tu 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugasu rnyan gyi spris kun bud bye ba dang mtshan dang dpal
240b8(1): byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba sU'i sgo thams cad dang / sus thams cad nas d+has gsum du gshegs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ cad kyi 'khor gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rnyan gi spr-in kun tu dge ba dang ga su tshan dang
240b9(1): dpe' khyad bzang po thams cad dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang lus thams cad d+ha sa gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spras pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs rnyan med po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpel byad bzang po thams cad
240b10(1): dang ga pa lU'i sgo thams cad dang lus thams cad gas chus gsum rtsa 'byung ba'i nyag pos dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rtag rab tu dgye kha dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po thams cad dadang / ba sU'i sgo thams cad dang lus khams
240b11(1): sa so gshes na gas nan shas ca pa nang semag ma bya byam ca byas kyi kya sarnag ca gsarba c+doMs ca phyo gtsa gsas shapas byas lan tsamam tha pam bab kyi
241a1(1): bdags rgyas gsum cu gshegs rang de bzhin gshegs pa lams cad tu gang po byang chub dang byang chub gyi gang gi gzugs kyi gzunas can ga shAn can tu gyi ba dang / rnam tshan dang ngas kya ma tha ma
241a2(1): bskul sgo thams can dang lus thams cad gas nus gsum rgya gshegs pa'i/ sangs rgyas lams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzugs rnyan yang wa'i spon kun tu dgye ba dang / macas dang dpe' byad babar tho las sa 'ad dang la tshul rna rnams ca
241a3(1): dang lus lams cad gas chus gsum cu 'byung ba'i 'jog rten gi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rnyan gi sprin kus tu dgye sa dang / mtshan dang dpel byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang lus thams 'ad nas chus gsum
241a4(1): 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i thams cad gzugs gi sprin kun tu dgye bas skad cig rlig tunam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas yang dgengs gong / myi mched kyi 'jig rten gi khams gas sa der spags nas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba deng
241a5(1): dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldas 'das la phyag 'tshal danas/ nub dang byad kyi phyogs choms su btan te/ rin po che'i rgyasang po phyogs kus nas nam yar snang ba'i snying po 'i seng gol khri rin po che 'gro ba gam yang/ 
241a6(1): snang ba 'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu tig zhon/ thub pa myed pa'i phrabs yongs su rgyan pa dang rin po che'i 'od kun gam snang ba'i cod pas bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs
241a7(1): nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin da trA pA ba skyed gi pha rold kyi/ 'jig rten gi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
241a8(1): dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nam akhal lta bur chags pa myed pa'i dpal gi rgyal mtshan rgyas po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa thams cad rnam khar thor ba'i ye shes kyis nas
241a9(1): bar gzhon pa zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten go / khams rgya mtsho la brjod du byed pa'i rdul shigad tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'kho gi dkyis 'khor rgya mtsho la de nas 'phags ma sUl du ga yas
241a10(1): bad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang / sma dang dbyangs dang nges pa'i tshig mngon par sgrub pa rgya mtsho la rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byang ba'i tshul rgya mtsho la sprin gi 'brug sna rab tu sprugs pa
241b1(1): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon las mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi 'jig rten gi khams dayongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la tshul rgya
241b2(1): smin ko/ sgra rab tu spags pa dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gi zhing thams cad tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu spags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lams pad kyi yang dag par sgrug pa dang / 
241b3(1): rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu spags pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par thor ba dang sa snying po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshab s+yab dang na ma lam
241b4(1): 'phrul la mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho la rab tu spags pa dang / de la'i rtsa gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khom lo skor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang phying rgya mtsho la dbyangs kyi sprin gi 'brug sgra spags pa dang / 'gro ba 'dus pa thams cad rus la
241b5(1): 'bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu sgragasapa dang / ye shes thams cad khong tu chud par bya ba'i phyir smonas ma cidang ltar btab la dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang thabs dang / chos kyi tshul
241b6(1): rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu skrag pa khyed cing / myi mched kyi'ajig rten gi khams gas pa der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsapa deradod ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom sngam 'das la phyag 'tshal gas
241b7(1): 'og gi phyogasu brtan te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhus myedakha de gi gzugs rnyam du rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa rtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs
241b8(1): kyi pad me'i snying po can yongs su bzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i stong po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs rnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gi cod pan ma gol la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin kyis rlabs nas
241b9(1): dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba'i snyed kyi pha ros da gi 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rigs mya zad pa shig de tu ston da pa zhes
241b10(1): bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyis ga'od kug tu sdang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi dros sa pa li gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba / byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten
242a1(1): segau khams rgya mtsho brjod du myed pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gan pa nas/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba s+phu'i sgo thams
242a2(1): cad dang / lus thams cad dang an sag dang nyin lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang spad yogs thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang bdag dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam kha ma hAng mdzad dang
242a3(1): sngon gi mtha'i mur thug gi de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lu bstan pa dang lung mo stan pa mkhyen pa thams cad dang / da ltar 'byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam
242a4(1): klas pa lams sad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyis pa'i pha rol srung phyi nad pa'i mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gi sbyor ba khyo ma mo dang / len pa dang nga/ sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs rtag mtshas dang dpes byad pabang po dang / 
242a5(1): ba khru'i sgo u sa thams cad dang yan lag dang nyid lag dang tshig gi lam/ dang / gos dang lpa sa yogs thams cad la rab tu byung la rnam par / bstan pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha ros tu phyind pa thams cad/ dang ldan pa'i
242a6(1): rab tu sba bar gyu dad pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshen 'grus dang drag zhul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gi sbyor brgya/ mtsho rab tu snang bar 'gyur la yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin
242a7(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan gi rgya mtsho'i yongs su tshol zhing rab tu smra ba pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gi spyod pa rgya mtsho la rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su snyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i chu
242a8(1): pangs su sbu bsod chos yongs su tshom pa dang ldan pa dang ga mdog pa lams cad dang yongs su gtong zhing gi nad du zhe zhen pa'i lus dang de'i gzugs nyan nas par dmyigs par bya las TIn gi sbyor ba rgyam tsho'u rab tu snar bar 'gyur de
242a9(1): yongs su la stag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhi pa dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mes laram byed pa dang ldan pa'i sdog gi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la rab tu snang bar
242b1(1): 'gyur la yongs su bstan pa dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi/ smon lam rgya mtsho la mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyas dang ldan pa'i sngon gi spyor la rgya mtsho la rab tu spang bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems
242b2(1): dpal thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'arab tu grub pa dang / rnam par nos pa dang rnam par dag par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gi sbyor ga rgya mtsho rab tu snar bar 'gyur ba yongs su snyam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam pa re 'bru
242b3(1): ba thams khad kyi sprin gis rnam par bkang te/ byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil/ 'khor dang ldan pa'i sdom gi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la rab tu snang bar 'gyur bu yongs su bstan pa byed cing myi mched kyi 'jig rten gi khams gag/ 
242b4(1): der lhags zhes bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang / bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogs su brtan te// rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gi kha daM kha che ges pa dang
242b5(1): go'i khri rdo rje e na dra ni la'i pad mo'i snying po can mngon par sprul zhes / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra ba sa kuHnas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal yo dus gsum gi de bzhin gshegs
242b6(1): pa'i mchag dbyangs su stegs pa'i 'phreng pa'ab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgoms ris po che'i cod pa gathogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/ lus su byin kyis rlabs gas dkyis mo dkrung yacas snrelakhong do/ 
242b7(1): 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ shin da rgyas pa chen po'i mdol/ bam po nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas por/ byang chub
242b8(1): sems dpal kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gis byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dru bo nas zhal chu lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i myig dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdol sngo'i tshula'i
242b9(1): gsung la rgya mtsholas nam pa yongs su gzhos pa byang chub sems dpa' thams/ tshad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la dam pa'i pha rol tu bzod par phyind pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshur gyi dor pa/ skad cig sra rig tu yongs su
242b10(1): bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byar pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad yus cig tu rgyas par dag la'i yul dang / ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chu lus mngon slar 'bru bzhi rnam par spar ba tshul shind
243a1(1): tu phra ba cig sa 'jig rten gi khams cig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yus dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smis par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus la sdod pa de bzhin gshegs la thams cad
243a2(1): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'brug sma ba spu'i ru ga thams can nas rab tu klog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi myig g.yor lta bu khong du chud pa waM pa po'i
243a3(1): gyad tu skye ba thams cad mi lam lta bur shes pas byung ba'i las dang tA rnam par smis pa thams cad gzugs rnyas lta bur shes pas rnam par dag gas ye shes ma nges pa ma grub thathams cad kyi byig kyu ltam mngon par shes la/ 'jig rten gyi
243a4(1): khams 'byam kAs pa khams cad sprul pa lta bur khong/ chu chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang // ye shes kyi skad pa rab tu thob pa myi 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i de ros rnam par zhon pa so so yang dag par rig pa
243a5(1): gyi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skadargya mtshol dang chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob la chos da kyi dbyings dang / nam mkhal ldam chags pa khyed pa'i ye shes gi spyod
243a6(1): yul dang ldan pa chos thams cad la srid pa skyed pa'i ye shes rab tu thob par byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi mngonabar shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nam par dag pa / bdud kyi
243a7(1): dkyil 'khor thams ca rnam par dkrug pa'i 'chog 'grus dang ldan pa/ rdzas gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes sgrib la myed pa rab tu thos pa
243a8(1): gnas pa snyed pas rnam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i a len pa myed pa nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldas pa/ srid pa thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul tsun/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad
243a9(1): kyi tshul rgya mtshol la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad za myi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams rnams cad cig nas cig tu bzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul bas 'byung ba/ 'jig rten gi khams
243a10(1): kyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i lus yongs su ston pa pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang rgya che ba dang yangs pa dang // dog la sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa shin tu pra ba zhing rgya chen po yangs par gzung ba'i ye shes khed
243b1(1): rgya chud pa dmyigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra ba shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad sems kyi skad cig la/ 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin/ gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes/ lus dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtshol
243b2(1): thams cad chu go mongs pa myed pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa// sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho la thams cad su rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad myed pa
243b3(1): pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis/ 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyurd kyang / nyan thos chen po sha ri'i bu dang / me lu 'gal gi bu dang / 'od bsrung chen po dang / nam u dang rab 'byor da dang / 'gag snyed dang
243b4(1): mos pa dang ka ta'i bu dang byams la pa ki bu la sogs pas/ 'dze ta'i tshal ma 'khod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de nas dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthul dang sangs
243b5(1): rgyas kyi rnam par ros da pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyasad kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par sprul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rlabs dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
243b6(1): yongs su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i yul lasam gis/ myi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang // byang chub sems dpal kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpal kun
243b7(1): nas tshogs pa 'ang / byang chub sems dpal nye bar 'ongs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khob gi dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems
243b8(1): phyogs su/ 'khor ba dang ga byang chub sems dpe'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khad pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chug sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gis rnam par che ba dang / byang chub sen
243b9(1): dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'gyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par non pa dang / byang sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gi lus rnam
243b10(1): dmyigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtsham bu na/ gsum/ tshogs pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang / byangade chub sems dpa'i
244a1(1): 'od zer 'i dra la rab tu 'byin dra byang chub sems dpa'i spras pa'i sprig kun tu dbyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyas par 'gyed lapa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khe rnam par 'phrul
244a2(1): gsapas mthongad pa/ dga'i nyid zheg/ dge ba'i ma gyi tshungs pa'i phyid sto dag gis ni then gi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'grus pa mthong ba'i rgyar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i pas gas so de dag sa ma rjes sangs rgyas bco ma ldas 'das da
244a3(1): kyos phyonas la cu'i 'jig rten gi khas sa su rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tam dang / bkod pa yongs su dga' yang dag par bstan pa ya dza / de dag sa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs byas kyi rnam par 'azhus
244a4(1): ma yang ga ga las brjod pa sa mdzad do// de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can nams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul pa ma byas ma/ de dag gis ni gzhan gi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu nges
244a5(1): byed pa rab tu bgag papam byes so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtung chum gyi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs ye ma yin no// de ni sems can lcags car yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir son pa ma yin no// de dag gis 'i byang du
244a6(1): sems dab gams pa sa tu phyon la bsdus pa ma byas so// de dag bya gas ni sngon 'bar las 'khor ba'i tshe / gro ga thams par mas kyang yang du 'phags pa'i 'a shen gyi sa la dbyigs pa sa byas so pa de dag gis na tha
244a7(1): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu 'gyur ba 'i dge ba'i rtse gu nye bar gas pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten sas 'das pa'i dge ba'i lal yongs su ma sgrubs so// de dag gis i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa khams pa
244a8(1): rtsarnam la 'brus pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud do// de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i myig zhi lam gis rnam par dmyigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa mthun yong ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i mas byang chub sems
244a9(1): dpa'i rkyen li sa chen po la 'byung la khod chu ma chud do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun kyis yi byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ba zang pa'i ye shes kyi/ myig gi las kyis rnam par dmyigs pa mthun mong/ ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
244a10(1): rlabs las byung ba'i spyas nas pa'i cho sa nyid kyis khyab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chu shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis thob pa / byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnas 'am 'phel bar byed pa khor du ma chung po
244b1(1): de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zur la stsogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa myi mthong ngo // spyi thos so myi shes so// khong du myi chud do// myi rtogs so skye rig go/ yid khyi ches so gyi sems so/ 
244b2(1): nas par s+yai lha'o togs par gyi lha'o// nges par myi sems so// nye bar gyi sems so// de col phyir zhen/ de mi sangs rgyas kyi spyod/ yul ste/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos ches po de dag 'dze tA li chal de nyid zha la 'od
244b3(1): kyang sangs rgyas kyi nam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong ste/ de dag dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i za ba myed do// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi nas par 'phrul pa de dag mthong lce myed pa de lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyig nam par dag go/ dmyigs pa chu
244b4(1): la rgya chen po'i byin kyi rlabs kyis kum du ting nge 'dzin da de lta bu khyed do// de dag shes pa dang / lte ga'am/ khong du chud par bya ba 'am rtogs par bya ba 'am9/ rgyas par dgang yang bya ba dang / 'jug par bya ba dang rnam par lnga pa ngas
244b5(1): 1sas su myong bar bya ba'am gzhan pa'am rnam par gnan pa 'am/ gzhan gis thos par bya ba'i mang/ bstan par bya ba 'amasmos par bya ba'amaH/ yang dag par bstan par bya ba 'am skabs par ltub bar ma
244b6(1): sbyin par bya ba 'am/ de la sems can rnams yongs su skul rar bya ba 'am/ sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ rab tu 'god par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid u sems can 'god par bya ba yang na Shu Shu
244b7(1): de dag la de lta bulenam par tha dad pa myed do// de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrulabyed de/ de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi mthu myed do / de lta bu li stobs myed / de lta bu'i dbang myed do/ de lta bu'i gnas myed do// de lta bu'i 'du
244b8(1): shes byed do// de lta bu'i myig gi mthu myed do// de lta bu'i ye shes byed de// de ci'i phyir zhe na de dag mi de skar nyen thos kyi theg pa las byung ba nyan thos gis yongs su gyub la nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil la khor yongs su rdzogs
244b9(1): pa nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa bden par snad ba shes pas des par rtogs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu zhi ba'i thar thug pa snying rje'i bsam pa myed pa 'jig rten thams cad sa myi ste myi sdod pa rang gi don grub pa ste/ 
244b10(1): de dag ni 'dze ta'i 'tshal de nyid chu kun nas/ 'dus ste 'khod la/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan snga dang / g.yas g.yon dang snyam na/ bcom ldan 'das a mngon tu lta bar gnas kyang 'dze ta'i tsha la der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag
244b11(1): mthong bar ma gyu ra to// / de ci 'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma sgrungs pa dang / thams mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes pa yang dgra bar
245a1(1): ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang drag par a btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma sbubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes yongs su ma sgoms pa dang
245a2(1): khams cad ma khyend pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa li ti de 'dzin gi nas lam 'phrus pa de dag la/ 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba 'am/ ste zhing khong du chud par bya bar myi nus so// de tsal khyer zhe na/ de mi byang chub
245a3(1): sems dra pa'i rigs dang ldas pa rnams kyi phyog gi las go sa la yin gi/ nyan thos kyi myig gis lta la ma yin no // de las gnyan thos chen po de dag 'phena'i chas de nyid sa 'khod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nas par 'brus pa dang gangs
245a4(1): rgyas kyi byin rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun zhes 'dus pa yang sa thong bar ma gyur da to/ de yang 'pheg sde dper mug pa'ags chu klub chen po'i ngogs pa 'olang tshu ro bad su
245a5(1): dgas baphres pa dang skom las rab tu mnar ba/ gcer bgos myed pa/ lus kyi mdog dang kha dog tshig cing 'chums pa rlung dang nyi mas/ skams pa l+ya 'ogs mang po/ gtse ba sbyang ki dpa tshas gro 'tsham pa s+ya stong
245a6(1): mang pos kun nas srir nyung yang 'ga'i su srung ches po kyi mtho 'i// slob pa'i las kyis spobs pa'i phyir/ ba las ni snyam 'i su byed pas mthong do / las ni tha la 'as yongs su gang bas mthong da
245a7(1): de bzhin tu nyan thos chen po gnas rten de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na/ 'khod kyapa/ thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid dang myi thun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling tog gis/ kun nas khebs pa dang 8/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i wa kha'i khrus
245a8(1): yongs su a bzung pa'i phyir / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mtho ba ma shes so// s+ye/ 'di lta ste dper na 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su/ myi la la zhig nyid kyis myos te log par gyur pa nas/ de gnyid
245a9(1): kyis log pa'i rmi lam chu gnas de nyid na lba'i grong rdal rgya byin gyi/ gnas lta na mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa bza' shing gi ya ba'i 'khor dang bcas ya/ A'i bu mo khyeb khrag khrig gis gang sA'i bu rgya bAg stong sbed
245a10(1): gnas pa'i lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / yid bzhin gi shing lha rdzas kyi gos/ drad// mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dngang / se mo to sna tshogs mar lo/ 'byin pa dang / sA tra sa kyi si swA swa na/ 
245b1(1): pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su skyod cing sgra dbyangs yid du 'ongs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan gi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i rked mos bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur swa lha'i bu mo mang pos lbu blangs pa dang / 
245b2(1): dzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyudad te/ bdag nyid kyang de na 'jug pa snyam byed la lnga rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i ga nas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur dkyar skye bo'i tshogs ma pa po de dag gis
245b3(1): gnas de nyid la 'khod bzhin du myi mthong myi shes khong du myi chud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa 'i de nyid kyi rmi sa ma gis sbas pa yin gi / gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis lta ba ma yin no/ 
245b4(1): pa nyid rtsa smon sa ma shi nad tu mngon par sgrubs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shi na tu zhugs pa dang /  byang chub sems dpa'i smosmon la bkod pa dang ldan par gnas pa dpal thams
245b5(1): da pa byedan mas so gas kyam pa nyid / gas gnas gams pa gon ma rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems da na rgyal da ba'i byud pa'i thang bar dang rlomapa pa yongs pa chom
245b6(1): par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyis/ 'khor yongs su gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pa kyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse
245b7(1): dang / byang chub sems dpal ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa myed pa rnam par spyod pas bsam gis myi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu/ phyung ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhom par ro lad pa de dag
245b8(1): mtho ba zhing khong bu chud sa nyams su myong bar gyu dad kyang / nyan thos chen po mchog kai bu pa dang / bzang po'i zung las tshogs de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i myig myed pas// mthong bar ma chu re dges par
245b9(1): gya rad to// 'di lta ste dper ga ro'i rgyal po kha ba can lpan gi 'byung gnas kyis ga pa la sngags dang / rigs sngags dang smas gi tshul dang / blang ba'i rgyus shes shing rigs sngags khyab pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ smag gi mo ga
246a1(1): thams cad shes pa sman blang ba'i las byed kyang // ri bo'i dbang po de nyid sa gnas pa'i phyogs dang ga 'ang ra lug rno ba dang / rngon pa dang de ma yin pa'i myi sman gi tshul myi shes pa gzhan dag gi sa sma med dag
246a2(1): gi cho ga dang / sman gi lo dang mthu dang yon tan dang rkyen dang thabs dang brod pa myi shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems/ dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yus
246a3(1): gis byang ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ti pa nge 'dzin kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mtho yang/ nyan thos chen po chog gzung dang / bzang po'i zu la satshogs pa rang gi dgos pas chis pa kun pa pa gzhan la dngos la yas
246a4(1): bas gzhog pa btang snyoms can de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang tshe 'di la rten par spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa yas par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de/ dag khong du lci chud de// 'di lta
246a5(1): ste dper gangs chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun gsum tshogs pa gter rgya stong rtsams gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su ga sa 'di la yang rin po che'i 'byung gnas
246a6(1): nga gshes mi byas pa mangs gi bya rab myan pa me btan ngas te gzugs sa gis zlogs su bya ba da/ gcer gi gtsug mas dang rnam dang den gags kya sa par sabs pa la sod gams rgya sem pa'i grobs kyi cu rtsa
246a7(1): btan pa dag/ de las rig po che ci 'dod par blangs shing bdag kyang yongs su tshim 'ar byed pha dang ma la yang legs yas par rim 'gro byed/ bupo smos kyang legs par gso ba byed cing de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan ngan pa dang / 
246a8(1): na ba dang dbul ba dang ta mnyes pa dang / kha zas dang gos myi 'byor pa rnams la sdud cing khyab par go sha byed la/ nor li/ dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bal byed kyang sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gi rgyus myi ges pa lasod nams
246a9(1): ma byas pa yin pa ches zhes pa'i myig yongs su dag pa / de dag nyid ga 'khod kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang zhin pa nye 'i gtem de dag khong du kyi chud kyi zhes pas da rin po 'ang spang du byed do/ ris po che'i dos kyang byar byed de
246a10(1): de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yungs bsam gos myi khyab pa la ye shes kyi myig shin tu rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gis myi khyad la ye zhugs pa de dag 'dze ta'i 'tshal na 'khod cing
246b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul la/ de dag mthong sa chos kyi tshul rgya mchos/ 'jug cing / ting nge 'dzinang gi phyag rgya yongs su sbyab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'grol bcog zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'gru ba pa la mngon
246b2(1): bar 'chon ste/ sdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'asdus pa/ de ska bu
246b3(1): a mthong ma shes er 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig myig gnyis gos kyis yakab ste/ Da/ rin po che'i glo cu phyin da par gyur da na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang ye/ tal la byas
246b4(1): kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de myi mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing dang / gos kyi rin po che dang / spos kyi rin po che dang / rin po che thams cad kyang myi mthong sa rin po che de dag gi spyod yul sam/ rin la ta pa dam yongs su spyad pa'i rgyus kyang myi shes pas de ni
246b5(1): rin po che de dag len kyang myi len la/ rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myongapar myi byed de gang gi myig la sgribs pa/ myed pa'i ngag ni de dag mthongang zhing shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por
246b6(1): phyind pa de dag gis khrag myed pa'i de bzhin gshegs 'di rin po Ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan su gyur pa mngon tu gyur da te/ 'jota'i tshal ma bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'grus pa bsam gis kyi khyab sa
246b7(1): yongs su ston pa mthong yang nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegasapa'i zhabs kyi chung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyi pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ti nge 'dzind kyi rmyi sum na ma khar 'phrul lo'i mo 'phrul de dag ma mthong po bya
246b8(1): nub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rim po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar gyur da to// de ci'i phyir zhe na ta/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting de'i 'dzi nang gi khyu mchog gi mthu phung ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis myi khyab la de dag ltar thams cad/ 
246b9(1): khyen da pa nyid dang gyi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sa jig pa'i gos kyis degs kyi sdig lagapa pa de dag la / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyig yongs su dag pa de lta du byed do// de dag gi ches kyi dbyings tshogasas cig tu chud pa 'jug pa deg su
246b10(1): khong du ma chud do// 'di lta ste dper na myig yongs su dag ba rdul dang bral bas reb tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ rab rib dang mun pa thams cad/ dang myi 'grogs/ pe yod de/ de myi la la zhig gis thob par gyur da na/ de rdul dang bral bas rab
247a1(1): rtsa snang ba dang ldan pa'i myig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ mtshan mo sban pa'i sun gag shig tu gzhag par 'gyur ba'i gapas sems can bye ba khrag khrig rgya steng kun nas 'dus pa dang cho ga dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs
247a2(1): dang ldag zhing mun pa'i raba'i sa gyi phyig yongs su 'jug pas bzum pa'i rgyam tha ga 'dun ci rnas par gyus pas rkyen 'grol dang 'bre ba dang / spyod pa lags pa na tshogs kyis spyod kyang byi dag gis skyes bu bro pa ma sung chongs kyi spyod pa de rgyal ba / 
247a3(1): shes so// skyes bu de ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod la ma dang chog sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa phyogs tha dad du mngon par ltas pa byibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa kha dog gi nas pa tha dad par dmyi chags pa tha dad pa'i tha dad pa thams cad kyang kyi 'thong pa byed do/ de
247a4(1): bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor mngal ba rnam par dag cing chags pa myi mngal ba'i spyan dang ldan pas 'jig rten thams cad mkhyend cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin pa gi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul ches
247a5(1): po snyan pa mdzad kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'iye shes dang ting nge 'dzin gi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrus chen po de dgad mthong bar ma khru dang to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu 'ayang
247a6(1): mthong bar ma byad so// 'di ste ste dpe ga dge slong sa la zhin skye mang pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su mas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa sgoms par thugs pas cus khyab pa ya / mes khyab pa'am / rlung gis khyab pa'am/ dra
247a7(1): sngon pos khyab pa 'am/ ser pos khyab pa 'am/ dmar pos khyab pa 'am/ dkar pos khyab pa'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi su so kyis khyab pa'am 'aM/ sgra dang / dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa'am/ dmyigs pa thams cad kyis
247a8(1): khyab pa'i ting nge dzind la snyoms par zhugs na/ 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po myi/ mthong ngo // me'i snang ba de yang myi/ mthong ngo // sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmyigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar du yang myi
247a9(1): mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzind de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par spyod pa rnams si ma rtogs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzinang gi yul gi rnam par spru'ad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa de dag yongs su
247a10(1): stogad pa mdzad na nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthing zhing shes par ma gyu rad to// byang chub sems dpal de pa bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong de khong du chud de// 'di lnga
247b1(1): ste dper na sku grub pa'i myi ni myig gnyis sgras a thag tu skye bo ar po/ thams cad kyis lus mI mthong ngo // des ni 'gro 'am/ 'jug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ 'gro ba mang po thams cad mthong ngo do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs la 'jog
247b2(1): rten las 'das pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yings su 'das pa// thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi yul chu zhugs pA / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi/ myig gis shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad la bzigs kyang
247b3(1): thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo// 'di lta ste dper na myi'i tshe ma 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang bzhi des myi re mthong yang myis lnga de myi mthor ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
247b4(1): pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa// byang chub sems 'apa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yong su stand pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin
247b5(1): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dadang / byang/ chub sems dpa'i 'khor gi dkyil 'khor gi rnam par 'grus pa de de dag kyang ma mthong ngo ma shes so// 'di lta ste dper na dge slong sems nAN+ya
247b6(1): can thams cags dbar dam pali pha rol tu 'grod par phyin pa pa/ 'du shes dang tshom pa 'gog las snyems par zhugs pa zhi/  shes pa byed la tshor ba skyed pas dbang po chug gis kyang byas gang yang nyams
247b7(1): su myi myong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin la 'jig rten gi tha snyad thams cad gnas de na yod kyang snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin kyi rlabs dang / mthus des myi shes myi mthong ba des de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze tra'i
247b8(1): tshal de na yang rnam par spyod la de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa dang / rnam par 'phrul la dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phru pa dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur khong du chud ber ma 'gyur / 
247b9(1): shes par ma gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul / chen po/ de dag dang 'o// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong rtsam chud/ ma mthebs shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yang sa la tshad myed
247b10(1): de lte bar dka' zhing rtogs yar dka' ste/ khong tu chud par dka' la/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul zhi bsam gis myi khyab pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis myi 'dus pal/ 
248a1(1): de khras mnyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnas par 'phrul ya de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // 
248a2(1): mgre pa'i tshal 'jig rten ni khams grangs myed pa khas ma gis kyi khyas gnas pa dag pa'i yon tan dang rgyan yongs su 'dus pa de yang ma mthong ma shes te/ don da'i snod sum rgya dad pa la phyin ro// degs byang chub sems dpasan sa pam
248a3(1): snang mdzad kyi smon lam gi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu skar las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// lto shig sems casangs pa'i// / sangs rgyas byang chub bsam kyi khyab/ rgyal bas sangs
248a4(1): rgyas nas 'brul pa// 'dze ta'i rgyas ma tshan 'dir bstam to// rang 'byung rnams kyis byis kyis rlams / bamang du skyed par khyab pas/ Ta/ sangs rgyas chos tshul gyi zhes pa// 'jig rten kun kyas mgo' yongs so/ 
248a5(1): sa kyi rgyal ba'i tshasathul dang / cad skyen gams kyis kyi thab cing/  shig sngal ba la su 'byung ba'i// des nga brten 'chub kyi thus/ rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dog mdon/ mtshan gyis gan tunas par byas
248a6(1): bdagag sangs rgyas skyed pa'i// ches rab de dag yaman cid byed// nase'abrul mtha' dang dgrab byed pa / tshig gisas gis brjod dag las gas 'phras gnang tu bab pa dag/ kya las yangangs mab tu thas/ rgyas
248a7(1): bdan nyid che ba'i rnam sa// shing rnams lams las bye ba nams// rgyal ba'i zhal sa mos dga' ste/ kun gas 'dus pa'i tshogs la sos/ blonasas yongs su phun gsum tshogs// smem sa sa spyod pa lags byed pa / de dag patsa
248a8(1): shes par mi// 'jig rten kus kyis myi nus so// de dag sems dang spyod yul dang / spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang // rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyis kyang // nas pa kug tu shes myi nus// rgyal sras shes rab chen po rnams
248a9(1): gzhan gyis gru ba dga' mas byed la// dpa' pa'i rgyas mtshan ma 'dres shing // 'ashes sel gnas gyur pa/ tid 'jig dpa ga su tshad byed la// zags len mnyam yang bdag pa rnams// chom dbyings thams ca byas pan
248a10(1): zhi / na mkhar 'phrul la kun kyang bston// de zhes byang chub sems dpa' thub pam dka'i bachog 'grus kyi thugs kyi sa rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu rnam pam ltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'dra/ 
248b1(1): rnams ba rnams nyid pags ba / byang chub skyed pa'i togs gang / 'dzas rten gsus la du byed pa'i// dem gshegs su las skyes pa gas yod bzung pa cwas samams zhig
248b2(1): mam sa na rnamams ldan pa// mtha' dang bus byed papa pa'i// bzhes rgyam srid yul bas// rgyan rams papa sangs byas gi / 'dre ga'i gags cal rgya mal// byang chub sems dpa' kun byas shing // 'de gshenas
248b3(1): tsho ga gnasabra phags pa'i sems byed pa/ ma kyi bying la gnas pa dang / yi sa rgyanyan ma pa' rtenas semapas myig pa zhing// rnam pa skyed pa'i mazhams bya na 'das par yang na pa
248b4(1): gas la shing ngasang khye ba rnams zangs kyis mya ma thagasas te sa/ yang dag sangs rgyas chung dunags/ gnyis kyi ca ni shes nas par bams/ gnang thubs kyayang po'i gnas par 'grubs de/ ma
248b5(1): dag mthong / de'i byis rlabs dam pa yis// byang chub semasadapal 'di dag lhags/ sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa myed/ chos dbyings gzhi la la 'ang de bzhin te/ tha skad tsas su yongs 'byed pa'i// 
248b6(1): pa nam da byin pa rgyal ba'i sras// ros kyi dbyings la dbyed byed pa'i/ mtha' sa thug pa de dag gnas/ tshig nam sa/ yongs su yad skyed pas/ chos la dbyel pa rab tu byed// de ras byang chub sems dpal dpas kug sa 'phags pani
248b7(1): la 'dzid byal les yangs rgyas kyi byis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur nas pas ltas ste de'i tsho tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag sbas so// stegag sems cag das pa'i// ye shes dkyis 'khor gin tu 'angs // dus dang cus sbyin ma khyen da yang shing / 
248b8(1): sems can rnams la chos kyang stos/ su stegs ldan pa tshogs 'dus pa'i// rgol pa thams cad rab tu 'jom// sems cas bsas pa'i bzhin bya/ rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston// phyogs na myi 'azhugs pade gshegs rnams
248b9(1): sangs rgyas yul gi rjes myi bzhud// tshad myed pa dang tshad yod/ mas // thub pa chen pos/ 'dres pa byed// nyi ma mkha' lnga/ 'gro bzhi/ nyis par 'grongs pa/ smos pa myed// de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa/ dus gsum chags
249a1(1): ma rgyas nam 'acus shes par bya// sum pan can gyig mams / lag shin sgom tshu 'a zhe na// nas kyi' ba pa thar ba sa/ dris zung na sagasamed pas// sa 'grel rtsegs parar rgyag// de bzhin sangs
249a2(1): rgyam som nyid kyang 'jis rten 'ams su 'ab tsu/ ji skar du'i nga bur thos// shing nams zangs bkun gnas pa// de bzhin rgyas nga gsum sangs rgyas kyang // ye shes 'o ga'a'ab tu gnas dang / denas byang chub
249a3(1): gagan tu mas 'dapa// de la jig te tus stso la//  sa mngam papa 'alags pas mam// jimar gyi mchom nu da na/ can byed rtsos pa byed pa sas/ sangs rgyas marjo ba 'ang de shi na
249a4(1): gakun gyi rnam sa gcod// rgya mtsho'i chulas 'phags pa'i// mtha nan 'dra pa// de bzhin 'ji ga nyen smon ma yang/ chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/ rig ces kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis// rgya mtshal
249a5(1): rgyas pa ji bzhin rtsa// rang 'byub la shes de bzhin te// myi bde sad cig rab tu mkhyed pa// seMrgan pa'i ye shes shig ma / tshad myed de bzhig ma kyi byed// de bas sangs byas nas 'phrul pa/ thoms gis kyi
249a6(1): da byed nyon// bla ma'i mtshan tan ston pa'i// sgra mkham mkhas la nges pa// nyes ma sangs rgyas mkhyen dab yab// rnam par 'phrul ba rang tu nas/ me lagan pa srernas par dag bams sa rdzongs byed mi pa/ 
249a7(1): na rnams pa dan pas// rnam las son sa ma rdzogs pa la na/ med da sems pa stod pa'i// ran chen nas nga 'i satha// de sar rnas sapa ma da dag pa// 'tshe ba'i khams la gapal 'angs 'du / jis
249b1(1): lag nga// gcinan nas ban rab lags sbyi sa/ rab cings skabs pas/  nga can 'dags so// deH dri byed surang byed/ de danan 'das rgyas pa'ongapas
249b2(1): kyang // san pa'i dang po dag par 'gyur// leras byang chub sems dpam tshas kyi dbyings su su na lam 'ab tu 'phrul ba'i rna pa'i tshul po'o// sas rgyas kyi gyi rangs kyis phyogs brdzu nas ma ma/ rang mchims su ga pa dngas
249b3(1): smras so// bye rnam pa khri mas 'dzin la yis// kha dag mdog cig byas pa snyam// sangs rgyas mthong bas skyes dgu rnams// de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyum// sangs rgyas rdul phras re re la/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams
249b4(1): da kyis gzhas tu byed pa lhod// byang chub sems dpa' nam dag yang da/ 8/ de'i sad 'byung gizhid chub sa// mthal yas sprul par dgal ba ste// blo lngag ye ges 'ayul de la/ 'jig rten mang po 'bab kyi nus// byang chub sems dpal spu don su/ 
249b5(1): bar gyud da pa'i yang / rgyal ba de la ldanang pa mngad// chos kyang mngal 'gyur sngodang la ste/ grag kya'i khyi mchog ston dpar gyur // de'i mo 'phrul tshad skyed pa 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin pa sa brtan pa'i da
249b6(1): pa sgra tshogs rnams/ tshad byed rnam par gzigs kun nas// rnam par 'phral ya mtha la yas pa// tshad skyed gzi' can stonod pa/ mdzad// 'jig nyon mgon po rgyas sras nam sa/ chos kyi dbyings pa slob pa mdzad// chos ras sa ralas
249b7(1): cad yongs la yang / 6/ chags byed ye shes spyod yul 'gyur// skyes bu'i dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis// cho 'phrul rgyad par ba ldan zhing / 'jig rten thams cad rnam spyod pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'dor// sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang / 
249b8(1): ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs spangs shing // shes rab chen po'i klu can rnams// 'jig rten thams cad 'grel par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpal chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzil brjid rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
249b9(1): phyogs btsur rnam par sbas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// drang srong dam yi/ mchog rnams kyi// dus gsum nyan thos gar byung ba// de dag kun gyi bde gshegs kyi// gshegs skabs 'jog 'deg sI shos so// rgyas gsu
250a1(1): ma lus thams cad kyi// mazhen 'ang rgyas yang byung ba// de dag gis kyang mgon po'i// gshegs stabs 'jog 'deg myi rig go// ma rig mun pas sgribs pa rnams// khyi ltar lto la rgyus pa yis// / sems can
250a2(1): de 'dra kun kyis ni/ mgon pa phyigs smos kyi dgos// rgyal bas yad las gzhas pa sbyin// de ni zhes yar gyi zhus te// sangs byas chags byed le shes pas// rin gyis ma sas gin tu 'das// zla ba rgyas 'dra' sang / 
250a3(1): brtan pas can gyis rnas par bris/ de'i smras pa dpas las pag/ nas 'phrul logs byed spyod pa mdzad// tshul ske re res sangs rgyas la// gis tu mnyam pazhag gsas byas kyang // skal pa bye ba bas ma yas pas
250a4(1): tu byed pa yad rnams kyi/ rang 'byung rnams kyi yon tan las// phyogs tsug cha'i mthar myi phyin pa// sangs rgyas de'i zhal ltas kyang// sangs rgyas chos ni bsam gyi khyab// gang zhig de la spong byed cing // gang zhig yid kyis dag la mo sa la
250a5(1): de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i// spyon yul lta dka' thob par 'gyur//  bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas shing // tshogs can yangs pas/  da nam gnon pa// dri byed blo ldan sems gnas pa// de dag 'dze ta'i chas tu
250a6(1): bal ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos sa ngas rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas par smras te/ dem tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// chags myed ye shes spu mngal bas/ rang 'byang nas pani sku myed de/  bsas las
250a7(1): shes sku mangs pas / de dag khasas par gyi nus so// phrin sa sa dag rdzogs ma yas pa// sangs rgyas sgra rab sgrub pa 'i phyis// des 'jig rten gsum gyi sa'o// macan dang pe byad babang ze sangs/ ras kyi dbyings kyisam
250a8(1): spangs pa ga/ 'jig ces can sa spa pa mdzad// sangs rgyas khyang chub sgo yin te// ye shes kun gyi gnas chen no// rags pa lams pananas spangs pas// tshul phyid smos la phyis nga 'a'o// sogs 'ad ser rab babyed pag ga 'dzin/ 
250a9(1): seg sug tu nyis 'dras/ khams sum thams ca nas skyong pas/ srid pa'i 'jig pa rnam par spyod pa ga/ byang chub sems dpal sprug pa mdzadag// byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no// kha dogs thal mas bston mdzad kyang / 
250b1(1): kun lab gnas pa byed // sems can kun gyis lasamasas pa'i/  zhon can byed yongs su man ga skad cig rigs sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub sems dpa' sbyangs pas na// do'i ye shes mapa dang byin papas// rkag la sus
250b2(1): kyang gyi rnam so// la shes bstan par zad byi shes pa/ rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba skyed// de la chus gsum rgyal ba kun // skad cig cig gis rab tu brjod/ cag par las gzhan yongs pacang ce// shes las byang chub den gang
250b3(1): ni gsosas she dang // sashes pa rnyed par bsas// gang gims rgyas rnye pa'i/ langs rgyas mamamams bams kyi // de sa dadapam lus pa yis// sbyi ma 'ang ma cagasas sa
250b4(1): lanas kyang chus sems dpa' nas par snang mdzad kyi na pas dpas ga rgyas macan gis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byegapa bcus rnam par smras / dang mtshogs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// rbam pa rmongs byed dmis
250b5(1): rnams/ ches 'don shin su des rnams dang / rnams bams byas kyi 'ang la/ bya bachub rgyamachos kyi 'dapa' de ga can na/ da nas nges// de dag spyod pa'i spyod sus yis// de dag gis pa sadir kyi bcu na
250b6(1): g.yol// de dag 'di sa the tsom can/ de dag skye bar myi 'gyur ro/ de dag yid kyang zhum myi 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol gang// de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung // de dag dad pa nyid tshugs
250b7(1): gang // yang dag 'phags pa rab tu ste// dbyigs skyed gnas pa skyed ma'i// ye shes 'dis de dag dgal// gsad pa bye bar 'thags pa'o// / yongs su rdzogs pa dgel ba'i chos// ye shes 'di 'dod tshungs byed pa 'ang
250b8(1): dag thams cad yongs su sde la// 'khor pa'i zhad gnas rgyal // 'khor ba dag la gnas pa sbyin// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas// sangs rgyas yul sa rab tu che// / sems can khams ga ji snyed kun/ 
250b9(1): 'jig rten phun gsum tshogs kyu la// de dag thams cad brtan par spangs// sangs rgyas phun gsum tshogs la gnas// sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung 'gyur kyang // 'jig rten don myed rab tu gnas// chags
250b10(1): byed spyod la de dag nyi/ ka rtag sems cag don la gan sa ka de dag spyod pa tshungs myed de// lus cas kus kyis bsas kyi khyas// 'jig rteg 'de la kun sems depas ga de dag zug sngal rnam par zlos// 'jig cen kun pa
251a1(1): snying che zhing // byang chub ye shes nas dag lasaH/ de dag 'jig rten snang bar 'gyur la/ 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel// de nas byang chub sems dpal sgri ba 'a thams cad rnam par grol ba'i rgyal po sa yang ba
251a2(1): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// skal pa bye ba phrag rgyar yang / sangs rgyas sma a rab bkod na/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i// dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smosapa/ chos
251a3(1): kun thugs su chud rtogs pa// 'jig rten gsum gi bsod nams stegs// sems can thams cad nem sbyor pa'i// 'jig rten smon ma mthong gis dgal/ sems can gyi po ma spang ba'i// gzugs kyi sku ni mthong 'gyur na// skas pa bye ba khrag khros tu
251a4(1): ngoms shing tshim paskyed I btub// myi yi dbang po'i skye gzugs la/ byas pa'i sras rnams sna lta zhing // rang gi dge ba chags myed pa// gzhan don 'tshon pa byang chub bsngol// / thung pa chen po'i ye shes sku// / de las so sor yang dag rig/ chags myed
251a5(1): ye shes 'byung 'gyur bas / de ni sangs rgyas byang chub bsngol/ sems can bsamayas tshad myed par// sdang bar mdzad de theg chen ya // btsud nas theg pa/ na chen po'i mchog/ byang chub dam par sung yang stos bsod nams chen
251a6(1): po'i rang bzhin zhing / ye shes dkyil 'khor ga bang 'byung ba 'jig chen chad skyed kun dra spang // bsod nams phung po nam 'phel mdzad ka sdug bsngas drang 'ab tu gcod/ ye shes phung po rnam lar skyo pa gang gis rgyal ba snyes na h+ye
251a7(1): bkur la// / de dag ngan song 'jigs pa myed// rkang gnyis dam pa mthong 'gyur na // shin tu yangs pa'i sems skyed skye// / 'od sA gsal ba shes rab khrul// grangs myed par yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu mchog mthong zhing // byang chub dam pa
251a8(1): nges par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes // de dag kug kyang nges par sems// de nas byang chub sems dpal chos kyi dbyings kyis rlon lam gi gzhi la rab tu rtogs pas / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa
251a9(1): 'dings smras po// yog chags pa mas yun ldan pa kA shag kya'i bu la cho ga zhug mthong nas/ yongs su bsde la byed pa'i sems theg pa las rnam par dge/ sems smin gyi don gyi phyir// zugs rje semapa la bzhen pa nas zang // chos kyi
251a10(1): kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad la / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar/ 'gyur// skal la khrag khrig phrag rgya ma a // sems can don pa yon sa dzad pa'i ka/ sangs rgyas na las la sus cas rnams kra/ kun kyis san glan cis kyang zhus / rlan song gsum/ 
251b1(1): rgyas myi mthong ma yin no// / 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na// / wa dang ngan song chud yod pas// / de dag yun ring gnas p+la li// sangs rgyas myi mthor ma yin no// se ma sa tsamye dmyal ba re rer yang // skas pa tshad myed/ gnas khA'i// mtha'
251b2(1): a sa rgya kha bas brnyas pa'i// byang chub mchog la'ing gnas kyis// ci zhig phyir ni ngan song rtsa/ yum ring gnas par/ 'dod ces// rgyal ba 'i dab maM po 'thod pa i// ye shes 'brel lo'i rgyur 'gyur zhing // rgyas pa 'jig rten mchog mthong mas
251b3(1): sdug snga la thams cad chad par 'gyur/ rdzogs pa yi sangs rgyas spyod yul gi// ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung // sangs rgyas myi'i mchog mthong zhingang // sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyurate// byang chub gang gis thob pa'i// bsod nam sa tshad myed 'phel
251b4(1): par 'gyur / sangs rgyas mthong las sems pananasas/ com ying gnis can dpar 'gyur// 'jig rten 'anas dang 'dig rten gi/ bsas pa'ang nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyus / segs byang chub sems dpa' das/ drab tu
251b5(1): chen po yun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad la nas par ltas ste// de bzhis gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge nas par 'byings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbyel ba dang rgya cher 'arjod pa dang
251b6(1): gsal lar bya ba dang rab tu brjod pa dang yang dag par snyan pa dang / shin tu snang bar b+ha ga dang rab tu gsal kha lta ba dang an dag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul nam ma kho'i dbyings dang mnyam pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dpa'achos kyi dbyings
251b7(1): mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba mnyam pa nyid dnga'agro ba thams cad kyi dus mnyam pa nyid kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ser gre nas pa ma 'byings pa nyid byang chub sems dpal de dag la snyan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par/ 
251b8(1): bstan te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad dru togs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rtul shin tu phra ge rnams la sangs rgyas cig nas gcig tu brgyad pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste nom mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad cu
252a1(1): lA ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i skas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang / mtha' dang dbus myed pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
252a2(1): blo rgyal rol yongs su brjod cing sten pa dang / 'di lta snyig sa ya la 'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khom ga dkyis 'khor gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dug snying po byang chub lang ma ros su 'grum pa'i gnas bskrag pa dang / 
252a3(1): 'di lnga ste khrus gsum gi sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dra bar sprul pa la spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas pa dag pa bstand pa dang / 'di lta ste phyogs rgya mamo thams cad rtsa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho la gzhi mnyam par byin kyis rlab
252a4(1): cing lus cig gis rgyas ka par dgang la bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dbyigs pa'i gzhi la thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dang // chus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhos par 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste zhing
252a5(1): thams cad kyi zhus shin tu phra ba rnams la tus gsum gi zhing cig nas cig/ tu chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / skal pa rgya mtsho la yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum gi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam
252a6(1): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan ma myi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu skor ba phyi ma'i mthar byinakyis rlabs pa bstand pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par
252a7(1): 'gyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin da 'di bstand pa bcu po de dgas batshogs pashin tu stan da ya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ kye rgyas pa'i sras dag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo// de nas byang chub sems
252a8(1): dpal kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po ser ge rnas par 'gyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs stand pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal cu lta zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la thams cad ya rnam
252a9(1): bar ltas nas// sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gis myi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gi rnam par 'grus pa mtha' dang dbus myed pa la rnam par lta ste/ 'jig rten gi khams khas ma gis myi khyag par yang dag par gzhol pa la rnas par
252b1(1): snyas pas/ ye shes pasar gyis myi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i ltos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sa sa/ rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab yanas par ltas nas/ mtha' dang dbus myed pa'i ngag gi las dang nges pa'i tshig dang chos kyi tshul
252b2(1): thams pas rnas par lnga we/ des tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// ba spu cigs rgyam tsho la rgyal ba'i zhing // zhing kun shig tu phra ba'i tshul dang mnyam// / de'i sangs rgyas bya chub sems dpa'i 'khor// kun kyis yongs sgor sangs rgyas gdag la
252b3(1): 'azhugs// spu cig rtses shing sang rgya tshol rnams// snying po byang chub pad mo la gdag gnas pa// chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing // shing drung dam pa kun sa mgon po ldang // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang snyed// rgyal pa spu cig la par
252b4(1): longs lazhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gis yongs su skor/ kun kyang bza ba po 'i spyod pa stom pa mdzad// zhing mchog sdig sa rgyal ba bzhugs kyard kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i spris mang myi zad pa// / de dag phyogs bcu'i ma lus
252b5(1): thams cad gas// 'byam klas shing kus lag pa zhing kun kyang 'ong/ shing rnamasadabye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'od/ phyogs lacu'i chos dbyings rgyas pas kus bkang zhing // stond pa de la gus kyang
252b6(1): 'khod nas sngar// shing rnams kun tu gzugs nyan rab tu ston// ma kyi rgyab po rgyal ba'i ye shes mcho// de dag kus kyang bzab pa'i spyong sa gnas / sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khom tsun par 'dod // 'byas klas zhing rnams kun na d+ya
252b7(1): nga spyon ci / byang chub sems dpa'i dga' par ba gnas te/ chos kyi sprin mthag dpa'o de dag sa// yid cig sul pa nas pa bye ba pa spyod/ byang chub sems ra ba'i spyad pa spyod pa byed/ chas kyi gab chen mchol spyod nam bar zlab/ sa
252b8(1): phas rgya mchor kus sa rab tu bcug/ de dag sangs rgyas sa mi sngon yul gnas// rgyal po'i chos nams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba'i// de dag kun tu bzar lo'i spyod pa shes// sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / rnam par 'thus pa rgya me sangs la
252b9(1): 'jug/ bde gshegs chos dbyings kug tu rgyas bkang zhing / zhing rnams lus kyi rdul phran ci snyed pa'i/ sku'i sprin rnams cag 'gyu'agyed mdzad cing chos kyi chang gis byang chub rabs 'god/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas
252b10(1): pal po 'i zhes bya ba shizhad tu rgyas pa ches mo'i mdol bas po nyi shu ma brgyas pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi tshor de 'drin seng ge nas par gyi sa
253a1(1): a 'di nyid pa de bas kyang banan te/ 'god par mdzad pa'i don tu sbyin tshams kyi mdzod su na nas chos kyi dbyings s+ho sun nas nas par dmyigs pas/ zus gsum gang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po 'od zer gyi dkyil la'or
253a2(1): khangs rgyas kyi shing 'arjod du byed pa'i tshul shin tu za ba babyed dang dran par bye te/ phyags bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mcholas kyi zhing 'byas thas pa rnams cad snang yar ma dad do// denas byang chub segs dpa dag
253a3(1): pa de dag gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi btogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam kha'i dbyings kyi sa thAs kla sa kha thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu pra
253a4(1): pa dag pa lnga sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi bying du bya ba'i kha dog sna tshogs dang rnam pa swa surnam par dag la dag pa dpa'o// gzhi sna tshogs dpa dbyibs sna tshogs dang / ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na byang chub sems
253a5(1): dpa'i snying po byang chub tu phyind te/ seng ge 'i khri la 'dug/ 'jig rten gyi dbang / ne po thams cad kyis shin tu mcho byang chub sems ba'i tshogs kyis kun nas la skod pa bla na byed pa yang dag par
253a6(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang bya ba mthong ste pa/ la yA ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa tsal tu shig tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil mdzor na chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil mdzod kyis chos kyi/ dra tu
253a7(1): 'khor lo bskod par mthong ngo // la wA ga 'i lha'i gnas sa 'jug/ la la sa ni klu'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni gnod sbyin gi gnas na 'jug/ la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'jug/ la la a ni nam mkha' lding kri gnas na 'jug ga ga na ni
253a8(1): gyi lam tsho 'i gnas na 'jug/ la swA sme byi chen po'i gnas ma 'jug/  la ye sa ni phyi'i dab po'i gnas ma 'dug/ la la na ni spyi'i 'jig rten gi grong dang klong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho bra ba 'khor dag na rnam par
253a9(1): baphrul pa sna tshogs dpa/ khyod las sna tshogs dang yus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgornam par sbyin pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su 'byung ba dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi
253a10(1): dkyil 'khod sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi dral sna tshogs bkye ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam ki skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa la bong
253b1(1): bar gyur da to// byang chub sems dpal ji snyed kyis 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i zas gtugs pa phyogs bcu na nas par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas par 'dus pa phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad khu gtogs pa// chos
253b2(1): tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi mying du bya ba sna tshogs su rtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad pang rtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba'i phyogs sna tshogs su rtogs pa 'di g+ha ste/ shar phyogs dang lho phyogs
253b3(1): dang / nub phyogs dang khya phyogs dang shar gyi phyogs tshems dang / shar dang lho'i phyogs tshasas/ dang/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs tshams dang / cu pa dang byang gi phyogs chosas dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing kyi kun gyi phyogs dang / sems can gi lus kyi phyogs
253b4(1): dang / sems can kyi skying du bya ba'i chos dang / sngon gyi ma pa'i mur lug pa'i phyogs dpag phyogs bcu lid ltar gyur pa'i phyogs dang gang nam cag kha'i khongs thams cad du sgra'i rtse mo shig tu bral dgod pas dmyigs pa'i phyogs dang / shing thams cad kyi
253b5(1): hrul shin tu pra ba tsi ga na sa Ni ga tu chud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong khu chun par bya ba'i phyogs dpa/ yas kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su mu ba ba'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo cig la mtha' dang dbus byed pa'i nas 'a
253b6(1): dbyings sti bya bar rtogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'ongs su chud pa'i dus gsum gi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gnos pas kun tu rtogs pa'i 'gro ba khams cad babyi dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dushes kyin la ba la sa nyas
253b7(1): pa'i spa dbyangs su 'gyur ba 'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs nyan rab tu sgrub pa'i 'thul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzi'i rnas par 'phrul ba sems gan thams cad kyi lus la mngon par sna
253b8(1): dbyigs par byas pas/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa bskal pa thams cad ye shes pa phyi dang la zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas sems can gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon gsum bu btam
253b9(1): rnam par demyigs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par btan pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun myi 'chad pa mthong par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das
253b10(1): rnam pad snang mdzad kyis dge' ba'i spyod pa skal pa mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyan pa dang rjes su dran pa dang / snyen bkur bas yongs su smin par bya ba dag go// sngon bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
254a1(1): pa'i byang rtsub tu sems skyed du btsud kha dag go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dang de dag gi drung bya glegs pa'i tshe ga dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sdus pa dag se/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa mnyam khas lams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
254a2(1): su sbyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldas 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'grus pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs khar 'gyur ba dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud pang
254a3(1): 'gyur ba yin te/ la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go// sa la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go// la la zhi sngon gi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su sgrub pa la 'jug go// la la zhi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go/ ya la ni spyod pa'i dkyil
254a4(1): 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// ya la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// kha la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa myi dad
