254a5(1): ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnas par 'byul pa'i btobs dang myi 'jigs pa la 'jug go// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go// de dag
254a6(1): la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya ma tsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod cu byed pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug te/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / lam sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa / d+yaSh+Ta tra
254a7(1): tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang // rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod sna tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs dang // 'jig rten sna tshogs dang / khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang/ tshogs sna tshogs
254a8(1): rag rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go// ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
254a9(1): chos kyi dbyings kun nas rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la logs pa myed pang yul sa pa par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos da dbyings kyi gzhi sa myi dad pa'i ye shes
254a10(1): snab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang gi dbyings la jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
254b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi snyengs pa myi mnga' ba'i rgyan kyis nas par gnon cing rnam par 'gyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
254b2(1): chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi grong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa myed par smra spogs pas rgyas pas 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
254b3(1): gi chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyan pa'i 'od kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i ting
254b4(1): de 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs chags pa myed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems da pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud
254b5(1): thams cad tu la myi dad pa'i lu sa snang ba'i rgyas mtshan dang / byang chub sems na dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha myi dad pa'i Tayul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig
254b6(1): cin thams cad kyi rlung kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ sring ni chen po'i snying po na dang / ga byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'din chos pam sa da kyi/ gnas lanyen pa'i byin drabs dang byang chub sems du pa'i cabatha
254b7(1): nge 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmyigs su myed pas kun tu sprul pa'i gzugs la rnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
254b8(1): nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa mngon pa sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bu dbang po'i
254b9(1): kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa'i dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyis 'khor chags pa myed pas rnam par spyod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs
254b10(1): ba thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dngang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ma su sa pa thams cad bu rnam par 'phrul pa
255a1(1): mngon par skyabs pas phyi ma'i bar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gi spyod pa rgyas stsol 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems pa'i ting
255a2(1): de 'dzin phyi ma'i thar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho la da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i
255a3(1): byin rlabs dpag byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig sdig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbyigs pa khams cad la chags paskyed pa'i mapar 'jug pa
255a4(1): dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig tu byin kyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems/ dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon
255a5(1): bar sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po'i rgyas rdo/ na rdo rje dmang po lta bu bams cad 'ong ba chud pa dang / byang chub rje/ sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzig de bzhin gshegs pa thams pang su
255a6(1): cig pa'i snying po'i byin rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig cig gi sas chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu sems cad khong du chud pas 'os par gnas pa dang / byang chu drab
255a7(1): sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'byas klas pa sgrus pa/ yongs su son pa'i byin gyi rlabs dpa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sIsmi/ 'u tshugs su gzhil rnam par spyod pa'i byid kyi rlabs dang / 
255a8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gi lus tha dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon gsum bu yang dag par gzhol ba dang / 
255a9(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig DA ki sa tha myi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dpe/ byang
255a10(1): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon
255b1(1): pa'i seng ge dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa thams cad mos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i phyag gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sobs bcu'i rgyas gyis rnam par gnog pa'i yang dag par thos pa
255b2(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i myig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'a jog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes par mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub
255b3(1): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gi glong myi g.yol ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos cig la chos thams cad yongs su 'phya bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos cig gi lam gyi nges pa'i ngag gi rig
255b4(1): rab tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya che de dag la rab tu 'jug go// / byang chub sems rapa li ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi
255b5(1): rgyal mtshan gi byin rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin du sa gsum gi mu yaMm par phug pa myed pa dang /  byang chub sems dpa'i tang nge 'dzin la skal ba wa se sa ca khong du tshud
255b6(1): bas tha myi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra las stobs bcu khong tu chud pa dang / byang chub seMsadapa'i ting nge 'dzin myi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
255b7(1): lags pa sems cad bu mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge brjin pa s+ho phyogs thams cad tu kun tu thugs kyis gdon su 'khor ba'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mdon 'du'ab bya ba'i
255b8(1): rnas par 'phrul pa rnam par smrab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa myed pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du na ma kha kha 'i h+yan mngon par sprug pa dang
255b9(1): byang chu ba sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad ci skad cig tu 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul pa'i gzugs rnyan gi sprin mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od nam mkha'i ltar rdul dang bral ba dang/ 
255b10(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam/ mkhar byin gyis rlob pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan rab tu spong pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos
256a1(1): thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sngon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyis la'or snang ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gi sangs rgyas dpas kyi byal mams
256a2(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad cig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chug sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig la sa dacig la mams pa'i thams cad par byin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems
256a3(1): nga ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams kyi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mapa'ayas pa mthong pa'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge
256a4(1): ltar rab tu gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spru khad pas yongs su snyan pas kun tu rnam par dmyigs pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems
256a5(1): dba'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gno// pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin du sa gsumacig tu spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos zas
256a6(1): nyid dang bzhin gyis rab tu ni bang dbyangs can tu ldog pa dang /  kyang rgyasasems dpa'i tibang 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad ma thong ba'i sa sams yidzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge sa ni cab
256a7(1): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad mo'i tshe la rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas pa skyed pa'i nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzig phyo ga sa TI ga tu phyogs bcu'i
256a8(1): rgya mtsho yongs su lud pa'i blong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems
256a9(1): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pa sa zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig TI ka la mngon par shes pa dang ga smon lam thams cad mngon par sgrub pa dang
256a10(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad tu kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin kyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan cig tu khong du chud lar 'jug pa dang
256b1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu sna ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba thams cad tu khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems
256b2(1): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig TIg gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul cig chos sems cad tshul cig par
256b3(1): rnam par 'god pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi'i brjid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams myig 'phrul lhung bu
256b4(1): yongs su slu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa'i byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams ca la myi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting ge 'dzin par yo byin nag par 'jug pas kun
256b5(1): tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems cand thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon bshes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can thams
256b6(1): tsapA la mngon tu byin kyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par
256b7(1): shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thamasacad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems da pa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod pa phyi dpapa'i snying po dang
256b8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang /  byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa khams cad kyi rnam khar thar pa'i pho brang la rnam khar lus pas seng ge
256b9(1): rnam par sgyings pa dang / de dag la 'a sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra la snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni
256b10(1): bir snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya cho de dag la rab tu 'jug go// sems kyi skad cig re re chos kyi dbyings thams cad tu rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal pa mnyam khar spad pa
257a1(1): da ses ga na da na nas kyi sa sa pa nam sa ci sa kyib la'i gangal ba dunan byams pa #
257a2(1): shing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa// ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa yis rjes su lob pa ye shes kyis kun tu rnas
257a3(1): ya spyod pas la shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon tu 'gyur ba ye shes kyi skyig rab rib myed pa dang ldan pa/ sems can kyi 'pho sprur pa'i// rang bzhin thob pa sangs rgyas thams cad
257a4(1): dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song brtag tu rnam par rtog pa myed pang chos la spyod pa chos kyi dmyigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gis zhi bar dmyigs bya 'jig rten thams cad
257a5(1): shin tu zhims gnas pa dad pa myed pa la rab tu gzhol pa/ 'jig rten ba dad pa thams cad tu zhugs pa gnas myed par zhing khams ga bad du dong la chos kyi gnas thams cad la rten pa byed par chos
257a6(1): byams par blang du byed pa'i gzhas las 'ang du byin pa 'gro ba semasacan yongs su smi par bya ba dang / gsus pas bzhug sab sems can thams cadas bde ba'i sa ma ston pa/ leshes dman pa
257a7(1): par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can 'dod chags dang bral ba'i thar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya tshol thams cad las khyen du 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam khar
257a8(1): ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho shes rab spang ba'i'i dkyil 'khor ban ting nge 'dzin kar cen ma mo'i dbyings dang shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/  chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa sa bu ma rab tu rtogs pa 'jig rten
257a9(1): gyi khams la bas par ya rmi la ba la bur zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad myig g.yor la bur khong du chud pa/ sa sad dang dbyings thams cad sA snyan la bu rnam par rig pa cos thams yad mngon par sgrub pa'i res
257a10(1): sprul pa ga bub rab tu rtogs pa/ kyang yar tu 'phags pa'i spos la ma shin tu ba sags pa ye shes kyi dkyis lakhor kun nas rnas par dag pa'i mkhas pa de bsnyen pa// sol bzhin tu mi zhing rab rtsi hU~M ba dang ldan pa/ bzungs kyi rgyu
257b1(1): thams cad kyi se zhes kyi spyod sul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gi stobs kyis dogs pa myed par kun nas rab tu gnon pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi zar phyin pa'i myig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad sa dmyigs pa myed
257b2(1): par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho thAlas pa la rnam par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i stobs dang shud sa thob pardzu 'phrul
257b3(1): pha rold tu byind pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ ting nge 'dzin gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la byin gyi log myed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas
257b4(1): chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i mchog la mkhas pa la/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa smos pa'i stobs dang chos kyi sbyinam dmyi shes pa dang ldan pa/ kyi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga
257b5(1): dbyin pa gnas pa byed pa'i chos kyi dka' ba la dkal bsamos pa chos thams cad la rab rib skyed pa'i phyig gis sa ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'brub dang 'jig bshes pa'i ma drun tu
257b6(1): bar 'gyur ba/ shes rab kyi dkyis 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul bams cad sa nas par smon pa'i 'od zer can legs kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi 'khor sug tu 'gyur ba dper bya la ba
257b7(1): zang la sa gas rgyu'anas pa chos khams cadas dbang po dang yeshes kyi sku sa rab tu skye ba dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshas dang ldan pa bdud thams cad kyi rgyal ma tshan rab tu stsol ba la bal ba/ legs pa ma
257b8(1): nga dag pa'ims can gyis par byin pas gnas pa/ mtshan ma byed pa san sa par suma'i yin kyi rgyan mngon gsum can / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i rgyas pa'ams rgya ga nyi
258a1(1): rba ga zigs kyi kyis 'od mun pabyed pa sa ris su zhugs su phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang yarab tu bkye sa/ 'gro ba lams cad kyi zhing mchog tu 'gyum pa 'os sa dab sa 'ong ba dang 'om la
258a2(1): nan yon pa'i rnam ma tshan rnams kyi ni rab 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zas kye gos pa'i chags khams cad mchar bcad pa sashin tu dpal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du
258a3(1): sgra smad dang dbyangs kyi ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas kyi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs rnyag gi dbang spyar pa dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba gtul ba dang zhun pa'i lus su byin gyis rdong po
258a4(1): zhing 'byam klas pa thams pa du lus cig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ nga 'gro bar 'du bya ba myed pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa skyed par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po theg pa'i
258a5(1): gru dang ldan pa/ legs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings bamasacad du lus rab tu spang ba 'i yeshes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba 'am bar bya shar pa 'gro ba sems cad la sa ma bgyi lta ba bzhin du dag
258a6(1): 'i kha dog dang ldan pa 'gro ba khams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po dang ma su rtogs pa'i ye shes can chos thams cad bsgribs ba myed pa'i yul bu khong du chud pa / chos thams cad kyi rang
258a7(1): bzhin skye ba myed pa/ rnam par rig pa phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su su ba la dbang sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa don zab mo'i tshig yi ge'i mthal snyad la mkhas pa tshig dang
258a8(1): yi ge dang / don gyi 'ad pa rab tu brjod pa mdo sde rgya tsho 'thams cad tshigacig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlo ba ba bsal pa mtha'as sa kha ra yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs/ 
258a9(1): dang ldan pa'i byin rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig cig gis paskasad pa brjod du byed par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig cig gis dus sum ma shes pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes
258a10(1): bas/ chos kyi gzungs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spos pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba las phyir myi ldog pa sangs rgyas kyi ye ges snang ba
258b1(1): rab tu thob pa/ bya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/ chags pa myed pa'i mapa'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos thams cad las khyad par bya'aphags pa'i nas
258b2(1): ba 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dbyigs pa thams cad rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbyings phyogs myed pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs pha ma sa ca rnam
258b3(1): dbye bas chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya pa rang bzhin kha dog myed pa las kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs cig las
258b4(1): yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas/ yang dag par bskyed de bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par 'gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis stod pa ba sngags pa bkur
258b5(1): ba'i tshig dang yi ke myi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa rjod du myed pa'id khyang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tsha la du sa se ga 'khod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la la 'jug pa// de bzhin kyikrig tu
258b6(1): ba li le shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba de dag gis sus thams cad dngag khab pa la rtsegs pa de dag byang chubasems dpa'i long spyod de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ban
258b7(1): ba deg dang / 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang dgal ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems pa'i chos snang la bsam gyis myi khyab pa rab tu thob pas/ dga' ba'i shug sa las byung
258b8(1): ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'bon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyu rang to// 'di lta ste sems kyi sad cig re re la 'od zer ki ma pa'i spri shin tu yongs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su ris
258b9(1): bar byed pa mngon par 'bon te/ phyogs brgya rgyas par khyab par gyur to// rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i smin mngon par 'thon te/ dus sum gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / legs khwa rab tu brjod pa'i sin
258b10(1): ki nga ro rjes su spags pas phyogs bcu rgyas pas khyag par gyurd to// dmyigs pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol mo'i sprin mngon par thon te/ sems cad thams cad kyi la sa dang / nas kham sbyin pa ron
259a1(1): so'i snga smras par blangs pas rjes su sgrog cing phyogs bcur rgyas par khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad smon las dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par
259a2(1): ston pa'i tshul ni di po mngon par 'thon nas// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog las phyogs bcur rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / 
259a3(1): rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas sheng de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su brjod cing phyogs bcu rgyas par byab par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus sa chen dang dpe
259a4(1): byad bzang pos rnam par rgyan pa'i sprin+da mang po mngon par 'bon nas/ zhingathams cad du byung pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba cig nas TIg tu rgyud pa'i rab tu brjod cing phyogs bcu byas par khyab par gyur da
259a5(1): dus ma bus gi de bzhin gshegs pa mams cad dang mnyas pa'i snying po byad chus kyi sde mang po mngon par lon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngos par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su
259a6(1): rgan cing byam pa pa burgyas par khyab pa gyur to// dbyigs pa lams yag las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi smin mang po mngon pa ban da sa sa tshogs kyi rarab tu 'pheb pa gling phyogs su tu
259a7(1): rgyas par khyab par gyurd to// 'grob sems cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin yang po mngon par lon nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun rtsu babar khe'i spyod pa yongs su rjod pa byed cing khyogs bcu byas par khyab
259a8(1): par gyu rad to// zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che khams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs snyan gi sing+ge mapa po mngon par lon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mngon par ston cing
259a9(1): ga sa na byas pa byas par byag to// de smras kyang chus sems das de sa byin kyis pa chos kyi rang sa sa mtshos pasas kyis kyi byab 'du tu rab pa'i rlo dpa
259a10(1): rnam par 'astsal pa'i smis gangs rgyas kyi zhing rjed du byed pa'i rgyal shin tu ska pa nyid grub par gyu rang to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gangs dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnas par 'dra
259b1(1): de dag yongs su son pa byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par sbas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dze ta'i tshul du sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs/ gis tha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung lho / 
259b2(1): dbyigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin cheg nasas/ rnam par 'on cing phyogs rnams kun tu bya ba// bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnas dag pa// nyan dang myis
259b3(1): ba yongs su bcas pa la// de dag thams cad gzugs d+has byung ba snang // rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od phro'i smin// bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu che las// sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu spros byed/ 
259b4(1): cing // zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro/ tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnaMs dang / spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag gi gzugs/ zhing gi me tog kun las mngon thon ste/ bas
259b5(1): gtan yan lag rjod cing kug tu dong / kun tu bzang po 'dra ba rgyal ba'i da sras/ mtshan rab dpe' byad bzang po rgyan pa'i lus / grangs myed bsam yas bde gshegs pa s+phu las/ d+han
259b6(1): sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa byed par 'byung // bde gshegs sras po rus gsum 'byung ba'i rnams// yon tan rgya mtsho legs/ par brjod pa rnams// rgya mtsho ches nyim rgyan pan+de de dag kun
259b7(1): 'dze tati tsha la na gnas shing de dag kun/ phyogs rnams kun kyi sems can yongs kyi las/ rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par/ 'dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gyi gzugs rnams kyi/ 
259b8(1): kase na sa zung bar gyu rang ba kun bya tha sa// dub gsum byung ba'i rgyas ga thams cad kyi// zhing rnams can gyim lus nas 'phrul pa// zhing rnams gya mo'i rdul snyed de dag kyang/ sa so dbyigs kyi dbyigs par gyurang
259b9(1): ba snang // sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mo'i san+de/ su ze re re sna tshogs nas bye ba'i// sangs rgyas gnas rnams sad cig re rer snang // de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin sang bzhugs 'gro dang mnyam par phyogs
259b10(1): rnams kun bgang zhing / ga sems can rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed/ de dag bod las spos kyi 'od 'jo dang/ ra d+h+r-ig me tog pas chen bya tshe'i sprin kyang 'byung/ ma kha' sar chad khyed rin cen gzhas byed khang / sa lus rgyan rab
260a1(1): kun gyis rnams mdzes pa// de dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun khyab byed/ zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no// dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal sras rnams/ kun tu bdang po'i spyod pa rnams tshul du
260a2(1): zhing rnams rgya tsho rnas par dag byas pa'i// rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad myed pa/ phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung ba/ bskal pa rgya tsho chen por rnam dbyangs pa/ de dag kun kyang 'dze ta'i nags
260a3(1): tshal gyi bar snang sa khalal gzugs rnyan tshul du snang / de nas byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gis rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag sa sa byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang snying rje chen po'i sgo/ sangs rgyas
260a4(1): kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tu zhugs par gyur nas de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang na/ yongs su bsdus pa'i don tu zhugs par gyu rad te ga de ltar mnyam khar
260a5(1): bzhag pa de dag gi ba su'i sgo re res nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod dumyed pa'i rdul shin tu phra snyed mngon par gyur te/ 'od zer/ te de dag gi sgo re re nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa'i
260a6(1): sIn 'jig rten gi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang 'gro ba thamasacad la mngon par lta ba'i lus dang / sems can thams cadayongs su sbyin par bya ba dang 'phrod pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon
260a7(1): khar gzon te/ mngon par thon gas kyang phyogs thams cad kyi dbyings rgyas par bka nas sems can thams cad yang dag par sul zhing yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba byed do/ lha'i gnas nas gi kho ba yongs su
260a8(1): bsug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dadang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su spyan po'i sgo nga/ rmi lam yongs su snyan pa'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul
260a9(1): kine tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongs su sprul bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam kyis byang la mi ng+ge dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su spyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i ba reb tu phyin de pa'i spyod pa 'amangs// 
260b1(1): su bstand pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la nan tan du smra ba'i rab tu skrag pa'i sngo dang yan lag dang nyid lag/ gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol dasu phyind pa'i yongs su ston pa'i sgo dang ke byang chub sems
260b2(1): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos sngon 'grus kyi pha rol da kyi phyibyind pa'i yongs su stan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha dad pa dang ting nge 'dzin pa dang/ snyoms par 'jug la thams cad dang
260b3(1): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'kho snang ba rab tu rjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs myed pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su bstan pa'i
260b4(1): sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dru bu 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri la'i sgo dang / dus la mi ltan 'bab pa dang / bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su sbyin par 'gyur
260b5(1): bathog par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho la snang bar bya ba rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i sgo / dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang phas kyi rgos pas myi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal
260b6(1): mtshag yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa lis yongs su stand pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis ton mongs pa dpa' bag chags
260b7(1): sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom khas shes shi mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su snyan pa'i sgo dang // de dag la sogs pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang // gdul ba'i thabs/ dang bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi
260b8(1): shing brjod du myed pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpal de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par swa ba ste/ sa la ni lha'i gnas su phyin pa khar snang ngo // sa la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par skar ro// pa' bzhi
260b9(1): gnod sbyin gi gnas su byin par snang po/ la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par sngang // la la i ma yin gi gnas su phyin pa par snang po// sa la zhi nam mkhal lding gyi gnas su byin par snang po/ ya la ni myi 'am ci'i gnas su
260b10(1): byond par snang / la sa na zhe 'phye chen po 'i gnas su phyind yam snang ngo// sas ni 'tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyind par skad ro/ la ma sa myo'i gnas su byin par snad de/ la la ni gshin rdo'i gnas su phyin pa
261a1(1): par snang de/ la la ni yi nags kyi gnas su phyi nad par snad de / la la ni sems can dmyal pa'i 'jig rten thams cad d+hu phyind par swA pa // la la ni yi dgas kyi/ rgyud thams cad pu phyind par snang de/ mthor
261a2(1): bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / zos pas 'dul ba dang / rjes dran pas/ 'drul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gis/ 'dul la dang / s+ya mying gi chu klung gi sAs bdul ba dang / 'ad kyi dkyil 'khor gis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gi
261a3(1): 'dra ba rab tu 'byed pas 'dus pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha myi dad pa dang / smos sam tha myi dad pa dang / ye shes tha spyi dang / pa da
261a4(1): sems can yongs su slu ba tha myi dad pa'i tshul yongs su byang chub sems dpal de dag 'dze ta'i tshas nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam par sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang / sems
261a5(1): cag gi/ khams khabya ma klas pa thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pabyed par snar yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi chung nas myi g.yold ste/ la sa ni rang gi gnas dang kha pa tshogs pa dang / stan dang
261a6(1): 'khor du bcas pas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed pas sA yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi chung nas myi g.yo lo// la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par swapa/ sas ni sems can yongs
261a7(1): su smin par bya ba'i don tu cig pu gnyis su myed par 'gro bar sAr yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gi dkyil 'khor gi chung nas myi g.yo'o// pas mi dge sbyong gi gzugs// las ni tshangs pa'i gzugs dang / 
261a8(1): lagi nyul zhugs can lams cad kyi ma byad dang cho ga dang chu zheng gi gzugs// la sa ni sman pa'i gzugs/ sa la zhing chod pa'i gzugs// las ni nyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la zhi gar khan gyi/ gzugs/ sa sa
261a9(1): lha khyam la'i gzugs/ sa ma'i gzol thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su zong dang meng khyer dang / zong rdal dang ljongs dang / khams dang rgyas po'i zo khrab lakhom rtsa phyin par spa ste/ rgyas kyi dab bris
261a10(1): zas rjes su 'thung zhing myod rang gzugs dang / sras mangs par sgrub pa sa dang pa dang / sus kyi 'dog dang / dbyibs tshul dang 'dra bu dang / dbyangs nas la la dad pa dang / sad nam pa 'a dngas dang
261b1(1): ma sa zhes pa sa dang pa dang / gnas nas pa tha dad las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad kyig 'phrul snga bur shes pa dang / ma zi'i 'khor thams car rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhes pa brjod
261b2(1): bas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi khyis kyi rlabs kyis rgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams
261b3(1): cad kyi dkyis 'khor rab tu snang ba sa spyod cing / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i don tu grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang // rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpas
261b4(1): gzhon nur gyu ra pa gnas pa myed pa'i 'ang pa legs pa na 'dug 'jug pa las/ skal ba thun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyam brte pa sa 'tshon zhing
261b5(1): sangs rgyas thams cad snyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus su rtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gi smon lam gi rjes su 'brang ba'irkang gis 'gro ba'i ris su rtogs pa'i lnga dag dang / chos gnyan pa
261b6(1): mngon par bsngos pa'i sna'i sna ga dang / snying rje chen gros ston ba'i lum dang / mchos dang / tshe lu dang / rdzi bu dang / khron pa dang mu krung kyi sa dgra dang / shes rab kyi 'ad spang bas rab tugasas la
261b7(1): me'i lha dang / rin po che'i bcod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag dang chos kyi phyogs snang ba khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa gsol ba la tshon pa'i mtshan me'i lce dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i/ 
261b8(1): mngon par bsgrub pa sa tshon pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' rgyan pa la chen po'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi srid pa'i rgya/ mtsho las sa spros par brtson pa'i gang chen mtsho'i lha dag dang
261b9(1): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu tshogs yang dag par 'phags pa sa gartson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i spom don par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha/ dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sus rgyan par bzon zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang
261b10(1): byin gyis rlabs la smod cing brtson pa'i mu klung gi sgra dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdas yongs su sbyang bar gyo nu pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer chu smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / 
262a1(1): sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dkal ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bam bya ba la brtson pa'i d+hi ba li dbang 'o dang/ yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad
262a2(1): rnam par bzlog pa la kha chen pa'i rgyal bum gi dbang po dag dang // sems can thams cad srid bu'i rgya mtsho las 'don pa'i smon lam gis zhugs pa 'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs
262a3(1): ba'i sku dang stobs yongs su sgrub par smon sa ma yongs su skyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ong bas dga' bar 'gyurar cing lus rab tu 'jud pa'i ste phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor pa sa sa skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pan
262a4(1): phyi dor lta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang / rim 'gro che po khyed cing sus rab tu 'jud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang / lhan cig tu de dag gis rim 'gro chen pos mngon par bskon de mchod cing de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i
262a5(1): byan phun gsum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi gnas nas/ byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su skor ba/ lan rgya phrag tu ma zhig byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa zums mchod do// bcom ldan pa 'das kyi spyan
262a6(1): sa byer byung gas 'o phyogs pags su rgyu zhing yodang / mams sa sangs rgyas pas po ma zhes bya yin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdes/ nam bus byed pa/ de nas langs rgyas kyi phyi
262a7(1): kyi rlabs kyis tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun gsum tshogs pa de 'dra bas 'dze ta'i tshas nas byung ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam cu
262a8(1): sems ste/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu dad pa dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dge slong chug bcu tsam gyis bskor cing mthun pu byas ste/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gapan pa der song ste/ bcom
262a9(1): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan/ 'das la gus te/ bcom ldag 'das kyis gnang pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum chu bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyas snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam
262a10(1): dpal gzho nur gyur sa pa sa na sa der dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po sa son pa sa ra tu zhugs pa las skrag ste/ 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang legs par byin pa chen po dang/ bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang
262b1(1): kun kyab sbyin dang / nas dag spyod pa dang / lha'i dpas dang / dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs pa'i das pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i tshwa gros dang / de dag sa gtogs pa dge slong drug bcu tsas lus kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba
262b2(1): byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa mos la zab mor gyu rad pa/ dad pa'i myigasayongs su dag pa sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba la mthul yod pa/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang
262b3(1): rang bzhin des pan rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa// gzhan sa phan par 'gyur ba'i blo can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tanas// mngon par mos pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur pa'i chos stag pa pas 'dul ba sha stag dang / 
262b4(1): 'grogs shing mdun tu byas te sngon du bdar nas 'jam dpa' gzho nur gyur da pa gan pa der dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus de ltams martsa zhugs te do pa'i tshe/ dge slong de dag kunas ltas nas dge slong rgya
262b5(1): mtsho'i blo la smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gi lus mtshan dang dpel byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing / yongs su dag pa'i lha dang myir bcas pas bsam gis myi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi/ 
262b6(1): dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad myed pa'i dgal ba yongs su skyed pa dang / 'od zer gi dra ba'i brgyan sems can dpag tu myed pa'i sdug sngal rab tu zhi bar bye ba dang / 'khor phun gsum tshogs pa sngon yi dge ba'i
262b7(1): changs yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan 'gro nas ma dmyigs mangs ris su gnas pa dang / lam rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi de kyis 'khor thams cad mngon par stabs gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun gsum tshogs pa'i
262b8(1): rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par thon pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la'o ma 'gror byas pa'i dge ba'i lba ba dang rgyu mthun pas shing gi sdeb thams cad nas brgyan mang po byung ba dang / 'jig rten gi dbang po thams cad mchod pa 'i sprin kyi
262b9(1): char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs/ bsu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer gi 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu zlog rtsi dang spyi bor cha dra bal ltos shig ces de dag
262b10(1): 'alogs patsho dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti'i dus 'jam dpal gno nuras gyu da pa lam tu grags pa'i mos can kyi rgyan tshad myed pa dag dge slong dag yongs su bsas te// brjod de/ bgad do// spos so// ba kram sa/ rab tu mdzid do// rnam
263a1(1): par zhe'o/ gsal bar byas so// de ltar gnas/ brtan sha ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu dad pa'i yon tan ji tsam tu brjod pa de tsam de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par dag par gyur da te/ rab tu dang bar gyur da / 
263a2(1): gla dgal ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// mos pa skyes par gyur to// de dag gi sems kyi rgyud lngas su rung bar gyurd to// dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur da te/ yid bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyu da to// yid kyi bde sa rab tu byang bar
263a3(1): gyur da to// sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur pa de// sgrig pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur pate/ sangs rgyas ska bas mngon par mos par gyur pa to// sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhos par gyur to// byang chub sems pa'i dbang
263a4(1): po yongs su dag par gyur da to// byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs bar gyur to// snying rje chen po 'byung bar gyur to// pha rold tu phyind pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyurd to// snying rje chen po yongs su skye bar
263a5(1): gyurd to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang dar/ gyu rad to// de skar de dag thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du mos pa'i shugasathob par gyu rad nas/ 'di skad 'dzer te mkhan po bdag cag kyang
263a6(1): skyes bu dam pa del chung du phyin par mdzad rtsagasol zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/ 'jam dpa' g.yo nur gyur pa gan ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so// 
263a7(1): 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa/ dag go// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang 'khor gyi dkyis/ 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par glang po'i sta stangs kyis gzil dang ldan par khyab
263a8(1): bar ltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong gra dang khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i
263a9(1): ma 'di dang / bdag gi dge ba'i ma pa gzhan khyod kyis mkhyend pa dang / mkhan thos thugs chud pa dang / gdas pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gag kyi grub pas mngon tu gzigs pa'i dge ba'i ma pa des khyod kyi 'dra ba de lnga ba
263a10(1): 'gyur te/ nam pa 'di 'dra ba'i yus rlob par shog gig/ nam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang // nas pa na ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin tshu 'ag khar shig gis / ces dge slong de dag gis re
263b1(1): skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal g.yo nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong dag yongs su myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa yi rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la bzhugs pa 'i
263b2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci spos kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro// bcu gapa zhen 'di ste ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ska ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang // rim 'gro bya ba la
263b3(1): 'ongs su kyi spo ba'i ses pa pabyed pa nga the ba'i byas bams pan thathams palas kyid kyi bye par 'angs su mya bya ba'i sems babyed pa dang / sa mas can bcas pas yongs su kyi byama'i sems paskyed pa dang /  tha
263b4(1): dpa'i pha rold tu/ phyind pa thams cad sbyor ba la myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzi nad tham sa cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas cig tu brgyud pa
263b5(1): thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtshol rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya bas yongs su myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang
263b6(1): sems can gi khams thams cad yongs su rgyan par bya ba dang gdus pa la yongs su myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang zhing dang bskapa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas mngon par bsgra
263b7(1): ba la yongs su myi skyo ba'i sems la skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa sbya pas sems can gcig yongs su skyes par bya bas tshul su sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya/ 
263b8(1): mas de bzhin gshegs pami stobs cig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su myi skyo ba'i sems ba skyed pa'o// dge slong dag yong su myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bsu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang pa dang ldan pa med ge
263b9(1): ba'i ma pa thams can pa yongs su zab par 'gyur ro// khor ba'i rgyan thams cad las khyim ldog lem 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten gi rgyud khrims cad las kyen tu 'phashes par 'gyur ro/ nyan lom dang 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad sas yongs
263b10(1): chu la par 'gyur no// de bzhin gshegs ma khams cas kyi rigs dang rgya rgya 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal thams can gyi spos sa nga dag par zab par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs bra mams cad kyi yon can tshunan can sarnam
264a1(1): pa dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad sa yongs su dag par 'gyur no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs pa yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur na// bdun dang las kyi rgol pa thams cad ra
264a2(1): 'dul bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la
264a3(1): chags pa byed pa'i myig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// de yi mthul phyogs pa su mthal yas mu skyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gi dkyil khor / mthong bar gyurd 'o// 'jin
264a4(1): rten gi khams de dag gi 'go ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus par mthong par gyur to// 'jig rten gi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyu dad to// 'jig rten gi khams de dag kyang
264a5(1): rnam par bye ba sna tshogs pa mthong bar gyurd to// 'jig rten gi khams de dag ni rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis shes par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag gri rin po che'i gnas
264a6(1): bangs rkyen 'das kyang ma pa 'azung ma/  bzhis gnan pa dgag byas kyi la lag rgya mtshol la mas par byed pa/ sanyam ma snye sa kyang cig pami zhe dang sa pa'o tshig dang / 
264a7(1): dang myi dang badz+ras yongs su shes par gyurd to// sems can de dag gi sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur tote// sngon gyi mtha' dang myi ma'i mtha'i tshe rab bsu yang rjes su dran par gyur da tong / 
264a8(1): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo/ bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul kyis nam par yul pa mngon par bsgrubar bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su
264a9(1): bstan pa'i chag mngon pas bsgrub pa bstsal zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sa somaya dag yar rig pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcul yang rab tu zhugs paras gyurd to// ting nge 'dzind de zeb ma lag tu bya ba
264a10(1): chub kyi sems kyi ma sras ga stong phrag brgyalang yongs su rdzogs par gyurd te/ ti pe dzin pa stong khrag bsu yar yongs su non par 'gyur ro// pha ros tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong khrag bcu yang nam par dag par gyur te/ sA la
264b1(1): chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po 'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar 'gyur ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thos par gyur to/ de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phral thob ste/ byang chub tu
264b2(1): sems bskyed pa yatan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu da pas// byang chub sems dpal kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yor dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do// / de ltar byang chub sems dpal kun tu babang po'i spyod pa la rang
264b3(1): tu gnas la de dag smon lam chen po rgya mamo zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur te/ de skar smon lam chen pos rgya tsho mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab u thob par gyur de 'o// lus rnam par
264b4(1): dag pas sus yang ba rab tu thob par gyur pa to// de ltar sus rnam par dag pa dang lus yang bas/ mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas/ myi mnyam zhing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu tho ba par
264b5(1): gyurd to// mngon par shes pa de thob pas 'jathad pas gzho nur bya rad pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang myi g.yolas angs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs
264b6(1): ba thams can kyi spu'i phrin las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyurd to// de nas 'jam dpas gso nur gyu rad pas dge slong de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas// mtha rad kyis
264b7(1): yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs sogs su bskyed pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdas chen po gapan pa de logs su dong ste byin nas// grong nas chen po la sbyi/ pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nag ma tshal chen po sa la sna tshogs
264b8(1): kyi rgyal mtshab kyi rgyan ces bya ba/ sngon gi sangs rgyas bzhugs pa thams pa'i mtshan nyes sems can sbyin par yadza pa'i don tu de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pas/ gsam tha' yas par myir ni sgra rjes su grags pa ldan las
264b9(1): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mdzad la mcho/ yongs su gtang khur dkal la kyum yongs su btang ba ste/ sa'i phyogs de na lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' sding
264b10(1): da dang / byi ma dang / rnas kyi na pa dang / rgyad phyi ma yig brnams la sa rgyan gyi yan par mcho bras mamam pa'i gas/ yod 'dapal dang bas kyi phyin gas// deng 'angs rab gzhon bur byas pas ya cwoms kyi kyi
265a1(1): pa 'ang shas byams da' bye 'ganyin tum bras bca byasanaye dbadas panas kyis man 'gas byabye sa pagacig cam zu sa 'asasas gis ma chu shesasalas rgya
265a2(1): yom tha pa de shig ngas san nyasems par 'byas tshu drugs par brlo das phyi rgyan 'das su 'did par bya na/ rab cwa grang mas lanasun byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya rgya pas byas kyis
265a3(1): bar byed rta yan pa'amamams can gyi'ams sas dang bung byed pa sa pa gsum gyis sa gtan dang gagan tu rnam par bcas par byar bang/ denas pasbyin pa'i 'byung sa nas kyi kyi rnams kyim 'jab dpas gan zu gyu pa
265a4(1): byung ba'i bathud panas sa rbang rgyas su byid da/ byal cogs kya nga kyimayin nyen gyigana' nyid sa nam par spyod ga gas las nas/ nan zhan mo dpon shes napa chen pa la thogan pa dge bzhes pa dang dge zhes pa dang / kye dang bum
265a5(1): rten bzang zos byin dang // bzod gams 'ad dang / grags pa'i lda dang / zags pa byin dang / slab 'i dpas dang / bra ba dgal po dang / zla zos pa zang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / sna can gzang dang / dge
265a6(1): snyen bzang po'i dpal dang 'i dag la stsogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdzun tu byas te/ 'jam dpas yazho nur gyu ra pa gangan pa der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa'i rkang pa la spyi bos phyag 'tsha te/ 'jam dpas gzho nur gyurang
265a7(1): ba la yan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'od do// de skar dge snyen la shes rab chen mo ni dge bsnyen ma 'od lamang mo dang / lus bza sgo dang // dge ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpral bzang mo
265a8(1): dang de dag la stsogs pa'i dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun rtsa byas te/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu dad pa gang na pa der dong nas 'jamad pa la gzho nur gyur da pa'i rkang pa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd
265a9(1): pa sa lan gsum skor ya byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod de// de nas tshob dpon gi bu zhor/ bzangs ni tshong dpon gi khu bcus zhugs bzang lo dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshus bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa
265b1(1): bzang po dang / bsam la bzang po dang / zla lbos bzang po dang / blo bzang po dang / myig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang // tshong dpon gi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dge la sogs pa tsho dpon gyi bu lA rgyas
265b2(1): bskor cing mthun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu rad pa gangan pa der dong nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurang pa'i ma pa pa gnyis la/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa pa la las gsum cu bskor ba byas nas
265b3(1): phyogs cig tu khod do// de la khyim khudag shos rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni bu mo/ bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i gzhi dang / brtam pa'i blo gros dang // dpal bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byin dang / dpal gyi
265b4(1): 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga rgyas skor ra cing mdun tu byas te/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu da pa gang na ba der dor nas/ 'jam dpal gzhi nur gyurd pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
265b5(1): phu mo de dag 'dus te khod par shes nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ bstan pa'i byis kyis zil kyis mnam te/ byams pa chen po'i byin gyis sim par byas nas snying rje chen po'i byin kyis chos ldan da pa mngon pa
265b6(1): skyabs ste/ ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dpa bsam pa rnam par phye nas la/ so yang dag par rig pos chos bstan par dga' ste/ 'tshong dpon gi bu nor bzangs sa ltas so// 'tshong dpon gyi bu nor 'azangs shes bya ba ci'i phyir nor bzang
265b7(1): shes bya zhe na/ tsheng dpon kyi bu nor bzangs zhes bya ba de la thog ar ma'i mar la chu zhugs ma thag tu khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po khron par gyur to// rin po che'i sngo po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun
265b8(1): yod de// gser dang datsal dang bye cu n+ya dang shes dang mu tig dang a sA gar pa dang mu sa lag ba dang / so mi gtamachas pa mjas pa de dag kya chu zheng dang thams su khA be rngan tsam pa sa 'i steng nas ma ngan par 'bogs te/ snab ba brang rnam par sA / 
265b9(1): zhing mdzes par bya dad stan/  mni/ rin po che de btsun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang gte de dag skyes te/ sa li bzhi rtes nas mngon par thon par thon par gyu ra to// de yan lag pa nyis lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/ zla la bcu
266a1(1): len nas tsas pa dang de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang rnams su khru bdun tsam cu sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te/ snang bar byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyurd to/ khyim der rin po me sna tshogs
266a2(1): rjong lnga bas yang byung bar 'gyurate/ 'di sar mar gyi byed dang nyis ma 'i snod dang bsrung rtsi'i snod dang / sams gi skrod dang / gzhan dag kyang ma so nas yo byad sde tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag ste/ ji ltar rdo lnga la sdom snatshon
266a3(1): kyis yongs su gang pa dang / spos kyi sgod gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / me shel gi snod kha zas dang sman gzigs sna tshogs mo mchog tu zhim khas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / gser gi snod
266a4(1): dngul si la mas yongs su gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod ser phyes yongs su gang ba dang / pa men gi sgong zhor bu rin po Ne bye dru rgyas yongs su ga pa dang / shes gi skrod su sa ma gar bas yongs su gang ba dang / mu sa ra gar ba'i snod rim po che shes
266a5(1): gis yongs su gapal dang / a sma gam pa'i snod mu tig gis yongs sudagang ba dang // nor bu rig po me skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod nor bu rin po che mu dngas kyis yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che mu 'dang kyi sgod nor bu rin
266a6(1): po nya ba ma'i byam ma can pas yongs su gang ba dang / de dag pa sos mngon tham mi skro sa brgya 'dzin par gyur ga// tshor dpon sa su gor ba nga na 'anas ma thams khyim dang bang ba dang 'dzin thams cad tun dang cwo
266a7(1): byig dang sa na pa tshan mas kyim man pa dbabs kyadas des tham mashes pa dang sa dngas dang can gyi logs kyis 'di las salags rnam sa po bus gsum choms pa 'byung bar 'gyur pas me pa dang de
266a8(1): thar gying cu bajamasapa// tshod dben mi bu nor parangs de'i na ni byas pa la bya ba byas pa'o// dge ba'i mab bskyed pa ma/ mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o// dge ba'i shes gcin gis rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa ca ni// sus dab dag dang yon gyi 'a
266a9(1): khan ga yo ba byed pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i las yongs su ltung ba la rab tu son pa'o// thams cad mnyend pa la rab tu mes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod tu 'gyur ba'o// bsam pa'i nam ga yongs su dag pa'i// byang chub kyi sems
266a10(1): sa pa byedan pa 'angs su thogs dasang / rnyegs 'angs dpas gzhin byad pas chod da dag sun 'dadas lags ga dga' pa'i gtas byas dmidas nis so// sangs rgyas bya'am gams pan las cad bamam sasas cam
266b1(1): kyi khob kyi dkyis 'khor rnam par dag pa sas kyang 'tshams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i las kyang tshams/ sangs rgyas cig nas TIg tu rgyud pa thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams
266b2(1): cad kyi khad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyis thams// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang smras pa'i rgyan las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dbang pel byad bza pa po rnam par dag pa las
266b3(1): kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos su yongs su grub pa las kyang khartsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil khor gyi brgyan rnam par dag pa sas kyang btsam
266b4(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te chos kyang bstan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpas gzho nur gyur da pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dge chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gis bstan te/ 
266b5(1): yang dag par bskus nas spro ba bskyed de dga' bar byas nas bA na s+ye/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems laskyed chu btsud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i ma pa yongs su dran par byas nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi
266b6(1): grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu chos bstan pas byin gyis rlabs te bde dar byas nas de nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu rad pa las
266b7(1): rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang che ba nyid thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin chu la brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la tshigs su gcad de mngon par
266b8(1): bstod de// bla gros chen po mthal yas spyod yul cen// khyod kyi mthus ni sems can smad slad du// bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur da// de sa/ nges pa gang chos bdag sa gsen// / dga' ba'i chus bkar 'obab kyis kun nas
266b9(1): bskor// dargyas 'dregs pa'i ra la mtho yar brtsegs/ sems can las rgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdas/ de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum phying ldan me// de zhi gti mug ma drig gzings pas khyebs/ 'dod chags e sdab me lces rab tu
266b10(1): gtungs/ rtag par brgyad kyi dbang po la dab du gyur/ delas byis pa ma rig rten kyang tshul/ sred pa'i sgrog dang zhags pas shin phya glags// g.yol dang spyi'i skyon gyis tho btsams shing / the tsom yid gnyis dag gis myig mdongs pa
267a1(1): log pa byin phyogs sems ram tu zhugs/ phra dog ser sna'i thag pas chags shing bcings/ yi dgas byol song sems cas dmyas myi khro mu rmya/ rga shi'i nad dang skye bas rab tu man ne// 'go mongs las rgyud bams
267a2(1): ma des khyed ni thugs rjen ma dag pa'i// dkyil zhan ye shes med laber spang sa la/ sa/ rkyen mongs rgyas mo bskam pam shar te 'phags/ nyis 'thabs bdag la skas la mdzad/ byams pa bsgoms pas dkyil khor rdzogs
267a3(1): shing nya// masod nams zla 'od bde ba'i zer 'gyed pa// / sems can kun kyi gnas su shar 'gyur gyis// zla ba nya ba lta bur bdag skar mdzad// / dkar mthu thams cad yongs bstsags dkor mngal zhing / chos dbyings 'bal chags
267a4(1): ba myi mnga' ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pasa'o// rgyas por gyur da pas bdag la bstan tu gsol// / byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu mngal ste/ bsod nams pape shes shin tu yangs gsugs shing / sems can kun la
267a5(1): phan pa'i don zhugs pa'i// / ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol// bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go ma nabs te/ ye shes pa spyan mtha'i thugs rje'i phyag ring bas// bdud kyi dmig dpung tshogs
267a6(1): ma ga ca pang// ga chen pas 'dag kyilan bag tu shing gam ma skyes pamanos panang rnams thabs gyi#
267a7(1): mdzad pa// brgya byin 'gyur bas bdag kyang gzigs su gsolanabyis pa'i gnas 'gyur khams gsum khe pa na/ nyam mongs las rnams nam la drabs la ba mkhyen da// rgya'i sa dpal ma rgyad khon rmongs par/ me mar wa
267a8(1): khas ba deg kyang shus bstan gsol// / ngan 'grol lam rnams rnam par bzlog mdzad cing // bdil ba'i 'gro ba 'os ma rnams nam spyod pa// 'jig rten kun gyi lam gi rgyud las 'das// bdag la'ang ma tha rad pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol
267a9(1): cag dang bdag dang bde bar bde bar 'du shes ldan// / log 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis skyabs gyur kyis// bden pa'i ye shes spyan no/ mchog mara' bas // mthar sgo 'dag la 'ong myur tu dbye bar gsoso/ yang dag log pa'i lams mkhas
267a10(1): 'gyur cing // sam gi rgyas dang lus la stengs kyi mngal// lam nams grus kyis 'dug bzugs chud pa// bdag la byang chub thus mi bstan thugasos// yang dgas pa'i sa'i khangs zhugs/ sangs rgyas srin gyi yon tan mas kyis
267b1(1): baspyan da/ sangs rgyas chos legs me tog chan 'bebs pa// / byang chu shul zhi bdag la bstan tu gsol// / rgyal la gdan/ 'das ma khyen gang rnams dang / da ltam 'byung ba'i rgyal pa sngam mdzad pa / sems can gso bo legs par
267b2(1): gshegs pa'i phyogs/  yang ses ldan mdzan pas bdag bstan gsal// las kyi khrul khor tshulal myi snyengs pa/ chos theg shi pa ta'i khrum 'khom sa khyen gyur da cing // ye shes theg pa'i tshul la nam nges bya/ byang chub leg pa
267b3(1): bdag sa la gad tu gsol pa/ mos shing smos pa'i khar lo'i mu khyud can// bzod pa rdo lnga snying rje srog shing zhen// dad pa'i gnyal shing rin cen legs spras pa 'i// byang chub theg la bdag kyang skyon rtsa gsel/ gzungs rnams kus kyis nam
267b4(1): dag dkyil khor can// byams pa brtsegs pa'i dag lengs rab brgyan pa/ so sor yang dag rig pa'i dril phreng can// theg mchog babang pos bdag la bsan tu gsol// tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan// 
267b5(1): ting 'dzin bud myed khrag khrig kun nas rgyu// chos kyi rda' dbyangs rab bsgrags pa// / theg pa'i dam pas bdag la bstan tu gsol// / bsdu ba bzhi'i myi zad/ mdzod ldan pa// ye shes rin cen yon tan
267b6(1): 'phreng gis brgyan// / khrel yod/ 'dul po'i 'phreng bas mchog bsnams pa'i// / theg pa 'i dam pa/ bdag a bstan tu gsol// sbyin ba'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can// tshul khrims ca
267b7(1): ngan snying rje'i byug ldan zhing // bzod pa'i zer gis mtshan rnams dam sbyar pa// theg pa'i mchog la myur tu bdag bzhag gsol// sems thams cad/ 'dul la myi ldog pa// / bsam gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthor
267b8(1): smon cing// shes rab thags gnyis 'byor 'thun 'gro skye ba'i// chos kyi theg pa'i mchogs bdag bzhag gsos// / sras 'khor los lam gyi 'khor spong bya/ chos kyi gzugs dam mthu brtam che ldan zhing/ ye shes khrul 'khor legs
267b9(1): rgyangs legs pa'i// chos kyi reg pa des bdag sbyin gsol/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing / sems can ltabs rgyas grogs byed pa// / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon gyu rad pa'i// ye shes theg pas gdogs brtan
267b10(1): rgyag soH/ do'i garnam pas de rje bzhin gnas pa// ye gas skye mas sems spangs legs byas shing / sgrib dang chanas pa thams cad 'acod pa'i/ bzan po'i chags bdag kyang ston 'am gsas/ wa mnyam dri byed shin tu sangs gyur
268a1(1): sems can thams cad skyob las bde grub cing // chos dbyings shin tu rgya chernam spang ba'i// byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// sdug sngal phung po rab 'byung gcod byed pa// / nyon mongs las kyi tshul mang spyod sel cing / 
268a2(1): bdud dang zam gyis rgol la kun 'jom pa'i/ chos kyi leg la bdag kyang skyon tu gses/ phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes rab snang ba'i / chos dbying sa nam mkha' nas pa grub byed cing / sems can kug kyi bsam po jog pa byed pa'i chos kyi theg la 'das
268a3(1): kyang bskyog tugs la// nam dag ma 'a la da mtshad phyed kyi bad pa// sred dang ma rig smra ba'i skyon byed cing / sems can kun la khan par rab gnas pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsos// rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas/ 
268a4(1): smon lam mthu yis 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing/ zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyes byed pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol/ sa ches bzhi'i stobs kyi stobs ldan pa/ snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing // ye shes so
268a5(1): 'gro ba nyer mtshol ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang kha skyon du gsol// / nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer mtshol zhing / bsrub rab yangs 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor cas/ gzungs kyi stobs mchog dam pa'i 'od bzang ba'i
268a6(1): seshes nyis kyis bdag la bsag tu gsol// bskas pa mang po tus rab 'aslabs pas/ rgya'i chus dpas kus mkhas 'gyur ba/ gang gis 'dus byas zong khyem gnam 'gyum ba'i/ shes brtas rdo rje la'ags
268a7(1): pas bdags bamal da zugasas/ sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa sus gsus kyis// yeshes rgya mtsho la yangs pa gang zhigs/ tshad byed rgya mtsham blo sangs bslabs 'gyu pa/ dalegs kyi phra 'a'ags pas lags par 'dad pa
268a8(1): gdog yang dag spyan mngal byed bzhugs shing / ye shes rgyal po'i cod lan legs brgyan pa'i// chos kyi dngu 'bod dam pas dbul bcings pa'i// chos kyi rgyal po'i po phrang bdag kya stan// de nas 'jam dpes gzhon nur gyur pas/ grang zo'i lnga
268a9(1): stangs kyis bcas te/ tshob ban 'i bu nor labangs ma 'di ska kyis bum pa// rig sa ste bu de ltar byed kyis bran byed pa yang dag pa thogs pa'i byang chub tu sems babyed de/ dge ba'i 'ashes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i ba
268a10(1): 'das su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' phyim pa yongs su 'dril bsas pa legs pa legs so// rigs kyi bu 'dis ste/ dge ba'i bshes panyen nams sa lasnyen ci smin pa dang rim grod byas 'ang ni 'ams ca sabyas
268b1(1): tho nyi yongs su zab par 'gyur ba'i gzhil yin te// 'di ni mazhus pa'i rgyu yin gis rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i shes bzhes bkur bas yongs su myi spro bar gyis shig// nor ba bangs kyis smras pa// 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems
268b2(1): rabs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi/ ci wA nan tan tu bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bam mkhar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dud pa ma 'gyi/ 
268b3(1): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyar par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug
268b4(1): bde bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i/ rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
268b5(1): byad pa 'as pa byi pa pa bcas kya ma sems sa las zhes pa sabyed pas byas pas kyi/ sa kya mas saradangs lha byams 'bas su nas pas sum du byams
268b6(1): rtsa gsog/ de nas 'jam dpa' gzhon nur bya rad las tshong dpon gi'u nom ba'adas 'tshigs su gcad de smras pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams gang chen mcho/ de ltar khyod ni ra'i drung bu nyer byin te/ snying rje snying ce rgya cher
268b7(1): gisayid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol ba legs// / 'gro ba thams cad dkrol don tu/ spyod pa tshungs myed don tu sme nas ma rab 'debs shipa// 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di yin/ byang chub
268b8(1): sems dpal brtan pa'i rnams/ 'khor ba'i nang na skyo myed yid kyis sbyor byed pa/ de dag kun tu bzang po'i// spyod pa mthul myed chags myed thob par 'gyur// bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal// de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i
268b9(1): spyod pa sa// / 'grol las phyir skyon byed pa// bsod nams rgyam che dge gzhi dag pa'i mtshan// mthal dang dbus skyed chad myed pa'i// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong 'gyur/ dran pa'i mthu dang sdebs kyis kyang / de dag
268b10(1): chos kyi sprin yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur// de skar byed kyis phyogs bcus / sangs rgyas shing rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang// byang chub spyod pa'idon gyi khyim// de gsunas smon las rgya mcho ga byed 'gyur/ 'odog rten gsosu
269a1(1): bsngal byed cing// gang nams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni 'asul byas nga// 'di tshus rgya mchor zhugs 'brum pa// / de dag kun kyang thams cad gzigs 'gyur pa// khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun drug/ bskal ya
269a2(1): rdul snyed rje kun d+ha bzang zos// spyod pa dam pa dum byas shi / byang chub rnam pa ni ba'i ba'ar 'gyur/ zhing nam sa mtha' dang dbus myed pa// ma lus kun tu bzlas pa rgya mcho spyod par gyis// kun tu bzad pa'i ru mchos phyir
269a3(1): lam rgya chen yongs su rdzogs par byos// / khyod kyi smos la ma zhes/ 'gyur nas// sems can khrag khrig dgal ba yongs su skyes 'gyur cing // kun tu dbang po 'i ye shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu smos pa byed la zhes / de nas 'jam dpal gzhan
269a4(1): bur gyu dad pas tshigs su gcad pa de dag smras nas// tshong dpon gi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces la skem/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na skyed la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sem se ma'i spyod pa yongs su btsal
269a5(1): bam sems pa legs ma legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di sngar dranan skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chubang sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su chos pa de lta bu'i sems can mchis
269a6(1): yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skye 'i yid myed par gyis shig/ dge ba'i shes gnyen bsdu pa la ngoms pa myed par gyis shig// dge ba'i shes gnyen gyis bstan pas 'dzin par gyis shig/ dge ba'i shes gnyen gyi rags
269a7(1): mkhas pa'i spyod pas khrod tho ba byed par gis shig/ rigs kyi bu sgo phyogs kyi rgyad 'di nyid na/ yul gyi mo l+ya zhem mchog ces khyab yod de/ de na mgul legs pa zhes pa'i ri zhig yod pa de la/ dge slong sprin kI dpal zhes bya ba 'jug gis
269a8(1): de'i gan tu sor la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems rapas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ci ltar byang chub
269a9(1): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyom pas spyan par bya ba dang / ji skar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bya ba dang // ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang // ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya
269b1(1): ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar sdug pa ma dmyigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems nabras kun tu babang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shes dang
269b2(1): rig pa'i zhem gzhan de khyod la kun tu babang bu'i spyod pa'i dkyil ladzem ldan ta/ de nas thor dmas ng+ge bu nor bzangs dgal rang sa te/ ma nu zhing nyams brnye la chis zhing yid pra de pa skyes nas 'jam dpal gnog zur mu dzad pa'i rkang la gnyis
269b3(1): la spyi zos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpas gzhon nur gyu rad pa/ sa san rgya stong rtsas ru g.yas phyogs su bskor bar byas nas snyan rgya stong rtsa mam phyir ltas ste hUM/ dge ba'i shes gnyen yid chu 'od ba'i sems dang ldan pas dge ba'i shes gnyen gyi
269b4(1): mthong ba spyi bzod de gdod yi mas gang bar du rtsa zhing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa'i chung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dben gi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis yus myi mo mchog ces bya ba der song sde phyin nas// de yul myi mo mchog nas
269b5(1): rnam par rgyas te/ sngon gi dge ba'i cha kha las byung zhing las rgya chen pos byin gyis rlabs pa'i longs spyod yid su 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing / ri mgul legs pa ga na pa der phyin nas mgul legs t+ya'u 'u
269b6(1): nub kyi phyogs tshams dang / thub byang gi phyogs tshams su yang bya'o/ ste khwa 'og tu'ang lta zhing/ dge slong sprin gi dpal chos tshol ba las des bzhag bdun len pa dang / dge slong sprin gi dpal ri me cig TIg gi sman spong na 'chag
269b7(1): cing 'drub pa mthong byas/ de dge slong sprin gi dpal gan pa der song ste/ dge slong sprin gi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas// dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas ste/ mdun tu 'jug nas thal
269b8(1): mo skyes te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pas thugs su chud par mdzad rgya gsos// bdag gis pA sa myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ma/ ji lngar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spro
269b9(1): pa la bslang bar gyil ba dang / ji ltam namatan du bgyi ba dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i brtsam pa dang / ji skal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji sngar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yongs su
270a1(1): rdzangs par bgyi ba dang / ji lta yongs su dag pa bgyi ba dang / jis 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji skang rjes su 'brang ba ma bgyi ba dang / ji ltar ma nges par sprus pam bgyis dang/ ji lta ba ldas pam dmyigs par
270a2(1): rgyam dang / ji gar byas par 'gyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpal kus tu bang za'i byedang pa'i dkyis 'khar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod mi byang chub segs dpal rnams la gdas ngag dang nges
270a3(1): su ston pa dzad ces pas nas// 'begs pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' blag byed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyum pa ladag la pa swAn tu ga so' / de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis
270a4(1): tsham dpon gyi bu zhing babangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de lta khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la yongs su 'dri ba segs mo legs so
270a5(1): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su bcas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su 'tshal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbyed pa rnam par dag pa yongs
270a6(1): mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa nam/ dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems pa'i rnam par tha rad pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgya yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems
270a7(1): dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las/ 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa/ dang / byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang
270a8(1): 'jigs pas myi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka'o shin tu dka'o// rigs kyi khu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi de bang gi myig gi blo gros dang / dad pa'i myig rnam par dag pas kun tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi/ 'od snar
270a9(1): ba phyir phyogs skyed pa dang / yul kun la logs pa myed cing sgribs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i skag mthongs mkhas pa dang / byig gi sras kun nas/ yongs su dag pa'i rnam par dag pa dang // phyogs kyi chung 'byam klas pa thams
270b1(1): cad su mngom par 'jud pa'i lus kyis 'jud pa la mkhas pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi/ sprin yongs su/ 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad nas mngomya d+hu gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
270b2(1): pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa cig kyang mthong // sangs rgyas gnyis dang bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas stong dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba
270b3(1): dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong nas/ de bzhim gshegs pa tshad myed pa// dpag tu myed pa grangs myed pa bsam
270b4(1): gyis myi khyab pa tshungs pa myed pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pas choms myed pa gzhas du myed pa/ brjod du myed pa dag kyang mthong po// de bzhin gshegs lnga/ 'dzam bu'i gling gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // 
270b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhil pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang stong gnyis dang stong gsum gi stor chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi tshul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong bya'u tu
270b6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed mthong rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing steng gi tshul shin tu bral
270b7(1): snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi tshul smig tu phra ba snyed dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i tshul shin su phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i phrag rgyal chus shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas
270b8(1): kyi zhing bye ba stong gi tshul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyel rgya phrag stong gi tshul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi mong bye ba khram khrig brgya ster gyi rgyal shin tu drang sred nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
270b9(1): brjod du phyed pa'i yang brjod du skyed pa'i nus shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ shar byegs logs su ji lta ba bzhin cu lnga phyogs dang / nub phyogs dadang/ byang phyogs dang / byang gang po phyogs choms drang / shar lde'i phyogs tsha
270b10(1): dge/ dazlas kyi byagam tsams dang / chub tung kyi skyegs rnasas dang / ngag dang cwa'i phyogs kyi'i bzhig gshegs po tsug mnas pa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sang sa rgyas kyi zhing brjo ma myed pa'i yang brjod pa byed pa'i dus shin
271a1(1): phra ba ste ba dag kyang mthor ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer rnam par sbas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mngal ba dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mngal ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mngal ba dang / rgyamachog gi
271a2(1): mthu dang nam par rol dpa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gi 'akyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'od zer gyi 'dra ba snang ba kha dog tum can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / 
271a3(1): pho bra ba dang h+yan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang sku'i tshe tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rnam par dmyigs par mdzad pa/ dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i spos rnam par 'phrul pa
271a4(1): rnam pa sna tshogs mngal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i ngayornam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo/ de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sgo kun nas dmyigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
271a5(1): 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyis dkyil nyid 'khor rnam par dag pa yang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyis khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang le brang rnam khar dag pa'i rgyan mngom thar
271a6(1): mthong bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun nas sna ba pa'idakyil gakhyer rab tu theg pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du na ma khar dmyigs pa bde bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rnam par dag pas t+yany+tsa
271a7(1): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'gre ba thams par bya spro btags pa rab tu theb pa dang/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa su tshad myed pa'i rjesasu 'brang bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo stobs kyis sgo btags
271a8(1): pa rab tu thob pa dad / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgo'i sprin sa sta bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang // ga gis phyogs rgyam mo thams cad kyi sangs
271a9(1): byas rgya mchob gyi dad pa la 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs nam dar snang ba la snying po rab tu theg pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yi nam par 'phrul pa dang // khyu mtsho b+h+rUM gi sathus lung bas rab tu phra bar sdigs zhing
271a10(1): 'dug las sangs rgyas kyi ngas su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad tu 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang /  'ad pa thams gang bu de bzhin gshegs ba mdzang zhing rnam par dasdigs pa dang kyi zas bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran nga'i rnaM la sa pa
271b1(1): sgo btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis lus thams cad bu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang myi bral bas sangs rgyasarjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
271b2(1): thams cad nas mngon par 'phags shing zis kyis mnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang gang gis chus gsum gi de bzhin
271b3(1): gshegs pa li dkyil 'khor dang sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas dus gsum du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa depa/ gang gis dmyigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa cig nas
271b4(1): gcig tu rgyud/ pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmyigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmyigs par sgro btags pal rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skad cig/ gtsigs 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
271b5(1): cad yongs su mya ngan las/ 'da' bar rnam par dmyigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob ya / gang gis ded nyin cig nas thams cad ru de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
271b6(1): sa nas na gyig lasasas sa tha rnadapa ma/ gnas pas snga gags pa ma ba nga/ gang nas de gsapanan ngas sa na/  lathug pa pas #
271b7(1): thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgonas par dmyigs pas / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgogs su yangs pas smre btags pa rab tu thob la dang / gang gis sgra'i che mo cigs sangs rgyas brjod du skyed las byung bas
