271b8(1): mnyem par byal la 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjes su dras pa'i sgo shin tu pra bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / skad cis TIg la 'jig rten gi khams thams cad phra mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmyigs pas gang
271b9(1): gis/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun tu sgro btags pa rab tu theb pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang ye shes skar ba rab tu thob pus gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dgongs pa sgo
271b10(1): matabs pa rab tu yobs dang / rang gi sems dang bsas pa la ltas na de gnan gshegs pa dmas par rab tu snang pa 'ab bas sangs rgyas rjes su drag pa'i ni sems kyis sde bdags pa rab tu tho pa de/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis sa mam
272a1(1): pa rdzi b+ha khu baphags pa'i gzugs rten yongs su ston pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyis spro btags pa rab tu thos pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad ma'i tshul gyis
272a2(1): rgyas pa ba sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya sem po sten pa phyogs kun tu mngos gsum du dmyigs pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dras pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul las sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra
272a3(1): gzugs brnyan li sprin dbyangs sgrog pas chos kyi dbyings dpa nam mkhal kun tu snang pas gang gis sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo na ma kas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'a'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan
272a4(1): sor rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud de nyid na phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'jug gis de'i gas du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa la bslab pa
272a5(1): bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu dadage ba'i shes gnyen de khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang rgyu yongs su bston par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi sa rgya chen po yang khong du chud par byed de/ 
272a6(1): dge ba'i bya ba'i stobs dang shugs su chen por yang yongs su bskye par byed de/ byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang sgra sna chen po yapa yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro// rmeg bu chen po rab tu ldog pa dang snang bar 'gyur
272a7(1): ba'i rgyu nya chen po yang skyed par byed do// pha des tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po yang rab tu rton pa ma byed do// spyod pa rgya mtsho la la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen rnga po yang rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// smon sam yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po
272a8(1): yang yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro// sgo kun nas 'byung pa'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya chen po yang yongs su 'phel bar byed de/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong
272a9(1): sprin gyi dpas kyi rka pa gnyis pa spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong ljin phyi dpal la lan rgya stong bya mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te san rgya stong tu mar phyir bltas nas/ dge slong spris gyi dpas kyi chung nas yong de/ 
272a10(1): 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdol/ bam po nyi shu a dgul pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nam bzangs/ dge ba'i shes gnyen gyi gdam dag de bzhin rjes su was mkha
272b1(1): dang / ye shes snang ba de rjes su dran par khya ga dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam khar tha ra pa de rnam khar dpyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpal ting nge 'dzin kyi tshul de rjes su sbyang pa dang / byang chub sems dpal rgya mtsho'i tshus de
272b2(1): blta ba dang sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor des mngon par mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par sro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjes su bsam pa dang sangs rgyas cig nas TIg tu brgyad pa de rjes
272b3(1): su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' des rjes su blta bar bya ba byed cing wa rod kyis phyogs kyi sdebs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na pa dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ga na
272b4(1): ba der phyin nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin 'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan rgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas dge slong rgya mtsho li sprin gyi mdun tu 'dug
272b5(1): b+he/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa ge bdag ni bla sa skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs ste/ bla na myed pa'i sre ges rgyam mo la 'jug par 'tshes na/ 
272b6(1): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'jig rten gyur las phyir log cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtshal las rgal zhing thams cad mkhyen pa pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba
272b7(1): dang / byim la so lo'i skye bo'i sa las khyen tu 'phags par 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de pa/ 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhipa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyud chu 'jug par 'gyur/ 
272b8(1): pa dang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyad kyi 'khor lo as phyir ldog cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon sam gyi 'khor lor/ 'jug par 'gyur ba/ de / brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jom zhib sangs rgyas kyi dkyis
272b9(1): 'khor 'gyur ba thams cad rtsa rab tu stonod pa dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho la yongs su skems ging snying rje chen po'i rgya mtshol rnam par 'phel par byed pa dang myi khom pa dngangan song dang Tha/ ngas 'gro dpa log par ltung ba thams ca du su
272b10(1): ma gyi das da nyid pa da/ sa thas yang bya thags na nga semam 'bre kyi' ngag ldan pa 'ong byed pa da mas na
273a1(1): phan ma pan khro zhing 'thob thams par 'asdu ba'i sto nas sa yongs su spyad par 'gyur ba mams te/ de skad ces zhus pa dang / dge slong snyam te'i sbyin khyim chong dben gyi bu nor bza mas 'di skad ces rnas sa
273a2(1): mas kyi bu khyod kyis deg nar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs me legasu pa / rims kyi bu dge zang ma pa sa bsnyed pa'i sems thun nams ni byang chub tu byesas kyang gyi 'a ma pa'i mdza'i seM um tu bla na
273a3(1): pas gas pa mnyan ba dang tha pa'i tshe rgya ngo min rgyam zhig sa pas bas nang bar 'gyur ba dang / dus mams rnamam batshas pa phyi na pa bamags pa dang sa ra bam chogs thams da kyicus rtswa 'jam pa das sa
273a4(1): sa na can pas yongs su the ba byed pa dang/ yus dang thogs pas pa bya gyi' dang / spem pa 'dzin pa thams cad pa zang dang /  bya ba ma byed pa'i mas sems mamam pa dang / rang
273a5(1): nga zhing byal pa se sems pas 'anapa dang / srid bsas kyi rgyang 'asus pa tuganas pas 'das pa dang / 'badzin gshegs pas sa ma na par mas pa'i semasapas rnam sa kyang chub tusemal phye ste byi
273a6(1): ma nasas su byams cing da can ma pa dang / sa par la ba lazums bdag sa tu bya phyir che pos mas pa dang / na bsas sa pa kyi brag rdzas kyi
273a7(1): za ga blar bya ba'i phyir ba ba'i sems dang / myi dge ba'i chos thams can rnam par zlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems des/ 'jigs pa thams cad dus sa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying che ba'i sems 'ang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam dpa'
273a8(1): bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa myed pa'i sems dpa'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mthal yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin
273a9(1): gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i phyir/ dri ma myed pa'i sems dang / chu so gsum gyi dmyigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgad pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems sa dang / thams cadu mkhyen pa
273a10(1): pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'artag par bya ba'i phyir/ ye shes kyi/ sems kya skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi/ khyo bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya/ mtsho'i sgo 'dir o bcu gnyis u rgya mtsho la chen po'i de la dmyigs te mngon tu byas nas 'di ltar rgya/ 
273b1(1): mtshol rgya che zhing tshad myed pa la rjes su bsam pa dang dri ma myed cing dang pa dang / za ba mI gting dpag dka' ba dang / bigs kyis gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang
273b2(1): chu'i phung po tshad myed pa dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / srog chags yang po sna tshogs kyi rten tu 'gyur ba dang / sprin chen po'i char yang yongs
273b3(1): su 'dzin pa dang / gang zhig bri bar 'gyur ba myed pa la rjes su sems la byed cing gnas gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so// 'jig rten gi khams 'di ni rgya mtsho' chen po 'di las kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di
273b4(1): bas kyang tshad myed la/ 'di bas kyang ngo char dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam/ snyam ste/ de ltar kho bo tshul bzhin rtsa bsam pa yid la byed pa la khatshon par gnas pa'i rgya mtsho la chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las pad ma chen po nor bu rin po che
273b5(1): en dra ni la thub pa myed cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu la can nor bu rin po che b+he rud+ya/ dam pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser ltar dr-i dam myed pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can tu sa dang thun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po
273b6(1): brgyan gyi sa brgyan pa rin po chem sA gar ba'i gze ba can rgya mtsho tsam cu yangs shing rgya che ba l+h+wa ma yin gyi dbang po rgya stong phrag bcus sdeng po'i spun nas bzung ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rgya stong gyi dra bas dun
273b7(1): nas g.yog pa/ klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus spos mu'i chas mngon par 'phab pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dam dang ris po che'i ljang ldi ngo// se mo ho mang po chus bzung zhing rab tu sbyangs pa/ myi 'am dzam

278a1(1): thar byam gi cos smra / dA pa dang myi ldang ba 'a nyams su stong pa ma byed de/ rtsig pa sa 'am lags thog sa byed pa dang / rab pa lags sogs byed par 'gro ma 'ben na
278a2(1): ma bye ba bzhin na/ rnamams sa byas pa byung gas ga dbe napa sags mas pa nyis bub dang rke tu 'gyur pa byed de/ be na sus bya bdan tshul gang 'byi ba skyed pas ma
278a3(1): zinan pas bya ba ba'inano// rtsal rdul pa dang ma 'bar bar rnyed de// dper na me'i phu le lanan na// sa la ya yongs su gsol bar byed do// nyis dang zla ba 'di gnyi sa sar du 'gyum che zhing de ltar ma du mem mas pas yongs su
278a4(1): na no/ ra ma pa'i 'jigazhen gyi la ba dag su' lus kyis dbang lhur ro/ 'ang ga zhen thos kyi chung ba sa sun tu chags pas ljin gyis kun nas byebs par byas shing rab tu'abam par byed de/ rin pa ni thams cad kyi 'on zeng
278a5(1): sprin gi 'dra bas 'jig rten kun nas byebs par byas shing 'gro ba rasas bu dang 'dra ba'i drus pa'i sprin rab tu 'byed do// kha dog mthal pas pa'i 'od kyi 'dra ba'i sprin ras su bkye zhing phyogs kun tu yang 'gro ste/ re gyur
278a6(1): gar phyog su 'gro'o/ lde phyogs dadang / nub phyogs dang / byang / phyogs dang / byang gar gyi phyogs tshams dpa/ shar sde'i phyogs tshams / dang // lho rus kyi phyogs tshams dang nub byad kyi phyogs tshams du dz+ra tra
278a7(1): rab 'og dang bA'i phyogs su yang 'gro'o// sems kyi skadacigare re zhing yang shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gi khams cig kya pa'ad la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu ya pa'anga'o// 'jig rten gyi 'os
278a8(1): brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gi khams khyel
278a9(1): brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang // 'jig rten gi khams tshad myed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu myed pa dang // 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams bsam gyis
278a10(1): gyi khyag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tshungs pa myed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams zhal tu myed pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams kun tu mja' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams su myed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ngas tshams byed
278a11(1): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du myed pa dag kyang 'dal bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ ji snyed cig bzhugs shing mtshol ba zhes la 'jig rten gyi khams brgya mtshol de dang de dag dang / 
278b1(1): 'jig nyen gyi khams 'i byam rnam pa'i dang me dag dang // 'jig rten gyi khamab kyi phyoms de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag rang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yongs su 'du ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten
278b2(1): gyo khams 'byung ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskas par bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rteran gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang
278b3(1): de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyis/ 'khor de dang / de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig chos ston pal de bzhin gshegs pa de
278b4(1): dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdus shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char
278b5(1): 'bebs shing dang 'gro'o// de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang / spos thams ched dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang // phye ma thams cad rbe dang / bug pa thams cad dang / na la za' thams cad dang / rgyal
278b6(1): mtshan thams cad dpa / lha'i ba dan thams cad dadang / bA re thams cad dang / dra ba thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad kyi mchos pa rgyan/ nam chad par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ga dra d+yen
278b7(1): ji snyed du gsung ba drang bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bshad pa dang / yang dag par 'thos ma dang / yongs su brjo pa dang mas ngag su gsungs pa dang / shis su bstas pa dang / rab
278b8(1): tu 'arjod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to// sungs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag la ji snyed pa de dag rnams cad klong rjes su dran no// sham phyogs su ji lta pa de bzhin du lde phyogs dang / 
278b9(1): nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang byang gang gi phyogs tshams dang lho nub kyi phyogs tshams dang / nub byang gi/ phyogs tshams dang / 'og dang / sted tu khyi phyogs su yang 'jig rten gyi khams cig kyang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams
278b10(1): gnyis dang 'du ya 'ad seM / 'jig rten gyi khams bya rgyanas 'di ga nyen gi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod pa myed pa'i rgyas shin tu zla ba snyed dag kyang 'dis// 'jigazhen gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas com ldan 'das ji ste
278b11(1): khrig 'azugs gis 'tsho ba nyes la// 'din chen gyi lams rgya ma mo de dang de ga dang /  'jig rten gyi khams nam par dag pa de dang de dag nas 'jig rten ga khams kyi su mar gyi kyis 'ato de dpe dag man sa ma khyen pa de dad kun
279a1(1): ban sa ra pas bya ba kyi man nga /  tsu da nyi da sa ma sa ma ma sa
279a2(1): ting ma'ang dza/ na bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'ad ma tog thams cad na sa gzugs sam mnyan gyi can gyis maman pa byed de/ sangs rgyas lanas ldan 'das de dag gis 'thong zhe phya ga sung pa nas rab tu brjod
279a3(1): pa'i ni dag thams can kyang yongs sugs gang ladzin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang ji sred pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran ma sems can gang ma la la mthong 'am 'gyus
279a4(1): rab ba bdang 'brogs par 'byar bar de dag srin kyang bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur la/ sems can pra me 'as ras pa 'am/ babang ba sa mngan pa lang bde ba mam kyi bde ba 'am ma med kyim kho'o
279a5(1): zos mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag sun la yang yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus las myi/ 'dal bar bya ba'i phyir khong ta de dag gi lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par sus byin gyis brlob bo// sems can ji snyed cig khe bo'i drung du 'ong ba de
279a6(1): dag 'ams can kyang byang chub sems pa'i rnam pa sa la sa kun du pane pa 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nam pa ma tham pa rnas par gnos pa den med pa sa rab su bano no// rigs kyi bu 'o thos ni byang chub sems
279a7(1): da zhes gas napazhags pa byed pa sa than tu mdza don/ gshenas pa'i mchen pa dang / ras grorab tu ma pa zhems pas mas yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang dun pa cwo mas par 'ad byang du
279a8(1): sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can// theg pa chen po li nga tshul can/ byang chub sems dpalas ma dang mI 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ thogs pa myed pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i
279a9(1): snying po chud myi gzon pa'i ngang tshul can// byang chub kyi sems yongs su myi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can// sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmyigs pa'i ngang tshul can/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la bya ba dang myi/ 'bral ba'i ngang tshul
279a10(1): can nam mkha' 'jig rten thams cad la myi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chud myi gzon pa'i ngang tshul can ma nyams pa'i ngang tshul cas/ mgod pa'i ngang tshul can/ glags myed pa'i ngang tshul chan// ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul
279a11(1): can rnyog pa myed pa'i ngang tshul can / 'gyod pa myed pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ sems dpa' tshul dang bral ba de dag kyi spyod pa shes ma 'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ sor rigs kyi lung
279b1(1): lbo khyegs kyi rgyar 'di nyid na dra bi la'i grong na ya nI rje'i grong khyer zhes bya ba yod de// de adra li la sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis de ltagam du so ba la ji snyam byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par hA ba dang / 
279b2(1): ji ltar nan tan tu khya ba dris zhig/ de nas tshong dazan gyi bu ner bzangs kyis dge slong rab tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal gas sman rgya stong d+ha me la g.yas phyogs su bskod pa byas le yang yang ltas gas dpe
279b3(1): spong shin tu brtan pa'i chung nas slong ngo // de nas tshong dpos kyi su nor bzangs chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang / byin gyis zhon pa sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gzung myi bcod pa la 'ab
279b4(1): tu brtson pa dus gsum snang bas sems snang bar 'gyur ba/ smon lam chen po yid la byed na/ dang ldan ma/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skye ba pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/ 'dus byas kyi dgal ba thams
279b5(1): cad la myi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khas/ sa thams cad yongs su spyod pa'i smon lam las kyi g.yo ba/ sangs
279b6(1): rgyas thams cad kyi khor kyi dkyil 'khor ba gnas pa myed par gnasapa/ chos kyi snang ba de rjes dran bur bya ga dang/ dge ba'i shesaganyen rjes su dran par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs
279b7(1): yongs su brjod pa byed cing / mabar gyis dra bi sa'i thong rdul rdo rje'i grong khyen du phyin nas dra'i la sprin yongs su chol chos galas gro khyer gri khyams shig na chos bu stan pa'i dos su ser ge'i khri la 'jug cing
279b8(1): srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam shig la chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongs su sten cing 'jug pa mthong ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dri'i la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi ros
279b9(1): phyag ca 9// rba li la hrIn pa lag brgya snong du sa ga yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas macan tu 'jug ste// zas mo gyun nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis ldan byed pa yang dan par rdzogs pa kya
279b10(1): chub tu ses pa bskyed na/ bi skam byang chub sems rapas byang chub sems dpas spyon las bslas par gyib dang / ji ska gan chub bya ba dang / ngos sa byung chub sems dgan byangabacub kyis pas srid pa sa pas chung tham
280a1(1): cad dra rab kyi tshul ba dang / ji kur yongs su skyob ma mchis gling bsam pa btag par 'gyum ba dang / hri skar thub pa mchis shing ldam pa'i bams pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongs su spyo
280a2(1): pa ma zhis gang d+har rje chen po'i stobs yang dag par skye bar 'brum pa dang ji ltar sgo nas nas lam dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnas par 'gyur ba dang // / ji sum sa rig pa'ir ba ba dang sgrib pas rnam par thar zhing shes rab kyi
280a3(1): 'an tshas lams cad la ba'o ga ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / li skar des dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang / slebs pa la mkhas pa 'i dbyings kyi dkyis ma mar yongs su rdzogs shing yang dag par rig pa'i stobs
280a4(1): gzhanan lar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad dkyi khar byang ba myi dad pa'i ya ba dag par 'dzind ci dran pa'i stobs yongs su gnos par 'gyur ba dang / nges ma rtog thams cad kyi phyogs rig pa'i spang pa rjes su rtogs
280a5(1): shing rig pa'i stobs rnam par dag par 'gyum pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting pe 'dzin pa kyi stobs chos thams cad kyi don namapar gdon myi ga khar rab su dbyel ba la brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur
280a6(1): ba ma 'tshal to// degs dra li le sprinas kyis byang chub semasarapal la rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir seng ge li khri de langs te 'bas sa nasatshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la lus thams cad gyis byar byas nas
280a7(1): tshob dpon gi bu nor bzangs la gser gi me tog kyi phung pos mngon par gtor to// nor bu rin po che rin thang myed pa mang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye me dam pas kyang mangs par gtor ro// gos mtshon sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas kha
280a8(1): dog sbyar ba brgya stong phrag rtsams kyang mngon par bkab bo/ spos kyi me tog kha rog rnam pa tha dad cing yid chu 'opa pa/ bstan stug pa mang pos kyang mngon par gtor nas mched pa'i rnam pa gzhan rab kyis kyang mchod pa dang / 
280a9(1): rim 'gro dang / mur sti dang / s+t+waM stang cher byas te/ hA/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bkangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na myed pa yang reg par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bems skyed pa legs so
280a10(1): segs me/ rigs kyi bu grong rim bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsub myi gcad pa'i phyi zhugs pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag
280b1(1): dza~M b+ha ba bzhin rnam par rig par bya bas brtson pa yis/ zhing gi chun thams cad yongs su dag par bya bas// zhugs pa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang gdul pa la wA gon
280b2(1): gnas pa yin nam kyin nas thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhis du brtag pa sa bachon pa yin/ las kyi rigs rnams pad dpa kyi 'gas par gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sto pa 'i rigs lams
280b3(1): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la rab rtsu brtson pa yin/ smon sam gi rigs thams cad rgyad myi gcod pa li phyir yang dag par zhugasu pa yin / chus gsum kyi chud lams 'a ye shes kyis khrod rdza
280b4(1): chud par phye ba zhugs pa yin/ mos pa'i rigs shind tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir batshon pa yin te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par
280b5(1): bar dga' bar byas pa yin/ b+ha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa yin pa/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim
280b6(1): 'gros byas pa yin/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis besulab yin/ myi 'amachi'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag / sngags pa yin/ sa
280b7(1): ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gyi lam rgyad gsum po yongs su gcad pa dang / myi khom pa dang ngan sor gyi lam thams cad bzlog pa'i nga / dbul ba'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bslu ba dang / zhwa

281a1(1): khang byangs dajugs byin par byas pa la// rigs kyi bu del bdag 'di sas rgya sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dmasas byed pa sa/ 'byung bar dga' zhib mthong bar dka' ba la/ khyang
281a2(1): chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la / lag dro bar byed/ pas pha dang ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpal rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan tu 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpal rnams ni sdug sngal gyis du
281a3(1): man pa rnams la skyabs su 'gyur ba // byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro la thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnasu 'gyur bam/ byang chub sems dpal rnams ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis ces pa rnams la
281a4(1): dpung gnyen chu 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpal rnams zhi 'gro ba thams cad ngas song gsum chu sgru pa las yongs su sogs pa 'i phyir chub gyi dkyil khor la/ bu lo/ byang chub sems dpal rnams ni ye shes
281a5(1): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsal nam khar 'phel bar byed pas sade lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpal rnams ni bsod nams rin po che'i mdzod myi zad pa'i gter dang ldan pas rgya mtsho la lta bu'o// byang drad+ya
281a6(1): sems dpa' rnams gi ye shes kyi 'od kyis spang bar byed pasaphyir nyi ma lnga bum/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i ma shin tu mtho pa da ri rab 'a / bumo/ byang chub sems dpa' nam
281a7(1): mi snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu na/ byang chub sems dpal rnams me brgyad kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'jom pas dpal ba pa'abya pa ma/ byang chub sems
281a8(1): dpa' rnams kyi rang 'gyur gyi chos kyi grong khyer du phyind par byed pas rtul phod pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpal rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la byams pa'i rlan yongs su skyems
281a9(1): par byed pas kyi ska bu ma/ byang chub sems dpal rnams ni chos kyi sprin rgya chen po'i mar chen mo mngon par 'bebs pas sbyig lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhi sems can gi dad pa la dgyogs pa'i du
281a10(1): sunam pa 'phel bar byed pas 'char pa lta bu ma/ byang chub sems 'ba' nams ni nus kyi rgyam tsho'i 'amam yongs su stod pa saM enas pas bu'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gi sems can thams cad 'khom pa'i
281b1(1): ma tshal las yang dag par 'grol ba'i phyir pham pa sa zhu'o// byang chub sems dpas rnams zhi sems can thams cad mngon par bzod par bya ba'i phyir mu ste nas lta khru'o// de ltar dra bi la sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor
281b2(1): bzangs kyis mdum du 'jug ste/ tshig gi rgyud de dag gis byang chub sems dpal rnams la yongs su sngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la legs sa legs so zhes sngags so// de ltar des byang chub
281b3(1): sems dpa' yang dag par dgal bar bya ba'i tshig brjod pa'i tshe/ kha'i sgo nas 'od phro ba'i phung po rnams 'di lta bu 'byung ste/ 'od gro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ lha dang
281b4(1): g+ha rtsu phrul chen po'am klu dang klu N+ya phrul chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin rdzu phrul chen po 'am/ dri za dang dri za b+hu phrul chen po 'am/ lha ma yin dang lha ma yin rdzu phrul chen po 'am/ nam mkha' ldi pa dang nam mkhal lding
281b5(1): rtsu grub chen po 'am/ myi 'am ci dang myi 'am ci rdzu phrul chen po 'am// lto phye chen po 'am ste bye chen po'i rdzu phrul chen po 'am/ myi dang myid+hu daphrul chen po 'am/ myi ma yin pa dang myi ma yin pa rdzu phrul chen po
281b6(1): 'am/ tshangs pa dang tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ sems can gang sus mthor yang rung ste/ sA nga 'a des yongs su snang b.rabyas pa de dag dra li la sprin gyi chung ngu rings so de nas des rba
281b7(1): pa la sprin gyis lasas la byin gyis rnams shing las mo sbyar te gnas pa lus dang sems yis par 'gyur ba dga' yarang rgya chen pa skyes pa/ pri 'u chen zil gnas pa/ nga rgyal kyi rgyal ma tshan bcom pa/ na pa la rgya dang bras
281b8(1): pas dbapal rnam par dpa par 'gyur ba de dag snga dra ba la sbyin gyis chos kyi nas grangs yi ge 'i mtsho la'i rgyud kyi brgyag ces bya ba de rtsod rgya chem yang dag las bstan te/ khong du lud pa dang rtogs pa dang / gas pa dang / ri
281b9(1): par byas me/ das nas kyang de dag lams dang phrag skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par byed do to/ dag pa de'i phyid chos kyi bsas la 'dug nas tshong dpon gyi bu nong pa 'angs la 'di skad ces nas bas
281b10(1): mas kyi su ma zas ni rgya ma dang na pa'i rung ba das / ga'i ma num ma las so gsum gyi gang ngan pa'i 'a shin milas mi 'di garnams kyi na gang gas sa rlo yu ba / gnad sbyin dang / drib dang / ma son sa/ 
282a1(1): rnam mkha' lding dang myi 'am yi dang lho phye chen mo dang / spyi dang / phyi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pazhasas kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes so/ lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// de bzhin
282a2(1): rtsa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang yin dang nam mkhal snying dang / kyi'i ma ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / spyi dang sgyi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i wa sa tshogs kyang shes so/ 
282a3(1): thathags kyi bu'i nad cig pa yang zhes po de bzhin du gyu dang / gnod sbyig dang / dril dang l+h+wa ma yig dang / nam mkhal snying dang phyi 'am mi dang / lto byi chen po dang / myi dang na phyi ma yig pa dang zar sa pa 'arnams
282a4(1): kyi tshangs pa'i thad cig pa yang zhes so/ ldanams kyi khwa'i skad la dad pa yang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyis dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang nam mnyal zhipa dang/ kyi las 'i dang po phye chen po dang / 
282a5(1): dang / phyi ma yis pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad nga zhwa dad pa yang shes so/ byol yod kyi skye gnas su skyes pa la sems can rnams kyi/ bad dang / skad dang gying thams cad shes so// sems can
282a6(1): dpyas ba'i sems can nams nad dang mying nams kyang zhes / gshin rje 'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang myid rnamasakyang shes so/ 'phags pa'i skad dang mying rnams kyang deshes so d+yaSh+Ta
282a7(1): 'phags pa ma yin pa'i ska ba dang mying rnams kyang shes so// byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi brda dang tshig dang nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang shes so// sems kyi skad cig re re
282a8(1): yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi mying dang gtam gyi sgra dang tshig tu ldan pa yang rtogs shing khong du chud do// ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen
282a9(1): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la sems can rnams kyi bad dang tshig dang skad dang myid rgya mtshol la 'jug cing shes pa bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rteg gi khams khye ba khrag khrig rgya stong tshad byed pa grangs byed pa khasam gyis myi khyab
282a10(1): tshungs pa myed la/ kug tu mtha' yas pa sra myed pa sa choms skyed pa gzhal bu med pa brjod tu myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa dang / de bzhin tu go/ phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang gang gi byabs tshams
282b1(1): dang / rmang 'i phyogs cham pa dang / nub kyi skyob mtsham sa'ang nub byang kyi phyogs tshams dang // reg dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jog rten gyi khams bye ba khrig khrig rgya sor chad myid pa nas/ 'arjod du skyed pa'i yang 'arjod
282b2(1): byed pa'i lar ge sems can rnams kyi bar dang nges pa'i tshig dang sbed dang phyid rgya mtshol thams cad la'ang 'jug cing shes te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi slaskad kyang shes so// tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shes so// 
282b3(1): rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs snang la dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpal 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya mtshol la zhugs pa de dag dngang / 'gro ba / 
282b4(1): tshogs kyi skad dang kyi rgya mtshol lo zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba lnga tshogs kyi myid shin tu bskas pa rgya mtshol la zhugs pa de dag dang / the gro ba sna cho gri dkyigs rjod pas sa cad la rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa rgya mtshol la
282b5(1): zhugs la de dag dang / tshig thams cad kyi tshams sbyar pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang nga / tshig lhur blangs ste/ bstan pa rgya mtsho la la zhugs pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi/ dmyigs pa thams cad dmyigs
282b6(1): pa tsi ba rnam par spyodad+ha pa rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dgadang/ tshig gis rtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la la zhugs pa de dag dang/ tshig gnyis nas zegs te bstan pra rgya mtsho la zhug sa pa de dag
282b7(1): dang / tshog rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho zhugs pa de dag dang chos thams cad rab tu dbyel bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag da pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs
282b8(1): pa de dag dang dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor nas par dog pa'i rgyas thams cad la zhugs pa de dag dang si go'i 'khor lo'i mthar phyin par bya bas rab tu dbyel ga la khyab pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am da/ yon
282b9(1): tas brjod par nus re skas/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul zhags 'chus na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ reg tshong dpon btang brjod ces bya ba 'jug gis de khrig na chu song la ji ltar byang
282b10(1): chub sems de pa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bu theg par bya ba dang ga ji stanan byung bar bya ba dang / ji lta sems zhes par bzhag par bya ba dris shi/  de na pa tshong dazan gyi bu zho pa bdus kyis dra bi Shas sgrib gyi rkang bu gnyis
283a1(1): 'a gsumasapa/ gas na pa zin kyi zhunas paras byang chub shes pa pa'i gzungs sangs byang sa dang na ma'i phyin ca pas bu ba'as sa dang / byang chub sem par ba'i ma sa rgya rgya

283a7(1): cad kyi gad ma dag mthug par len pa / ges rab kha ma khab pa'i yul dang ldan pa zla zlo kus nas nas pa dag bakhyil sa mngon su mya rad ba / ye shes zham par dag pa'i khyod yul logs pa skyed pa nye ga kun cag pa'i le ges kyi tshul sdang ba dang ldan pa Ta

284a7(1): da kyi kyang kyi rnams kyi la sa 'ang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chus ses dpa' thams cad byams kyi mau dang ma dang skye ma dma' sashes spa 'asob sa 'gyib dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams can byang dzin gyi

284b1(1): gzus ma na pa sa su dpa mas de gsu dang / da kyi 'chas ngas sgrub la 'ams pa de la bu dang / su sum mang na gsus rgyal gyi sa de ga bu dang/ dus khang cu run pam ma byes la mos pa de la bu dang nas lam/ 
284b2(1): dag pa la gnas pa de lta bu dang / nas par dpyad pa'i bsas pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gnas pa'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba la sbyor ba de lta bu 'ang / mngon du 'gyur ba'i sems de lta bus kha dag 'dir mchis te/ 'phags pa zhi bdag yang

284b6(1): myi dge ba las ni phyir zlog par mdzad/ sems can dmyal ba las ni ldog pa mdzadapa/ gnas dang ni bral bar mdzad/ mngon par zhen kha las ni gyen tu spyod pa mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongs
284b7(1): sku 'brel lam mdzad/ thams can mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub par sajed/ chos kyi grong byed tu 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du mangs tshu gyur ba mdzad/ zhes rje chen po la ni rab su bsku bar mngang/ byas sa pa can zal sa 'atus nas/

285b2(1): khams pa san na de bzhin bshes pa pa myangan lam 'das pa rnams kyi dang bres rnam par dgad las snang pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la nani A dang phyi rnams de bzhis gshegs pa'i mchen nyen pa rgyan gyis grub pa byed par snang zhe/ sangs kya
285b3(1): ma ldan 'das de dag gas thams can gyi sa nas pa sa 'ad pa dang / sems pan mi 'jig ces gi nas pas dang pa dang \u0f7f/ sems can gi lam nas pa tha dad pa dang/ sems can mi skye gan sanas pal dang pa dang / sems can gi tshogs nas/

286b7(1): sems dpa'i 'khor gi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cog tubazhugs pa yang myig lam chu sA pa / lho nub kyi phyogs tshams kyi 'arjeg rten gi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs
286b8(1): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lce kun gas ye shes rnam pas snang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpal mnag kyi 'od kun nas 'phro bar btsug phud rab tu 'byang ba las brdzogs pa/ 
286b9(1): snang chub sem pa dathal la bas gyid dkyil langar thams pad dang la sa cis sa brnams pa kya gyig las rdza sna ba// nub byang kyi phyogs rnams kyi 'jig cen ni khasas las kyi brgyan yid du 'ang ba 'di na
286b10(1): ming bag / de badzin bshegs pa ma sa pa la dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lan ga rgyam pa'i ri byed pa'i 'dipas byab/ byang du sem pa dgas sus nyis dpang rig pa pa byed pas mas sa
287a1(1): zas gas pa/  sa sems dpas la sa ma mas dang bas ba 'ams pa kyig+sa sa nga / la 'e sa na yas 'am
287a2(1): ga'abazhin gagags pa dang cas pa yang dag par dgas pas sangs rgyas 'datha cas kyi dbyings su mang ba mi byab/ byang chub shesasar ba sa kyi byings pa tha thams
287a3(1): bar thapa sa rkyang ba blo thas las gyogs pa / byang chub semapa dpa'i 'thar yi dkyis 'khor bams cad dang thabs cig su bzhugs pa sang myig lam du snang ba/ gleng ga phyogs kyi 'jig rten mi las sa can 'i yo
287a4(1): rnam par thang bun/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yen tan grags pa legs pa skyed pa'i rnam rang bur ba dang pal 'ad kyi rgyal la zhes bya ba// byang chub sems
287a5(1): da bol thob pa dang brtson 'grus logs pa byed pa'i blo thos las cigs pa/ byang chub sems dpal mabar gyi dkyil 'khor baman cad dang thabs thos su bzhugs pa yang myig las du spang po/ 
287a6(1): rigs kyi nu thar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag las 'amigs pa phyogs bcul de bzhin gshegs pa dam btsas pa yang dag parathogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rtsa
287a7(1): gin tu phra ba snyed mdzad yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dis kyi byen/ kha ze yang der 'gre ba skyed de/ gan 'dod pas bde la yin pa'i 'jig rten gi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa'ang spang ba mtha' yang
287a8(1): bzhugs te yang mthong je/ tsan dag yod pa'i 'jig rtog gi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'od snang rdo/ rje bzhugs pa yapa mthong / spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gi khams ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'od sngang rin cen
287a9(1): bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // pad ma yod pa'i 'jig rten gi khams la de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'od snang rin cen pad ma bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // gser yod pa'i jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi
287a10(1): ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo po// mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa myi skul pa bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs
287b1(1): pa ya ba mthong po me le nga gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba/ bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // rin ce na dpa la gi dang pa rgyan pa'o 'jig rten li
287b2(1): khams na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos zhi phyogs gang dang dad na/ 'jig rten gi khams gang dang gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin
287b3(1): bgegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong po dus gang dang gang tu dmyigs pa gang dang gapa sa sngon gi spyod pa gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang / sems can 'phrul pa yang dang
287b4(1): gang gi don tu de bzhin mashegs pa gang dang ga pa mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de/ dang de dag kyang mthong ste// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/ bdag kyang der phyis pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos
287b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang las kyang byin pa myed par shes la/ rang na gi lus kyang bar kyang 'gro ba myed par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmyigs pa yang rmyi lam lnga bur shes la/ rang gi
287b6(1): gI sems nam par dmyigs pa yang myi lam dang / 'bral rgya bar shes padang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmyigs pa yang gzugs/ rnyan lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmyigs pa yang chu'i/ 
287b7(1): snod gsal pa lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmyigs pa yang sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmyigs pa sgyu ma ste khur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
287b8(1): gsung yang sgra la rnyan ri'i b+hag a lta bur brjod par shes la/ rang gi sems nas par dmyigs sgra yang snang brtag lnga bur shes pas / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gi rang gi sems kyi byin rlab sa sa sa
287b9(1): gang byung ngo zhes bya ba rjes su goms shing khong tu chud dro/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong gi su dag pas thams cad kyang 'dag sems kyi byin gyi rlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thud pa yang rangag sems kyi byin gyi rnam ma/ thams ca
287b10(1): rnams par 'angs su sbyin par bya ba dang 'dul pa yang reng ni sems kyi byin gyi rlabs med// byang chub sems dpa' rlon mas ma ngan par thub pa su da zhakhams kyi byin gyi rnam pas// rams pa ma khyen du zhin kyi wang byar tu phyin
288a1(1): byag la 'jig sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so / rnam par da pa bsam gyis kyi skab pas rnam pas che ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// langs byas kyi byang rub tu mngom par rdzog pa 'ar 'chang rgyab yang dang
288a2(1): nig sems kyi byin gyi rlangasas / rab kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyas cag gis du byung zhing rnam par 'bral pa yang rang gi sems rgya byin gyi rabs so sas pa mam sa cad tu shin tu phra bar bskul ba'i le shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rung pa
288a3(1): zhes bya bar khob tu chud cing rjes su rtogs so// 5/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bo ni 'di snyam cu sems ste/ dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyis si rang gi sems nyid nye bar brtan par bya'o// chos kyi sprin gis mi rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlam
288a4(1): bar bya'o// sgri ba la'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su ltung bar bya'o// brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems nyid brtan par bya'o// bzod pa khris ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam bur bya'o// ye shes khong du chud par bya ba/ 
288a5(1): la ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol bar bya'o// shes rab kyis zhi rab nga gi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyidamangon par sgrub par bya'o//  sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi
288a6(1): shes ste/ blangs shing yongs su 'dzin par zad na/ kho bos byang chub nasems dpala' chags pa myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chags pa myed par na ma bar spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ska pa 'byub ba'i sangs rgyas
288a7(1): khams da mngon gsum cu zhugs pa'i ring nge 'dzin rab tu thob ba mya ngan las 'das ba skyed pa'i mthal pas rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu rob ya / rus gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur de pa ba'i kus nas bred pa'i ting nge
288a8(1): 'dzin 'i spyod yug gi tshul shes pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tu lus rnam par 'gram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la myi dad pa la nas par sred pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa byin phyogs
288a9(1): skyed pa'i rishes kyi dkyil mamar mi yin ma khams / me ga gi sus la 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyad 'jig cing 'dra ban+d+ha yab// de dag pa banas dang 'jig chen ga khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes byed wa 'i dag gi spyong bzhe pa
288b1(1): 'am man tan pa rde par thus menas/ maung rigs kyi bu sgo phyogs kyi rgyud 'di 'od kyi 'dzam bu gling gi mgal 'bebs par rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod pa / des dug slor khyim tshol rgyal mtshan zhes bya ga rgyag gis/ ro lags sa
288b2(1): so la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gi bu nor bzangs kyis tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong
288b3(1): dben btang brjod pa las rgya stong tu am g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas nas yang dang yang stas te/ tshong dpon gtang brjod kyi yon tan grangs myed pa la snyam par brjod de brtag pa dang / mos par bya ba dang / myi gtang par bya bA ra sems shing rtsa ste/ 
288b4(1): smre sngags bton nas dge ba'i bshes la snyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i shes gnyen gi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i shes gnyen snyen bskur pa dang / dge ba'i shes gnyen gyis sgo ba dang myi 'gal bar byed pa dang / thams cad
288b5(1): ba dad bsapas 'das ces su bas pa dang/ gangasas sa tu byed pa dang / ga mabs du sa kyim sa kyi byabames
288b6(1): ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i shes banyen rnams gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/ dge ba'i ma pa thams cad yongasasu skyed pas pha tsam du sems shing cong dpon btang brjod kyi drung nas som
288b7(1): po/ de nas tshong dpon gi bu nor bzangs tshong dpon bteng brjod kyis bstan pa la rjes su sems shing / tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdam ngag la nan tan du bya ba dgra byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rjes su
288b8(1): 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis kyi khyab pa rjes su dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing bsam gyis myi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'ju bar
288b9(1): bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis myi khyab par bya ba la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin bshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa rjes su lta bar bya ba dang / nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba bsam gyis kyi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang
288b10(1): sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyi rgyag zhe sa su 'brang be bya ba dang / byang chub sems da pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nam mar 'a nga po'i rnam par 'ged pa dang / lhas chos kyi khru byung ba bsam gyis kyi khyab mal yongs su btag pa dang / 'dzin chen
289a1(1): la sa sa pa las nga gams pa dang / byang chub bams dpa'i mas mamasasasas ba mayasasas bya ba dang / byang dum ze du pa'i mam mamathan pa ma'i sa pas

289a3(1): sulabs sa dug byabangasas pas mthos kyi byab ra ti tsugasar byas sa tuma'i sa dang 'as pa thams kyi ma ma' sra rgyas rnam pa dad pang byed pa'i bar mamam 'a bamacis

289a6(1): thams cad kyi bde ba'i las gi sgo dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi myi shes pa'i/ mun pa'i sdig pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sems can thams cad thams
289a7(1): cad mkhyen pa/ nyid la 'god pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam par sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing de'i rkang pa'i khri sa gnyis nas/ tshong dpon gi tshogs rim 'gro dang bkur sti/ sna tshogs
289a8(1): byed pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du rtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan la lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi lus shin/ klubs pa// zer tshugs dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang nga/ bco pa 'am sna tshogs
289b1(1): thegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs byed pa'i chus shin tu phra ba snyed khyis la bye ba 'bres pa'i 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba mthong ngo // nga bram ze dang khyim byedag mang pe la ba la btu pa ni ma la mang po dang rol yan lag sna rdzogs su spyab pa
289b2(1): thams cad dang / rgyan lams cad dang / shes khams can dang / me tog thams cad dang / 'breng ba khams cad dang / gros thams cad dang / phyag pa thams cad dpa / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang / rin po se mam pa cad pa
289b3(1): gnas thams cad dang / sdod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ye byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongs su sdud cing 'gro ba lcug sngal ba rnams dbugs byub pa dang / sems can gyi sems
289b4(1): tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gi bsam kha rnas par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed cing phyogs bcu la bkang ste 'dod pa mthong ngo // pus me'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i
289b5(1): gzugs dpabram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang/ 'jig rtenadam mkham Na'i gzugs dang gzil sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dung myi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud ma mkhas pa'i gzugs dang/ 'jig
289b6(1): ldan pa dang 'jig nyon las 'das pamasas kyi chus dang rgyas pa/ bsapa zhib ma khas pa'i gzugs dang/ 'jig rten pa rjeb dazan/ rnga bya bams khas pa'i gzunas kyi ma byad nas pardzas dang las
289b7(1): pa dbyibs dang rgyan nas be tu sa dang ldan pa/ yid du 'o ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas yid myi bde ba'i sems can rab tudaga' byed cing / chos kyi nor pas dbul ba'i sems can rnams
289b8(1): la phan gdags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'o sems can nams bde bar bya ba dang / log par ltung ba'i sems can nams mngon par 'don pa dang / theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs 'byung ba dang / 
289b9(1): 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su sprul ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grag par bya ba dang / sdig pa'i las zlog pa'i sgra yongs su spags pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par snang ba la sems can gzud pa dang / don spyad pa
289b10(1): sems pan dayod pa dang / dka' ba'i thugapa yongs su byed pa dang / gag par smra ba'i bsdu pa'i dngam la yongs su 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten la dag mun par khyab sa rten pa byed cing khyonas bcu rgyas dam bkang ba dod pa 'a'ang ba te/  rnam
290a1(1): dbyams 'donapa drang phrengasang ba 'gro ba 'am shid dadungs su 'bed pa mags pa dang kun pa'i nas byin pa'i sa pa 'ogos pa 'dugs dang sa byang dang byings sa choms can khyod las rang stsal pa dang byung nas
290a2(1): byeng gi yang spangs pa sangs rgyas kyi yin tan 'arjod pa byed cing chos kyi yongs su slab pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i rjorje pa yongs su brjod / 
290a3(1): dang dbang po dben pa sa sems can 'god pa dang / rang bzhin myed pa'i 'od rab tu tar pa dang / ye shes kyi ngan la 'jig rten rab tu 'bod pa dang / sangs tes gi sanyam pa'i gsus las gims pa yengs su 'arjod pa dang
290a4(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / zard kyis bya ba'i lus la sems can rab tu 'god pa byed cing / phyogs bsu bkang ste 'dod pa mthong ngo // rtsib legs gnyis nas klu'i bu zos
290a5(1): 'jig rten gi rgya ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa lus kyi dbyings bsam gyis myi khyab patu ma dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrus dang gra bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos kyi sprin ri
290a6(1): 'argya lams shes kyi nya pa nas par 'i dbyings pa byin gyis nabs pa dang / mnyas gi sprin byan bsas kyis kyi khyab pas nam sakha'i dbying sa 'ams cang babyas po dang / 'phreng ba'i dris
290a7(1): thamam gis myi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nanan par sgrub pa dang / rin pa che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam kyis kyikhyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad song ba su khengs
290a8(1): par bya ba dang / rin pa tsha la rgyal/ mtshan gi spris pa sam gyis myi khyab pol rgyan dang/ rin po che'i ba da ni gi smin pasam gyis myi khyab pa'i/ rgyan dang/ rin po che'i phyar phul lnga tshogs kyi sprin dang char le sam gyis myi
290a9(1): ba'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po medam pa'i sprin gi char dbab pa las ma gis kyi khab pa'i nyan dang / rin pa che'i me me de sna tshogs dang me tog gi cham khams byis kyi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rig po ze'i sprin pa dkyil me krung chu 'a
290a10(1): kha'i byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chom kyi sprin gi cha bsam kyis kyi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyag dang / lA rdzas kyi me tog rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bu mo chis po chos kyi gru snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gi char
290b1(1): 'bebs po thos me khyom kyi bya ba dang / rin ze mo'i pad mo le la mtho ba'i mu tig gi dra bas rgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dbu'i sIm khri thar zhom lam 'thor ba ba sam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyas dang / rim pa
290b2(1): che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char phabebs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyan dang lha'i lus kyi sprin gi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang gdubs dang / 
290b3(1): rgyal mtshan dang // lnga'i ba dan bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i spris thal mo sbyar te gser gi me tog sil mas snyimakhar khror ba// de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang / khegs pa thams cad du
290b4(1): kha stod pa'i sprin gi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa ba sam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyan// danam mkha'i dbyings la khyen kyis rlob cing spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang gdugs
290b5(1): spos kyi zha bun dang sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gi dkyis 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba/  'jig rten gi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad duHrab tu brgyan

290b7(1): nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // thon ka li dpal gi 'i lunas wA ma yos gi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing ldongs myed pa'i rdul shin tu bra ba snyed 'bru ste/ rje mra yis skyes rnam par 'phrul pa
290b8(1): bsam gis myi khyab la stond cing chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyam pa/ 'jig rten gi khams rgya stong rab tu spyod pa dang / ro'i rgyal po thams cad zab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu skyed pa dang / bcud kyi
290b9(1): kyilal per thams cad gzild kyis gzhan pa dang / bdud kyi se sems cad rab tu gdul ba dang / da rgyal dang rjes pa dang dregs pa thams cad rab tu gsos pa dong/ gnod pa ma sems pa'i sems bzlog pa dga' bar bya ba dang /  chos
290b10(1): ma'i sems phyir 'phrog par bya bya dang / sems pan gams cad kyi skyi ge pa mchos rab tu snyi bram bya dang ni can mongs pa'i rnam par gtul ba dang // can mongs pa'i datha mags tu zhi par bya ba dang sa yin gyi zhum rnam par du
291a1(1): bdang rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang / sdig pa las gyen tu stod pa dang / 'khor ba las 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam ba rgyad thams cad nas rkyen tu spyod de
291a2(1): bya gnas pa myed pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la sems cas rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa
291a3(1): rold tu phyind pa la rab tu dbyed par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu 'god pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su skyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis
291a4(1): sems kyi wad cig me re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par byed pa // tshong dben gyi bu zhon bgangs kyis mthong // rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs byed pa'i rdus shin tu phra ba snyed khyang nas nyan 'os dang
291a5(1): d+hi rang sangs rgyas kyis 'phrul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhend pa rnams la bdag myed pa dang / sems can myed pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing rtag par mngon bar zhend pa rnams la 'phya byed thams cad kyi rtag par yongs su stan pa
291a6(1): rang shA yod 'aras kyi srung gnamasas kyi thug pa dang / de gang gi spyod babag nams byams pa dang / ga'i sug 'khyen pa can rnams sa rkyen pas byang ba'iyin pa 'bre'i bar 'byung ba 'dod pa dpa'
291a7(1): ba thab da dang ska pags bye dpa mapas mal ma na tha
291a8(1): mas pa'as ba ma nyin dang than pa'i bang ba byis bla ga palam 'a sa kyi byas pa padag da sa zhi nogs bye pababyi tu mchog sa das su thugs na
291b1(1): bas kyim nga sa dang /  sa gas yi pa la 'ang dang /  na 'am mapa dan pa yang bdang / yang da pa sa khamams cad sangs sa zung ba dang / yangs tsam pa
291b2(1): ma pa dang/ ris 'gre bya ba dang sebs can zag par lhung gnams kyi ngan sang gi rgyud thams cad rnam par klog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nad dpa gnod pa dang 'jigs pa rnams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i rim tu brtson
291b3(1): sems can gyi don byabs 'jig rten yongs su sbyong bas brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khomam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'bAm par bya ba dang / ras k+She rgal pa yi 'khor
291b4(1): tshar gcod pa byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa 'gengs pa byed pa/ tshong dpon gi khu nor bzangs kyis mthong rje / mdun gyi stong nas kyi 'am ci'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'am tshal
291b5(1): dbang po'i bu me 'khor gyi stong grangs myed pa can dang/ dri za'i dbang po/  sangs rgyas zhi zhing grangs myed pa'i tshul shin tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang po'i Ta/ mo'i 'khor gyi stong grangs myed pa can dag byang nas skra'i rol su
291b6(1): brjod pa dang // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon paro bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam bina'aphrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya
291b7(1): ngan las 'dal ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su bzung pa dang / sems can gi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi sgo thams cad yongs su dag
291b8(1): bar bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams can bstan par bya ba dang ga sgri'i pa'i rlothams cad nam pas zlog par bya ba dbya/ dge la'i ga pa'i sbomams cad yongs su sbed par byed par byed cing chus kyi dbyings khams par chus papa 'ding bu bathong
291b9(1): dbon gi bu ne pa 'das kyis mthong ba/ kha'i skegs 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal pos rin po tshe'u bdun dang ldan zhing stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i 'khor dang sbas pa byang nas//  sbyin pa chen po'i 'ad zes gyi brgyan rab tu 'byed cing rin pa che
292a1(1): 'byung gnas lams cad sangs su btang ba dang / nam du'an tha mas tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbus pa rnams nos dang ldan par bya ba dang / theg gcod pa las 'jig nyon nas par zlog pa dang / byam pa
292a2(1): theg pa sa thams can ras chung gad pa dang ma byin pa len pa dang rab tu bral ba dang / rkyen gyis shin tu da pa'i dum khye ba khram khrib rgya ltang yangs su gtab pa dang / 'dod pas les par ga yes pa las rnam par 'breg par
292a3(1): mngam pa'i byan pas rab yod pa dang / rdzu ca mralasos rnam par brdzes pa dang / grub byed pa la mnas par rab tu da pa dang / rnam 'chis las nas pas bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'jug pa 'ichig rab tu bdad pa dang / 
292a4(1): na ma chin las 'jig nyin rnam par bzlas pa dang / tshan pa mau kyi 'ang ma'i tshasas tu badzan pa dang / gan thas sam dang ldan pa'i byang rgyas sa la las sems pananas lam thos pang / don dam mo tshig rab sa
292a5(1): ba gdon myi za ba la yang dag par 'gad pa dang ngag gi nyes pa thams nga cad lam/ 'ji gzhen rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab rdzu brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gi snying gi dri sa rnams yongs su la sel
292a6(1): tshig/ 'dod pa rung ba dang tshe gshes pa la la phen par sems / san rab tu 'ged pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par pa bzlog pa dang / gzhan gi sems kyi rgyad dgal bar byed pa la rab d+yathun
292a7(1): 'amad pa dang / wA ma 'i rga tha mams cad lam ngas gin rab tu madres pa dpa'/ yod ga nyid kyi ra ba 'ams pa na la ba gtas pa dang ni 'i ba ma ga po khrims cad reb tu gnas pa dang / ni 'azung dang tham ma
292a8(1): rab rib yongs su gsal ba dang / chos nas par dbye ba'i 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang //  rkyen las byung ba 'ag su brjod pa dang / rang bzhin gis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par
292a9(1): bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa myed pa'i tshul la bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rin gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing byebs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgas par 'gengs pa tshod dben gi bu zhi 'bangs kyis mthong ba/ byin gnyis
292a10(1): na nyi ma'i dkyis labar rgya greb sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs sred pa'i rdul shin su zla ba nyid byang ze/ sems can dbyag pa chen po thams cad yongs su srab par byed cing 'ji gsheg gi mus pa zer ba shes pa dang / sems can
292b1(1): rnams kyi gti mu ge wi raba'irig gses pa dang/ grang ba'i sems can dpyas pa na 'khod pa'i sems cas rnams kyi thang pa'i sdug snga la rab tuzhi bar byed pa dang 'aM/ sa'i rang bzhis gi zhing rnams su 'ong kha reg dkapa po can rab su dbyed pa dang / 
292b2(1): zar mi rang bzhin zhi zhing rnams su 'ad bya chu l+ya'i 'a dug can rab tu byed pa dang / b+he ru r+ya'i rang bzhin po zhing rnams su 'ong gser gi kha dog can thu ba cung byed pa dang / dngul gi rang bzhin po zhi rnams su 'ang gser gi pa de gcas
292b3(1): gdangam sa du bdas ma / sa /  gsanam mas kyi kyi pa'i 'ad ma tu byed pa ma nga nyan sa ma
292b4(1): su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu dbyed pa dang / gser gi rang bzhin gi zhing rnams su 'ad sa lpalpags pa'i kha dog can rab tu dgyed pa dang / srin dra ni la 'i rang bzhin gi zhing rnams su 'od rin po/ che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dos
292b5(1): 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyisnying po'i khu dog can rab tu 'byed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gi snying po'i rang bzhin gi zhing rnams su
292b6(1): 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gzhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'byed pa dang / rin po che sna tsho bas kI rang bzhin mi zhi rnams
292b7(1): su 'od rig po che cag gi kha dog can rab tu 'byed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gi dkyil 'khor thams cad tu sems can gi don tshad myed pa la batshen zhing dang / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa chong
292b8(1): dban su 'on pa bangs kyis mthar ba// sbyin mas gnyis kyi mdzod sunas thab yang ste/ sa das rgyas kyi zhing grangs byed pa'i rdul shin tu bra la zher byang nas/ hA'i dbang pa 'ams sad kril da kyis gnan sad 'jig cen
292b9(1): thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dgal ba rnam par zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas lta bar dgal ba la rjes su sngags pa byed cing sems can tshad myed par 'dul pa la rtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs la/ cho
293a1(1): raban gzun ma sa sa/ 'anas panas ma mnan pa spyod pas rab cwam pa yangs rgyam byas pa zangs khyad pa'i nub gis ma la zhed byangams ma sa pa sa dbyangs sul nad pa langs kyas
293a2(1): sa / ba tunas bya ma thams dpa' gang sa ma kyin mangs byed pa khrab med bya nas byings rnamams kyis brgyan pa'i rnam pa sa su tha ci/ dpa' byed par
293a3(1): zas rnam pam bris pa'i dus rab tu bstan pa dang / da kyi kyis 'them sa smin sa' dang dbus byed pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba su'i sus na rang thams cadasas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sman gyi byang chub sems
293a4(1): rapa' byer pa nas bzung ste/ gtong ba dang len pa dang / dngos pa yongs su gtong ba'i rnam pa'i sprin mang po rab tu dbye pa dang / pa reng su phyin pa pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa 'i/ trar+tha
293a5(1): ldanam khyim pa'i rgya mtsha yangs su bstan pa dang / rgyakha'i spyo pa 'jig rten tu yongs su brjod pa dang / sema.Ani dri ma mag par bzlog pa dang / chags pa khams ca
293a6(1): spang ba la sems cam rab tu 'god pa dang / 'drigazhon rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pam byin gyis rlabs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha ro la tu phyind pa la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / 
293a7(1): mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par 'arjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i sgra ston pa byed pa mthong po / yang byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs myed pa'i rdul shin phra ba snyed byung nas
293a8(1): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can tham
293a9(1): 'ad las ni chung dang yul las phyir phyog par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yus la mngon su byegs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gi 'dod pas nam par spa pa dang 'aM/ 'jig rten gi byin gyi zhanas ming ces nom pa du 'bres ba
293b1(1): dalog pa yin su bar rtog pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par 'dod pa dang / zhing rje chen po'i tshul khrims yong su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob pam/ 
293b2(1): bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis ma nan tan tu bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu 'ged pa dpa srid pa'i lam gi rgyud rmi lam lta bub sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing rmi lam gi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhog 'am
293b3(1): bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzind pa dang / nyon mongs pa la dbang spyad pas sems can rnams rab tu 'ged par byed pa mthong ngo yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas 'jig
293b4(1): rten rnams la mdog gser gi kha dog ste bu mngon par stond cing khro ba myed pa dang / 'khrug pa myed pa dang / shar gnyer myed pa dang / zhe sdang myed pa dang / chud gzon pa myed pa dang / kho ba khro ba myed pa'i sems la sems can dpe
293b5(1): tu 'ged pa dang / byol song gyi skye gnas kyi lamang gi rgyud thams cad de yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i
293b6(1): smin rab tu 'gyed cing / bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu 'god pa dpa/ chos la dbang spyad pa la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo ngo// yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
293b7(1): zhing grangs myed pa'i rdus shin phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ste nad cing thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du nyams pa las phyir myi ldog pa'i stobs kyis / 
293b8(1): pa rgya mtsho la yongs su btsal las myi skyo ba yongs su brjod pa dang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim 'gro byangab la sems can rab tu bzung ba dang / sdug sdel gi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus
293b9(1): chen po la sems can rab tu 'bod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gi lto pa mang po'i spris lus thams da pa rab tu 'gyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha ros tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
293b10(1): yongs su ldand pa dang / sems can rnams kyi me ma'i nirnam par spor ba dang ga brtseg 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sems cas rab tu 'azod pa dang / las la dbang gyur ba la/ 'jig rten rab tu gsung ba dang rgyan gyi cha
293b11(1): par brtson par byed pa mthong po// yang byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhi grangs byed pa'i rdul shin tu grag snyed byang nas / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pA'i las la/ sems can thams cad rab tu 'do
294a1(1): na dun ma pa dang / sa kyis kyi sa byam ma na pa nam #ka shA rgyan mas su
294a2(1): zu gams padanam thams gzhan pa yang tu phyid pa dang ldan pam ldan gsul mang ba'i srin rab tur rnas pa dang / semam men pa nga nga sru ga sumams ca rab tu 'azad pa byed cing nan can na sa'im kyi
294a3(1): shes pa mang yang byang chub segs dpa' las nus kyi zhing zangs byed pa'i bu gon sa ma pa med byung gi/ mthu'i bu ma byams ca nas sangs rgyas khyim mo pangs su tshol pa dang ldan pa 'i thun ga ma
294a4(1): dang khams ca kyi shes mtshal las phyid pa da su dag ban pa'i thad papa tu med pa dang
294a5(1): bya rang bzhan pa snga dbyangs rab tu spags pa dang / sems can nams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ro'i sprus rab tu bajig pa dang // lta ba zham sa haMcad kyi bug tu phyur ga dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang nes nu gyi
294a6(1): rab rib nas par bcal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par sngags pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig le re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzanayang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs byed
294a7(1): 'i rgyab shin tu phra ba snyed khyang zhes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gi/ dkyil 'khor/ rab tu brjod pa byed cingab U'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab
294a8(1): tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang ka ta/ theg pa chen po la 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par sngags pa dang
294a9(1): 'khor pa dang mya rtan las 'das pa tha myi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pa rol du phyind pa la sems can rab tu 'god pa de dang / 'jig
294b1(1): rten rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa khyed ci / sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo/ yong byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
294b2(1): myed pa'i rdus shin tu phra la lted byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gi 'brug sgra sgrog cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
294b3(1): kyi smon lam gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gi spyod pa mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang/ smon lam gi pha rol tu phyind pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams
294b4(1): cad la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril pa chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa myi shes pa'i ri
294b5(1): rnam par thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu brjod par byed cing / smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas sems kyi skad cig re re la chosad kyi dbyings rnam par 'argyas par 'gongs par mthong ngo // yang byang
294b6(1): sgra rab tu 'byed pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs nyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgrub ci pa 'byin pa'i sngon gi sbyor bas mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis myi khrung
294b7(1): pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'khor yug dang rdo rje la ri thams cad lus kyi steng rtsa rdib kyang myi mnyam kha'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / skal pas tshig pa thams cad kyi skye rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kye ba sun pa
294b8(1): gnod pa skyed pa'i stobs yongs su bston pa dang / 'jig rten gi khams 'byas klas pa thams cad lag pa'i zil gis nas kha'i dbyings su rten pa 'i skabs yongs su ston pa khyod cing sems kyi ska cig mam
294b9(1): ches kyi dbyings su 'gengs pas rgyan myi gcod pa mthong ngo // yas byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdus shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing
295a1(1): btsul bu ga gams bdag sa bags bya ba sa dang byed ma yangs sa das pa dang ldanapa sa thun ma snyam pa yang ba'i sa rab tu byed pa dang / 'jig rten nam sa sa sangs rgyas khams par kyi/ 
295a2(1): ban can dang thegs// mngan pa gas pa dang ldan pa'i sogs kyis rab tu brjod pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldam tha ma sa shes kyis mngon par bsand pa dang / rlom pa su
295a3(1): thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i le gas mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs smra ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon pan shes pa dang
295a4(1): ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems cad thams cad bdag myed pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems cam thams
295a5(1): kyi mas sharnamacanas pa sa gami mabasasas pa mas paso rnams kyiban da gang / ma par yod kyi bang man stan smra ba'ings ses sengon pa shes
295a6(1): pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ga dang / sems canathams cad kyi bsam la dang mos larnam paralta pa'i ye shes mngon bar shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yab dag par brjod pa
295a7(1): dang sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la/ 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dpe ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par gros pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par
295a8(1): shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su bstan pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / de spyi bo'i gtsug gtong gi gseb nas
295a9(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phral med mtshan dam pa dang dpel byad bzang pos nam khar dag pas brgyan pa 'dam bu'i chu klung gi gser gi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar spang
295a10(1): ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcud wa zhing tshad myed par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs/ mngal ba sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ma 'amathal dang dbus myed par yongs su
295b1(1): btsun pa / 'gro ba thamam cad la la myi dad par chos kyi sprin gi sar mdzes par 'bebs pa ste/ 'di skar snying po byang chub mchog tu byin pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnams la / chos kyi dbyings gzhi'i bye brag mngon pa
295b2(1): gsum tu shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings char mngon par dpab pa dang / byang chub sems dpal dbang skur pa thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos te smismin gi char mngon par dbab pa dang
295b3(1): byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal mtshan du dbang skur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gri char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzho nur gyur da pa rnams la kun nas
295b4(1): brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gi char mngon par dbapa pa dang byang chub sems dpa' phyir myi ldog pa rnams snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi/ sprin gi char mngon par dpapa pa dang / 
295b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa 'i bsam lazham par dag pa denams la ches thams cad kyi rang bzhin gi bye brag shes pa 'i rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin go 'ams ngem par dbab pa dang / 
295b6(1): byang chub sems dpal sngon gyi spyor pa dang ldan pa rnams la 'gropa yongs su bsud pas gus nas rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gi tshar mngon par dpag ga dang / byang chub semasatraH
295b7(1): dpa' cher skyes pagasas pa2/ rgyas gsum gi/ de bzhin gshegs za mi dkyis 'khor mngon gsum du dmyigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyisgron gi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems darje
295b8(1): rnal 'byor sa skyem pa rnams sa chos khams can rang bzhin dang gzhil rab tu zlog pa zhes bya ba'i rjes kyi sdig gi nam mngon par dpab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang za pa rnas pa sa sring rje chen tha'i
295b9(1): sa kyi zhing pa man nan 'byu pams bya pa ma sa sa tha ma pa mas padang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba sbyid pa rnams la/ dgal par thalal pa dag
295b10(1): pal nyepa pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sman gi zhir mngan pa yang bab pa dang / byang chub sems rapa la 'ongs pa mamam nanas mi sa nas par 'ad pa kyi thang ga dang nga/ de bzhin gshes sa pa'i rmonam ma'i
296a1(1): dgal bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gi cha char mngon par dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams gzhol kun tu myi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin ni
296a2(1): tshe mtshan pam dbazal yang tshangs pa'idas kyi lha rnams la tshus rgyas tshol tshad myed pa'i 'phrag sA'i dbyangs shes rgyal 'i chos kyi sngoT gi cham mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang srung gi lga rnams la
296a3(1): stobs 'gyur pa'i chos kyilam khyad kyi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi spris gi/ ma chad mngon par dbab pa dang bdud kyi ris kyi sgra rnams la sems cad lamakhyend pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs
296a4(1): can yang dag par bskyab pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gi char mngon par dpab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gi
296a5(1): char mngon par dbab pa dang dga' ldan gi lha rnams byang chub sems dpa'i smon lem rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan na zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gi char mngon par da bab pa dang
